############################################################################################################
# Russia Events 																				   		   #
############################################################################################################
# First attempted rework by Rylock and Alpinia															   #
############################################################################################################
# Second rework by Matoro, Katie, Frill Shark, Kano, Daru, Deliberus, marimari, Gideones, Targai and DDago #
############################################################################################################
add_namespace = russia_events
add_namespace = russia_elections_events #Russian Election
add_namespace = russia_democratic_events #Democratic Russia
add_namespace = russia_monarchist_events #Monarchist Russia
add_namespace = russia_socialist_events #Socialist Russia
add_namespace = russia_boldyrev_events #Boldyrev
add_namespace = russia_foreign_policy_events #Foreign policyehd
add_namespace = russia_flavour_events #Flavour
add_namespace = russia_news_events #News Events

# russia_events.1-10 = intro and system events
# russia_events.11-150 = Black Monday and other early events
# russia_events.151-200 = Chernov assassination and fallout
# russia_events.120-279 = Savinkov events
# russia_events.280-299 = Voskhod events
# russia_events.400-319 = German Economic Influence events
# russia_events.442-323 = War Planning events
# russia_events.450-399 = Great Patriotic War events
# russia_events.501-513 = Caucasus Unrest events
# russia_events.550-599 = Central Asia Crisis
# russia_events.600-699 = Semyonov events
# russia_events.900-949 = Government changes
# russia_events.950-999 = Triggered anger events
# russia_events.1100> = integration events
# russia_elections_events.1-51 = DemRusAssembly and Election events
# russia_democratic_events.1-125 = Democratic Russia events
# russia_monarchist_events.1-99 = Monarchist Russia events
# russia_socialist_events.1-500 = Socialist Russia events
# russia_boldyrev_events.1-13 = Boldyrev's Free Russia events
# russia_foreign_policy_events.1-214 = Foreign Policy events
# russia_flavour_events.1-111 = Flavour events
# russia_events.1000-1099 = MIO modifiers/effects events
# russia_events.441-1199 = Army events
# russia_events.5000-5005 = Debug events

country_event = { #This is how AI picks paths.
	id = russia_events.10000
	title = russia_events.10000.t
	desc = russia_events.10000.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1
	hidden = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { is_ai = yes }

	option = { #Savinkov
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.10000 option russia_events.10000.a"
		name = russia_events.10000.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 35
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_aftermath option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_aftermath option = RUS_AFTERMATH_AUT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_aftermath option = RUS_AFTERMATH_REG } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_aftermath option = RUS_AFTERMATH_NOT_SOC } }
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
		country_event = { id = russia_events.10001 hours = 6 }
	}
	option = { #Republic
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.10000 option russia_events.10000.b"
		name = russia_events.10000.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_aftermath option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_aftermath option = RUS_AFTERMATH_REP } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_aftermath option = RUS_AFTERMATH_NOT_SOC } }
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_republic_ai
		country_event = { id = russia_events.10003 hours = 6 }
	}
	option = { #Empire
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.10000 option russia_events.10000.c"
		name = russia_events.10000.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_aftermath option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_aftermath option = RUS_AFTERMATH_MON } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_aftermath option = RUS_AFTERMATH_NOT_SOC } }
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_empire_ai
		country_event = { id = russia_events.10004 hours = 6 }
	}
	option = { #Socialist
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.10000 option russia_events.10000.e"
		name = russia_events.10000.e
		ai_chance = {
			base = 15
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_aftermath option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_aftermath option = RUS_AFTERMATH_SOC } }
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_socialist_ai
		country_event = { id = russia_events.10005 hours = 6 }
	}
}

country_event = { #This is how AI picks subpaths for Savinkov.
	id = russia_events.10001
	title = russia_events.10001.t
	desc = russia_events.10001.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1
	hidden = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { is_ai = yes }

	immediate = {
		country_event = { id = russia_events.10002 hours = 6 }
	}

	option = { #Old Svobodniks
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.10001 option russia_events.10001.a"
		log = "KR_Event_Logging;RUSSIA POLITICAL PATH - Old Svobodniks"
		name = russia_events.10001.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 40
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_OLD_SVOBODNIK_NATPOP } }
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_old_svobodnik_ai
	}

	option = { #Solidarists
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.10001 option russia_events.10001.b"
		log = "KR_Event_Logging;RUSSIA POLITICAL PATH - Solidarists"
		name = russia_events.10001.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_SOLIDARIST_NATPOP } }
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_solidarist_ai
	}
	option = { #Ideocrats
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.10001 option russia_events.10001.c"
		log = "KR_Event_Logging;RUSSIA POLITICAL PATH - Ideocrats"
		name = russia_events.10001.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_IDEOCRAT_NATPOP } }
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_ideocrat_ai
	}
}

country_event = { #This is how AI picks if it will do Wrangel path, and what subpath.
	id = russia_events.10002
	title = russia_events.10002.t
	desc = russia_events.10002.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1
	hidden = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { is_ai = yes }

	option = { #No Wrangel
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.10002 option russia_events.10002.a"
		name = russia_events.10002.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 95
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_aftermath option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_aftermath option = RUS_AFTERMATH_AUT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_aftermath option = RUS_AFTERMATH_NOT_SOC } }
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #VPS
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.10002 option russia_events.10002.b"
		log = "KR_Event_Logging;RUSSIA POLITICAL PATH - Wrangel"
		name = russia_events.10002.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 3
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_aftermath option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_aftermath option = RUS_AFTERMATH_REG } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_aftermath option = RUS_AFTERMATH_NOT_SOC } }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_SHULGIN_AUTDEM } }
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_ai
		set_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_vps
	}
	option = { #VPP
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.10002 option russia_events.10002.c"
		log = "KR_Event_Logging;RUSSIA POLITICAL PATH - Wrangel"
		name = russia_events.10002.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_aftermath option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_aftermath option = RUS_AFTERMATH_REG } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_aftermath option = RUS_AFTERMATH_NOT_SOC } }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_GOLITSYN_SOCCON } }
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_ai
		set_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_vpp
	}
	option = { #Kadets
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.10002 option russia_events.10002.e"
		log = "KR_Event_Logging;RUSSIA POLITICAL PATH - Wrangel"
		name = russia_events.10002.e
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_aftermath option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_aftermath option = RUS_AFTERMATH_REG } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_aftermath option = RUS_AFTERMATH_NOT_SOC } }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_KARTASHYOV_MARLIB } }
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_ai
		set_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_kadets
	}
}

country_event = { #This is how AI picks paths for Republic.
	id = russia_events.10003
	title = russia_events.10003.t
	desc = russia_events.10003.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1
	hidden = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { is_ai = yes }

	option = { #RDP
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.10003 option russia_events.10003.a"
		log = "KR_Event_Logging;RUSSIA POLITICAL PATH - RDP"
		name = russia_events.10003.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_SOCDEM } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_REP_SULIMOV_SYNDIE } }
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_rdp_ai
		country_event = russia_events.10006
	}
	option = { #Right SRs
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.10003 option russia_events.10003.b"
		log = "KR_Event_Logging;RUSSIA POLITICAL PATH - Right-SRs (Republic)"
		name = russia_events.10003.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_FONDAMINSKY_SOCLIB } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_SOROKIN_SOCLIB } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_RIKHTER_SOCLIB } }
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_sr_ai
	}
	option = { #Kadets
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.10003 option russia_events.10003.c"
		log = "KR_Event_Logging;RUSSIA POLITICAL PATH - Kadets (Republic)"
		name = russia_events.10003.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_DOLGORUKOV_MARLIB } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_KARTASHYOV_MARLIB } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_MAKLAKOV_MARLIB } }
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_kadet_ai
	}
	option = { #VPP
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.10003 option russia_events.10003.e"
		log = "KR_Event_Logging;RUSSIA POLITICAL PATH - VPP (Republic)"
		name = russia_events.10003.e
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_SOLONEVICH_SOCCON } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_ROMANOV_SOCCON } }
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_vpp_ai
	}
}

country_event = { #This is how AI picks paths for Empire.
	id = russia_events.10004
	title = russia_events.10004.t
	desc = russia_events.10004.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1

	is_triggered_only = yes

				factor = 0

				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_FONDAMINSKY_SOCLIB } }

			base = 30

				factor = 0

				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_NEKRASOV_MARLIB } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_GRONSKY_MARLIB } }
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_kadet_ai
	}
	option = { #VPP
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.10004 option russia_events.10004.c"
		log = "KR_Event_Logging;RUSSIA POLITICAL PATH - VPP (Empire)"
		name = russia_events.10004.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_SOLONEVICH_SOCCON } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_GOLITSYN_SOCCON } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_VERNADSKY_SOCCON } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_ROMANOV_SOCCON } }
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_vpp_ai
	}
}

country_event = { #This is how AI picks paths for Socialists.
	id = russia_events.10005
	title = russia_events.10005.t
	desc = russia_events.10005.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1
	hidden = yes

	trigger = { is_ai = yes }

	option = { #Zdobnov

			base = 1667
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_ZDOBNOV_RADSOC } }

country_event = { #This is how AI picks Leaders for Dems.
	id = russia_events.10006
	title = russia_events.10006.t
	desc = russia_events.10006.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1
	hidden = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { is_ai = yes }

	option = { #Titov
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.10006 option russia_events.10006.a"
		name = russia_events.10006.a
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_rdp_ai }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 75
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_REP_SULIMOV_SYNDIE }
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_titov_ai
	}
	option = { #Sulimov
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.10006 option russia_events.10006.b"
		name = russia_events.10006.b
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_rdp_ai }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_aftermath option = RUS_AFTERMATH_NOT_SOC }
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_aftermath option = RUS_AFTERMATH_REP }
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_SOCDEM }
				}
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_REP_SULIMOV_SYNDIE } }
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_sulimov_ai
	}
	option = { #Rikhter
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.10006 option russia_events.10006.c"
		name = russia_events.10006.c
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_sr_ai }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_RIKHTER_SOCLIB } }
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_rikhter_ai
	}
	option = { #Sorokin
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.10006 option russia_events.10006.e"
		name = russia_events.10006.e
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_sr_ai }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_SOROKIN_SOCLIB } }
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_sorokin_ai
	}
	option = { #Fondaminsky
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.10006 option russia_events.10006.f"
		name = russia_events.10006.f
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_sr_ai }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100

				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }

			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_fondaminsky_ai
	}
	option = { #Maklakov
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.10006 option russia_events.10006.g"

		ai_chance = {
			base = 100

				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_MAKLAKOV_MARLIB } }
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_maklakov_ai
	}

country_event = { #Towards Total War
	id = russia_events.10010
	title = russia_events.10010.t
	desc = russia_events.10010.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_idea = RUS_failed_plan
		#is_ai = yes
		OR = {
			has_government = national_populist
			has_socialist_government = yes
		}
		has_war_with = GER
		surrender_progress > 0.05
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.10010 option russia_events.10010.a"
		name = russia_events.10010.a
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_total_war
			days = 400
		}
		if = {
			limit = { country_exists = FER }
			random_owned_controlled_state = {
				prioritize = { 561 }
				limit = { valid_state_for_spawning_friendly_unit = yes }
				create_unit = {
					division = "division_template = \"Kazachya diviziya\" start_experience_factor = 0.5"
					owner = ROOT
					count = 10
				}
				create_unit = {
					division = "division_template = \"Gvardeyskaya Udr. Diviziya\" start_experience_factor = 0.5"
					owner = ROOT
					count = 10
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

### ECONOMIC EVENTS
country_event = { #Black Monday Hits Russia (triggered by main Black Monday event)
	id = russia_events.5
	title = russia_events.5.t
	desc = russia_events.5.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_run_on_the_banks
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.5 option russia_events.5.a"
		name = russia_events.5.a
		add_ideas = RUS_black_monday_3
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_influence_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_german_economic_influence = yes
		set_country_flag = RUS_Black_Monday_Happened
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_events.6 days = 30 }
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Unemployment Spike
	id = russia_events.6
	title = russia_events.6.t
	desc = russia_events.6.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_run_on_the_banks
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_events.7 days = 30 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.6 option russia_events.6.a"
		name = russia_events.6.a
		RUS_increase_black_monday = yes
	}
}
country_event = { #Banking Bailouts
	id = russia_events.7
	title = russia_events.7.t
	desc = russia_events.7.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_run_on_the_banks
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_events.8 days = 30 }
			country_event = { id = russia_events.12 days = 60 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.7 option russia_events.7.a"
		name = russia_events.7.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_republic_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_empire_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_socialist_ai
				}
			}
		}
		RUS_increase_black_monday = yes
		add_political_power = 25
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.7 option russia_events.7.b"
		name = russia_events.7.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
			}
		}
		RUS_increase_black_monday = yes
		add_political_power = -25
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = 3 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
	}
}
country_event = { #Plight of the Farmers
	id = russia_events.8
	title = russia_events.8.t
	desc = russia_events.8.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_run_on_the_banks
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.8 option russia_events.8.a"
		name = russia_events.8.a
		RUS_increase_black_monday = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.8 option russia_events.8.b"
		name = russia_events.8.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				add = -10
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_republic_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_empire_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_socialist_ai
				}
			}
		}
		RUS_increase_black_monday = yes
		add_political_power = -25
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_government = national_populist } }
			add_stability = 0.03
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Addressing the Shortages
	id = russia_events.12
	title = russia_events.12.t
	desc = russia_events.12.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_shortages

	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { has_government = national_populist }

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.12 option russia_events.12.a"
		name = russia_events.12.a #Divert funds from the military to alleviate the shortages
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
				check_variable = { RUS_popular_anger > 5 }
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { RUS_popular_anger > 1 }
		}
		add_political_power = 50
		add_war_support = -0.1
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.12 option russia_events.12.b"
		name = russia_events.12.b #Our military comes first, and it's our duty to support them
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 1
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_republic_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_empire_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_socialist_ai
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { RUS_military_anger > 1 }
		}
		add_political_power = -25
		add_war_support = 0.10
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.12 option russia_events.12.c"
		name = russia_events.12.c #Do what we can to aid those most affected
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { RUS_popular_anger > 1 }
		}
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		add_political_power = -50
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.12 option russia_events.12.e"
		name = russia_events.12.e #Dig deep - the government needs to help out
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { RUS_popular_anger > 2 }
		}
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		add_political_power = -100
		add_stability = 0.05
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -2 }
		RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
	}
}

#15-17 empty

unit_leader_event = { #Army demands funds
	id = russia_events.30
	title = russia_events.30.t
	desc = russia_events.30.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		NOT = {
			has_completed_focus = RUS_spirit_of_victory
			has_completed_focus = RUS_science_of_victory
			has_completed_focus = RUS_military_production
			has_government = paternal_autocrat
			has_socialist_government = yes
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.30 option russia_events.30.a"
		name = russia_events.30.a
		activate_mission = RUS_army_focus_demand
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_mil_focus_tt
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.30 option russia_events.30.b"
		name = russia_events.30.b
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 2 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
	}
}
unit_leader_event = { #Army furious
	id = russia_events.31
	title = russia_events.31.t
	desc = russia_events.31.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_savinkov = yes
		NOT = {
			has_completed_focus = RUS_spirit_of_victory
			has_completed_focus = RUS_science_of_victory
			has_completed_focus = RUS_military_production
			focus_progress = { focus = RUS_spirit_of_victory progress > 0 }
			focus_progress = { focus = RUS_science_of_victory progress > 0 }
			focus_progress = { focus = RUS_military_production progress > 0 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.31 option russia_events.31.a"
		name = russia_events.31.a
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -3 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.31 option russia_events.31.b"
		name = russia_events.31.b
		add_political_power = -50
		add_popularity = { ideology = paternal_autocrat popularity = 0.05 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Great Patriotic War
	id = russia_events.50
	title = russia_events.50.t

	desc = {
		text = russia_events.50.d.socialist
		trigger = {
			has_socialist_government = yes
			has_war_with = GER
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = russia_events.50.d.democratic_FRA
		trigger = {
			has_elected_government = yes
			has_war_with = FRA
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = russia_events.50.d.authoritarian_FRA
		trigger = {
			has_authoritarian_government = yes
			has_war_with = FRA
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = russia_events.50.d.democratic_GER
		trigger = {
			has_elected_government = yes
			has_war_with = GER
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = russia_events.50.d.authoritarian_GER
		trigger = {
			has_authoritarian_government = yes
			has_war_with = GER
		}
	}

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		is_subject = no
		OR = {
			has_war_with = FRA
			has_war_with = GER
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.50 option russia_events.50.a"
		name = russia_events.50.a #We will march through Avenue des Champs-Elys√©es!
		trigger = {
			has_war_with = FRA
		}
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_war_support = 0.05
		add_manpower = 75000
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.50 option russia_events.50.b"
		name = russia_events.50.b #We will march under Brandenburg Gate!
		trigger = {
			has_war_with = GER
		}
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_war_support = 0.05
		add_manpower = 75000
		hidden_effect = {	### This is how the AI goes to Wrangel in the game rules
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_ai = yes
					RSA = { is_ai = yes }
					has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_ai
				}
				set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 10 }
				RUS_change_military_anger = yes
			}
		}
		#UKR Hard Mode
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = MIE_east_no_help
			}
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_patriotic_war_2
				days = 730
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = russia_events.100

	desc = russia_events.100.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_election

	is_triggered_only = yes

		name = russia_events.100.a
		country_event = { id = russia_events.101 days = 3 } #Standoff in the State Council
	}
}

country_event = { #Three Shots in the Chest
	id = russia_events.104
	title = russia_events.104.t
	desc = russia_events.104.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_gun
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			add_named_threat = {
				threat = 2
				name = RUS_chernov_threat
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.104 option russia_events.104.a"
		name = russia_events.104.a
		add_stability = -0.1
		RUS_viktor_chernov = { kill_character = yes }
		activate_advisor = RUS_aleksandr_dikgof_derental_sic
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_events.105 days = 4 } #Opposition is in Disarray
			country_event = { id = russia_events.500 days = 42 random_days = 6 } #Riots in Southern Russia
			country_event = { id = russia_events.115 days = 5 random_days = 10 } #Kerensky Criticizes Government
			GER = { country_event = { id = germany_black_monday_events.1 days = 1 } }
			news_event = russia_news_events.1
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #The Opposition in Disarray
	id = russia_events.105
	title = russia_events.105.t
	desc = russia_events.105.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_duma

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.105 option russia_events.105.a"
		name = russia_events.105.a
		add_stability = -0.04
		swap_ideas = {
			remove_idea = RUS_entrenched_opposition
			add_idea = RUS_death_throes_of_the_republic
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = -0.05 }
		effect_tooltip = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = radical_socialist
				long_name = RUS_radical_socialist2_party_long_tt
				name = RUS_radical_socialist2_party
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		promote_character = {
			character = RUS_maria_spiridonova
			ideology = radical_socialist_subtype
		}
		promote_character = {
			character = RUS_vladimir_rikhter
			ideology = social_liberal_subtype
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = radical_socialist
				long_name = RUS_radical_socialist2_party_long
				name = RUS_radical_socialist2_party
			}
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = social_liberal
				long_name = RUS_SR_unified_party_long
				name = RUS_SR_unified_party
			}
			country_event = { id = russia_events.106 days = 3 } #The Leonidov Investigation
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Chernov's Funeral
	id = russia_events.109
	title = russia_events.109.t
	desc = russia_events.109.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_chernov

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.109 option russia_events.109.a"
		name = russia_events.109.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
			}
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = -0.04 }
		add_stability = -0.02
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.109 option russia_events.109.b"
		name = russia_events.109.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_republic_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_socialist_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_empire_ai
				}
			}
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = 0.06 }
	}
}

country_event = { #The Last Journey of Kornilov
	id = russia_events.113
	title = russia_events.113.t
	desc = russia_events.113.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_death_kornilov
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.113 option russia_events.113.a"
		name = russia_events.113.a
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.113 option russia_events.113.b"
		name = russia_events.113.b
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = 3 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
	}

	after = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = russia_events.124 #Replacing Kornilov
			country_event = { id = russia_events.244 days = 300 random_days = 150 } #New evidence
		}
	}
}

		name = russia_events.120.a
		add_political_power = 50

		}

country_event = { #Demonstrations in response to Court Control
	id = russia_events.121
	title = russia_events.121.t
	desc = russia_events.121.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_demonstration
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { has_government = national_populist }

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.121 option russia_events.121.a"
		name = russia_events.121.a #Let them demonstrate, if they must
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.121 option russia_events.121.b"
		name = russia_events.121.b #Send in the military to disperse them
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_republic_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_empire_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_socialist_ai
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -0.05 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Replacing Kornilov
	id = russia_events.124
	title = russia_events.124.t
	desc = russia_events.124.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kornilov
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { has_government = national_populist }
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_events.123 days = 5 } #State of Security
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.124 option russia_events.124.a"
		name = russia_events.124.a #Wrangel
		trigger = { has_character = RUS_pyotr_wrangel }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_empire_ai
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_ai
			}
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_pyotr_wrangel_army_chief
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_wrangel_guide_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_army_reshuffle
			days = 180
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_pyotr_wrangel = {
				unit_leader_event = { id = russia_events.133 days = 1 } #Wrangel Pleased
				unit_leader_event = { id = russia_events.30 days = 180 } #Army demands funds
				if = {
					limit = { has_ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype }
					promote_character = { ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype }
				}
				else = {
					add_country_leader_role = {
						country_leader = {
							desc = RUS_pyotr_wrangel_leader_desc
							ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
						}
						promote_leader = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.124 option russia_events.124.b"
		name = russia_events.124.b #Denikin
		trigger = { has_character = RUS_anton_denikin }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_republic_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_socialist_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_ai
			}
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_anton_denikin_army_chief
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_denikin_guide_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_army_reshuffle
			days = 180
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_anton_denikin = {
				unit_leader_event = { id = russia_events.134 days = 1 } #Denikin Pleased
				unit_leader_event = { id = russia_events.30 days = 180 } #Army demands funds
				if = {
					limit = { has_ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype }
					promote_character = { ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype }
				}
				else = {
					add_country_leader_role = {
						country_leader = {
							desc = RUS_anton_denikin_leader_desc
							ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
						}
						promote_leader = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	after = {
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_aleksandr_kolchak = {
				unit_leader_event = { id = russia_events.32 days = 180 } #Navy demands funds
			}
		}
	}
}

	desc = russia_events.125.d

	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { has_government = national_populist }

	trigger = {
		has_character = RUS_karl_gopper
		has_government = national_populist
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.135 option russia_events.135.a"
		name = russia_events.135.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_old_svobodnik_ai
						power_balance_value = { id = RUS_power_balance value < -0.15 }
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_ideocrat_ai
						power_balance_value = { id = RUS_power_balance value < 0.30 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		add_power_balance_value = {
			id = RUS_power_balance
			value = -0.05
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.135 option russia_events.135.b"
		name = russia_events.135.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_old_svobodnik_ai
						power_balance_value = { id = RUS_power_balance value > 0.15 }
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_solidarist_ai
						power_balance_value = { id = RUS_power_balance value > -0.30 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = national_populist popularity = 0.05 }
		add_power_balance_value = {
			id = RUS_power_balance
			value = 0.05
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_karl_gopper = { unit_leader_event = { id = russia_events.136 days = 60 } }
		}
	}
}

unit_leader_event = { #Gopper's Resignation
	id = russia_events.136
	title = russia_events.136.t
	desc = russia_events.136.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_character = RUS_karl_gopper
		has_government = national_populist
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.136 option russia_events.136.a"
		name = russia_events.136.a
		retire_character = RUS_karl_gopper
		set_country_flag = RUS_gopper_retired
	}
}

country_event = { #The Orthodox Church
	id = russia_events.203
	title = russia_events.203.t
	desc = russia_events.203.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_orthodox
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { has_government = national_populist }

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.203 option russia_events.203.a"
		name = russia_events.203.a #Time for some Quid Pro Quo!
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -40
		add_stability = 0.05
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = 3 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.203 option russia_events.203.b"
		name = russia_events.203.b #We're okay with whatever support they'll freely offer
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_republic_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_empire_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_socialist_ai
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 20
		add_stability = 0.03
	}
}

country_event = { #Death of the Patriarch
	id = russia_events.204
	title = russia_events.204.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_government = national_populist }
		text = russia_events.204.d.savinkov
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_socialist_government = yes }
		text = russia_events.204.d.socialist
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_government = national_populist }
			has_socialist_government = no
		}
		text = russia_events.204.d.democratic
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_orthodox
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		set_country_flag = new_patriarch_elected
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.204 option russia_events.204.a"
		name = russia_events.204.a #We pray for Vozhd's health!
		trigger = { has_government = national_populist }
		add_stability = 0.04
		RUS_patriarch = {
			set_character_name = { name = RUS_patriarch_sergy }
			set_portraits = {
				civilian = {
					small = "gfx/interface/advisors/RUS/RUS_patriarch_antony.png"
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.204 option russia_events.204.b"
		name = russia_events.204.b #Pray for People's health!
		trigger = { has_socialist_government = yes }
		add_stability = 0.02
		RUS_patriarch = {
			set_character_name = { name = RUS_patriarch_yevlogy }
			set_portraits = {
				civilian = {
					small = "gfx/interface/advisors/RUS/RUS_patriarch_yevlogy.png"
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.204 option russia_events.204.c"
		name = russia_events.204.c #It is Iosif who will guide the flock!
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				check_variable = { RUS_right_anger < 3 }
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_government = national_populist }
			has_socialist_government = no
		}
		add_stability = 0.03
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		RUS_patriarch = {
			set_character_name = { name = RUS_patriarch_iosif }
			set_portraits = {
				civilian = {
					small = "gfx/interface/advisors/RUS/RUS_patriarch_iosif.png"
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.204 option russia_events.204.e"
		name = russia_events.204.e #It is Yevlogy who will lead us now!
		ai_chance = {
			base = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				check_variable = { RUS_left_anger < 3 }
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_government = national_populist }
			has_socialist_government = no
		}
		add_stability = 0.03
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		RUS_patriarch = {
			set_character_name = { name = RUS_patriarch_yevlogy }
			set_portraits = {
				civilian = {
					small = "gfx/interface/advisors/RUS/RUS_patriarch_yevlogy.png"
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #The Quantification Problem of the VES
	id = russia_events.230
	title = russia_events.230.t
	desc = russia_events.230.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_vosnenensky
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { has_government = national_populist }

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.230 option russia_events.230.a"
		name = russia_events.230.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_expansion_of_VES_bureaucracy
			days = 365
		}
		add_power_balance_value = {
			id = RUS_power_balance
			value = 0.05
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.230 option russia_events.230.b"
		name = russia_events.230.b
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		add_stability = -0.05
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_supreme_economic_council_3 }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_supreme_economic_council_3
				add_idea = RUS_supreme_economic_council_2
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_supreme_economic_council_2 }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_supreme_economic_council_2
				add_idea = RUS_supreme_economic_council_4
			}
		}
		add_power_balance_value = {
			id = RUS_power_balance
			value = -0.05
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_defunded_VES
	}
}

country_event = { #The Army Commissars
	id = russia_events.233
	title = russia_events.233.t
	desc = russia_events.233.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army_1
	trigger = { has_government = national_populist }
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.233 option russia_events.233.a"
		name = russia_events.233.a #Keep army command happy
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				check_variable = { RUS_military_anger < 2 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				check_variable = { RUS_military_anger > 4 }
			}
		}
		swap_ideas = {
			remove_idea = RUS_army_commissars_idea
			add_idea = RUS_army_commissars_idea_2
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.233 option russia_events.233.b"
		name = russia_events.233.b #The commissars will have a great deal of latitude
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
				check_variable = { RUS_military_anger > 2 }
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_events.135 days = 90 } #Cracks in the SZRS Military
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Rise of the Svobodniks

	title = russia_events.238.t
	desc = russia_events.238.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_partisans2
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		has_government = national_populist
		OR = {
			check_variable = { RUS_popular_anger > 1 }
			check_variable = { RUS_military_anger > 1 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.238 option russia_events.238.a"
		name = russia_events.238.a #Let them focus on keeping the people 'happy'
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { RUS_popular_anger > 1 }
		}

			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
				check_variable = { RUS_popular_anger > RUS_military_anger }
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.238 option russia_events.238.b"
		name = russia_events.238.b #We need them to monitor our soldiers
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { RUS_military_anger > 1 }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
				check_variable = { RUS_military_anger > RUS_popular_anger }
			}

					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_old_svobodnik_ai
						power_balance_value = { id = RUS_power_balance value < -0.10 }
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_ideocrat_ai
						power_balance_value = { id = RUS_power_balance value < 0.35 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 50
		add_power_balance_value = {
			id = RUS_power_balance
			value = -0.1
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.242 option russia_events.242.b"
		name = russia_events.242.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_old_svobodnik_ai
						power_balance_value = { id = RUS_power_balance value > 0.10 }
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_solidarist_ai
						power_balance_value = { id = RUS_power_balance value > -0.35 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_war_support = 0.05
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = 5 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		add_power_balance_value = {
			id = RUS_power_balance
			value = 0.1
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #New evidence regarding Chernov assassination
	id = russia_events.244
	title = russia_events.244.t
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_chernov
	desc = russia_events.244.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = russia_events.245 days = 3 } }
	}
	trigger = {
		is_subject = no
		has_government = national_populist
		has_idea = RUS_military_anger
		has_idea = RUS_popular_anger
		NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.244 option russia_events.244.a"
		name = russia_events.244.a #It's just talk
		ai_chance = {
			base = 40
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.04
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.244 option russia_events.244.b"
		name = russia_events.244.b #Punish those who spread such slander
		ai_chance = { base = 60 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_completed_focus = RUS_army_commissars }
			add_political_power = -30
			army_experience = -5
		}
		else = {
			army_experience = -20
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.244 option russia_events.244.c"
		name = russia_events.244.c #Replace the chief of army
		ai_chance = {
			base = 60
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_ai
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -20
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_pyotr_wrangel = { is_army_chief = yes } }
			activate_advisor = RUS_anton_denikin_army_chief
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { RUS_anton_denikin = { is_army_chief = yes } }
			activate_advisor = RUS_pyotr_wrangel_army_chief
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #The Sheeps and the Fools
	id = russia_events.246
	title = russia_events.246.t
	desc = russia_events.246.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { has_government = national_populist }
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_savinkov2
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						RUS_pyotr_savitsky = { is_second_in_command = yes }
						RUS_maksimilian_filonenko = { is_second_in_command = yes }
					}
				}
				country_event = { id = russia_events.247 days = 1 } #Choosing New Chairman-Minister
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.246 option russia_events.246.a"
		name = russia_events.246.a
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_political_power = -40
		retire_character = RUS_pyotr_savitsky
		retire_character = RUS_maksimilian_filonenko
		retire_character = RUS_pavel_agyeyev
		retire_character = RUS_alisa_berkova
		effect_tooltip = { retire_character = RUS_anastasy_vonsyatsky }
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_anastasy_vonsyatsky = { remove_all_country_leader_roles = yes }
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.246 option russia_events.246.b"
		name = russia_events.246.b
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_political_power = -80
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.246 option russia_events.246.c"
		name = russia_events.246.c
		add_stability = -0.05
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		RUS_pyotr_savitsky = { kill_character = yes }
		RUS_maksimilian_filonenko = { kill_character = yes }
		RUS_pavel_agyeyev = { kill_character = yes }
		RUS_alisa_berkova = { kill_character = yes }
		#RUS_ivan_maysky = { kill_character = yes }
		effect_tooltip = { RUS_anastasy_vonsyatsky = { kill_character = yes } }
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_anastasy_vonsyatsky = { remove_all_country_leader_roles = yes }
		}
	}

	after = {
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_disable_factionalism_tt
		set_country_flag = RUS_factionalism_disabled
	}
}

			}

		name = russia_events.247.b

				slot = second_in_command

				desc = RUS_boris_savinkov_leader_desc
				traits = { RUS_vozhd }
				can_be_fired = no
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_disable_factionalism_tt
		set_country_flag = RUS_factionalism_disabled
	}
}

country_event = { #Land Reform Begins
	id = russia_events.252
	title = russia_events.252.t
	desc = russia_events.252.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_SRI_italian_farmers

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.252 option russia_events.252.a"
		name = russia_events.252.a #Let's keep the impact minimal, if we can
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_republic_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_empire_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_socialist_ai
				}
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = 3 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = national_populist }
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = { id = russia_events.253 days = 180 }
				country_event = { id = russia_events.501 days = 90 } #Caucasus Reaffirms Commitment to Land Reform
			}
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = { id = russia_events.255 days = 150 } #Hitch in Reforms
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.252 option russia_events.252.b"
		name = russia_events.252.b #This needs to get done, no matter the reaction
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				check_variable = { RUS_popular_anger > 2 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				check_variable = { RUS_popular_anger > 4 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				check_variable = { RUS_left_anger > 2 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				check_variable = { RUS_left_anger > 4 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_land_reform_improve
		add_to_variable = { land_reform = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = national_populist }
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = { id = russia_events.253 days = 180 } #Land Reform in Central Asia
				country_event = { id = russia_events.254 days = 60 } #Farmer Strikes
				country_event = { id = russia_events.501 days = 90 } #Caucasus Reaffirms Commitment to Land Reform
			}
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = { id = russia_events.255 days = 150 } #A Hitch in Reforms
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = russia_events.253

		name = russia_events.253.a #Deal harshly with the dissent

			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_republic_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_empire_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_socialist_ai
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 50
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.02
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_land_reform_improve
		add_to_variable = { land_reform = 1 }

		RUS_add_CA_unrest = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.253 option russia_events.253.b"
		name = russia_events.253.b #Agree to the tribunal
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				check_variable = { RUS_popular_anger > 2 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				check_variable = { RUS_popular_anger > 4 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
				check_variable = { RUS_military_anger < 6 }
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -4 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
	}

	after = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_events.255 days = 80 } #Hitch in Reforms
		}
	}

country_event = { #Results of Land Reform
	id = russia_events.256
	title = russia_events.256.t
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_farm1

	desc = {
		text = russia_events.256.d.minimal
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { land_reform < 1 }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = russia_events.256.d.low
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { land_reform = 1 }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = russia_events.256.d.moderate
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { land_reform = 2 }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = russia_events.256.d.high
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { land_reform > 2 }
		}
	}
	trigger = { has_government = national_populist }
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_events.299 days = 365 } #Grim Reports from the Countryside
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.256 option russia_events.256.a"
		name = russia_events.256.a #It will have to do
		trigger = { check_variable = { land_reform = 0 } }
		random_core_state = {
			limit = {
				has_state_category = two
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
			increase_state_category_by_one_level = yes
		}
		every_core_state = {
			random_select_amount = 2
			display_individual_scopes = yes
			limit = {
				has_state_category = one
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
			increase_state_category_by_one_level = yes
		}
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_political_power = 40
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.256 option russia_events.256.b"
		name = russia_events.256.b #At least the economy will recover
		trigger = { check_variable = { land_reform = 1 } }
		every_core_state = {
			random_select_amount = 2
			display_individual_scopes = yes
			limit = {
				has_state_category = two
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
			increase_state_category_by_one_level = yes
		}
		every_core_state = {
			random_select_amount = 2
			display_individual_scopes = yes
			limit = {
				has_state_category = one
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
			increase_state_category_by_one_level = yes
		}
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = 2 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		add_stability = 0.075
		add_political_power = 80
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.256 option russia_events.256.c"
		name = russia_events.256.c #Well done!
		trigger = { check_variable = { land_reform = 2 } }
		every_core_state = {
			random_select_amount = 3
			display_individual_scopes = yes
			limit = {
				has_state_category = two
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
			increase_state_category_by_one_level = yes
		}
		every_core_state = {
			random_select_amount = 3
			display_individual_scopes = yes
			limit = {
				has_state_category = one
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
			increase_state_category_by_one_level = yes
		}
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = 4 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		add_stability = 0.1
		add_political_power = 120
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = national_populist }
			RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
		}
		else = {
			RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.256 option russia_events.256.e"
		name = russia_events.256.e #A valiant effort!
		trigger = { check_variable = { land_reform > 2 } }
		every_core_state = {
			random_select_amount = 4
			display_individual_scopes = yes
			limit = {
				has_state_category = two
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
			increase_state_category_by_one_level = yes
		}
		every_core_state = {
			random_select_amount = 4
			display_individual_scopes = yes
			limit = {
				has_state_category = one
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
			increase_state_category_by_one_level = yes
		}
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = 6 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		add_stability = 0.125
		add_political_power = 160
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -2 }
		RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Proposal for Solidarist Government
	id = russia_events.257
	title = russia_events.257.t
	desc = russia_events.257.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_filonenko
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		has_character = RUS_maksimilian_filonenko
		has_government = national_populist
		RUS_maksimilian_filonenko = { is_second_in_command = no }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_factionalism_disabled }
		NOT = {
			AND = {
				is_ai = yes
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_OLD_SVOBODNIK_NATPOP }
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_IDEOCRAT_NATPOP }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.257 option russia_events.257.a"
		name = russia_events.257.a
		ai_chance = {
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_old_svobodnik_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_ideocrat_ai
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { RUS_maksimilian_filonenko = { is_hired_as_advisor = yes } }
				deactivate_advisor = RUS_maksimilian_filonenko_advisor
			}
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_maksimilian_filonenko_sic
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_filonenko_tt
		effect_tooltip = {
			add_power_balance_value = {
				id = RUS_power_balance
				value = -0.1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.257 option russia_events.257.b"
		name = russia_events.257.b
		ai_chance = {
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_solidarist_ai
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -5 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.257 option russia_events.257.c"
		name = russia_events.257.c
		ai_chance = {
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_solidarist_ai
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -40
		add_stability = -0.05
		retire_character = RUS_maksimilian_filonenko
		add_power_balance_value = {
			id = RUS_power_balance
			value = 0.2
		}
	}
}

			base = 100

			}

			id = RUS_power_balance
			value = -0.2
		}
		retire_character = RUS_pyotr_savitsky

country_event = { #New Supreme Commander-in-Chief
	id = russia_events.259
	title = russia_events.259.t
	desc = russia_events.259.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_savinkov2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_government = national_populist
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.259 option russia_events.259.a"
		name = russia_events.259.a #General Gopper
		trigger = { has_character = RUS_karl_gopper }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_old_svobodnik_ai
						power_balance_value = { id = RUS_power_balance value < -0.10 }
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_ideocrat_ai
						power_balance_value = { id = RUS_power_balance value < 0.35 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -25
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		RUS_karl_gopper = { promote_leader = yes }
		activate_advisor = RUS_karl_gopper_army_chief
		add_power_balance_value = {
			id = RUS_power_balance
			value = -0.1
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.259 option russia_events.259.b"
		name = russia_events.259.b #General Turkul
		ai_chance = { base = 100 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		RUS_anton_turkul = { promote_leader = yes }
		add_advisor_role = {
			character = RUS_anton_turkul
			activate = yes
			advisor = {
				slot = army_chief
				idea_token = RUS_anton_turkul_army_chief
				desc = RUS_anton_turkul_commander_desc
				traits = { KR_army_chief_manoeuvre_1 }
				cost = 50
				can_be_fired = no
			}
		}
		RUS_yevgeny_miller = { promote_leader = yes }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.259 option russia_events.259.c"
		name = russia_events.259.c #General Manstein
		trigger = {
			has_character = RUS_vladimir_manstein
			NOT = { RUS_vladimir_manstein = { has_character_flag = RUS_UKR_governor } } #In case he dies later, disable him as option
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_old_svobodnik_ai
						power_balance_value = { id = RUS_power_balance value > 0.10 }
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_solidarist_ai
						power_balance_value = { id = RUS_power_balance value > -0.35 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 2 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		RUS_vladimir_manstein = { promote_leader = yes }
		add_advisor_role = {
			character = RUS_vladimir_manstein
			activate = yes
			advisor = {
				slot = army_chief
				idea_token = RUS_vladimir_manstein_army_chief
				desc = RUS_vladimir_manstein_high_command_desc
				traits = { KR_army_chief_morale_2 }
				cost = 100
				can_be_fired = no
			}
		}
		add_power_balance_value = {
			id = RUS_power_balance
			value = 0.1
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.259 option russia_events.259.e"
		name = russia_events.259.e #General Pyotr Glazenap
		ai_chance = { base = 100 }
		add_political_power = 25
		add_advisor_role = {
			character = RUS_pyotr_glazenap
			activate = yes
			advisor = {
				slot = army_chief
				idea_token = RUS_pyotr_glazenap_army_chief
				desc = RUS_pyotr_glazenap_high_command_desc
				traits = { KR_army_chief_manoeuvre_2 }
				cost = 100
				can_be_fired = no
			}
		}
	}

	after = {
		set_country_flag = RUS_has_loyalist_commander
	}
}

	id = russia_events.264

	desc = russia_events.264.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_vendzyagolsky

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.264 option russia_events.264.a"
		name = russia_events.264.a #Vendzyagolsky is brilliant already!
		ai_chance = { base = 100 }
		add_trait = {
			character = RUS_karol_vendzyagolsky
			slot = political_advisor
			trait = RUS_minister_of_propaganda_1
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.264 option russia_events.264.b"
		name = russia_events.264.b #Savitsky's vision is revolutionary.
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_old_svobodnik_ai
						power_balance_value = { id = RUS_power_balance value > 0.10 }
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_solidarist_ai
						power_balance_value = { id = RUS_power_balance value > -0.35 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_pyotr_savitsky = { is_second_in_command = yes } }
			add_trait = {
				character = RUS_pyotr_savitsky
				slot = second_in_command
				trait = RUS_minister_of_propaganda_2
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = {
				character = RUS_pyotr_savitsky
				slot = political_advisor
				trait = RUS_minister_of_propaganda_2
			}
		}
		add_power_balance_value = {
			id = RUS_power_balance
			value = 0.1
		}
	}

					}
				}
			}

				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_ideocrat_ai }
				check_variable = { RUS_popular_anger > 2 }
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_centralise_federal_system
			days = 365
		}
		add_power_balance_value = {
			id = RUS_power_balance
			value = 0.1
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_centralisation_tt
		effect_tooltip = {
			add_political_power = 200
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_unitary_state
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_towards_unitary_state_tt
	}
}

country_event = { #Terror Bombing Question
	id = russia_events.267
	title = russia_events.267.t
	desc = russia_events.267.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_Boris_Savinkov
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { has_government = national_populist }

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.267 option russia_events.267.a"
		name = russia_events.267.a #Make every German cower in fear
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_old_svobodnik_ai
						power_balance_value = { id = RUS_power_balance value > 0.15 }
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_solidarist_ai
						power_balance_value = { id = RUS_power_balance value > -0.30 }
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 1000
				has_country_flag = RUS_socialist_ai
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
				check_variable = { RUS_military_anger > 2 }
			}
		}
		add_ideas = RUS_terror_bomber_school
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_terror_bomb_tt
		add_power_balance_value = {
			id = RUS_power_balance
			value = 0.05
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_terror_bomb_exclusive_tt
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.267 option russia_events.267.b"
		name = russia_events.267.b #Wars are not won through terror but destruction
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_socialist_ai
			}
		}

		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
	}

				factor = 0.5

			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				check_variable = { RUS_popular_anger > 7 }
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = 0.04 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = 0.02 }

		RUS_change_popular_anger = yes

		}

country_event = { #MA Economic Organisation yearly plan
	id = russia_events.292
	title = russia_events.292.t
	desc = russia_events.292.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_industry
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_events.292 days = 365 }
			remove_ideas = {
				RUS_MA_mech_plan
				RUS_MA_navy_plan
				RUS_MA_air_plan
				RUS_MA_infra_plan
			}
			if = { #This idea should NEVER trigger on_remove effect if it was not already present, or else you break synthetic refinery rubber production!
				limit = { has_idea = RUS_MA_autarky_plan }
				remove_ideas = RUS_MA_autarky_plan
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.292 option russia_events.292.a"
		name = russia_events.292.a #Army mechanisation
		ai_chance = { base = 20 }
		add_ideas = RUS_MA_mech_plan
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.292 option russia_events.292.b"
		name = russia_events.292.b #Contest the seas
		trigger = { GER = { is_faction_leader = no } }
		ai_chance = { base = 5 }
		add_ideas = RUS_MA_navy_plan
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.292 option russia_events.292.c"
		name = russia_events.292.c #Avitation production
		ai_chance = { base = 10 }
		add_ideas = RUS_MA_air_plan
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.292 option russia_events.292.e"
		name = russia_events.292.e #Infra projects
		ai_chance = { base = 15 }
		add_ideas = RUS_MA_infra_plan
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.292 option russia_events.292.f"
		name = russia_events.292.f #Resource autarky
		ai_chance = { base = 15 }
		add_ideas = RUS_MA_autarky_plan
	}

	after = {
		every_other_country = {
			limit = { is_in_array = { MEC.economic_sphere:members = THIS } }
			country_event = russia_events.293
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #MA Economic Organisation yearly plan for members
	id = russia_events.293
	title = russia_events.293.t
	desc = russia_events.293.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_industry
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_ideas = {
				RUS_MA_mech_plan
				RUS_MA_navy_plan
				RUS_MA_air_plan
				RUS_MA_infra_plan
			}
			if = { #This idea should NEVER trigger on_remove effect if it was not already present, or else you break synthetic refinery rubber production!
				limit = { has_idea = RUS_MA_autarky_plan }
				remove_ideas = RUS_MA_autarky_plan
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.293 option russia_events.293.a"
		name = russia_events.293.a #Accept
		if = {
			limit = { RUS = { has_idea = RUS_MA_mech_plan } }
			add_ideas = RUS_MA_mech_plan
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { RUS = { has_idea = RUS_MA_navy_plan } }
			add_ideas = RUS_MA_navy_plan
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { RUS = { has_idea = RUS_MA_air_plan } }
			add_ideas = RUS_MA_air_plan
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { RUS = { has_idea = RUS_MA_infra_plan } }
			add_ideas = RUS_MA_infra_plan
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { RUS = { has_idea = RUS_MA_autarky_plan } }
			add_ideas = RUS_MA_autarky_plan
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.293 option russia_events.293.b"
		name = russia_events.293.b #Opt out
		add_political_power = -20
	}
}

country_event = { #The Loyalty Clause
	id = russia_events.294
	title = russia_events.294.t
	desc = russia_events.294.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_duma
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { has_government = national_populist }

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.294 option russia_events.294.a"
		name = russia_events.294.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_old_svobodnik_ai
						power_balance_value = { id = RUS_power_balance value > 0.15 }
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_solidarist_ai
						power_balance_value = { id = RUS_power_balance value > -0.30 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 50
		add_popularity = { ideology = national_populist popularity = 0.05 }
		add_power_balance_value = {
			id = RUS_power_balance
			value = 0.05
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.294 option russia_events.294.b"
		name = russia_events.294.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_old_svobodnik_ai
						power_balance_value = { id = RUS_power_balance value < -0.15 }
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_ideocrat_ai
						power_balance_value = { id = RUS_power_balance value < 0.30 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_power_balance_value = {
			id = RUS_power_balance
			value = -0.05
		}
	}
}

		add_popularity = { ideology = totalist popularity = -0.02 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = -0.02 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = -0.02 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = -0.02 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = -0.02 }
	}
}
country_event = { #Decree on Universities
	id = russia_events.296
	title = russia_events.296.t
	desc = russia_events.296.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_Young_Pioneers
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { has_government = national_populist }

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.296 option russia_events.296.a"
		name = russia_events.296.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_old_svobodnik_ai
						power_balance_value = { id = RUS_power_balance value > 0.10 }
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_solidarist_ai
						power_balance_value = { id = RUS_power_balance value > -0.35 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_popularity = { ideology = national_populist popularity = 0.02 }
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_purged_universities
			days = 700
		}
		add_power_balance_value = {
			id = RUS_power_balance
			value = 0.1
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.296 option russia_events.296.b"
		name = russia_events.296.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_old_svobodnik_ai
						power_balance_value = { id = RUS_power_balance value < -0.15 }
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_ideocrat_ai
						power_balance_value = { id = RUS_power_balance value < 0.30 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = authoritarian_democrat popularity = 0.05 }
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_purged_universities
			days = 400
		}
		add_power_balance_value = {
			id = RUS_power_balance
			value = -0.05
		}
	}
}
