country_event = { #Grim Reports from the Countryside
	id = russia_events.299
	title = russia_events.299.t
	desc = russia_events.299.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_vosnenensky
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { has_government = national_populist }

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.299 option russia_events.299.a"
		name = russia_events.299.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
				check_variable = { RUS_popular_anger < 3 }
			}
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = 0.03 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = 0.03 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.299 option russia_events.299.b"
		name = russia_events.299.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
				check_variable = { RUS_popular_anger > 2 }
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -100
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.299 option russia_events.299.c"
		name = russia_events.299.c
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		add_stability = -0.05
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
	}
}

 ### Post-War Savinkov Events

country_event = { #Veering Towards New War
	id = russia_events.300
	title = russia_events.300.t
	desc = russia_events.300.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_meeting
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { RUS_maksimilian_filonenko = { is_second_in_command = yes } }

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.300 option russia_events.300.a"
		name = russia_events.300.a
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_events.301 days = 3 }
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Paranoia and Conspiracy
	id = russia_events.301
	title = russia_events.301.t
	desc = russia_events.301.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_filonenko
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.301 option russia_events.301.a"
		name = russia_events.301.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_ai = yes
				has_country_flag = RUS_solidarist_ai
			}
			country_event = { id = russia_events.304 days = 1 } #Slaying the Shadow of Savinkov
		}
		else = {
			set_variable = { RUS_klepikov_conspiracy = 0 }
			activate_mission = RUS_conspiracy_collapse
			activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_recruit_wrangel target = ROOT }
			activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_recruit_denikin target = ROOT }
			activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_recruit_georgievsky target = ROOT }
			activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_recruit_voznesensky target = ROOT }
			activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_recruit_yusupov target = ROOT }
			activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_recruit_vonsyatsky target = ROOT }
			activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_recruit_berkova target = ROOT }
			activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_recruit_vysheslavtsev target = ROOT }
			activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_recruit_gopper target = ROOT }
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #The Conspiracy Unravels
	id = russia_events.303
	title = russia_events.303.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_out_of_time }
		text = russia_events.303.d1
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_out_of_time } }
		text = russia_events.303.d2
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_trial_1
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_mission = RUS_conspiracy_collapse
			remove_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_recruit_wrangel target = ROOT }
			remove_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_recruit_denikin target = ROOT }
			remove_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_recruit_georgievsky target = ROOT }
			remove_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_recruit_voznesensky target = ROOT }
			remove_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_recruit_yusupov target = ROOT }
			remove_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_recruit_vonsyatsky target = ROOT }
			remove_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_recruit_berkova target = ROOT }
			remove_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_recruit_vysheslavtsev target = ROOT }
			remove_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_recruit_gopper target = ROOT }
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.303 option russia_events.303.a"
		name = russia_events.303.a
		add_stability = -0.1
		RUS_maksimilian_filonenko = { kill_character = yes }
		RUS_mikhail_georgiyevsky = { kill_character = yes }
		if = {
			limit = { has_character = RUS_karl_gopper }
			retire_character = RUS_karl_gopper
		}
		set_power_balance = {
			id = RUS_power_balance
			left_side = RUS_solidarist
			right_side = RUS_ideocrat
			set_value = 0.1
		}
		if = {
			limit = { is_in_coalition_with_authoritarian_democrat = yes }
			end_coalition = yes
			add_popularity = { ideology = authoritarian_democrat popularity = -0.1 }
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_out_of_time
		activate_advisor = RUS_aleksandr_dikgof_derental_sic
		uncomplete_national_focus = { focus = RUS_codification_of_regime uncomplete_children = yes }
	}
}
country_event = { #Slaying the Shadow of Savinkov
	id = russia_events.304
	title = russia_events.304.t
	desc = russia_events.304.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_filonenko
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_mission = RUS_conspiracy_collapse
			remove_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_recruit_wrangel target = ROOT }
			remove_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_recruit_denikin target = ROOT }
			remove_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_recruit_georgievsky target = ROOT }
			remove_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_recruit_voznesensky target = ROOT }
			remove_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_recruit_yusupov target = ROOT }
			remove_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_recruit_vonsyatsky target = ROOT }
			remove_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_recruit_berkova target = ROOT }
			remove_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_recruit_vysheslavtsev target = ROOT }
			remove_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_recruit_gopper target = ROOT }
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.304 option russia_events.304.a"
		name = russia_events.304.a
		add_stability = -0.15
		RUS_flegont_klepikov = { kill_character = yes }
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_events.305 days = 7 }
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #The Palace Coup
	id = russia_events.305
	title = russia_events.305.t
	desc = russia_events.305.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_meeting
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.305 option russia_events.305.a"
		name = russia_events.305.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_anton_denikin = { is_second_in_command = no }
				RUS_pyotr_wrangel = { is_second_in_command = no }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_character = RUS_karl_gopper }
				activate_advisor = RUS_karl_gopper_army_chief
				RUS_karl_gopper = {
					promote_leader = yes
					set_can_be_fired_in_advisor_role = {
						slot = army_chief
						value = no
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { RUS_aleksandr_kutepov = { has_advisor_role = army_chief } }
				activate_advisor = RUS_aleksandr_kutepov_army_chief
				RUS_aleksandr_kutepov = {
					promote_leader = yes
					set_can_be_fired_in_advisor_role = {
						slot = army_chief
						value = no
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				RUS_aleksandr_kutepov = {
					add_advisor_role = {
						advisor = {
							slot = army_chief
							idea_token = RUS_aleksandr_kutepov_army_chief
							desc = RUS_aleksandr_kutepov_high_command_desc
							traits = { KR_army_chief_reform_2 }
							cost = 100
							can_be_fired = no
						}
						activate = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Relaxation of the Economy
	id = russia_events.306
	title = russia_events.306.t
	desc = russia_events.306.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_economic_policy
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.306 option russia_events.306.a"
		name = russia_events.306.a
		add_political_power = 100
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_controlled_by = ROOT
				infrastructure > 3
			}
			add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1
		}
		add_stability = -0.15
		retire_character = RUS_aleksandr_voznesensky
		every_owned_state = { RUS_remove_VES_modifier = yes }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.306 option russia_events.306.b"
		name = russia_events.306.b
		add_popularity = { ideology = authoritarian_democrat popularity = 0.05 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_artels_chamber }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_artels_chamber
				add_idea = RUS_artels_chamber_2
			}
		}
		else = {
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_artels
				add_idea = RUS_artels_chamber
			}
		}
		retire_character = RUS_aleksandr_voznesensky
	}
}

	id = russia_events.307
	title = russia_events.307.t
	desc = russia_events.307.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_trial_big
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.307 option russia_events.307.a"
		name = russia_events.307.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_old_svobodnik_ai
						power_balance_value = { id = RUS_power_balance value < -0.05 }
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_ideocrat_ai
						power_balance_value = { id = RUS_power_balance value < 0.40 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 50
		add_manpower = 120400
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_state_guard_2 }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_state_guard_2
				add_idea = RUS_state_guard_1
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.1
		add_popularity = { ideology = national_populist popularity = -0.1 }
		add_power_balance_value = {
			id = RUS_power_balance
			value = -0.15
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.307 option russia_events.307.b"
		name = russia_events.307.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_old_svobodnik_ai
						power_balance_value = { id = RUS_power_balance value > 0.05 }
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_solidarist_ai
						power_balance_value = { id = RUS_power_balance value > -0.40 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = authoritarian_democrat popularity = -0.05 }
		add_power_balance_value = {
			id = RUS_power_balance
			value = 0.15
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Robbing of Europe
	id = russia_events.312
	title = russia_events.312.t
	desc = russia_events.312.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_authoritarian_government = yes
			has_government = social_conservative
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.312 option russia_events.312.a"
		name = russia_events.312.a
		every_subject_country = {
			limit = {
				is_german_tag = yes
				is_subject_of = ROOT
			}
			add_stability = -0.1
		}
		random_state = {
			limit = {
				controller = { is_subject_of = ROOT }
				is_germany = yes
				arms_factory > 2
			}
			remove_building = { type = arms_factory level = 2 }
		}
		random_state = {
			limit = {
				controller = { is_subject_of = ROOT }
				is_germany = yes
				industrial_complex > 2
			}
			remove_building = { type = industrial_complex level = 2 }
		}
		random_state = {
			limit = {
				controller = { is_subject_of = ROOT }
				is_germany = yes
				industrial_complex > 2
			}
			remove_building = { type = industrial_complex level = 2 }
		}
		random_core_state = {
			limit = {
				free_building_slots = { building = arms_factory size > 2 }
			}
			add_building_construction = { type = arms_factory level = 2 instant_build = yes }
		}
		random_core_state = {
			limit = {
				free_building_slots = { building = industrial_complex size > 2 }
			}
			add_building_construction = { type = industrial_complex level = 2 instant_build = yes }
		}
		random_core_state = {
			limit = {
				free_building_slots = { building = industrial_complex size > 2 }
			}
			add_building_construction = { type = industrial_complex level = 2 instant_build = yes }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_dlc_aat = yes }
			random_military_industrial_organization = { add_mio_funds = 750 }
			random_military_industrial_organization = { add_mio_funds = 650 }
			random_military_industrial_organization = { add_mio_funds = 550 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Economy of Dialectical Statism
	id = russia_events.316
	title = russia_events.316.t
	desc = russia_events.316.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_savitsky
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.316 option russia_events.316.a"
		name = russia_events.316.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_old_svobodnik_ai
						power_balance_value = { id = RUS_power_balance value < -0.15 }
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_ideocrat_ai
						power_balance_value = { id = RUS_power_balance value < 0.30 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_expansion_of_VES_bureaucracy
			days = 180
		}
		add_power_balance_value = {
			id = RUS_power_balance
			value = -0.05
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.316 option russia_events.316.b"
		name = russia_events.316.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_old_svobodnik_ai
						power_balance_value = { id = RUS_power_balance value > 0.15 }
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_solidarist_ai
						power_balance_value = { id = RUS_power_balance value > -0.30 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_eurasian_autarky }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_eurasian_autarky
				add_idea = RUS_eurasian_autarky_2
			}
		}
		add_one_random_civilian_factory = yes
		add_one_random_civilian_factory = yes
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_expansion_of_VES_bureaucracy
			days = 365
		}
		add_power_balance_value = {
			id = RUS_power_balance
			value = 0.05
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Influence Contested (kickoff event)
	id = russia_events.400
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_economic_policy
	title = "[RUS.RUS_GetInfluenceEventTitle]"
	desc = "[RUS.RUS_GetInfluenceEventDesc]"
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		NOT = { has_war_with = RUS }
		RUS = { has_socialist_government = no }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.400 option russia_events.400.a"
		name = russia_events.400.a
		ai_chance = { base = 60 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = if_they_accept_tt
		event_option_tooltip = russia_events.402.a
		FROM = { country_event = russia_events.401 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.400 option russia_events.400.b"
		name = russia_events.400.b
		ai_chance = { base = 20 }
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { RUS_sanction_points < 2 } }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_sanction_points = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_add_1_sanction_point_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_sanction_point_tt
		}
		else = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_sanction_point_cap_tt
			add_political_power = 30
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Germans demand compensation
	id = russia_events.401
	title = russia_events.401.t
	desc = russia_events.401.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy3
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_socialist_government = no
		NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.401 option russia_events.401.a"
		name = russia_events.401.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				NOT = {
					has_idea = partial_economic_mobilisation
					has_idea = war_economy
					amount_taken_ideas = {
						amount > 0
						slots = { political_advisor }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { GER.RUS_sanction_points < 2 } }
				custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_add_1_sanction_point_tt
				custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_sanction_point_tt
			}
			else = {
				effect_tooltip = { add_political_power = 30 }
			}
			country_event = russia_events.403 #Russians refuse
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.401 option russia_events.401.b"
		name = russia_events.401.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 3
				RUS_is_demrus = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				RUS_savinkov = yes
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -30
		FROM = { country_event = russia_events.402 } #Russians pay up
	}
}

country_event = { #GER: Russian Government Freezes the Vilnius Accord
	id = russia_events.404
	title = russia_events.404.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { tag = RUS }
		text = russia_events.404.d
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { tag = GER }
		text = russia_events.404.d2
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.404 option russia_events.404.a"
		name = russia_events.404.a
		trigger = { tag = GER }
		set_variable = { RUS_sanction_points = 0 }
		activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_GER_business_withdrawal target = RUS }
		activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_GER_lumber_embargo target = RUS }
		activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_GER_grain_tariff target = RUS }
		activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_GER_embargo_russian_energy target = RUS }
		activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_GER_tariff_wall target = RUS }
		activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_GER_buy_up_roubles target = RUS }
		activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_GER_dump_state_bonds target = RUS }
		activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_GER_international_sanctions target = RUS }
		effect_tooltip = {
			RUS = {
				add_named_threat = {
					threat = 2
					name = RUS_end_vilnius_agreement
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.404 option russia_events.404.b"
		name = russia_events.404.b
		trigger = { tag = RUS }
		add_named_threat = {
			threat = 2
			name = RUS_end_vilnius_agreement
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #German influence removed from Russia
	id = russia_events.405
	title = russia_events.405.t
	desc = russia_events.405.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_BUL_crowd

	trigger = {
		has_variable = RUS_german_economic_influence
	}

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.405 option russia_events.405.a"
		name = russia_events.405.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_war_with = GER
				has_variable = RUS_german_economic_influence
				check_variable = { RUS_german_economic_influence < 4 }
			}
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_economic_fallout
				days = 90
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_war_with = GER
				has_variable = RUS_german_economic_influence
			}
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_economic_fallout
				days = 180
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = national_populist
				has_war_with = GER
				has_variable = RUS_german_economic_influence
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = RUS_german_economic_influence }
			RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_government = national_populist }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
			RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_soclib_or_socdem_government = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
			RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_soccon_or_marlib_government = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
			RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		}
		add_political_power = 50
		if = {
			limit = { 577 = { has_resources_rights = { receiver = JAP } } }
			JAP = { remove_resource_rights = 577 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { 232 = { has_resources_rights = { receiver = GER } } }
			GER = { remove_resource_rights = 232 }
			GER = { remove_resource_rights = 961 }
			activate_targeted_decision = { target = 961 decision = RUS_grozny_oil }
			activate_targeted_decision = { target = 249 decision = RUS_romanshkino_oil }
			activate_targeted_decision = { target = 213 decision = RUS_arctic_mines }
			activate_targeted_decision = { target = 233 decision = RUS_tyrnyauz_tungsten }
			set_country_flag = RUS_railways_nationalised
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = { remove_ideas = RUS_german_economic_influence_[LEVEL] }
			LEVEL = "[?RUS_german_economic_influence]"
		}
	}
}

	id = russia_events.407
	title = russia_events.407.t
	desc = russia_events.407.d

		GER = {
			NOT = { has_war_with = RUS }
		}
	}

		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.407 option russia_events.407.a"
		name = russia_events.407.a

			limit = { has_idea = RUS_brain_drain }
			modify_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_brain_drain
				days = 140
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_brain_drain
				days = 140
			}
		}
		GER = { country_event = russia_events.408 } #Influx of Expertise from Russia
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.407 option russia_events.407.b"
		name = russia_events.407.b
		trigger = {
			RUS_is_demrus = yes
			NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_restrict_foreign_business }
		}
		add_political_power = -35
		add_tech_bonus = {
			name = russia_events.407.t
			bonus = 0.33
			uses = 2
			category = industry
			category = electronics
		}
	}
}

			NOT = { has_war_with = RUS }

	}

		name = russia_events.411.a

			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
				check_variable = { RUS_popular_anger > 2 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai
					RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = national_populist }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
			RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
		}
		else = {
			add_stability = -0.04
		}

				add = 5

			}
		}

	}

		}

country_event = { #Businesses Re-establish in EE
	id = russia_events.415
	title = russia_events.415.t
	desc = russia_events.415.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.415 option russia_events.415.a"
		name = russia_events.415.a
		add_one_random_civilian_factory = yes
		if = {
			limit = { tag = UKR }
			set_temp_variable = { UKR_influence_change = 2 }
			UKR_industrial_score = yes
			add_popularity = { ideology = market_liberal popularity = 0.04 }
			add_resource = {
				type = coal
				amount = 3
				state = 228 #Starobyelsk
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { tag = POL }
			add_political_power = 30
			set_temp_variable = { POL_influence_change = 1 }
			POL_add_ruling_influence = yes
			set_temp_variable = { POL_influence_change = 3 }
			POL_add_german_influence = yes
		}
		else = {
			add_political_power = 20
			add_popularity = { ideology = paternal_autocrat popularity = 0.02 }
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Embargo for RUS
	id = russia_events.416
	title = {
		trigger = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_lumber_embargo } }
		text = russia_events.416.t.lumber
	}
	title = {
		trigger = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_grain_tariff } }
		text = russia_events.416.t.grain
	}
	title = {
		trigger = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_energy_embargo } }
		text = russia_events.416.t.energy
	}
	title = {
		trigger = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_tariff_wall } }
		text = russia_events.416.t.tariff_wall
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_lumber_embargo } }
		text = russia_events.416.d.lumber
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_grain_tariff } }
		text = russia_events.416.d.grain
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_energy_embargo } }
		text = russia_events.416.d.energy
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_tariff_wall } }
		text = russia_events.416.d.tariff_wall
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.416 option russia_events.416.a"
		name = russia_events.416.a
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_tariff_wall } }
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_mitteleuropa_sanctions }
			modify_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_mitteleuropa_sanctions
				days = 140
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_mitteleuropa_sanctions
				days = 140
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.416 option russia_events.416.b"
		name = russia_events.416.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 33
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					check_variable = { RUS_popular_anger > 2 }
					check_variable = { RUS_left_anger > 2 }
					check_variable = { RUS_right_anger > 2 }
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_tariff_wall }
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_mitteleuropa_sanctions }
			modify_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_mitteleuropa_sanctions
				days = 140
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_mitteleuropa_sanctions
				days = 140
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = national_populist }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
			RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_demrus = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
			RUS_change_left_anger = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
			RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		}
		else = {
			add_stability = -0.05
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_has_black_monday = yes }
			RUS_increase_black_monday = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.416 option russia_events.416.c"
		name = russia_events.416.c
		ai_chance = { base = 33 }
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_tariff_wall
			has_socialist_government = no
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_mitteleuropa_sanctions }
			modify_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_mitteleuropa_sanctions
				days = 140
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_mitteleuropa_sanctions
				days = 140
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -35
	}
}

	id = russia_events.420
	title = russia_events.420.t
	desc = russia_events.420.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.420 option russia_events.420.a"
		name = russia_events.420.a

			limit = {
				OR = {
					any_neighbor_country = { tag = RUS }
					tag = GER
					is_in_faction_with = BPL
				}
			}
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_GER_trade_war_2
				days = 180
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_GER_trade_war_1
				days = 120
			}
		}
	}
}

		RUS = { add_opinion_modifier = { target = ROOT modifier = KR_hates_govt } }

			every_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {

						tag = NFA
					}
				}

country_event = { #ENT joins sanctions for RUS/GER/ENT
	id = russia_events.425
	title = russia_events.425.t
	desc = russia_events.425.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.425 option russia_events.425.a"
		name = russia_events.425.a
		trigger = { tag = IMP }
		effect_tooltip = {
			RUS = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_idea = RUS_mitteleuropa_sanctions }
					modify_timed_idea = {
						idea = RUS_mitteleuropa_sanctions
						days = 140
					}
				}
				else = {
					add_timed_idea = {
						idea = RUS_mitteleuropa_sanctions
						days = 140
					}
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS = { country_event = { id = russia_events.416 days = 91 } }
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					is_in_faction_with = IMP
					num_of_owned_factories > 20
					surrender_progress < 0.05
				}
				country_event = { id = russia_events.420 days = 60 } #Trade war wreaks havoc
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.425 option russia_events.425.b"
		name = russia_events.425.b
		trigger = { tag = RUS }
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_mitteleuropa_sanctions }
			modify_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_mitteleuropa_sanctions
				days = 140
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_mitteleuropa_sanctions
				days = 140
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.425 option russia_events.425.c"
		name = russia_events.425.c
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				tag = IMP
				tag = RUS
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			RUS = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_idea = RUS_mitteleuropa_sanctions }
					modify_timed_idea = {
						idea = RUS_mitteleuropa_sanctions
						days = 140
					}
				}
				else = {
					add_timed_idea = {
						idea = RUS_mitteleuropa_sanctions
						days = 140
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

		name = russia_events.426.c

		add_political_power = 15
		JAP = { remove_resource_rights = 577 }
		hidden_effect = { JAP = { country_event = russia_events.426 } }

country_event = { #Germany funds opposition/resistance
	id = russia_events.430
	title = {
		trigger = { RUS_is_demrus = yes }
		text = russia_events.430.t.dem
	}
	title = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_socialist_government = yes
				has_government = national_populist
			}
		}
		text = russia_events.430.t.resistance
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_is_demrus = yes }
		text = russia_events.430.d.dem
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_socialist_government = yes }
		text = russia_events.430.d.soc
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_government = national_populist }
		text = russia_events.430.d.szrs
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		country_exists = GER
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.430 option russia_events.430.a"
		name = russia_events.430.a
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_demrus = yes }
			if = {
				limit = { has_soclib_or_socdem_government = yes }
				set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
				RUS_change_right_anger = yes
			}
			else = {
				set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
				RUS_change_left_anger = yes
			}
			add_war_support = -0.05
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_government = national_populist }
				if = {
					limit = { has_idea = RUS_VRBO }
					swap_ideas = {
						remove_idea = RUS_VRBO
						add_idea = RUS_VRBO_2
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { check_variable = { RUS_popular_anger = 9 } }
					add_stability = -0.05
				}
				else = {
					set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
					RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
				}
			}
			else = {
				RUS_increase_antisoc_resistance = yes
			}
			add_war_support = -0.05
		}
	}
}

### Military Related Events ###

country_event = {
	id = russia_events.440
	title = russia_events.440.t
	desc = russia_events.440.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { has_dlc_aat = yes }
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.440 option russia_events.440.a" #osoavia
		name = russia_events.440.a
		trigger = { mio:RUS_osoavia_organisation = { is_mio_assigned_to_task = yes } }
		mio:RUS_osoavia_organisation = {
			add_mio_funds_gain_factor = 0.25
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.440 option russia_events.440.b" #duks
		name = russia_events.440.b
		trigger = { mio:RUS_duks_organisation = { is_mio_assigned_to_task = yes } }
		mio:RUS_duks_organisation = {
			add_mio_funds_gain_factor = 0.25
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.440 option russia_events.440.c" #tsagi
		name = russia_events.440.c
		trigger = { mio:RUS_tsagi_organisation = { is_mio_assigned_to_task = yes } }
		mio:RUS_tsagi_organisation = {
			add_mio_funds_gain_factor = 0.25
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.440 option russia_events.440.e" #gamayun
		name = russia_events.440.e
		trigger = { mio:RUS_gamayun_organisation = { is_mio_assigned_to_task = yes } }
		mio:RUS_gamayun_organisation = {
			add_mio_funds_gain_factor = 0.25
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.440 option russia_events.440.f" #skorost
		name = russia_events.440.f
		trigger = { mio:RUS_skorost_organisation = { is_mio_assigned_to_task = yes } }
		mio:RUS_skorost_organisation = {
			add_mio_funds_gain_factor = 0.25
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.440 option russia_events.440.g" #sokol
		name = russia_events.440.g
		trigger = { mio:RUS_sokol_organisation = { is_mio_assigned_to_task = yes } }
		mio:RUS_sokol_organisation = {
			add_mio_funds_gain_factor = 0.25
		}
	}

country_event = { #Reorg of Cossack Hosts
	id = russia_events.441
	title = russia_events.441.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_savinkov = yes }
		text = russia_events.441.d.szrs
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_wrangel_path = yes }
		text = russia_events.441.d.wrangel
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			RUS_is_demrus = yes
			RUS_wrangel_path = no
		}
		text = russia_events.441.d.dem
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_cossacks_1
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_abolished_cossack_hosts
			has_country_flag = RUS_lost_wk2
		}
	}

	option = { #More funds to the Hosts!
		name = russia_events.441.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_old_svobodnik_ai
						power_balance_value = { id = RUS_power_balance value < -0.15 }
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_ideocrat_ai
						power_balance_value = { id = RUS_power_balance value < 0.30 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.441 option russia_events.441.a"
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_krasnov_tt
		add_units_to_division_template = {
			template_name = "Kazachya diviziya"
			regiments = {
				cavalry = 1
				cavalry = 2
			}
		}
		every_unit_leader = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_trait = cavalry_leader
					has_trait = cavalry_officer
				}
			}
			add_logistics = 1
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = national_populist }
			add_power_balance_value = {
				id = RUS_power_balance
				value = -0.05
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { is_monarchy = yes }
			RUS_increase_imperial_popularity = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_demrus = yes }
			RUS_decrease_democracy = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
			RUS_change_right_anger = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
			RUS_change_military_anger = yes
			if = {
				limit = { RUS_rikhter = yes }
				custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
				custom_effect_tooltip = {
					localization_key = tooltip_disable_focus
					FOCUS = RUS_values_of_february
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_strengthened_cossacks
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { RUS_savinkov = yes }
				country_event = { id = russia_flavour_events.46 days = 50 random_days = 100 } #Ataman Challenges Vozhd
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #Fine as they are
		name = russia_events.441.b
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.441 option russia_events.441.b"
		ai_chance = { base = 100 }
		add_stability = 0.05
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_rikhter = yes }
			custom_effect_tooltip = {
				localization_key = tooltip_disable_focus
				FOCUS = RUS_values_of_february
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { RUS_savinkov = yes }
				country_event = { id = russia_flavour_events.46 days = 50 random_days = 100 } #Ataman Challenges Vozhd
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #Abolished
		name = russia_events.441.c
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.441 option russia_events.441.c"
		trigger = { RUS_wrangel_path = no }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				OR = {
					has_soclib_or_socdem_government = yes
					has_government = national_populist
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_cossack_resistance }
			remove_ideas = RUS_cossack_resistance
			retire_character = RUS_pyotr_krasnov
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 2 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_soclib_or_socdem_government = yes
					RUS_maklakov = yes
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = 5 }
			change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
			add_political_power = 50
		}
		RUS_abolish_hosts = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = national_populist }
			add_power_balance_value = {
				id = RUS_power_balance
				value = 0.05
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_demrus = yes }
			RUS_increase_democracy = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
			RUS_change_right_anger = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
			RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_maklakov = yes }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_apathy_var = -2 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_apathy_decrease2_tt
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = RUS_bold_promises }
			add_days_mission_timeout = {
				mission = RUS_bold_promises
				days = 45
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = RUS_titov_SR_demands }
			add_days_mission_timeout = {
				mission = RUS_titov_SR_demands
				days = 45
			}
		}
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_flavour_events.154 days = 900 }
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Ukraine, Belarus, or Baltics?
	id = russia_events.442
	title = russia_events.442.t
	desc = {
		text = russia_events.442.desc1
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					BAT = { exists = yes }
					EST = { exists = no }
					LAT = { exists = no }
				}
				AND = {
					EST = { is_in_faction_with = GER }
					LAT = { is_in_faction_with = GER }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = russia_events.442.desc2
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						BAT = { exists = yes }
						EST = { exists = no }
						LAT = { exists = no }
					}
					AND = {
						EST = { is_in_faction_with = GER }
						LAT = { is_in_faction_with = GER }
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_troop_flag

	option = { #Ukraine, Vasilevsky suggestion (under patronage of Denikin), Uran operation
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.442 option russia_events.442.a"
		name = russia_events.442.a
		ai_chance = { base = 100 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = russia_events.442.a.tt
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				UKR = { is_in_faction_with = GER }
				UKR = { is_in_faction_with = AUS }
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_UKR_bonus
	}
	option = { #Belarus, Rodzyanko suggestion (under patronage of Markov), Mars operation
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.442 option russia_events.442.b"
		name = russia_events.442.b
		custom_effect_tooltip = russia_events.442.b.tt
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		trigger = {
			BLR = { is_in_faction_with = GER }
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_BLR_bonus
	}
	option = { #Baltics, Shatilov suggestion (under patronage of Wrangel), Venera operation
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.442 option russia_events.442.c"
		name = russia_events.442.c
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = russia_events.442.c.tt
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					BAT = { exists = yes }
					EST = { exists = no }
					LAT = { exists = no }
				}
				AND = {
					EST = { is_in_faction_with = GER }
					LAT = { is_in_faction_with = GER }
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_BAT_BONUS
	}

	after = {
		country_event = { id = russia_events.443 days = 2 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Capital Captured, momentum gained
	id = russia_events.445
	title = russia_events.445.t
	desc = russia_events.445.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_troop_flag

	option = { #Momentum gained
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.445 option russia_events.445.a"
		name = russia_events.445.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_speed_bonus
				202 = { is_controlled_by_ROOT_or_ally = no } #Kyiv
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_taken_kiev_before }
			}
			add_ideas = RUS_UKR_shock_plan
			activate_mission = RUS_take_kiev
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_speed_bonus
				206 = { is_controlled_by_ROOT_or_ally = no } #Minsk
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_taken_minsk_before }
			}
			add_ideas = RUS_BLR_shock_plan
			activate_mission = RUS_take_minsk
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_speed_bonus
				842 = { is_controlled_by_ROOT_or_ally = no } #Riga
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_taken_riga_before }
			}
			add_ideas = RUS_BAT_shock_plan
			activate_mission = RUS_take_riga
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_firepower_bonus
				202 = { is_controlled_by_ROOT_or_ally = no } #Kyiv
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_taken_kiev_before }
			}
			add_ideas = RUS_UKR_fire_plan
			activate_mission = RUS_take_kiev
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_firepower_bonus
				206 = { is_controlled_by_ROOT_or_ally = no } #Minsk
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_taken_minsk_before }
			}
			add_ideas = RUS_BLR_fire_plan
			activate_mission = RUS_take_minsk
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_firepower_bonus
				842 = { is_controlled_by_ROOT_or_ally = no } #Riga
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_taken_riga_before }
				LAT = { has_socialist_government = no }
			}
			add_ideas = RUS_BAT_fire_plan
			activate_mission = RUS_take_riga
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_firepower_bonus
				OR = {
					202 = { is_controlled_by_ROOT_or_ally = yes } #Kyiv
					has_country_flag = RUS_taken_kiev_before
				}
				OR = {
					206 = { is_controlled_by_ROOT_or_ally = yes } #Minsk
					has_country_flag = RUS_taken_minsk_before
				}
				OR = {
					842 = { is_controlled_by_ROOT_or_ally = yes } #Riga
					has_country_flag = RUS_taken_riga_before
					LAT = { has_socialist_government = yes }
				}
			}
			add_ideas = RUS_GER_fire_plan
			activate_mission = RUS_the_rush_for_berlin
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_speed_bonus
				OR = {
					202 = { is_controlled_by_ROOT_or_ally = yes } #Kyiv
					has_country_flag = RUS_taken_kiev_before
				}
				OR = {
					206 = { is_controlled_by_ROOT_or_ally = yes } #Minsk
					has_country_flag = RUS_taken_minsk_before
				}
				OR = {
					842 = { is_controlled_by_ROOT_or_ally = yes } #Riga
					has_country_flag = RUS_taken_riga_before
					LAT = { has_socialist_government = yes }
				}
			}
			add_ideas = RUS_GER_shock_plan
			activate_mission = RUS_the_rush_for_berlin
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #War Game at Voronezh
	id = russia_events.446
	title = russia_events.446.t
	desc = russia_events.446.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_troop_flag

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.446 option russia_events.446.a"
		name = russia_events.446.a
		army_experience = 40
		every_army_leader = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_trait = artillery_officer
					has_trait = artillery_specialist
					has_trait = trait_engineer
				}
			}
			add_attack = 1
		}
		add_tech_bonus = {
			name = russia_events.446.t
			bonus = 0.5
			uses = 2
			category = artillery
			category = rocketry
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.446 option russia_events.446.b"
		name = russia_events.446.b
		army_experience = 40
		every_army_leader = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_trait = armor_officer
					has_trait = trait_reckless
					has_trait = panzer_leader
				}
			}
			add_planning = 1
		}
		add_tech_bonus = {
			name = russia_events.446.t
			bonus = 0.5
			uses = 2
			category = armor
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.446 option russia_events.446.c"
		name = russia_events.446.c
		army_experience = 40
		every_army_leader = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_trait = cavalry_officer
					has_trait = infantry_officer
				}
			}
			add_logistics = 1
		}
		add_tech_bonus = {
			name = russia_events.446.t
			bonus = 0.5
			uses = 2
			category = motorized_equipment
			category = cat_mechanized_equipment
		}
	}

	after = {
		add_named_threat = {
			threat = 3
			name = russia_events.446.t
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Sikorsky's Helicopter
	id = russia_events.447
	title = russia_events.447.t
	desc = russia_events.447.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.447 option russia_events.447.a"
		name = russia_events.447.a
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.447 option russia_events.447.b"
		name = russia_events.447.b
		add_political_power = -20
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc_gtd = yes
				NOT = { is_special_project_completed = sp:sp_air_helicopter }
			}
			complete_special_project = sp:sp_air_helicopter
		}
		else = {
			air_experience = 35
		}
	}
}

###################################################
############ GREAT PATRIOTIC WAR ##################
###################################################

### Defense of Moscow ###
country_event = {
	id = russia_events.450
	title = russia_events.450.t
	desc = russia_events.450.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_german_troops
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		original_tag = RUS
		has_war_with = GER
		controls_province = 4380 #Moscow
		219 = {
			any_neighbor_state = {
				NOT = { is_controlled_by = ROOT }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.450 option russia_events.450.a"
		name = russia_events.450.a
		add_command_power = 50
		219 = {
			add_dynamic_modifier = {
				modifier = RUS_battle_for_moscow_modifier
				days = 180
				scope = RUS
			}
			custom_override_tooltip = {
				add_building_construction = {
					type = bunker
					level = 2
					province = 6380
					instant_build = yes
				}
				tooltip = {
					localization_key = tooltip_add_building_on_victory_point
					BUILDING = bunker
					NUMBER = 2
					VP = 6380
				}
			}
		}
		activate_mission = RUS_hold_moscow
		set_country_flag = RUS_battle_for_moscow_flag
	}
}

#############################
### North Caucasus Events ###
#############################

country_event = { #Riots in Southern Russia
	id = russia_events.500
	title = russia_events.500.t
	desc = russia_events.500.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_cossacks_2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { has_government = national_populist }
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_events.505 days = 250 random_days = 250 } #Expansion of the 'Wild Battalions'
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.500 option russia_events.500.a"
		name = russia_events.500.a #The Cossacks can handle their own affairs
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_republic_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_empire_ai
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.02
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -5 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.500 option russia_events.500.b"
		name = russia_events.500.b #Order the Cossacks to stop - no need to provoke more opposition
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_socialist_ai
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
	}

	after = {
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { has_state_flag = oskab_state }
			force_enable_resistance = RUS
			start_resistance = yes
			add_resistance = 15
			hidden_effect = { add_compliance = 65 }
		}
		#233, 787, 961
	}
}

country_event = { #Caucasus Reaffirms Commitment to Land Reform
	id = russia_events.501
	title = russia_events.501.t
	desc = russia_events.501.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_don_kuban_map
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { has_government = national_populist }

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.501 option russia_events.501.a"
		name = russia_events.501.a
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { has_state_flag = oskab_state }
			add_compliance = 5
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_events.502 days = 50 random_days = 50 } #Assassination of Ibragim Chulikov
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Assassination of Ibragim Chulikov
	id = russia_events.502
	title = russia_events.502.t
	desc = russia_events.502.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_death_kornilov
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { has_government = national_populist }

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.502 option russia_events.502.a"
		name = russia_events.502.a
		add_stability = -0.04
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { has_state_flag = oskab_state }
			add_resistance = 10
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_events.503 days = 60 random_days = 60 }
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #The Preaching of Ali Kayaev
	id = russia_events.503
	title = russia_events.503.t
	desc = russia_events.503.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kayaev
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { has_government = national_populist }

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.503 option russia_events.503.a"
		name = russia_events.503.a #Imprison him, we can't afford rabble rousers
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_political_power < 25
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -30
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.503 option russia_events.503.b"
		name = russia_events.503.b #I preferred his less polemical works...
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_stability < 0.5
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.025
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { has_state_flag = oskab_state }
			add_resistance = 5
		}
	}
	after = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_events.504 days = 10 random_days = 20 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Flames Spread to Dagestan
	id = russia_events.504
	title = russia_events.504.t
	desc = russia_events.504.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_cossacks_1
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { has_government = national_populist }

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.504 option russia_events.504.a"
		name = russia_events.504.a
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_VRBO }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_VRBO
				add_idea = RUS_VRBO_2
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_VRBO_2 }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_VRBO_2
				add_idea = RUS_VRBO_3
			}
		}
		else = { add_stability = -0.05 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Expansion of the 'Wild Battalions'
	id = russia_events.505
	title = russia_events.505.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_savinkov = yes }
		text = russia_events.505.d.szrs
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_savinkov = no }
		text = russia_events.505.d.dem
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_defend_caucasus
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { has_socialist_government = no }

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.505 option russia_events.505.a"
		name = russia_events.505.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
			}
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				region = 135 #North Caucasus
				has_resistance = yes
			}
			add_resistance = -15
		}
		add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
			type = infantry_equipment
			amount = -500
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		set_country_flag = RUS_wild_battalions_expanded
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.505 option russia_events.505.b"
		name = russia_events.505.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				add = 50
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_empire_ai
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai
					RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_savinkov = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
			RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -5 }
			change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		}
	}
	after = {
		activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_pacify_caucasus target = 233 }
	}
}

country_event = { #The Fall of Dzheyrakh
	id = russia_events.506
	title = russia_events.506.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_wild_battalions_expanded }
		text = russia_events.506.d.1
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_wild_battalions_expanded } }
		text = russia_events.506.d.2
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_dzheyrakh
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.506 option russia_events.506.a"
		name = russia_events.506.a
		add_stability = 0.04
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_wild_battalions_expanded }
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = { id = russia_events.508 days = 60 random_days = 60 } #The Burning of Kuanib
			}
		}
	}
}

		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.509 option russia_events.509.b"
		name = russia_events.509.b #We will restrict ourselves to more conventional means
		ai_chance = { base = 50 }
	}

### Interactions with Georgia go here

# Central Asia Crisis Events
country_event = { #New Wave of Asian Settlement
	id = russia_events.550
	title = russia_events.550.t
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_farm1
	desc = russia_events.550.d
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		original_tag = RUS
		has_socialist_government = no
		date > 1937.5.1
		TRK = {
			exists = yes
			is_subject = no
			NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 5
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.550 option russia_events.550.a"
		name = russia_events.550.a
		add_ideas = RUS_kazakh_unrest
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_events.552 days = 30 } #The Land Tenure Issue
			country_event = { id = russia_events.560 days = 90 } #Kazakhs in Crisis
			country_event = { id = russia_events.571 days = 160 } #The Rise of Ayukevich
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #The Land Tenure Issue
	id = russia_events.552
	title = russia_events.552.t
	desc = russia_events.552.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_cossacks_1
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_idea = RUS_kazakh_unrest
		has_socialist_government = no
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.552 option russia_events.552.a"
		name = russia_events.552.a #Side with the cossacks - land tenure must be respected
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
				check_variable = { RUS_military_anger > 3 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				is_monarchy = yes
			}
		}
		RUS_cossack_division_check = yes
		random_owned_controlled_state = {
			prioritize = { 589 }
			limit = { valid_state_for_spawning_friendly_unit = yes }
			create_unit = {
				division = "division_template = \"Kazachya diviziya\" start_experience_factor = 2.0"
				owner = ROOT
				count = 2
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { RUS_military_anger > 1 } }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
			RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_events.553 days = 5 random_days = 10 } #Alash Party Protests
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.552 option russia_events.552.b"
		name = russia_events.552.b #Economic development requires sacrifice
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
				check_variable = { RUS_military_anger < 4 }
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 50
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					state = 589 #Semirechye
					state = 810 #Alash-kala
					state = 404 #Karaganda
					state = 402 #Turgay
				}
			}
			add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_events.555 days = 5 random_days = 10 } #Alash Moves to Support Government
		}
	}
}
