country_event = { #Kazakhs in Crisis
	id = russia_events.560
	title = russia_events.560.t
	desc = russia_events.560.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_shortages

	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		owns_state = 589
		has_idea = RUS_kazakh_unrest
		has_socialist_government = no
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.560 option russia_events.560.a"
		name = russia_events.560.a #We will restore order, no matter the cost
		ai_chance = {
			base = 60
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_government = national_populist
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.75
				check_variable = { RUS_popular_anger > 4 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				check_variable = { RUS_popular_anger > 5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.25
				check_variable = { RUS_popular_anger > 6 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
				check_variable = { RUS_popular_anger > 2 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { RUS_popular_anger > 0 } }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
			RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
		}
		589 = { RUS_central_asia_resistance = yes }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_kazakh_crisis_1_tt
		hidden_effect = {
			var:617.owner = {
				country_event = { id = russia_events.561 days = 5 random_days = 5 } #Kazakhs Fleeing Into Xinjiang
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						tag = TRK
						tag = KHI
					}
					is_subject = no
					is_neighbor_of = RUS
					NOT = { has_war_with = RUS }
				}
				country_event = { id = russia_events.567 days = 15 random_days = 5 } #Kazakhs Fleeing Into Turkestan
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						tag = OTT
						tag = PRF
						tag = AFG
						tag = AZR
						tag = GEO
					}
					is_subject = no
				}
				country_event = { id = russia_events.570 days = 20 random_days = 5 } #The Kazakh Mission
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.560 option russia_events.560.b"
		name = russia_events.560.b #Focus on helping the displaced Kazakhs
		trigger = { RUS_savinkov = no }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_elected_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_political_power < 0
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2.0
				has_political_power > 75
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_supports_kazakhs
		add_political_power = -75
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_controlled_by = RUS
				OR = {
					state = 589 #Semirechye
					state = 810 #Alash-kala
					state = 404 #Karaganda
				}
			}
			RUS_central_asia_resistance = yes
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_kazakh_crisis_2_tt
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_events.555 days = 5 random_days = 10 } #Alash Moves to Support Government
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.560 option russia_events.560.c"
		name = russia_events.560.c #Give it time and it will work itself out
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 2.0
				has_political_power < 0
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_central_asia_unrest_temp = 1 }
		RUS_add_CA_unrest = yes
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_controlled_by = RUS
				OR = {
					state = 589 #Semirechye
					state = 810 #Alash-kala
					state = 404 #Karaganda
					state = 402 #Turgay
					state = 406 #Guryev
					state = 587 #Mangyshlak
				}
			}
			RUS_central_asia_resistance = yes
		}
	}
	after = {
		hidden_effect = {
			var:617.owner = {
				country_event = { id = russia_events.561 days = 5 random_days = 5 } #Kazakhs Fleeing
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Kazakhs Fleeing Into Xinjiang
	id = russia_events.561
	title = russia_events.561.t
	desc = russia_events.561.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_gathering

	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		OR = {
			tag = SIK
			tag = ETS
			tag = KUM
		}
		is_subject = no
		589 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by = RUS } #Semirechye
		617 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT } #Dihua
		NOT = { has_war_with = RUS }
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.561 option russia_events.561.a"
		name = russia_events.561.a #The Kazakhs are our brother Turks - we will not turn them away
		trigger = {
			NOT = { tag = SIK }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 33
			modifier = {
				factor = 3
				tag = ETS
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_supports_kazakhs
		add_manpower = 22000
		add_political_power = -50
		add_opinion_modifier = { target = RUS modifier = KR_hates_govt }
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				exists = yes
				is_subject = no
				NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
				OR = {
					tag = TRK
					tag = KHI
				}
			}
			add_opinion_modifier = { target = ROOT modifier = KR_pleased }
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.561 option russia_events.561.b"
		name = russia_events.561.b #Keep order, but neither help nor hinder them
		ai_chance = { base = 33 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Kazakhs Fleeing Into Turkestan
	id = russia_events.567
	title = russia_events.567.t
	desc = russia_events.567.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kazakhs

	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		589 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by = RUS }
		is_subject = no
		is_neighbor_of = RUS
		NOT = { has_war_with = RUS }
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.567 option russia_events.567.a"
		name = russia_events.567.a #Help them, but do not provoke the Russians
		ai_chance = {
			base = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				tag = TRK
			}
		}
		add_manpower = 12500
		add_stability = -0.01
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.567 option russia_events.567.b"
		name = russia_events.567.b #We will aid them regardless of how the Russians feel
		ai_chance = { base = 50 }
		add_manpower = 18500
		add_stability = -0.03
		RUS = {
			add_opinion_modifier = { target = ROOT modifier = KR_disapproves_of_govt }
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.567 option russia_events.567.c"
		name = russia_events.567.c #If the Kazakhs want arms, give them arms!
		ai_chance = { base = 25 }
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				is_ai = yes
				has_equipment = { infantry_equipment > 300 }
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_supports_kazakhs
		add_manpower = 18500
		add_political_power = -25
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_equipment = { infantry_equipment > 300 }
			}
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = infantry_equipment
				amount = -300
			}
		}
		RUS = {
			add_opinion_modifier = { target = ROOT modifier = KR_hates_govt }
			country_event = russia_events.568 #X is Arming Kazakhs?
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Turkestan Arming Kazakhs?
	id = russia_events.568
	title = russia_events.568.t
	desc = russia_events.568.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_tashkent

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.568 option russia_events.568.a"
		name = russia_events.568.a
		reverse_add_opinion_modifier = { target = FROM modifier = KR_hates_govt }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_central_asia_unrest_temp = 1 }
		RUS_add_CA_unrest = yes
	}
}
country_event = { #The Kazakh Mission
	id = russia_events.570
	title = russia_events.570.t
	desc = russia_events.570.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kazakhs

	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		589 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by = RUS }
		is_subject = no
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.570 option russia_events.570.a"
		name = russia_events.570.a #No - such a revolt stands no chance of success
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.6
				OR = {
					tag = AFG
					tag = PRF
					tag = AZR
					tag = GEO
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.4
				tag = OTT
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.570 option russia_events.570.b"
		name = russia_events.570.b #We are willing to provide covert assistance, for now
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.4
				OR = {
					tag = AFG
					tag = PRF
					tag = AZR
					tag = GEO
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.6
				tag = OTT
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2.5
				has_country_flag = TRK_has_new_diplomats_flag
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_supports_kazakhs
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = 0.01 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		add_political_power = -30
	}
}

country_event = { #The Rise of Ayukevich
	id = russia_events.571
	title = russia_events.571.t
	desc = russia_events.571.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kazakhs
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		owns_state = 589
		has_idea = RUS_kazakh_unrest
		has_socialist_government = no
		NOT = { has_country_leader = { character = RUS_daniil_sulimov } }
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.571 option russia_events.571.a"
		name = russia_events.571.a #We must hunt these rebels down! No mercy!
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_central_asia_unrest_temp = 1 }
		RUS_add_CA_unrest = yes
		add_stability = -0.045
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { RUS_military_anger > 0 } }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
			RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_controlled_by = RUS
				has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_central_asia_chaos }
				has_resistance = yes
			}
			add_resistance = 30
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.571 option russia_events.571.b"
		name = russia_events.571.b #Focus on maintaining goodwill with the Alash
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { RUS_military_anger > 0 } }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
			RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_controlled_by = RUS
				OR = {
					state = 406 #Guryev
					state = 587 #Mangyshlak
					state = 402 #Turgay
				}
				has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_central_asia_chaos }
			}
			remove_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_central_asia_chaos }
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_controlled_by = RUS
				OR = {
					state = 589 #Semirechye
					state = 810 #Alash-kala
					state = 404 #Karaganda
				}
				NOT = {
					has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_central_asia_chaos }
				}
			}
			RUS_central_asia_resistance = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.571 option russia_events.571.c"
		name = russia_events.571.c #Our attention is required elsewhere
		ai_chance = { base = 10 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_central_asia_unrest_temp = 1 }
		RUS_add_CA_unrest = yes
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_controlled_by = RUS
				OR = {
					state = 589 #Semirechye
					state = 810 #Alash-kala
					state = 404 #Karaganda
					state = 406 #Guryev
					state = 587 #Mangyshlak
					state = 402 #Turgay
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_central_asia_chaos }
					has_resistance = yes
				}
				add_resistance = 30
			}
			else = {
				RUS_central_asia_resistance = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

### See events in 01 Central Asian Crisis events for actual CA war

country_event = { #Fate of Alash Autonomy
	id = russia_events.575
	title = russia_events.575.t
	desc = russia_events.575.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kazakhs

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						state = 402 #Turgay
						state = 404 #Karaganda
						state = 587 #Mangyshlak
						state = 590 #Akmolinsk
						state = 810 #Alash-kala
						state = 589 #Semireche
					}
				}
				set_state_flag = alash_state
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.575 option russia_events.575.a"
		name = russia_events.575.a
		ai_chance = { base = 10 }
		add_stability = 0.025
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_demrus = yes }
			add_popularity = { ideology = market_liberal popularity = 0.05 }
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { has_state_flag = alash_state }
			add_compliance = 10
			add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_CA_modifier }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_abolished_cossack_hosts } }
			589 = {
				set_state_flag = semirechye_state
				add_compliance = 10
				add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_cossack_host_modifier }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.575 option russia_events.575.b"
		name = russia_events.575.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = market_liberal }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_alash_hates_this_tt
			add_political_power = -100
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
			RUS_change_left_anger = yes
			add_popularity = { ideology = market_liberal popularity = -0.05 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_soclib_or_socdem_government = yes }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_alash_hates_this2_tt
			add_political_power = -50
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
			RUS_change_left_anger = yes
			add_popularity = { ideology = market_liberal popularity = -0.05 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_unitary_state } }
			add_political_power = -40
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { has_state_flag = alash_state }
			clr_state_flag = alash_state
			add_resistance = 25
			add_compliance = -10
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_abolished_cossack_hosts } }
			589 = {
				set_state_flag = semirechye_state
				add_compliance = 10
				add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_cossack_host_modifier }
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Federalism in Turkestan
	id = russia_events.576
	title = russia_events.576.t
	desc = russia_events.576.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_bukhara

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.576 option russia_events.576.a"
		name = russia_events.576.a
		ai_chance = { base = 10 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_unitary_state }
			set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -5 }
			change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_khiva = yes
					is_bukhara = yes
					is_turkestan = yes
				}
				NOT = { state = 418 } #Asgabat
			}
			set_state_flag = turkestan_state
			add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_TRK_modifier }
			add_compliance = 15
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.576 option russia_events.576.b"
		name = russia_events.576.b
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_unitary_state
					has_conservative_government = yes
				}
			}
			add_political_power = 50
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_khiva = yes
					is_bukhara = yes
					is_turkestan = yes
				}
			}
			add_resistance = 25
			add_compliance = -10
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Spiritual Administration of the Muslims of Central Asia
	id = russia_events.577
	title = russia_events.577.t
	desc = russia_events.577.d
	trigger = {
		has_socialist_government = no
	}
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_muslims

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.577 option russia_events.577.a"
		name = russia_events.577.a
		add_political_power = -25
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_central_asia = yes
				NOT = { is_core_of = RUS }
			}
			add_compliance = 8
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_savinkov = yes
				RUS_pyotr_savitsky = { is_second_in_command = yes }
			}
			add_country_leader_trait = RUS_protector_of_the_steppe
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = 0.05 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.577 option russia_events.577.b"
		name = russia_events.577.b
		trigger = {
			is_monarchy = no
			RUS_fondaminsky = no
			RUS_kartashyov = no
			RUS_solonevich = no
			NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_state_orthodoxy }
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_central_asia = yes
				NOT = { is_core_of = RUS }
			}
			add_compliance = 5
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = 0.035 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.577 option russia_events.577.c"
		name = russia_events.577.c
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				is_monarchy = yes
				has_government = social_conservative
				has_authoritarian_government = yes
				has_completed_focus = RUS_state_orthodoxy
			}
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_central_asia = yes
				NOT = { is_core_of = RUS }
			}
			add_resistance = 15
		}
		add_political_power = 40
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Reorganisation of Central Asia (SocRus)
	id = russia_events.578
	title = russia_events.578.t
	desc = russia_events.578.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_bukhara
	trigger = {
		original_tag = RUS
		has_socialist_government = yes
		TRK = {
			OR = {
				exists = no
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					is_southern_central_asia = yes
				}
				add_claim_by = ROOT
			}
			TRK = {
				remove_ideas = {
					central_asia_member_of_the_pishpek_pact_0
					central_asia_member_of_the_pishpek_pact_1
					central_asia_member_of_the_pishpek_pact_2
					central_asia_member_of_the_pishpek_pact_3
				}
			}
			KHI = {
				remove_ideas = {
					central_asia_member_of_the_pishpek_pact_0
					central_asia_member_of_the_pishpek_pact_1
					central_asia_member_of_the_pishpek_pact_2
					central_asia_member_of_the_pishpek_pact_3
					KHI_russia_pivot
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.578 option russia_events.578.a"
		name = russia_events.578.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 3
				RUS_PLSR = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				BUK = { is_ai = no }
				has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_central_asia option = DEFAULT }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_central_asia option = RUS_CENTRAL_ASIA_UNIFIED }
			}
		}

		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					is_southern_central_asia = yes
					is_claimed_by = ROOT
				}
				remove_claim_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		release_puppet = KHI
		set_autonomy = {
			target = KHI
			autonomy_state = union_republic
			end_wars = no
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		release_puppet = TRK
		set_autonomy = {
			target = TRK
			autonomy_state = union_republic
			end_wars = no
		}
		if = {
			limit = { BUK = { exists = no } }
			custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
			release_puppet = BUK
			set_autonomy = {
				target = BUK
				autonomy_state = union_republic
				end_wars = no
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				BUK = { set_politics = { ruling_party = radical_socialist } }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.578 option russia_events.578.b"
		name = russia_events.578.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				RUS_VST = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_central_asia option = RUS_CENTRAL_ASIA_SEPARATE }
			}
		}

		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_central_asia = yes
				NOT = {
					state = 581 #Uralsk
					state = 583 #Petropavlovsk
					state = 588 #Pavlodar
				}
			}
			remove_claim_by = ROOT
			remove_core_of = ROOT
			transfer_state_to = BUK
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		BUK = {
			if = {
				limit = { TRK = { exists = yes } }
				annex_country = {
					target = TRK
					transfer_troops = no
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { KHI = { exists = yes } }
				annex_country = {
					target = KHI
					transfer_troops = no
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { KAZ = { exists = yes } }
				annex_country = {
					target = KAZ
					transfer_troops = no
				}
			}
			every_state = {
				limit = {
					is_central_asia = yes
					is_claim_or_core_of_PREV = no
				}
				add_claim_by = PREV
			}
			set_capital = { state = 407 remember_old_capital = no } #Tashkent
			custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
			get_current_government_type = yes
			RUS = {
				set_autonomy = {
					target = PREV
					autonomy_state = union_republic
					end_wars = no
				}
			}
			restore_previous_government_type = yes
			custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
			set_cosmetic_tag = TRK_RUS
		}
	}
}

# Semyonov Events
country_event = { #The Manchurian Curse
	id = russia_events.600 ### Fire in february 1937
	title = russia_events.600.t
	desc = russia_events.600.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_aigun
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_events.601 days = 150 random_days = 50 } #Unrest of the Amur-Ussuri Cossacks
			country_event = { id = russia_events.602 days = 300 random_days = 50 } #The Circle of St. George
			JAP = { country_event = { id = russia_events.603 days = 350 random_days = 50 } }  #Kolendo Incident
			country_event = { id = russia_events.606 days = 450 random_days = 50 } #The Honghuzi Ataman
			country_event = { id = russia_events.608 days = 500 random_days = 50 } #Question of the Far Eastern Military District
			country_event = { id = russia_events.609 days = 500 random_days = 50 } #Far Eastern All-Military Union
			country_event = { id = russia_events.610 days = 450 random_days = 50 } #Smugglers of the Amur and Ussuri
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.600 option russia_events.600.a"
		name = russia_events.600.a
		ai_chance = { base = 30 }
		set_country_flag = RUS_underfunded_vladivostok
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.600 option russia_events.600.b"
		name = russia_events.600.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 70
			modifier = {
				add = -50
				has_political_power < 20
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					JAP = { is_ai = no }
					FNG = { is_ai = no }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_republic_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_empire_ai
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -20
		army_experience = 5
		408 = {
			custom_override_tooltip = {
				add_building_construction = {
					type = coastal_bunker
					province = 957
					level = 3
					instant_build = yes
				}
				tooltip = {
					localization_key = tooltip_add_building_on_victory_point
					BUILDING = coastal_bunker
					NUMBER = 3
					VP = 957
				}
			}
			custom_override_tooltip = {
				add_building_construction = {
					type = bunker
					province = 957
					level = 3
					instant_build = yes
				}
				tooltip = {
					localization_key = tooltip_add_building_on_victory_point
					BUILDING = bunker
					NUMBER = 3
					VP = 957
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_amur_defence_increase_tt
	}
}
country_event = { #Unrest of the Amur-Ussuri Cossacks
	id = russia_events.601
	title = russia_events.601.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_government = national_populist }
		text = russia_events.601.d.savinkov
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_socialist_government = yes }
		text = russia_events.601.d.soc
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_cossacks_3
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { RUS_is_demrus = no }
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.601 option russia_events.601.a"
		name = russia_events.601.a
		ai_chance = { base = 20 }
		set_country_flag = RUS_ussuri_unrest
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.601 option russia_events.601.b"
		name = russia_events.601.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 80
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					JAP = { is_ai = no }
					FNG = { is_ai = no }
				}
			}
		}
		add_manpower = -10000
		add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
			type = infantry_equipment
			amount = -1000
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_amur_defence_increase_tt
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.601 option russia_events.601.c"
		name = russia_events.601.c
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_expand_okhrana
				has_completed_focus = RUS_gosstrazha
				has_completed_focus = RUS_state_surveillance
				RUS_flegont_klepikov = { is_hired_as_advisor = yes }
				RUS_yakov_blyumkin = { is_hired_as_advisor = yes }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 160
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					JAP = { is_ai = no }
					FNG = { is_ai = no }
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_police_state_tt
		add_political_power = -20
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_amur_defence_increase_tt
	}
	after = {
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = national_populist }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_semyonov_assassination_tt2
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #The Circle of St. George
	id = russia_events.602
	title = russia_events.602.t
	desc = russia_events.602.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_circle_of_st_george
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.602 option russia_events.602.a"
		name = russia_events.602.a
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.602 option russia_events.602.b"
		name = russia_events.602.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_active_mission = RUS_demands_from_unions_monarchy
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai
					RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				is_monarchy = yes
				has_government = social_conservative
			}
		}
		FER = {
			every_army_leader = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { is_character = RUS_oi_shigemoto }
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_political_advisor_role = yes
					remove_high_command_role = yes
					remove_army_chief_role = yes
					remove_navy_chief_role = yes
					demote_to_general = yes
				}
				set_nationality = ROOT
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		add_popularity = { ideology = national_populist popularity = 0.03 }
		set_country_flag = RUS_circle_of_st_george_in_russia
		effect_tooltip = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = national_populist
				long_name = RUS_national_populist3_party_long_tt
				name = RUS_national_populist3_party
			}
		}
		retire_character = RUS_grigory_semyonov
		RUS_mikhail_diterikhs = {
			add_unit_leader_trait = RUS_monarchist_officer
			promote_character = { ideology = national_populist_subtype }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = national_populist
				long_name = RUS_national_populist3_party_long
				name = RUS_national_populist3_party
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Kolendo Incident for JAP
	id = russia_events.603
	title = russia_events.603.t
	desc = russia_events.603.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_ship

	trigger = {
		JAP = { owns_state = 537 } #South Sakhalin
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = russia_events.605 days = 30 } } #The Siberian Gambit
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.603 option russia_events.603.a"
		name = russia_events.603.a #Offer explanations and apologies
		RUS = {
			add_opinion_modifier = { target = ROOT modifier = KR_pleased }
			set_country_flag = RUS_JAP_apologies
			effect_tooltip = {
				add_named_threat = {
					threat = -1
					name = RUS_kolendo_incident
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.603 option russia_events.603.b"
		name = russia_events.603.b #Sakhalin is Japanese land - end of story
		RUS = {
			add_opinion_modifier = { target = ROOT modifier = KR_displeased }
			effect_tooltip = {
				add_named_threat = {
					threat = 1
					name = RUS_kolendo_incident
				}
			}
		}
	}
	after = {
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS = { country_event = russia_events.604 } #Russian Ship Sunk off Sakhalin
		}
	}
}

	id = russia_events.606
	title = russia_events.606.t
	desc = russia_events.606.d

	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		country_exists = FNG
		NOT = { has_war_with = FNG }
		RUS_is_demrus = no
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.606 option russia_events.606.a"
		name = russia_events.606.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = FER_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = FER_path option = FER_PATH_NO_REVOLT } }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.606 option russia_events.606.b"
		name = russia_events.606.b
		trigger = {
			has_socialist_government = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 1000
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
				OR = {
					RUS_flegont_klepikov = { is_hired_as_advisor = yes }
					RUS_yakov_blyumkin = { is_hired_as_advisor = yes }
					RUS_irina_kakhovskaya = { is_hired_as_advisor = yes }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 60
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
				OR = {
					has_idea = RUS_okhrana_1
					has_idea = RUS_okhrana_2
					has_idea = RUS_okhrana_3
					has_idea = RUS_okhrana_non_lar_1
					has_idea = RUS_okhrana_non_lar_2
					has_idea = RUS_okhrana_non_lar_3
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				has_game_rule = { rule = FER_path option = FER_PATH_NO_REVOLT }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				JAP = { is_ai = no }
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = FER_path option = DEFAULT }
					has_game_rule = { rule = FER_path option = FER_PATH_NO_REVOLT }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = FER_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = FER_path option = FER_PATH_NO_REVOLT } }
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -100
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_semyonov_assassination_tt
		random_list = {
			4 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					OR = {
						RUS_flegont_klepikov = { is_hired_as_advisor = yes }
						AND = {
							is_ai = yes
							has_game_rule = { rule = FER_path option = FER_PATH_NO_REVOLT }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			2 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 3
					OR = {
						has_idea = RUS_okhrana_1
						has_idea = RUS_okhrana_2
						has_idea = RUS_okhrana_3
						has_idea = RUS_okhrana_non_lar_1
						has_idea = RUS_okhrana_non_lar_2
						has_idea = RUS_okhrana_non_lar_3
					}
				}
				country_event = russia_events.607 #Assassination of Grigory Semyonov
			}
		}
	}
}

	desc = russia_events.610.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_aigun

	trigger = { RUS_is_demrus = yes }
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.610 option russia_events.610.a"
		name = russia_events.610.a

			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai
					RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
				}
			}
		}
		add_manpower = -5000
		add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
			type = infantry_equipment
			amount = -500
		}
		add_stability = 0.03
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.610 option russia_events.610.b"
		name = russia_events.610.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_dolgorukov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_kartashyov_ai
				}
				RUS_vasily_maklakov = { is_country_leader = yes }
			}
		}
		add_manpower = -5000
		add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
			type = infantry_equipment
			amount = -500
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = 4 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		657 = { increase_state_category_by_one_level = yes }
		560 = { increase_state_category_by_one_level = yes }
		561 = { increase_state_category_by_one_level = yes }
		if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = RUS_political_apathy }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_apathy_var = -1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_apathy_decrease_tt
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = RUS_bold_promises }
			add_days_mission_timeout = {
				mission = RUS_bold_promises
				days = 30
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = RUS_titov_SR_demands }
			add_days_mission_timeout = {
				mission = RUS_titov_SR_demands
				days = 30
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { is_monarchy = yes }
			RUS_increase_imperial_popularity = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.610 option russia_events.610.c"
		name = russia_events.610.c
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
	}
}

			has_socialist_government = no
		}

				has_authoritarian_government = yes

				factor = 2

				factor = 1.5
				has_liberal_government = yes
			}

		FER = {
			every_unit_leader = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_character = RUS_fyodor_bredov
						is_character = RUS_viktorin_molchanov
						is_character = RUS_nikolay_protopopov

				}

			}
		}
	}

country_event = { #Military Anger 6
	id = russia_events.910
	title = russia_events.910.t
	desc = russia_events.910.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army2
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		has_government = national_populist
		is_subject = no
		check_variable = { RUS_military_anger > 5 }
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.910 option russia_events.910.a"
		name = russia_events.910.a
		add_stability = -0.03
		add_popularity = { ideology = paternal_autocrat popularity = 0.05 }
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { RUS_military_anger > 6 } }
				country_event = { id = russia_events.911 days = 4 random_days = 4 }
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Military Anger 8 - Attempted Coup
	id = russia_events.912
	title = russia_events.912.t
	desc = russia_events.912.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army2
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		has_government = national_populist
		RUS_boris_savinkov = { is_country_leader = yes }
		is_subject = no
		check_variable = { RUS_military_anger > 7 }
		NOT = {
			AND = {
				is_ai = yes
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_aftermath option = RUS_AFTERMATH_AUT }
					AND = {
						NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
						has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_ai
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.912 option russia_events.912.a"
		name = russia_events.912.a #The coup succeeds
		trigger = {
			country_exists = GER
			OR = {
				NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
				RUS_pyotr_wrangel = { is_army_chief = yes }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { base = 75 }
		add_stability = -0.1
		set_country_flag = { flag = RUS_looming_coup days = 10 }
		country_event = { id = russia_events.914 days = 4 random_days = 4 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.912 option russia_events.912.b"
		name = russia_events.912.b #The coup fails
		ai_chance = {
			base = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_aftermath option = DEFAULT } }
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -5 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_military_purges
			days = 180
		}
		set_country_flag = military_anger_8
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { RUS_military_anger > 8 } }
				country_event = { id = russia_events.913 days = 4 random_days = 4 }
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Military Anger 9
	id = russia_events.913
	title = russia_events.913.t
	desc = russia_events.913.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army2
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		has_government = national_populist
		is_subject = no
		check_variable = { RUS_military_anger > 8 }
		has_country_flag = military_anger_8
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_looming_coup
			AND = {
				is_ai = yes
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_aftermath option = RUS_AFTERMATH_AUT }
					AND = {
						NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
						has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_ai
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.913 option russia_events.913.a"
		name = russia_events.913.a
		add_popularity = { ideology = national_populist popularity = -0.10 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_military_purges }
			add_political_power = -50
		}
		else = {
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_military_purges
				days = 180
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { RUS_military_anger > 9 } }
				country_event = { id = russia_events.914 days = 4 random_days = 4 }
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Military Anger 10 - Savinkov Assassinated
	id = russia_events.914
	title = {
		trigger = { NOT = { has_war_with = GER } }
		text = russia_events.914.t
	}
	title = {
		trigger = { has_war_with = GER }
		text = russia_events.914.t2
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { NOT = { has_war_with = GER } }
		text = russia_events.914.d
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_war_with = GER }
		text = russia_events.914.d2
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army2
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		has_government = national_populist
		is_subject = no
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_looming_coup
			AND = {
				is_ai = yes
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_aftermath option = RUS_AFTERMATH_AUT }
					AND = {
						NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
						has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_ai
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_war_with = GER
					NOT = { RUS_pyotr_wrangel = { is_army_chief = yes } }
				}
				activate_advisor = RUS_pyotr_wrangel_army_chief
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.914 option russia_events.914.a"
		name = russia_events.914.a
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_vladimir_nabokov = { is_advisor = yes } }
			hidden_effect = { retire_character = RUS_vladimir_nabokov }
		}
		add_stability = -0.1
		if = {
			limit = { has_war_with = GER }
			add_popularity = { ideology = national_populist popularity = -0.1 }
		}
		kill_country_leader = yes
		RUS_military_restore_republic = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Death of Savinkov (wartime)
	id = russia_events.918
	title = russia_events.918.t
	desc = russia_events.918.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army2

	trigger = {
		has_government = national_populist
		has_war = yes
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.918 option russia_events.918.a"
		name = russia_events.918.a
		add_popularity = { ideology = national_populist popularity = -0.4 }
		add_war_support = -0.25
		kill_country_leader = yes
		set_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_suicide
		RUS_military_restore_republic = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			GER = { country_event = { id = russia_foreign_policy_events.1300 days = 3 } }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Popular Anger 6
	id = russia_events.920
	title = russia_events.920.t
	desc = russia_events.920.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_protest
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		has_government = national_populist
		is_subject = no
		check_variable = { RUS_popular_anger > 5 }
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.920 option russia_events.920.a"
		name = russia_events.920.a
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_VRBO }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_VRBO
				add_idea = RUS_VRBO_2
			}
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = 0.04 }
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				region = 135 #North Caucasus
				has_resistance = yes
			}
			add_resistance = 15
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { RUS_popular_anger > 6 } }
				country_event = { id = russia_events.921 days = 14 random_days = 14 }
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Popular Anger 7
	id = russia_events.921
	title = russia_events.921.t
	desc = russia_events.921.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army2
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		has_government = national_populist
		is_subject = no
		check_variable = { RUS_popular_anger > 6 }
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.921 option russia_events.921.a"
		name = russia_events.921.a #Appoint Savitsky
		trigger = {
			power_balance_value = {
				id = RUS_power_balance
				value > -0.001
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		add_power_balance_value = {
			id = RUS_power_balance
			value = -0.25
			tooltip_side = RUS_solidarist
		}
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -5 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.921 option russia_events.921.a"
		name = russia_events.921.a #Appoint moderates
		trigger = {
			power_balance_value = {
				id = RUS_power_balance
				value < -0.001
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		add_power_balance_value = {
			id = RUS_power_balance
			value = -0.25
			tooltip_side = RUS_solidarist
		}
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -5 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.921 option russia_events.921.b"
		name = russia_events.921.b #Nonsense
		add_stability = -0.05
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -5 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
	}
	after = {
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { RUS_popular_anger > 7 } }
				country_event = { id = russia_events.922 days = 14 random_days = 14 }
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Popular Anger 8 - Attempted Uprising
	id = russia_events.922
	title = russia_events.922.t
	desc = russia_events.922.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army2
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		has_government = national_populist
		RUS_boris_savinkov = { is_country_leader = yes }
		is_subject = no
		check_variable = { RUS_popular_anger > 7 }
		NOT = {
			AND = {
				is_ai = yes
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_aftermath option = RUS_AFTERMATH_AUT }
					AND = {
						NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
						has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_ai
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.922 option russia_events.922.a"
		name = russia_events.922.a #uprising succeeds
		trigger = { NOT = { has_war_with = GER } }
		ai_chance = { base = 50 }
		add_stability = -0.1
		country_event = russia_events.924
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.922 option russia_events.922.b"
		name = russia_events.922.b #uprising fails
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		add_political_power = -50
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_VRBO_2 }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_VRBO_2
				add_idea = RUS_VRBO_3
			}
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = 0.05 }
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { RUS_popular_anger > 8 } }
				country_event = { id = russia_events.923 days = 14 random_days = 14 }
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Popular Anger 9
	id = russia_events.923
	title = russia_events.923.t
	desc = russia_events.923.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army2
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		has_government = national_populist
		is_subject = no
		check_variable = { RUS_popular_anger > 8 }
		NOT = {
			AND = {
				is_ai = yes
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_aftermath option = RUS_AFTERMATH_AUT }
					AND = {
						NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
						has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_ai
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.923 option russia_events.923.a"

		add_stability = -0.05

			}
		}
	}

country_event = { #Popular Anger 10 - Savinkov Assassinated
	id = russia_events.924
	title = russia_events.924.t
	desc = russia_events.924.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_savinkov2
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		has_government = national_populist
		RUS_boris_savinkov = { is_country_leader = yes }
		is_subject = no
		date < 1939.1.1
		NOT = {
			has_war_with = GER
			AND = {
				is_ai = yes
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_aftermath option = RUS_AFTERMATH_AUT }
					AND = {
						NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
						has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_ai
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.924 option russia_events.924.a"
		name = russia_events.924.a
		add_stability = -0.1
		add_war_support = -0.15
		kill_country_leader = yes
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = radical_socialist
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_boris_kamkov_sic
		set_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_socialist_uprising
		hidden_effect = {
			add_ideas = RUS_post-savinkov_economy #Replaces Savinkov economic ideas
			RUS_remove_savinkov = yes
			country_event = { id = russia_events.925 days = 1 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Socialist Provisional Government
	id = russia_events.925
	title = russia_events.925.t
	desc = russia_events.925.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_crowd1
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.925 option russia_events.925.a"
		name = russia_events.925.a
		set_country_flag = RUS_spiridonova_revolt
		add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = 0.05 }
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					date < 1937.12.31
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							check_variable = { RUS_military_anger > 4 }
							AND = {
								is_ai = yes
								has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_aftermath option = RUS_AFTERMATH_SOC }
							}
						}
					}
					custom_effect_tooltip = rus_925_tt_1
					RUS_vladimir_manstein = {
						unit_leader_event = { id = russia_events.926 days = 2 } #Manstein's coup attempt
					}
				}
				else = {
					custom_effect_tooltip = rus_925_tt_2
					var:army_chief = {
						unit_leader_event = { id = russia_events.927 days = 2 } #Denikin/Wrangel take power
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				custom_effect_tooltip = rus_925_tt_3
				var:army_chief = {
					unit_leader_event = { id = russia_events.927 days = 2 } #Denikin/Wrangel take power
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

unit_leader_event = { #Manstein Coup Attempt
	id = russia_events.926
	title = russia_events.926.t
	desc = russia_events.926.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.926 option russia_events.926.a"
		name = russia_events.926.a
		country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.102 days = 1 }
		add_stability = -0.05
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		RUS_vladimir_manstein = { kill_character = yes }
		hidden_effect = {
			random_other_country = {
				limit = { is_ai = yes }
				news_event = russia_news_events.8
			}
			RUS = { RUS_initialise_socrus = yes }
		}
	}
}

unit_leader_event = { #Denikin/Wrangel Coup
	id = russia_events.927
	title = {
		trigger = { RUS = { RUS_anton_denikin = { is_army_chief = yes } } }
		text = russia_events.927.t.denikin
	}
	title = {
		trigger = { RUS = { RUS_pyotr_wrangel = { is_army_chief = yes } } }
		text = russia_events.927.t.wrangel
	}
	desc = russia_events.927.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.927 option russia_events.927.a"
		name = russia_events.927.a
		RUS_military_restore_republic = yes
		clr_global_flag = RUS_socrus_happened
		hidden_effect = {
			random_other_country = {
				limit = { is_ai = yes }
				news_event = russia_news_events.9
			}
		}
	}
}

### Triggered Anger Events ###

country_event = { #Anger from casualties
	id = russia_events.961
	title = russia_events.961.t
	desc = russia_events.961.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army3
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		original_tag = RUS
		has_war = yes
		OR = {
			has_idea = RUS_military_anger
			has_idea = RUS_military_anger_dem
		}
		casualties_k > 1000
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { months = 2 }

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.961 option russia_events.961.a"
		name = russia_events.961.a
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Anger from surrender progress
	id = russia_events.962
	title = russia_events.962.t
	desc = russia_events.962.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_border

	trigger = {
		surrender_progress > 0.1
		OR = {
			has_idea = RUS_military_anger
			has_idea = RUS_military_anger_dem
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.962 option russia_events.962.a"
		name = russia_events.962.a
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Reduced anger from winning a war
	id = russia_events.963
	title = russia_events.963.t
	desc = russia_events.963.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army_1
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_idea = RUS_military_anger
			has_idea = RUS_military_anger_dem
		}
	}
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.963 option russia_events.963.a"
		name = russia_events.963.a
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { RUS_military_anger > 0 } }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
			RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		}
		else = {
			add_war_support = 0.03
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Renaming of states
	id = russia_events.964
	title = russia_events.964.t
	desc = russia_events.964.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_savinkov1
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.964 option russia_events.964.a"
		name = russia_events.964.a
		if = {
			limit = { owns_state = 5 } #Konigsberg
			5 = {
				set_global_flag = konigsberg_renamed_savinkov
				effect_tooltip = {
					set_state_name = STATE_5_KALEDINGRAD
					set_province_name = { id = 6332 name = VICTORY_POINTS_6332_KALEDINGRAD }
				}
				rename_state_effect = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owns_state = 777 } #Masuria
			777 = {
				set_global_flag = allenstein_renamed_savinkov
				custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
				effect_tooltip = {
					set_province_name = { id = 9346 name = VICTORY_POINTS_9346_ROPSHINGRAD }
				}
				rename_state_effect = yes
			}
		}
		253 = {
			set_global_flag = ivanovovznesensk_renamed_savinkov
			custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
			effect_tooltip = {
				set_province_name = { id = 357 name = VICTORY_POINTS_357_NECHAYEV }
			}
			rename_state_effect = yes
		}
		248 = {
			set_global_flag = rybinsk_renamed_savinkov
			set_victory_points = { province = 6167 value = 3 }
			effect_tooltip = {
				set_province_name = { id = 6167 name = VICTORY_POINTS_6167_SAVINKOVSK }
			}
			rename_state_effect = yes
		}
		### Possible names to add - Svobodinsk, Belovsk
	}
}

country_event = { #Ukraine in Flames
	id = russia_events.1100
	title = russia_events.1100.t
	desc = russia_events.1100.d
	immediate = {
		set_variable = { RUS_USNS_cp_cost = 30 }
		set_variable = { RUS_USNS_speed = 50 }
		set_variable = { RUS_UKR_governor_compliance = 3 }
	}
	trigger = {
		202 = { #Kyiv
			is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
		}
		is_russian_tag = yes
		has_socialist_government = no
		NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
		is_subject = no
	}
	fire_only_once = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_events.1127 days = 25 } #Belarusian Resistance
			country_event = { id = russia_events.1103 days = 21 } #Commander of the Ukrainian Military District
			country_event = { id = russia_events.1116 days = 80 } #The Kharkov Trials
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_rally
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.1100 option russia_events.1100.a"
		name = russia_events.1100.a
		add_ideas = RUS_UKR_resistance
		792 = { #Volhynia, AGAIN
			add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_USNS_rebels }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { UKR = { is_monarchy = no } }
			201 = { #Zhitomir
				add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_USNS_rebels }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { UKR = { has_government = national_populist } }
			199 = { #Proskurov
				add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_USNS_rebels }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { UKR = { has_socialist_government = yes } }
			192 = { #Odessa
				add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_USNS_rebels }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { UKR = { has_completed_focus = UKR_partisan_training } }
			997 = { #Polesia
				add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_USNS_rebels }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					has_socialist_government = yes
					OR = {
						tag = POL
						tag = LIT
						tag = GAL
						tag = HUN
					}
				}
			}
			93 = { #Brest-Litovsk
				add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_USNS_rebels }
			}
		}
		activate_mission = RUS_USNS_spreading
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = ROOT decision = RUS_finish_resistance }
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_USNS_rebels }
			}
			ROOT = { activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_counter_insurgency target = PREV } }
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { is_core_of = UKR }
			add_resistance = 50
			add_compliance = -10
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Administrative Division of Ukraine
	id = russia_events.1101
	title = russia_events.1101.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_unitary_state }
		text = russia_events.1101.d.unitary
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_unitary_state } }
		text = russia_events.1101.d
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_central_rada
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			add_to_array = { RUS.RUS_novorossia = 221.id } #Kharkiv
			add_to_array = { RUS.RUS_novorossia = 228.id } #Starobyelsk
			add_to_array = { RUS.RUS_novorossia = 227.id } #Yuzovka
			add_to_array = { RUS.RUS_novorossia = 821.id } #Pavlograd
			add_to_array = { RUS.RUS_novorossia = 200.id } #Aleksandrovsk
			add_to_array = { RUS.RUS_novorossia = 196.id } #Taurida
			137 = { remove_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = UKR_crimean_autonomy } }
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_core_of = UKR
						state = 91 #Lviv
						state = 89 #Stanislviv
						state = 80 #Cernauti
						state = 1088 #Chelm
						state = 73 #Transcarpathia
						state = 78 #Bessarabia
					}
					NOT = {
						is_in_array = { RUS.RUS_novorossia = THIS }
						state = 137 #Crimea
					}
				}
				add_to_array = { RUS.RUS_small_ukraine = THIS }
			}
			country_event = { id = russia_events.1104 days = 180 } #Tereschenko and Protofis
			country_event = { id = russia_events.1105 days = 250 } #Minister of Ukrainian Matters
			country_event = { id = russia_events.1106 days = 360 } #Kharkiv, the City of Liberation
			country_event = { id = russia_events.1107 days = 450 } #With Russia or with Communism
			country_event = { id = russia_flavour_events.135 days = 500 random_days = 365 } #The Future of Ukraine
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.1101 option russia_events.1101.a"
		name = russia_events.1101.a #Ukrainian Autonomy
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				OR = {
					has_soclib_or_socdem_government = yes
					has_country_leader = { character = RUS_vasily_maklakov }
					has_country_leader = { character = RUS_nikolay_nekrasov }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 5
				RUS_savinkov = yes
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_towards_unitary_state
				has_country_flag = RUS_unitary_state
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_core_of = UKR
					state = 91 #Lviv
					state = 89 #Stanislviv
					state = 80 #Cernauti
					state = 78 #Bessarabia
					state = 73 #Transcarpathia
					state = 1088 #Chelm
				}
				NOT = { state = 137 } #Crimea
			}
			set_state_flag = ukraine_state
			add_compliance = 5
			add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_ukraine_modifier_autonomy }
		}
		#weaken USNS
		add_to_variable = { RUS_USNS_speed = 15 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_UKR_resistance_reduce
		set_country_flag = RUS_full_UKR_autonomy
		activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_crimean_self_rule target = 137 } #Crimea
		hidden_effect = {
			add_days_mission_timeout = {
				mission = RUS_USNS_spreading
				days = 15
			}
			country_event = { id = russia_events.1102 days = 20 } #Government of Ukraine
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.1101 option russia_events.1101.b"
		name = russia_events.1101.b #Ukrainian and Novorossian Autonomies
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				OR = {
					has_country_leader = { character = RUS_anton_kartashyov }
					has_conservative_government = yes
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 5
				RUS_savinkov = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_soclib_or_socdem_government = yes
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_towards_unitary_state
				has_country_flag = RUS_unitary_state
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		add_to_array = { RUS.RUS_novorossia = 226.id } #Ekaterinoslav
		add_to_array = { RUS.RUS_novorossia = 197.id } #Kherson
		add_to_array = { RUS.RUS_novorossia = 192.id } #Odessa
		remove_from_array = { RUS.RUS_small_ukraine = 226.id } #Ekaterinoslav
		remove_from_array = { RUS.RUS_small_ukraine = 197.id } #Kherson
		remove_from_array = { RUS.RUS_small_ukraine = 192.id } #Odessa
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_core_of = UKR
				is_in_array = { RUS.RUS_novorossia = THIS }
			}
			set_state_flag = novorus_state
			add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_novorussia_modifier_autonomy }
			add_resistance = 20
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						is_core_of = UKR
						is_in_array = { RUS.RUS_small_ukraine = THIS }
					}
					state = 91 #Lviv
					state = 89 #Stanislviv
					state = 80 #Cernauti
					state = 78 #Bessarabia
					state = 73 #Transcarpathia
					state = 1088 #Chelm
				}
			}
			set_state_flag = ukraine_state
			add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_ukraine_modifier_autonomy }
			add_resistance = 20
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_split_UKR
		activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_crimean_self_rule target = 137 } #Crimea
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_events.1102 days = 20 } #Government of Ukraine
			country_event = { id = russia_flavour_events.138 days = 700 random_days = 200 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.1101 option russia_events.1101.c"
		name = russia_events.1101.c #Ukrainian Autonomy + annex the east
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				OR = {
					RUS_solonevich = yes
					has_government = authoritarian_democrat
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_soclib_or_socdem_government = yes
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_towards_unitary_state
				has_country_flag = RUS_unitary_state
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -25
		add_stability = -0.05
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_core_of = UKR
				is_in_array = { RUS.RUS_novorossia = THIS }
			}
			add_compliance = -10
			add_resistance = 40
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						is_core_of = UKR
						is_in_array = { RUS.RUS_small_ukraine = THIS }
					}
					state = 91 #Lviv
					state = 89 #Stanislviv
					state = 80 #Cernauti
					state = 78 #Bessarabia
					state = 73 #Transcarpathia
					state = 1088 #Chelm
				}
			}
			set_state_flag = ukraine_state
			add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_ukraine_modifier_autonomy }
			add_compliance = -10
			add_resistance = 40
		}
		activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_crimean_self_rule target = 137 } #Crimea
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_events.1102 days = 20 } #Government of Ukraine
			country_event = { id = russia_events.1117 days = 50 } #Position of the Ukrainian and Belarusian Language
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.1101 option russia_events.1101.e"
		name = russia_events.1101.e #Annex it all
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_ensure_federalism_law
				has_completed_focus = RUS_empower_autonomies
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.15
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { is_core_of = UKR }
			add_compliance = -40
			add_resistance = 40
			add_resistance_target = {
				amount = 40
				occupier = ROOT
				days = 3650
				tooltip = RUS_USNS_resistance_target_tt
			}
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_USNS_speed = 15 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_UKR_resistance_boost
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_state = { #This is in case you already annexed Galicia and got autonomy modifiers there
				limit = { has_state_flag = ukraine_state }
				clr_state_flag = ukraine_state
				remove_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_ukraine_modifier_autonomy }
			}
			add_days_mission_timeout = {
				mission = RUS_USNS_spreading
				days = -15
			}
			country_event = { id = russia_events.1117 days = 50 } #Position of the Ukrainian and Belarusian Language
		}
	}
}

	id = russia_events.1102
	title = russia_events.1102.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_elected_government = yes }
		text = russia_events.1102.d.dem
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_government = national_populist }
		text = russia_events.1102.d.szrs
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes } }
		text = russia_events.1102.d.solonevich
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_elected_government = yes
				has_government = national_populist
				RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
			}
		}
		text = russia_events.1102.d
	}
	trigger = { controls_state = 202 }
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_dacha
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.1102 option russia_events.1102.a"
		name = russia_events.1102.a #SHD-protofis
		trigger = {
			RUS_is_demrus = yes
			has_soclib_or_socdem_government = no
		}
		add_stability = 0.03
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { is_core_of = UKR }
			add_compliance = 3
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = paternal_autocrat popularity = 0.03 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.1102 option russia_events.1102.b"
		name = russia_events.1102.b #Savinkovite

			limit = { is_core_of = UKR }
			add_resistance = -5
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = national_populist popularity = 0.03 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.1102 option russia_events.1102.c"
		name = russia_events.1102.c #Classocrats
		trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = RUS_duma_of_best_minds
			has_government = paternal_autocrat
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { is_core_of = UKR }
			add_compliance = 3
			add_resistance = -5
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = authoritarian_democrat popularity = 0.03 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.1102 option russia_events.1102.e"
		name = russia_events.1102.e #elections
		trigger = {
			RUS_is_demrus = yes
			has_authoritarian_government = no
			NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_towards_unitary_state }
		}
		add_political_power = -35
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { is_core_of = UKR }
			add_compliance = 5
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = 0.02 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = 0.02 }
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_events.1113 days = 10 }
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Commander of the Ukrainian Military District
	id = russia_events.1103
	title = russia_events.1103.t
	desc = russia_events.1103.d
	trigger = { controls_state = 202 }
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_troops2
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.1103 option russia_events.1103.a"
		name = russia_events.1103.a
		trigger = {
			has_character = RUS_vladimir_manstein
			RUS_vladimir_manstein = { is_army_chief = no }
			has_government = national_populist
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_UKR_manstein_tt
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { is_core_of = UKR }
			add_compliance = -6
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_UKR_risk_tt
		RUS_vladimir_manstein = {
			set_character_flag = RUS_UKR_governor
			ROOT = {
				set_variable = { RUS_UKR_governor_compliance = PREV.skill_level }
				multiply_variable = { RUS_UKR_governor_compliance = 2 }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.1103 option russia_events.1103.b"
		name = russia_events.1103.b
		trigger = { has_character = RUS_boris_shteyfon }
		custom_override_tooltip = {
			tooltip = RUS_UKR_resistance_reduce
			add_to_variable = { RUS_USNS_speed = 15 }
			add_days_mission_timeout = { mission = RUS_USNS_spreading days = 15 }
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { is_core_of = UKR }
			add_compliance = 2
			add_resistance = -5
		}
		add_command_power = 40
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_UKR_risk_tt
		RUS_boris_shteyfon = {
			set_character_flag = RUS_UKR_governor
			ROOT = {
				set_variable = { RUS_UKR_governor_compliance = PREV.skill_level }
				multiply_variable = { RUS_UKR_governor_compliance = 2 }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.1103 option russia_events.1103.c"
		name = russia_events.1103.c
		trigger = {
			has_character = RUS_andrey_shkuro
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_abolished_cossack_hosts }
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { is_core_of = UKR }
			add_compliance = 3
			add_resistance = -3
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_template = "Kazachya diviziya" }
			random_owned_controlled_state = {
				prioritize = { 202 }
				limit = { valid_state_for_spawning_friendly_unit = yes }
				create_unit = {
					division = "division_template = \"Kazachya diviziya\" start_experience_factor = 0.6"
					owner = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_democratic_government = no
					has_government = social_conservative
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = 4 }
			change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_UKR_risk_tt
		RUS_andrey_shkuro = {
			set_character_flag = RUS_UKR_governor
			ROOT = {
				set_variable = { RUS_UKR_governor_compliance = PREV.skill_level }
				multiply_variable = { RUS_UKR_governor_compliance = 2 }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.1103 option russia_events.1103.e"
		name = russia_events.1103.e
		trigger = {
			has_character = RUS_rodion_malinovsky
			is_monarchy = no
		}
		add_stability = 0.05
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { is_core_of = UKR }
			add_compliance = 5
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_UKR_risk_tt
		RUS_rodion_malinovsky = {
			set_character_flag = RUS_UKR_governor
			ROOT = {
				set_variable = { RUS_UKR_governor_compliance = PREV.skill_level }
				multiply_variable = { RUS_UKR_governor_compliance = 2 }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.1103 option russia_events.1103.f"
		name = russia_events.1103.f
		trigger = {
			has_character = RUS_andrei_grechko
			RUS_andrei_grechko = { skill > 1 }
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { is_core_of = UKR }
			add_compliance = 5
			add_resistance = -10
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_UKR_risk_tt
		RUS_andrei_grechko = {
			set_character_flag = RUS_UKR_governor
			ROOT = {
				set_variable = { RUS_UKR_governor_compliance = PREV.skill_level }
				multiply_variable = { RUS_UKR_governor_compliance = 2 }
			}
		}
	}

country_event = { #Kharkiv, the City of Liberation
	id = russia_events.1106
	title = russia_events.1106.t
	desc = russia_events.1106.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_szrs_rally
	trigger = {
		owns_state = 202
		controls_state = 221
		has_government = national_populist
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.1106 option russia_events.1106.a"
		name = russia_events.1106.a
		add_political_power = -25
		221 = {
			custom_override_tooltip = {
				add_building_construction = {
					type = landmark_vozhd_liberator
					level = 1
					province = 418
					instant_build = yes
				}
				tooltip = {
					localization_key = tooltip_add_building_on_victory_point
					BUILDING = landmark_vozhd_liberator
					NUMBER = 1
					VP = 418
				}
			}
		}
	}

country_event = { #first elections of ukraine
	id = russia_events.1113
	title = russia_events.1113.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_full_UKR_autonomy }
		text = russia_events.1113.d.1
	}
	desc = { #Novorussia exists
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_split_UKR }
		text = russia_events.1113.d.2
	}
	desc = { #Novorussia annexed
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_full_UKR_autonomy }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_split_UKR }
		}
		text = russia_events.1113.d.3
	}
	trigger = {
		controls_state = 202
		has_democratic_government = yes
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_election
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.1113 option russia_events.1113.a"
		name = russia_events.1113.a
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_full_UKR_autonomy }
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { is_core_of = UKR }
			add_compliance = 5
			add_resistance = -10
		}
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_UKR_opposition
			days = 730
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = 0.02 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = 0.04 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = market_liberal popularity = 0.03 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.1113 option russia_events.1113.b"
		name = russia_events.1113.b
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_full_UKR_autonomy }
		add_stability = 0.04
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { is_core_of = UKR }
			add_compliance = 3
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = market_liberal popularity = 0.02 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = 0.05 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.1113 option russia_events.1113.c"
		name = russia_events.1113.c
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_split_UKR }
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { is_core_of = UKR }
			add_compliance = 2
		}
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_UKR_opposition
			days = 365
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = 0.04 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = 0.04 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.1113 option russia_events.1113.e"
		name = russia_events.1113.e
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_full_UKR_autonomy }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_split_UKR }
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { is_core_of = UKR }
			add_compliance = 2
		}
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_UKR_opposition
			days = 1825
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = 0.04 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = 0.04 }
	}
	after = {
		RUS_increase_democracy = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #uprising in ukraine
	id = russia_events.1120
	title = russia_events.1120.t
	desc = russia_events.1120.d

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		has_war_with = INT
		controls_state = 202 #Kyiv
		OR = {
			has_idea = RUS_UKR_resistance
			has_dictatorship_government = yes
		}
		OR = {
			any_owned_state = {
				is_core_of = UKR
				any_neighbor_state = { owner = { has_socialist_government = yes } }
			}
			773 = { owner = { has_socialist_government = yes } } #Constantinople
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.1120 option russia_events.1120.a"
		name = russia_events.1120.a
		every_state = {
			limit = {
				is_core_of = UKR
				is_owned_by = RUS
				OR = {
					has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_USNS_rebels }
					resistance > 75
					state = 792 #Volyn
					state = 192 #Odessa
				}
			}
			remove_core_of = RUS
			UKR = { transfer_state = PREV }
			if = {
				limit = { has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_USNS_rebels } }
				remove_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_USNS_rebels }
			}
		}
		INT = { add_to_faction = UKR }
		UKR = {
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { NOT = { has_character = UKR_symon_petliura } }
					UKR_symon_petliura = { set_nationality = UKR }
					UKR_yurii_tiutiunnyk = { set_nationality = UKR }
					UKR_oleksandr_udovychenko = { set_nationality = UKR }
					UKR_omelian_volokh = { set_nationality = UKR }
				}
			}
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = radical_socialist
				elections_allowed = no
			}
			UKR_yurii_tiutiunnyk = {
				add_country_leader_role = {
					country_leader = {
						desc = UKR_yurii_tiutiunnyk_commander_desc
						ideology = social_democrat_subtype
						traits = { KR_respected_war_hero_sic }
					}
					promote_leader = yes
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				RUS = {
					declare_war_on = {
						target = UKR
						type = annex_everything
					}
				}
				drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
				set_cosmetic_tag = UKR_republic
				mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
				UKR_remove_hetmanate = yes
				set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:radical_socialist }
				add_to_coalition = yes
				set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_liberal }
				add_to_coalition = yes
				activate_advisor = UKR_mykhailo_poloz_sic
				activate_advisor = UKR_oleksandr_hrekiv_army_chief
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = totalist
					name = UKR_URVA_party
					long_name = UKR_URVA_party_long
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = syndicalist
					name = UKR_URVA_party
					long_name = UKR_URVA_party_long
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = radical_socialist
					name = UKR_USNS-L_party
					long_name = UKR_USNS-L_party_long
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = social_democrat
					name = UKR_USNS-C_party
					long_name = UKR_USNS-C_party_long
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = social_liberal
					name = UKR_USNS-R_party
					long_name = UKR_USNS-R_party_long
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = market_liberal
					name = UKR_USNS-R_party
					long_name = UKR_USNS-R_party_long
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = social_conservative
					name = UKR_USNS-R_party
					long_name = UKR_USNS-R_party_long
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = authoritarian_democrat
					name = UKR_USNS-R_party
					long_name = UKR_USNS-R_party_long
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = paternal_autocrat
					name = UKR_ZSLUN_party
					long_name = UKR_ZSLUN_party_long
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = national_populist
					name = UKR_ZSLUN_party
					long_name = UKR_ZSLUN_party_long
				}
				add_ideas = war_economy
				add_ideas = extensive_conscription
				add_war_support = 0.5
				add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = 0.4 }
				add_manpower = 50000
				#add ideas?
				add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
					type = infantry_equipment_1
					amount = 3000
					producer = RUS
				}
				enable_tech_irregulars = yes
				enable_tech_militias = yes
				if = {
					limit = { has_template = "Dyviziia Opolchennia" }
					delete_unit_template_and_units = { division_template = "Dyviziia Opolchennia" disband = yes } #no cheating
				}
				division_template = {
					name = "Dyviziia Opolchennia"
					division_names_group = UKR_MIL_01
					regiments = {
						irregular_infantry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
						irregular_infantry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
						irregular_infantry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
						irregular_infantry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
						irregular_infantry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
						irregular_infantry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
						irregular_infantry = { x = 2 y = 0 }
						irregular_infantry = { x = 2 y = 1 }
						irregular_infantry = { x = 2 y = 2 }
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned_controlled_state = {
				prioritize = { 792 }
				limit = { valid_state_for_spawning_friendly_unit = yes }
				create_unit = {
					division = "division_template = \"Dyviziia Opolchennia\" start_experience_factor = 0.5"
					owner = PREV
					count = 2
				}
				create_unit = {
					division = "division_template = \"Kavaleriya Dyviziya\" start_experience_factor = 0.7"
					owner = PREV
					count = 2
				}
			}
			random_owned_controlled_state = {
				prioritize = { 192 }
				limit = { valid_state_for_spawning_friendly_unit = yes }
				create_unit = {
					division = "division_template = \"Dyviziia Opolchennia\" start_experience_factor = 0.5"
					owner = PREV
					count = 2
				}
			}
			random_owned_controlled_state = {
				limit = { valid_state_for_spawning_friendly_unit = yes }
				create_unit = {
					division = "division_template = \"Kavaleriya Dyviziya\" start_experience_factor = 0.5"
					owner = PREV
					count = 2
				}
			}
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = { is_controlled_by = PREV }
				create_unit = {
					division = "division_template = \"Dyviziia Opolchennia\" start_experience_factor = 0.5"
					owner = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Recovered Northwestern Gubernias
	id = russia_events.1125
	title = russia_events.1125.t
	desc = russia_events.1125.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_BLR_national_theatre
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_events.1124 days = 200 } #Delatinisation of Belarusian Language
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.1125 option russia_events.1125.a"
		name = russia_events.1125.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_conservative_government = yes
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_towards_unitary_state
				has_country_flag = RUS_unitary_state
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -20
		RUS_cossack_division_check = yes
		random_owned_controlled_state = {
			prioritize = { 206 } #Minsk
			limit = { valid_state_for_spawning_friendly_unit = yes }
			create_unit = {
				division = "name = \"Diviziya Bulak-Balakhovich\" division_template = \"Kazachya diviziya\" start_experience_factor = 0.6"
				owner = ROOT
			}
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_controlled_by = ROOT
				is_core_of = BLR
			}
			set_state_flag = belarus_state
			add_resistance = -10
			add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_belarus_modifier_autonomy }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_events.1128 days = 75 } #Ataman of Belarus
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.1125 option russia_events.1125.b"
		name = russia_events.1125.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				OR = {
					has_soclib_or_socdem_government = yes
					has_country_leader = { character = RUS_vasily_maklakov }
					has_country_leader = { character = RUS_nikolay_nekrasov }
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_dictatorship_government = yes
				has_completed_focus = RUS_towards_unitary_state
				has_country_flag = RUS_unitary_state
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -30
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_controlled_by = ROOT
				is_core_of = BLR
			}
			set_state_flag = belarus_state
			add_compliance = 3
			add_resistance = -5
			add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_belarus_modifier_autonomy }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_events.1126 days = 125 } #Elections in Belarusian Automony
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.1125 option russia_events.1125.c"
		name = russia_events.1125.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_government = authoritarian_democrat
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_soclib_or_socdem_government = yes
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_ensure_federalism_law
				has_completed_focus = RUS_empower_autonomies
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.075
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_controlled_by = ROOT
				is_core_of = BLR
			}
			add_compliance = -20
			add_resistance = 40
		}
	}
}

			limit = { is_core_of = BLR }

			add_resistance = -8
		}

		add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = 0.03 }
	}
