country_event = { #The Belarusian Resistance
	id = russia_events.1127
	title = russia_events.1127.t
	desc = russia_events.1127.d
	trigger = { controls_state = 206 }
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_BLR_partisans
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.1127 option russia_events.1127.a"
		name = russia_events.1127.a
		194 = { #Mozyr
			add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_generic_rebels }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { BLR = { has_completed_focus = BLR_Partisan_Warfare } }
			95 = { #Pinsk
				add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_generic_rebels }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					var:96.owner = { #Vilnius
						has_socialist_government = yes
					}
					BLR = { has_government = national_populist }
				}
			}
			204 = { #Novogrudok
				add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_generic_rebels }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { 206 = { NOT = { has_state_flag = belarus_state } } } #Minsk
			207 = { #Braslav
				add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_generic_rebels }
			}
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_generic_rebels }
			}
			ROOT = { activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_counter_insurgency target = PREV } }
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { is_core_of = BLR }
			add_resistance = 30
			add_compliance = -10
		}
	}
}

	}

country_event = { #Future of the Baltic Gubernias
	id = russia_events.1130
	title = russia_events.1130.t
	desc = russia_events.1130.d
	trigger = {
		13 = { is_owned_by_ROOT_or_ally = yes }
		11 = { is_owned_by_ROOT_or_ally = yes }
		842 = { is_owned_by_ROOT_or_ally = yes }
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_Forest_Brothers

	option = { #Pursue autonomy
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.1130 option russia_events.1130.a"
		name = russia_events.1130.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				OR = {
					has_soclib_or_socdem_government = yes
					has_country_leader = { character = RUS_vasily_maklakov }
					has_country_leader = { character = RUS_nikolay_nekrasov }
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_towards_unitary_state
				has_country_flag = RUS_unitary_state
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				owns_state = 13
				owns_state = 11
				owns_state = 842
			}
			add_political_power = -75
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				count_triggers = {
					amount = 2
					owns_state = 13
					owns_state = 11
					owns_state = 842
				}
			}
			add_political_power = -100
		}
		else = {
			add_political_power = -75
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_controlled_by = ROOT
				is_core_of = EST
			}
			set_state_flag = estonia_state
			add_resistance = -10
			add_compliance = 5
			add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_estonia_modifier_autonomy }
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_controlled_by = ROOT
				is_core_of = LAT
				NOT = { is_core_of = ROOT }
			}
			set_state_flag = latvia_state
			add_resistance = -10
			if = {
				limit = {
					ROOT = { RUS_karl_gopper = { is_hired_as_advisor = yes } }
				}
				add_compliance = 10
			}
			else = {
				add_compliance = 5
			}
			add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_latvia_modifier_autonomy }
		}
		880 = {
			clr_state_flag = dvinsk_state
			set_state_flag = latvia_state
			remove_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_dvinsk_modifier }
			add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_latvia_modifier_autonomy }
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_controlled_by = ROOT
				is_core_of = LIT
			}
			set_state_flag = lithuania_state
			add_resistance = -10
			add_compliance = 5
			add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_lithuania_modifier_autonomy }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				188 = { #Memel
					is_owned_by = ROOT
					is_claimed_by = ROOT
				}
			}
			188 = {
				set_state_flag = lithuania_state
				add_resistance = -10
				add_compliance = 5
				add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_lithuania_modifier_autonomy }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				97 = { #Bialystok
					is_owned_by = ROOT
					is_claimed_by = ROOT
				}
			}
			97 = {
				set_state_flag = lithuania_state
				add_resistance = -10
				add_compliance = 5
				add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_lithuania_modifier_autonomy }
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_events.1135 days = 25 } #Baltic Resistance
		}
	}
	option = { #Pursue full integration
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.1130 option russia_events.1130.b"
		name = russia_events.1130.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 5
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_government = market_liberal
						NOT = {
							has_country_leader = { character = RUS_vasily_maklakov }
							has_country_leader = { character = RUS_nikolay_nekrasov }
						}
					}
					has_conservative_government = yes
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_soclib_or_socdem_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				206 = { has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_belarus_modifier_autonomy } }
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_ensure_federalism_law
				has_completed_focus = RUS_empower_autonomies
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				owns_state = 13
				owns_state = 11
				owns_state = 842
			}
			add_stability = -0.075
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				count_triggers = {
					amount = 2
					owns_state = 13
					owns_state = 11
					owns_state = 842
				}
			}
			add_stability = -0.05
		}
		else = {
			add_stability = -0.025
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_controlled_by = ROOT
				is_core_of = LAT
				is_core_of = EST
				is_core_of = LIT
				NOT = { is_core_of = ROOT }
			}
			add_compliance = -15
			add_resistance = 25
		}
		880 = {
			clr_state_flag = dvinsk_state
			remove_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_dvinsk_modifier }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_events.1135 days = 25 } #Baltic Resistance
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Puppet the Baltic allies?
	id = russia_events.1131
	title = russia_events.1131.t
	desc = russia_events.1131.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_Forest_Brothers

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #hell yeah hoe
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.1131 option russia_events.1131.a"
		name = russia_events.1131.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				EST = {
					is_in_faction_with = RUS
					is_subject = no
				}
			}
			EST = { country_event = russia_events.1132 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				LAT = {
					is_in_faction_with = RUS
					is_subject = no
				}
			}
			LAT = { country_event = russia_events.1132 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				LIT = {
					is_in_faction_with = RUS
					is_subject = no
				}
			}
			LIT = { country_event = russia_events.1132 }
		}
	}
	option = { #nah I'm good
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.1131 option russia_events.1131.b"
		name = russia_events.1131.b
		add_stability = 0.02
	}
}

country_event = { #Puppet the Baltic allies? (Baltic reaction to this)
	id = russia_events.1132
	title = russia_events.1132.t
	desc = russia_events.1132.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_Forest_Brothers

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Cringe! But I gotta do it!
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.1132 option russia_events.1132.a"
		name = russia_events.1132.a
		RUS = {
			set_autonomy = {
				target = ROOT
				autonomy_state = autonomous_puppet
				end_wars = no
			}
			country_event = russia_events.1133
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					AND = {
						has_authoritarian_government = yes
						RUS = { has_elected_government = yes }
					}
				}
			}
			restore_previous_government_type = yes
		}
	}
	option = { #I have a death wish
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.1132 option russia_events.1132.b"
		name = russia_events.1132.b
		add_war_support = 0.05
		leave_faction = yes
		RUS = {
			country_event = russia_events.1134
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Forest Brothers in Latvia/Estonia
	id = russia_events.1135
	title = russia_events.1135.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { #Latvia only
			owns_state = 842
			NOT = { owns_state = 13 }
		}
		text = russia_events.1135.d.latvia
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { #Estonia only
			owns_state = 13
			NOT = { owns_state = 842 }
		}
		text = russia_events.1135.d.estonia
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { #Estonia and Latvia
			owns_state = 842
			owns_state = 13
		}
		text = russia_events.1135.d.both
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_Forest_Brothers

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.1135 option russia_events.1135.a"
		name = russia_events.1135.a
		if = {
			limit = { owns_state = 842 } #Riga
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = LAT
					NOT = { state = 842 }
				}
				add_resistance = 15
				add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_generic_rebels }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					842 = { #Riga
						NOT = { has_state_flag = latvia_state }
						is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
					}
				}
				842 = { #Estonia
					add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_generic_rebels }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_democratic_government = yes
					LAT = {
						OR = {
							has_authoritarian_government = yes
							has_socialist_government = yes
						}
					}
				}
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = { is_core_of = LAT }
					add_compliance = 5
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owns_state = 13 }
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = EST
				}
				add_resistance = 15
				add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_generic_rebels }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					13 = { #Estonia
						NOT = { has_state_flag = estonia_state }
						is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
					}
				}
				13 = { #Estonia
					add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_generic_rebels }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_democratic_government = yes
					EST = { has_authoritarian_government = yes }
				}
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = {
						is_core_of = EST
					}
					add_compliance = 5
				}
			}
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_generic_rebels }
			}
			ROOT = { activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_counter_insurgency target = PREV } }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_events.1136 days = 30 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Fate of North Caucasus
	id = russia_events.1150
	title = russia_events.1150.t
	desc = russia_events.1150.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_caucasus

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = { has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_oskab_modifier } }
				remove_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_oskab_modifier }
				force_enable_resistance = { occupier = RUS clear = yes }
				clr_state_flag = oskab_state
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = russia_events.1150.a
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.1150 option russia_events.1150.a"
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_autonomy_will_be_formed
		custom_effect_tooltip = north_caucasus_state
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		233 = {
			add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_oskab_modifier_autonomy }
			set_state_flag = north_caucasus_state
		}
		961 = {
			add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_oskab_modifier_autonomy }
			set_state_flag = north_caucasus_state
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_abolished_cossack_hosts }
				NOT = { 787 = { has_state_flag = terek_state } }
			}
			787 = {
				add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_cossack_host_modifier }
				set_state_flag = terek_state
			}
		}
		RUS_autonomy_effect = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = russia_events.1150.b
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.1150 option russia_events.1150.b"
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_autonomy_will_be_formed
		custom_effect_tooltip = kabard_state
		custom_effect_tooltip = chechen_state
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		233 = {
			add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_ethnic_autonomy }
			set_state_flag = kabard_state
		}
		961 = {
			add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_ethnic_autonomy }
			set_state_flag = chechen_state
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_abolished_cossack_hosts }
				NOT = { 787 = { has_state_flag = terek_state } }
			}
			787 = {
				add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_cossack_host_modifier }
				set_state_flag = terek_state
			}
		}
		#Kalmyk Autonomy is created through decision RUS_caspian_autonomies
	}
	option = {
		name = russia_events.1150.c
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.1150 option russia_events.1150.c"
		add_stability = 0.01
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_abolished_cossack_hosts }
				NOT = { 787 = { has_state_flag = terek_state } }
			}
			787 = {
				add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_cossack_host_modifier }
				set_state_flag = terek_state
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Fate of South Caucasus
	id = russia_events.1152
	title = russia_events.1152.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_savinkov = yes }
		text = russia_events.1152.d.szrs
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_savinkov = no }
		text = russia_events.1152.d.dem
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_caucasus
	trigger = {
		has_socialist_government = no
		is_russian_tag = yes
		OR = {
			owns_state = 231 #Georgia
			owns_state = 230 #Armenia
			owns_state = 229 #Azerbaijan
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = russia_events.1152.a
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.1152 option russia_events.1152.a"
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_towards_unitary_state
				has_country_flag = RUS_unitary_state
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -25
		if = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_autonomy_will_be_formed
			custom_effect_tooltip = georgian_state
			limit = {
				231 = {
					is_owned_by = ROOT
					NOT = { has_state_flag = georgian_state }
				}
			}
			231 = {
				add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_georgia_modifier_autonomy }
				add_compliance = 10
				set_state_flag = georgian_state
			}
			if = {
				limit = { 585 = { is_owned_by = RUS } } #Batumi
				585 = {
					add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_georgia_modifier_autonomy }
					add_compliance = 10
					set_state_flag = georgian_state
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { 1080 = { is_owned_by = RUS } } #Abkhazia
				1080 = {
					add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_georgia_modifier_autonomy }
					add_compliance = 10
					set_state_flag = georgian_state
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				230 = {
					is_owned_by = ROOT
					NOT = { has_state_flag = armenian_state }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_autonomy_will_be_formed
			custom_effect_tooltip = armenian_state
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = { is_core_of = ARM }
				add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_armenia_modifier_autonomy }
				add_compliance = 10
				set_state_flag = armenian_state
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				229 = {
					is_owned_by = ROOT
					NOT = { has_state_flag = azeri_state }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_autonomy_will_be_formed
			custom_effect_tooltip = azeri_state
			229 = {
				add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_azerbaijan_modifier_autonomy }
				add_compliance = 10
				set_state_flag = azeri_state
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owns_state = 1001 } #Lazistan
			1001 = {
				add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_georgia_modifier_autonomy }
				add_compliance = 10
				set_state_flag = georgian_state
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_events.1153 days = 90 } #Resurgence of Caucasian Resistance
			if = {
				limit = {
					231 = {
						is_owned_by = RUS
						has_state_flag = georgian_state
					}
				}
				country_event = { id = russia_events.1154 days = 20 } #Georgian government
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia_events.1152.b
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.1152 option russia_events.1152.b"
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_ensure_federalism_law
				has_completed_focus = RUS_empower_autonomies
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_controlled_by = ROOT
				is_core_of = GEO
				is_core_of = AZR
				NOT = { is_core_of = ROOT }
			}
			add_compliance = -25
			add_resistance = 25
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_controlled_by = ROOT
				is_core_of = ARM
				NOT = { is_core_of = ROOT }
			}
			add_compliance = -15
			add_resistance = 15
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_events.1153 days = 90 } #Resurgence of Caucasian Resistance
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Resurgence of Caucasian Resistance
	id = russia_events.1153
	title = russia_events.1153.t
	desc = russia_events.1153.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_caucasus

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.1153 option russia_events.1153.a"
		name = russia_events.1153.a
		add_stability = -0.04
		add_manpower = -55000
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_core_of = GEO
				is_core_of = AZR
				is_core_of = ARM
				NOT = { is_core_of = ROOT }
			}
			add_compliance = -10
			add_resistance = 50
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.1153 option russia_events.1153.b"
		name = russia_events.1153.b
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_OSKAB_reformed } }
		add_stability = -0.02
		add_political_power = -50
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_core_of = GEO
				is_core_of = AZR
				is_core_of = ARM
				NOT = { is_core_of = ROOT }
			}
			add_resistance = 30
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.1153 option russia_events.1153.c"
		name = russia_events.1153.c
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_OSKAB_reformed }
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_core_of = GEO
				is_core_of = AZR
				is_core_of = ARM
				NOT = { is_core_of = ROOT }
			}
			add_resistance = 10
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Georgian government
	id = russia_events.1154
	title = russia_events.1154.t
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			is_monarchy = no
			RUS_is_demrus = yes
			RUS_wrangel_path = no
			NOT = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_towards_unitary_state
				has_government = authoritarian_democrat
			}
		}
		text = russia_events.1154.d.dem
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_government = national_populist }
		text = russia_events.1154.d.szrs
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			RUS_solonevich = yes
			has_government = authoritarian_democrat
		}
		text = russia_events.1154.d.solonevich
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			is_monarchy = yes
			has_country_leader = { character = RUS_vladimir_romanov }
			has_country_flag = RUS_leonida_marriage
			NOT = {
				RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
				has_completed_focus = RUS_towards_unitary_state
			}
		}
		text = russia_events.1154.d.monarchy.leonida
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			is_monarchy = yes
			has_country_leader = { character = RUS_vladimir_romanov }
			NOT = {
				RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
				has_country_flag = RUS_leonida_marriage
				has_completed_focus = RUS_towards_unitary_state
			}
		}
		text = russia_events.1154.d.monarchy
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			is_monarchy = yes
			RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
			NOT = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_towards_unitary_state
			}
		}
		text = russia_events.1154.d.monarchy.solonevich
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			is_monarchy = yes
			RUS_wrangel_path = yes
			has_country_leader = { character = RUS_pyotr_wrangel }
			NOT = {
				RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
				has_completed_focus = RUS_towards_unitary_state
			}
		}
		text = russia_events.1154.d.monarchy.wrangel
	}

	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = RUS_towards_unitary_state
			NOT = { has_government = authoritarian_democrat }
		}
		text = russia_events.1154.d
	}
	trigger = { controls_state = 231 }
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_Georgia_tbilisi
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.1154 option russia_events.1154.a"
		name = russia_events.1154.a #local bureaucrats
		trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = RUS_towards_unitary_state
			NOT = { has_government = authoritarian_democrat }
		}
		add_stability = 0.03
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { has_state_flag = georgian_state }
			add_compliance = 3
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = paternal_autocrat popularity = 0.03 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.1154 option russia_events.1154.b"
		name = russia_events.1154.b #Savinkovite
		trigger = { has_government = national_populist }
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { has_state_flag = georgian_state }
			add_resistance = -5
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = national_populist popularity = 0.03 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.1154 option russia_events.1154.c"
		name = russia_events.1154.c #traditionalists
		trigger = {
			RUS_solonevich = yes
			has_government = authoritarian_democrat
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { has_state_flag = georgian_state }
			add_compliance = 3
			add_resistance = -5
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = authoritarian_democrat popularity = 0.03 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.1154 option russia_events.1154.e"
		name = russia_events.1154.e #elections
		trigger = {
			is_monarchy = no
			RUS_is_demrus = yes
			has_authoritarian_government = no
			NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_towards_unitary_state }
		}
		add_political_power = -35
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { has_state_flag = georgian_state }
			add_compliance = 5
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = 0.02 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = 0.02 }
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_events.1155 days = 180 } #Elections in Georgia
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.1154 option russia_events.1154.f"
		name = russia_events.1154.f #no georgian king
		trigger = {
			is_monarchy = yes
			RUS_is_demrus = yes
			NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_towards_unitary_state }
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { has_state_flag = georgian_state }
			add_resistance = 5
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = no }
			}
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
			RUS_change_right_anger = yes
			add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = 0.02 }
			add_popularity = { ideology = market_liberal popularity = 0.02 }
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = { id = russia_events.1155 days = 180 } #Elections in Georgia
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_stability = 0.03
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.1154 option russia_events.1154.g"
		name = russia_events.1154.g #georgian king
		trigger = {
			is_monarchy = yes
			RUS_is_demrus = yes
			NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_towards_unitary_state }
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { has_state_flag = georgian_state }
			add_compliance = 5
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_georgian_monarchy
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = no }
			}
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
			RUS_change_right_anger = yes
			add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = 0.02 }
			add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = 0.02 }
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = { id = russia_events.1155 days = 180 } #Elections in Georgia
			}
			else = {
				add_popularity = { ideology = paternal_autocrat popularity = 0.03 }
				add_political_power = -35
			}
		}
	}
}

		name = russia_events.1155.a

			limit = { has_state_flag = georgian_state }
			add_compliance = 10
		}

		add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = 0.03 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.1155 option russia_events.1155.b"
		name = russia_events.1155.b
		add_stability = 0.05
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { has_state_flag = georgian_state }
			add_compliance = 5
			add_resistance = -15
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = market_liberal popularity = 0.04 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = 0.03 }
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = russia_events.1156
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.1156 option 1"
		if = {
			limit = {
				owns_any_state_of = {
					229 #Azerbaijan
					230 #Yerevan
					231 #Georgia
				}
			}
			country_event = russia_events.1152
		}
	}
}
### DemRus Constituent Assembly and election events

unit_leader_event = { # 3rd Constitutional Asssembly
	id = russia_elections_events.1
	title = russia_elections_events.1.t
	desc = russia_elections_events.1.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.1 option russia_elections_events.1.a"
		name = russia_elections_events.1.a
		hidden_effect = {
			var:country_leader = {
				unit_leader_event = { id = russia_elections_events.2 days = 1 } #Opening speech
			}
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_soc_var = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_socdem_var = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_soclib_var = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_marlib_var = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_soccon_var = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_mil_var = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_temp_mil_anger = 1 }
		set_variable = { RUS_temp_right_anger = 1 }
		set_variable = { RUS_temp_left_anger = 1 }
		set_country_flag = RUS_ongoing_const_assembly
		unlock_decision_category_tooltip = RUS_3rd_constitutional_assembly
		activate_mission = RUS_military_pressure_mission
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_pyotr_wrangel = { is_country_leader = yes } }
			activate_mission = RUS_monarchism_mission
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_boldyrev = yes }
			set_country_flag = RUS_lost_wk2 #temporarily here
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		custom_effect_tooltip = russia_elections_events.1.tt
	}
}

unit_leader_event = { # Opening speech
	id = russia_elections_events.2
	title = russia_elections_events.2.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_anton_denikin = { is_country_leader = yes } }
		text = russia_elections_events.2.d.denikin
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_pyotr_wrangel = { is_country_leader = yes } }
		text = russia_elections_events.2.d.wrangel
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_ongoing_const_assembly }

		name = russia_elections_events.2.a
		trigger = { RUS_anton_denikin = { is_country_leader = yes } }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.2 option russia_elections_events.2.b"
		name = russia_elections_events.2.b
		trigger = { RUS_pyotr_wrangel = { is_country_leader = yes } }
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_dmitry_romanov = {
				unit_leader_event = { id = russia_elections_events.6 days = 2 }
			}
		}
	}
}

unit_leader_event = { # Crisis in the Kadet Faction
	id = russia_elections_events.3
	title = russia_elections_events.3.t
	desc = russia_elections_events.3.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_ongoing_const_assembly }
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.3 option russia_elections_events.3.a"
		name = russia_elections_events.3.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_kadets_swayed_to_monarchism
		set_country_flag = RUS_kadets_swayed_to_monarchism
		if = {
			limit = { has_decision = RUS_russia_is_monarchy }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_support_marlib
			add_to_variable = { RUS_marlib_var = 1 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # The constitution is accepted
	id = russia_elections_events.4
	title = russia_elections_events.4.t
	desc = russia_elections_events.4.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { clr_country_flag = RUS_ongoing_const_assembly }

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.4 option russia_elections_events.4.a"
		name = russia_elections_events.4.a
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_enshrine_military_role_law }
			add_political_power = 50
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_active_mission = RUS_land_reform_in_progress
					has_country_flag = RUS_restricted_nationalisation_law
				}
				add_days_mission_timeout = {
					mission = RUS_land_reform_in_progress
					days = 90
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_after_election_tt
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_repeal_communist_ban_law }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_temp_right_anger = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_temp_mil_anger = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_state_secularism_law }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_temp_right_anger = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_state_religion_law }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_temp_left_anger = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_enshrine_military_role_law }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_temp_mil_anger = -1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { is_monarchy = yes }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_temp_left_anger = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_temp_right_anger = -1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { RUS_soccon_var < 0 } }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_temp_right_anger = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { RUS_socdem_var < 0 } }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_temp_left_anger = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { RUS_socdem_var < 0 } }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_temp_mil_anger = 1 }
		}
		#if = {
		#	limit = { check_variable = { RUS_temp_right_anger > 0 } }
		#	set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = RUS_temp_right_anger }
		#	custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_right_anger
		#}
		#if = {
		#	limit = { check_variable = { RUS_temp_left_anger > 0 } }
		#	set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = RUS_temp_left_anger }
		#	custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_left_anger
		#}
		#if = {
		#	limit = { check_variable = { RUS_temp_mil_anger > 0 } }
		#	set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = RUS_temp_mil_anger }
		#	custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_mil_anger
		#}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_pyotr_wrangel = { is_country_leader = yes } }
			RUS_pyotr_wrangel = {
				unit_leader_event = { id = russia_monarchist_events.1 days = 2 } #Wrangel announces intention to return to monarchy
			}
		}
		var:army_chief = {
			unit_leader_event = { id = russia_elections_events.10 days = 4 } #Announce elections
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_kadets_swayed_to_monarchism
	}
}

unit_leader_event = { # The Gunpoint Constitution
	id = russia_elections_events.5
	title = russia_elections_events.5.t
	desc = russia_elections_events.5.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.5 option russia_elections_events.5.a"
		name = russia_elections_events.5.a
		trigger = { RUS_anton_denikin = { is_country_leader = yes } }
		clr_country_flag = RUS_ongoing_const_assembly
		set_country_flag = RUS_decrees_law
		set_country_flag = RUS_electoral_threshold_law
		set_country_flag = RUS_judicial_review_law
		set_country_flag = RUS_defensive_democracy_law
		set_country_flag = RUS_enshrine_military_role_law
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 3 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_left_anger
		add_to_variable = { RUS_temp_left_anger = 3 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_right_anger
		add_to_variable = { RUS_temp_left_anger = 1 }
		hidden_effect = {
			var:army_chief = {
				unit_leader_event = { id = russia_elections_events.10 days = 2 } #Elections in 90 days
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.5 option russia_elections_events.5.a"
		name = russia_elections_events.5.a
		trigger = { RUS_pyotr_wrangel = { is_country_leader = yes } }
		clr_country_flag = RUS_ongoing_const_assembly
		set_country_flag = RUS_decrees_law
		set_country_flag = RUS_electoral_threshold_law
		set_country_flag = RUS_judicial_review_law
		set_country_flag = RUS_defensive_democracy_law
		set_country_flag = RUS_enshrine_military_role_law
		clr_country_flag = RUS_kadets_swayed_to_monarchism
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 4 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_left_anger
		add_to_variable = { RUS_temp_left_anger = 4 }
		hidden_effect = {
			var:army_chief = {
				unit_leader_event = { id = russia_elections_events.10 days = 2 } #Elections in 90 days
				unit_leader_event = { id = russia_monarchist_events.1 days = 1 } #Wrangel becomes the imperial regent
			}
		}
	}
}

		name = russia_elections_events.6.a
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { RUS_wrangel_path = no }
				random_list = {
					50 = {
						set_country_flag = RUS_maria_marriage
					}
					50 = {
						set_country_flag = RUS_leonida_marriage
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

unit_leader_event = { # Elections in 90 days announced by Denikin/Wrangel
	id = russia_elections_events.10
	title = russia_elections_events.10.t
	desc = russia_elections_events.10.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army3
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { RUS_is_demrus = yes }
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.10 option russia_elections_events.10.a"
		name = russia_elections_events.10.a
		complete_national_focus = RUS_democracy_restored
		set_variable = { RUS_RDP_var = 1 }
		set_variable = { RUS_PSR_var = 2 }
		set_variable = { RUS_kadet_var = 2 }
		set_variable = { RUS_VPP_var = 1 }
		activate_mission = RUS_election_timer
		hidden_effect = {
			meta_effect = {
				text = {
					set_politics = {
						ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
						last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
						election_frequency = 3
						elections_allowed = yes
					}
				}
				CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
			}
			RUS_vasily_maklakov = {
				unit_leader_event = { id = russia_elections_events.11 days = 2 } #Kadet intro
			}
		}
	}
}
unit_leader_event = { #Kadet intro
	id = russia_elections_events.11
	title = russia_elections_events.11.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { is_monarchy = no }
		text = russia_elections_events.11.d.republic
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { is_monarchy = yes }
		text = russia_elections_events.11.d.monarchy
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		has_active_mission = RUS_election_timer
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.11 option russia_elections_events.11.a"
		name = russia_elections_events.11.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_favored_by_establishment_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_kadet
		add_to_variable = { RUS_kadet_var = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_anton_denikin = { is_country_leader = yes } }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_favored_by_general_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_kadet
			add_to_variable = { RUS_kadet_var = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_electoral_threshold_law }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_favored_by_theshold_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_kadet
			add_to_variable = { RUS_kadet_var = 1 }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { is_monarchy = yes }
				RUS_ilya_fondaminsky = {
					unit_leader_event = { id = russia_elections_events.12 days = 2 } #SR intro
				}
			}
			else = {
				RUS_vladimir_rikhter = {
					unit_leader_event = { id = russia_elections_events.12 days = 2 } #SR intro
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
unit_leader_event = { #SR intro
	id = russia_elections_events.12
	title = russia_elections_events.12.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { is_monarchy = no }
		text = russia_elections_events.12.d.republic
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { is_monarchy = yes }
		text = russia_elections_events.12.d.monarchy
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		has_active_mission = RUS_election_timer
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.12 option russia_elections_events.12.a"
		name = russia_elections_events.12.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 1
				has_country_flag = RUS_rdp_ai
			}
		}
		trigger = { is_monarchy = no }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_favored_by_establishment_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_PSR
		add_to_variable = { RUS_PSR_var = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_electoral_threshold_law }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_favored_by_theshold_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_PSR
			add_to_variable = { RUS_PSR_var = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_proportional_system_law }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_favored_by_propsys_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_PSR
			add_to_variable = { RUS_PSR_var = 1 }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_aleksandr_titov = {
				unit_leader_event = { id = russia_elections_events.13 days = 2 } #RDP intro
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.12 option russia_elections_events.12.c"
		name = russia_elections_events.12.c
		trigger = { is_monarchy = yes }
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_electoral_threshold_law }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_favored_by_theshold_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_PSR
			add_to_variable = { RUS_PSR_var = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_proportional_system_law }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_favored_by_propsys_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_PSR
			add_to_variable = { RUS_PSR_var = 1 }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_aleksandr_titov = {
				unit_leader_event = { id = russia_elections_events.13 days = 2 } #RDP intro
			}
		}
	}
}
unit_leader_event = { #RDP intro
	id = russia_elections_events.13
	title = russia_elections_events.13.t
	desc = russia_elections_events.13.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		has_active_mission = RUS_election_timer
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.13 option russia_elections_events.13.a"
		name = russia_elections_events.13.a
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_repeal_communist_ban_law }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_favored_by_com_repeal_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_RDP
			add_to_variable = { RUS_RDP_var = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_proportional_system_law }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_favored_by_propsys_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_RDP
			add_to_variable = { RUS_RDP_var = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_repeal_communist_ban_law } }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_harmed_by_com_repeal_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_lower_RDP
			add_to_variable = { RUS_RDP_var = -1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_electoral_threshold_law }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_harmed_by_theshold_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_lower_RDP
			add_to_variable = { RUS_RDP_var = -1 }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_aleksandr_golitsyn = {
				unit_leader_event = { id = russia_elections_events.14 days = 2 } #VPP intro
			}
		}
	}
}

			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_kadet_ai
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_elections_events.16 days = 5 } #Cooperation with communists?
		}
	}
	option = { #SRs
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.15 option russia_elections_events.15.b"
		name = russia_elections_events.15.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_sr_ai
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_psr_pov
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_elections_events.16 days = 5 } #Cooperation with communists?
		}
	}

		name = russia_elections_events.15.c

			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_vpp_ai
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_vpp_pov
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_elections_events.16 days = 5 } #Cooperation with communists?
		}
	}
	option = { #RDP

			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_rdp_pov
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_elections_events.16 days = 5 } #Cooperation with communists?
		}
	}

country_event = { #Cooperation with communists?
	id = russia_elections_events.16
	title = russia_elections_events.16.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_repeal_communist_ban_law }
		text = russia_elections_events.16.d.communist
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_repeal_communist_ban_law } }
		text = russia_elections_events.16.d.ban
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		has_active_mission = RUS_election_timer
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_levitsky
	option = { #Yes
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.16 option russia_elections_events.16.a"
		name = russia_elections_events.16.a
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_rdp_pov
				has_stability < 0.49
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				has_country_flag = RUS_sulimov_ai
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_RDP
		add_to_variable = { RUS_RDP_var = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_after_election_tt
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_left_anger
		add_to_variable = { RUS_temp_left_anger = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_rdp_pov } }
			country_event = { id = russia_elections_events.19 days = 5 } #Protests against military
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_repeal_communist_ban_law
				RUS_boldyrev = no
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_radical_RDP_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				RUS_vladimir_levitsky = {
					unit_leader_event = { id = russia_elections_events.17 days = 5 } #Titov ousted
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
				RUS_aleksandr_titov = {
					unit_leader_event = { id = russia_elections_events.18 days = 5 } #Titov stays
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #No
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.16 option russia_elections_events.16.b"
		name = russia_elections_events.16.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_rdp_pov
				has_stability > 0.5
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_titov_ai
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.03
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_rdp_pov }
				RUS_aleksandr_titov = {
					unit_leader_event = { id = russia_elections_events.18 days = 5 } #Titov stays
				}
			}
			else = {
				country_event = { id = russia_elections_events.19 days = 5 } #Protests against military
			}
		}
	}
}
unit_leader_event = { #Titov ousted
	id = russia_elections_events.17
	title = russia_elections_events.17.t
	desc = russia_elections_events.17.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		has_active_mission = RUS_election_timer
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.17 option russia_elections_events.17.a"
		name = russia_elections_events.17.a
		set_country_flag = RUS_RDP_leader_levitsky
		add_country_leader_role = {
			character = RUS_daniil_sulimov
			country_leader = {
				desc = RUS_daniil_sulimov_leader_desc
				ideology = social_democrat_subtype
			}
			promote_leader = yes
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = 0.03 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_after_election_tt
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_decrease_left_anger
		add_to_variable = { RUS_temp_left_anger = -1 }
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_elections_events.19 days = 5 } #Protests against military
		}
	}
}

	id = russia_elections_events.19
	title = russia_elections_events.19.t
	desc = russia_elections_events.19.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_protest
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		has_active_mission = RUS_election_timer
	}
	option = { #Disperse protests
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.19 option russia_elections_events.19.a"
		name = russia_elections_events.19.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_vpp_ai
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.02
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_after_election_tt
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_left_anger
		add_to_variable = { RUS_temp_left_anger = 1 }
		hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = russia_elections_events.20 days = 5 } } #Socialists harassed
	}
	option = { #Let them protest
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.19 option russia_elections_events.19.b"
		name = russia_elections_events.19.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_rdp_ai
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_sr_ai
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_kadet_ai
			}
		}
		add_war_support = -0.04
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_RDP
		add_to_variable = { RUS_RDP_var = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = { is_monarchy = yes }
			add_stability = -0.04
		}
		else = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_after_election_tt
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_mil_anger
			add_to_variable = { RUS_temp_mil_anger = 1 }
		}
		hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = russia_elections_events.20 days = 5 } } #Socialists harassed
	}
}
country_event = { #Socialists harassed
	id = russia_elections_events.20
	title = russia_elections_events.20.t
	desc = russia_elections_events.20.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_Spiridonova
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		has_active_mission = RUS_election_timer
	}
	option = { #Hinder their campaign every mean available
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.20 option russia_elections_events.20.a"
		name = russia_elections_events.20.a
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_lower_RDP
		add_to_variable = { RUS_RDP_var = -1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_after_election_tt
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_left_anger
		add_to_variable = { RUS_temp_left_anger = 1 }
		hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = russia_elections_events.21 days = 4 } } #Corruption
	}
	option = { #Just try to keep the peace
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.20 option russia_elections_events.20.b"
		name = russia_elections_events.20.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_rdp_ai
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_sr_ai
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_kadet_ai
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_vpp_ai
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { is_monarchy = yes }
			add_political_power = -20
		}
		else = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_after_election_tt
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_mil_anger
			add_to_variable = { RUS_temp_mil_anger = 1 }
		}
		hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = russia_elections_events.21 days = 4 } } #Corruption
	}
	option = { #Fight fire with fire!
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.20 option russia_elections_events.20.c"
		name = russia_elections_events.20.c
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_rdp_pov
				has_country_flag = RUS_psr_pov
			}
			is_monarchy = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_psr_pov }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_PSR
			add_to_variable = { RUS_PSR_var = 1 }
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_RDP
		add_to_variable = { RUS_RDP_var = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_after_election_tt
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_right_anger
		add_to_variable = { RUS_temp_right_anger = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = { is_monarchy = yes }
			add_stability = -0.04
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_mil_anger
			add_to_variable = { RUS_temp_mil_anger = 1 }
			add_stability = -0.02
		}
		hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = russia_elections_events.21 days = 4 } } #Corruption
	}
}
country_event = { #Restrictions on Major Donors
	id = russia_elections_events.21
	title = russia_elections_events.21.t
	desc = russia_elections_events.21.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		has_active_mission = RUS_election_timer
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.21 option russia_elections_events.21.a"
		name = russia_elections_events.21.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_sr_ai
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_kadet_ai
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_vpp_ai
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 25
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_kadet
		add_to_variable = { RUS_kadet_var = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_psr_pov }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_PSR
			add_to_variable = { RUS_PSR_var = 1 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_vpp_pov }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_VPP
			add_to_variable = { RUS_VPP_var = 1 }
		}
		activate_mission = RUS_pay_back_backers
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_elections_events.22 days = 4 } #Appealing to nationalists
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.21 option russia_elections_events.21.b"
		name = russia_elections_events.21.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_rdp_ai
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -20
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_after_election_tt
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_temp_left_anger = -1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_decrease_left_anger
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_elections_events.22 days = 4 } #Appealing to nationalists
		}
	}
}

		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_right_anger
		add_to_variable = { RUS_temp_right_anger = 1 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Duma election results
	id = russia_elections_events.30
	title = russia_elections_events.30.t
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_duma
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_VPP_victory }
		text = russia_elections_events.30.d.soccon
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_PSR_victory
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_RDP_victory
					is_monarchy = yes
				}
			}
		}
		text = russia_elections_events.30.d.soclib
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_RDP_victory
			is_monarchy = no
		}
		text = russia_elections_events.30.d.socdem
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_kadet_victory }
		text = russia_elections_events.30.d.marlib
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { RUS_is_demrus = yes }
	immediate = {
		set_country_flag = RUS_had_first_election
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_mission = RUS_election_timer
			complete_national_focus = RUS_elections
			country_event = { id = russia_democratic_events.120 days = 150 random_days = 50 } #General reveals the war plan
			news_event = { id = russia_news_events.5 days = 1 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.30 option russia_elections_events.30.a"
		name = russia_elections_events.30.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_RDP_victory
			is_monarchy = no
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_democrat
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_RDP_leader_levitsky }
			add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = 0.05 }
			country_event = russia_elections_events.31 #Sulimov forms his government
		}
		else = {
			add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = 0.05 }
			country_event = russia_elections_events.32 #Titov forms his government
		}
		complete_national_focus = RUS_socdems
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.30 option russia_elections_events.30.b"
		name = russia_elections_events.30.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_PSR_victory
				AND = {
					is_monarchy = yes
					has_country_flag = RUS_RDP_victory
				}
			}
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_liberal
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		if = {
			limit = { is_monarchy = yes }
			add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = 0.05 }
			RUS_ilya_fondaminsky = { unit_leader_event = russia_elections_events.38 } #Tsar appoints SR PM
		}
		else = {
			add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = 0.05 }
			country_event = russia_elections_events.34 #Rikhter forms his government
		}
		complete_national_focus = RUS_soclibs
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.30 option russia_elections_events.30.c"
		name = russia_elections_events.30.c
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_kadet_victory }
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = market_liberal
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = market_liberal popularity = 0.05 }
		if = {
			limit = { is_monarchy = yes }
			country_event = russia_elections_events.39 #Tsar appoints Kadet PM
		}
		else = {
			country_event = russia_elections_events.35 #Maklakov forms his government
		}
		complete_national_focus = RUS_marlibs
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.30 option russia_elections_events.30.e"
		name = russia_elections_events.30.e
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_VPP_victory }
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_conservative
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = 0.05 }
		if = {
			limit = { is_monarchy = yes }
			country_event = russia_elections_events.40 #Tsar appoints VPP PM
		}
		else = {
			country_event = russia_elections_events.36 #Solonevich forms his government
		}
		complete_national_focus = RUS_soccons
	}
}

country_event = { #Titov Sworn in
	id = russia_elections_events.32
	title = russia_elections_events.32.t
	desc = russia_elections_events.32.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		is_monarchy = no
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_titov
	immediate = {
		RUS_setup_demrus = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_democratic_events.50 days = 60 } #Emboldened Labour Movement
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.32 option russia_elections_events.32.a"
		name = russia_elections_events.32.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = { check_variable = { RUS_PSR_var < RUS_kadet_var } }
		}
		activate_mission = RUS_titov_SR_demands
		activate_advisor = RUS_sergey_melgunov_sic
		activate_advisor = RUS_vladimir_rikhter_advisor
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_liberal }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_increase_farmer_subsidies target = ROOT }
			activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_increase_wages target = ROOT }
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.32 option russia_elections_events.32.b"
		name = russia_elections_events.32.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = { check_variable = { RUS_kadet_var < RUS_PSR_var } }
		}
		activate_mission = RUS_titov_kadet_demands
		activate_advisor = RUS_sergey_melgunov_sic
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:market_liberal }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_subsidy_private_enterprise target = ROOT }
			activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_increase_wages target = ROOT }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Maklakov Sworn in
	id = russia_elections_events.35
	title = russia_elections_events.35.t
	desc = russia_elections_events.35.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		is_monarchy = no
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_maklakov

	immediate = {
		RUS_setup_demrus = yes
		set_variable = { RUS_apathy_var = 1 }
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = russia_events.10006	# Leader-choosing event for AI
			country_event = { id = russia_flavour_events.177 days = 90 random_days = 30 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.35 option russia_elections_events.35.a"
		name = russia_elections_events.35.a
		activate_mission = RUS_political_apathy
		if = {
			limit = { is_ai = yes }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_apathy_var = -1 }
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_nikolay_nekrasov_sic
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_liberal }
		add_to_coalition = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.35 option russia_elections_events.35.b"
		name = russia_elections_events.35.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_RDP_leader_levitsky }
		}
		activate_mission = RUS_political_apathy
		if = {
			limit = { is_ai = yes }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_apathy_var = -1 }
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_nikolay_nekrasov_sic
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_democrat }
		add_to_coalition = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.35 option russia_elections_events.35.c"
		name = russia_elections_events.35.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_maklakov_ai
			}
		}
		activate_mission = RUS_political_apathy
		activate_advisor = RUS_nikolay_nekrasov_sic
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_conservative }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		if = {
			limit = { is_ai = no }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_apathy_var = 1 }
		}
		else = {
			add_to_variable = { RUS_apathy_var = -1 }
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_apathy_increase_tt
	}
	after = {
		country_event = { id = russia_democratic_events.60 days = 3 } #Control of the State Council
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_pass_progressive_legislation target = ROOT }
			activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_maklakov_resign target = ROOT }
		}
	}
}

	id = russia_elections_events.40
