		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.40 option russia_elections_events.40.a"
		name = russia_elections_events.40.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_GOLITSYN_SOCCON } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_ROMANOV_SOCCON } }
			}
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_aleksandr_golitsyn_sic
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:authoritarian_democrat }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		add_political_power = 80
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_monarchist_events.103 days = 400 random_days = 150 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.40 option russia_elections_events.40.b"
		name = russia_elections_events.40.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_VERNADSKY_SOCCON } }
			}
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_georgy_vernadsky_sic
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:market_liberal }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		add_stability = 0.1
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_monarchist_events.102 days = 400 random_days = 150 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.40 option russia_elections_events.40.c"
		name = russia_elections_events.40.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_SOLONEVICH_SOCCON } }
			}
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_ivan_solonevich_sic
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:authoritarian_democrat }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		 ### Starts Solonevich monarchy path
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = 0.1 }
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_democratic_events.71 days = 30 } #Ascension of the People's Monarchists
			country_event = { id = russia_flavour_events.90 days = 100 random_days = 160 } #Solonevich Attacked
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #President's agenda
	id = russia_elections_events.50
	title = russia_elections_events.50.t
	desc = russia_elections_events.50.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_duma
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		is_monarchy = no
		has_elected_government = yes
		NOT = { var:country_leader = { has_character_flag = RUS_traits_assigned } }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.50 option russia_elections_events.50.a"
		name = russia_elections_events.50.a
		trigger = { RUS_sulimov = yes }
		add_country_leader_trait = RUS_sulimov_1_off
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.50 option russia_elections_events.50.a"
		name = russia_elections_events.50.a
		trigger = { RUS_titov = yes }
		add_country_leader_trait = RUS_titov_1_off
		add_country_leader_trait = RUS_titov_2_off
		add_country_leader_trait = RUS_titov_3_off
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.50 option russia_elections_events.50.a"
		name = russia_elections_events.50.a
		trigger = { RUS_rikhter = yes }
		add_country_leader_trait = RUS_rikhter_1_off
		add_country_leader_trait = RUS_rikhter_2_off
		add_country_leader_trait = RUS_rikhter_3_off
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.50 option russia_elections_events.50.a"
		name = russia_elections_events.50.a
		trigger = { RUS_fondaminsky = yes }
		add_country_leader_trait = RUS_fondaminsky_1_off
		add_country_leader_trait = RUS_fondaminsky_2_off
		add_country_leader_trait = RUS_fondaminsky_3_off
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.50 option russia_elections_events.50.a"
		name = russia_elections_events.50.a
		trigger = { RUS_sorokin = yes }
		add_country_leader_trait = RUS_sorokin_1_off
		add_country_leader_trait = RUS_sorokin_2_off
		add_country_leader_trait = RUS_sorokin_3_off
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.50 option russia_elections_events.50.a"
		name = russia_elections_events.50.a
		trigger = { RUS_maklakov = yes }
		if = {
			limit = { is_in_coalition_with_social_liberal = yes }
			add_country_leader_trait = RUS_maklakov_1_off
		}
		add_country_leader_trait = RUS_maklakov_2_off
		add_country_leader_trait = RUS_maklakov_3_off
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.50 option russia_elections_events.50.a"
		name = russia_elections_events.50.a
		trigger = { RUS_kartashyov = yes }

		add_country_leader_trait = RUS_kartashyov_1_off
		add_country_leader_trait = RUS_kartashyov_2_off
		add_country_leader_trait = RUS_kartashyov_3_off
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.50 option russia_elections_events.50.a"
		name = russia_elections_events.50.a
		trigger = { RUS_dolgorukov = yes }
		add_country_leader_trait = RUS_dolgorukov_1_off
		add_country_leader_trait = RUS_dolgorukov_2_off
		add_country_leader_trait = RUS_dolgorukov_3_off
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.50 option russia_elections_events.50.a"
		name = russia_elections_events.50.a
		trigger = { RUS_golitsyn = yes }
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_leader = { character = RUS_dmitry_romanov } }
			}
			add_country_leader_trait = RUS_golitsyn_1_off
		}
		add_country_leader_trait = RUS_golitsyn_2_off
		add_country_leader_trait = RUS_golitsyn_3_off
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.50 option russia_elections_events.50.a"
		name = russia_elections_events.50.a
		trigger = { RUS_solonevich = yes }
		add_country_leader_trait = RUS_solonevich_1_off
		add_country_leader_trait = RUS_solonevich_2_off
		add_country_leader_trait = RUS_solonevich_3_off
	}
	after = {
		var:country_leader = { set_character_flag = RUS_traits_assigned }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_president_trait_tt
	}
}

country_event = { #Future elections for republic
	id = russia_elections_events.51
	title = russia_elections_events.51.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_pyotr_dolgorukov = { is_country_leader = no } }
		text = russia_elections_events.51.d
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_pyotr_dolgorukov = { is_country_leader = yes } }
		text = russia_elections_events.51.d2
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_election
	trigger = {
		is_monarchy = no
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		RUS_wrangel_path = no
		has_country_flag = RUS_had_first_election
		NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_had_second_election }
		NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
		NOT = { has_war_with = INT }
	}
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = RUS_deadlocked_duma }
				remove_ideas = RUS_deadlocked_duma
			}
			country_event = { id = russia_elections_events.50 days = 30 } #President's agenda
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_part_of_government_social_democrat = yes
						is_in_coalition_with_radical_socialist = yes
					}
				}
				country_event = { id = russia_democratic_events.173 days = 30 } # Demands from the Socialists
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_had_second_election
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.51 option russia_elections_events.51.a"
		name = russia_elections_events.51.a #Titov wins
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_RDP_split
				has_completed_focus = RUS_values_of_february
				has_idea = RUS_guided_democracy
			}
			OR = {
				RUS_titov = yes
				RUS_sorokin = yes
				AND = {
					is_ai = yes
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_SOCDEM }
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_SOCDEM } }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_titov_ai }
			}
		}
		RUS_aleksandr_titov = { promote_character = { ideology = social_democrat_subtype } }
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_democrat
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_titov = no }
			add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = 0.1 }
			set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_liberal }
			add_to_coalition = yes
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_sergey_melgunov_sic
		set_country_flag = { flag = RUS_peaceful_election_change days = 1 }
		RUS_increase_democracy = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.51 option russia_elections_events.51.b"
		name = russia_elections_events.51.b #Rikhter re-elected
		trigger = { RUS_rikhter = yes }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_RIKHTER_SOCLIB } }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_sr_ai }
			}
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_liberal
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_nikolay_martyanov_sic
		set_country_flag = { flag = RUS_peaceful_election_change days = 1 }
		RUS_increase_democracy = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.51 option russia_elections_events.51.e"
		name = russia_elections_events.51.e #Sorokin elected
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_idea = RUS_guided_democracy
				has_completed_focus = RUS_values_of_february
			}
			OR = {
				has_soclib_or_socdem_government = yes
				RUS_maklakov = yes
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_RIKHTER_SOCLIB } }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_sr_ai }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = social_liberal }
			set_temp_variable = { prev_part_was_soclib = 1 }
		}
		RUS_pitirim_sorokin = { promote_character = { ideology = social_liberal_subtype } }
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_liberal
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					NOT = { has_government = social_liberal }
					NOT = {
						check_variable = { prev_part_was_soclib = 1 }
					}
				}
			}
			add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = 0.1 }
			set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_democrat }
			add_to_coalition = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { is_in_coalition_with_market_liberal = yes }
			activate_advisor = RUS_nikolay_nekrasov_sic
			add_popularity = { ideology = market_liberal popularity = 0.05 }
		}
		else = {
			activate_advisor = RUS_konstantin_takhtarev_sic
		}
		set_country_flag = { flag = RUS_peaceful_election_change days = 1 }
		RUS_increase_democracy = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.51 option russia_elections_events.51.f"
		name = russia_elections_events.51.f #Fondaminsky elected
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_idea = RUS_guided_democracy }
			OR = {
				RUS_sorokin = yes
				RUS_fondaminsky = yes
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_FONDAMINSKY_SOCLIB } }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_sr_ai }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = social_liberal }
			set_temp_variable = { prev_part_was_soclib = 1 }
		}
		RUS_ilya_fondaminsky = { promote_character = { ideology = social_liberal_subtype } }
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_liberal
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					NOT = { has_government = social_liberal }
					NOT = {
						check_variable = { prev_part_was_soclib = 1 }
					}
				}
			}
			add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = 0.1 }
			set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:market_liberal }
			add_to_coalition = yes
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_vladimir_zenzinov_sic
		set_country_flag = { flag = RUS_peaceful_election_change days = 1 }
		RUS_increase_democracy = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.51 option russia_elections_events.51.g"
		name = russia_elections_events.51.g #Kartashyov elected
		trigger = {
			has_soccon_or_marlib_government = yes
			RUS_maklakov = no
			RUS_solonevich = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_KARTASHYOV_MARLIB } }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_kadet_ai }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = market_liberal }
			set_temp_variable = { prev_part_was_marlib = 1 }
		}
		RUS_anton_kartashyov = { promote_character = { ideology = market_liberal_subtype } }
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = market_liberal
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					NOT = { has_government = market_liberal }
					NOT = {
						check_variable = { prev_part_was_marlib = 1 }
					}
				}
			}
			add_popularity = { ideology = market_liberal popularity = 0.1 }
			set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_conservative }
			add_to_coalition = yes
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_pavel_gronsky_sic
		set_country_flag = { flag = RUS_peaceful_election_change days = 1 }
		RUS_increase_democracy = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.51 option russia_elections_events.51.h"
		name = russia_elections_events.51.h #Nekrasov elected
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					has_soclib_or_socdem_government = yes
					RUS_rikhter = no
				}
				RUS_maklakov = yes
				RUS_dolgorukov = yes
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_MAKLAKOV_MARLIB } }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_kadet_ai }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = market_liberal }
			set_temp_variable = { prev_part_was_marlib = 1 }
		}
		RUS_nikolay_nekrasov = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_ideology = market_liberal_subtype }
				promote_character = market_liberal_subtype
			}
			else = {
				add_country_leader_role = {
					country_leader = {
						desc = RUS_nikolay_nekrasov_sic_desc
						ideology = market_liberal_subtype
					}
					promote_leader = yes
				}
			}
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = market_liberal
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					NOT = { has_government = market_liberal }
					NOT = {
						check_variable = { prev_part_was_marlib = 1 }
					}
				}
			}
			add_popularity = { ideology = market_liberal popularity = 0.1 }
			set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_liberal }
			add_to_coalition = yes
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_mikhail_kalugin_sic
		set_country_flag = { flag = RUS_peaceful_election_change days = 1 }
		RUS_increase_democracy = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.51 option russia_elections_events.51.i"
		name = russia_elections_events.51.i #Solonevich re-elected
		trigger = {
			RUS_solonevich = yes
			OR = {
				AND = {
					social_conservative > 0.4
					count_triggers = {
						amount = 4
						has_completed_focus = RUS_restrict_foreign_business
						has_completed_focus = RUS_banking_act
						has_completed_focus = RUS_state_orthodoxy
						has_completed_focus = RUS_symphony_of_authorities
						has_completed_focus = RUS_white_empire
					}
				}
				AND = {
					is_ai = yes
					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_SOLONEVICH_SOCCON } }
			}
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_conservative
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_re-elected
		add_political_power = 100
		activate_advisor = RUS_boris_suvorin_sic
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.51 option russia_elections_events.51.j"
		name = russia_elections_events.51.j #Golitsyn elected
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_government = social_conservative
				RUS_kartashyov = yes
			}
			NOT = {
				count_triggers = {
					amount = 4
					has_completed_focus = RUS_restrict_foreign_business
					has_completed_focus = RUS_banking_act
					has_completed_focus = RUS_state_orthodoxy
					has_completed_focus = RUS_symphony_of_authorities
					has_completed_focus = RUS_white_empire
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_vpp_ai }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_solonevich = yes }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_solonevich_election_fail
			hidden_effect = { RUS_restore_VPP = yes }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = social_conservative }
			set_temp_variable = { prev_part_was_soc_con = 1 }
		}
		RUS_aleksandr_golitsyn = { promote_character = { ideology = social_conservative_subtype } }
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_conservative
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					NOT = { has_government = social_conservative }
					NOT = {
						check_variable = { prev_part_was_soc_con = 1 }
					}
				}
			}
			add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = 0.1 }
			set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:market_liberal }
			add_to_coalition = yes
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_georgy_vernadsky_sic
		add_stability = 0.05
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.51 option russia_elections_events.51.k"
		name = russia_elections_events.51.k #Dmitry Romanov elected
		trigger = {
			has_government = social_conservative
			OR = {
				has_country_leader = { character = RUS_dmitry_romanov }
				NOT = {
					count_triggers = {
						amount = 4
						has_completed_focus = RUS_restrict_foreign_business
						has_completed_focus = RUS_banking_act
						has_completed_focus = RUS_state_orthodoxy
						has_completed_focus = RUS_symphony_of_authorities
						has_completed_focus = RUS_white_empire
					}
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_ROMANOV_SOCCON } }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_vpp_ai }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_solonevich = yes }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_solonevich_election_fail
		}
		RUS_dmitry_romanov = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_ideology = social_conservative_subtype }
				promote_character = social_conservative_subtype
			}
			else = {
				add_country_leader_role = {
					country_leader = {
						desc = RUS_dmitry_romanov_leader_desc
						ideology = social_conservative_subtype
					}
					promote_leader = yes
				}
			}
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_conservative
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		hidden_effect = { RUS_restore_VPP = yes }
		activate_advisor = RUS_georgy_vernadsky_sic
		add_political_power = 50
	}
}

country_event = { #Future elections for empire
	id = russia_elections_events.52
	title = russia_elections_events.52.t
	desc = russia_elections_events.52.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_election
	trigger = {
		is_monarchy = yes
		RUS_wrangel_path = no
		has_elected_government = yes
		has_country_flag = RUS_had_first_election
		NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_had_second_election }
		NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
		NOT = { has_war_with = INT }
	}
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = RUS_deadlocked_duma }
				remove_ideas = RUS_deadlocked_duma
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_in_coalition_with_social_democrat = yes }
				country_event = { id = russia_democratic_events.173 days = 30 } # Demands from the Socialists
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_had_second_election
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.52 option russia_elections_events.52.a"
		name = russia_elections_events.52.a #Fondaminsky re-elected
		trigger = {
			has_government = social_liberal
			RUS_ilya_fondaminsky = { is_second_in_command = yes }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_FONDAMINSKY_SOCLIB } }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_fondaminsky_ai }
			}
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_liberal
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = 0.1 }
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:market_liberal }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		activate_advisor = RUS_ilya_fondaminsky_sic
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_postponed_elections }
			clr_country_flag = RUS_postponed_elections
		}
		RUS_increase_democracy = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.52 option russia_elections_events.52.b"
		name = russia_elections_events.52.b #Left-Kadet
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_government = social_conservative }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_NEKRASOV_MARLIB } }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_kadet_ai }
			}
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = market_liberal
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = market_liberal popularity = 0.1 }
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_liberal }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		activate_advisor = RUS_nikolay_nekrasov_sic
		RUS_increase_democracy = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.52 option russia_elections_events.52.c"
		name = russia_elections_events.52.c #Right-Kadet
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_GRONSKY_MARLIB } }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_kadet_ai }
			}
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = market_liberal
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = market_liberal popularity = 0.1 }
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_conservative }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		activate_advisor = RUS_pavel_gronsky_sic
		RUS_increase_democracy = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.52 option russia_elections_events.52.e"
		name = russia_elections_events.52.e #Vernadsky
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_government = social_liberal }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_VERNADSKY_SOCCON } }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_vpp_ai }
			}
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_conservative
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = 0.1 }
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:market_liberal }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		activate_advisor = RUS_georgy_vernadsky_sic
		RUS_increase_democracy = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.52 option russia_elections_events.52.f"
		name = russia_elections_events.52.f #Golitsyn
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_government = social_liberal }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_GOLITSYN_SOCCON } }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_vpp_ai }
			}
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_conservative
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:authoritarian_democrat }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_government = social_conservative } }
			add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = 0.1 }
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_aleksandr_golitsyn_sic
		add_stability = 0.05
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.52 option russia_elections_events.52.g"
		name = russia_elections_events.52.g #Dmitry Romanov
		trigger = {
			has_government = social_conservative
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_ROMANOV_SOCCON } }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_vpp_ai }
			}
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_conservative
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		add_advisor_role = {
			character = RUS_dmitry_romanov
			activate = yes
			advisor = {
				slot = second_in_command
				idea_token = RUS_dmitry_romanov_sic
				desc = RUS_dmitry_romanov_advisor_desc
				traits = { KR_banker_prince }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { is_in_coalition_with_market_liberal = no }
			set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:market_liberal }
			add_to_coalition = yes
		}
		add_political_power = 50
	}
	after = {
		set_country_flag = { flag = RUS_peaceful_election_change days = 1 }
	}
}

country_event = { #The Red Regiments Strike
	id = russia_elections_events.53
	title = russia_elections_events.53.t
	desc = russia_elections_events.53.d

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = RUS_had_first_election
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		RUS_wrangel_path = no
		OR = {
			has_war_with = GER
			has_war_with = INT
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_elections_events.53 option russia_elections_events.53.a"
		name = russia_elections_events.53.a
		set_country_flag = RUS_postponed_elections
		if = {
			limit = { has_elected_government = yes }
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = var:current_party_ideology_group
				elections_allowed = no
			}
		}
	}
}

### Democratic Russia Events ###

country_event = { #Small White Terror
	id = russia_democratic_events.1
	title = russia_democratic_events.1.t
	desc = russia_democratic_events.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army3
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_government = paternal_autocrat
		has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_socialist_uprising
		RUS_boldyrev = no
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.1 option russia_democratic_events.1.a"
		name = russia_democratic_events.1.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_empire_ai
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.05
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_left_anger
		add_to_variable = { RUS_temp_left_anger = 1 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = -0.04 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = -0.03 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.1 option russia_democratic_events.1.b"
		name = russia_democratic_events.1.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 1
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_rdp_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_empire_ai
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.05
		if = {
			limit = { is_monarchy = no }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_mil_anger
			add_to_variable = { RUS_temp_mil_anger = 1 }
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = -0.02 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = paternal_autocrat popularity = -0.03 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Crimes of the Past (fired by focus)
	id = russia_democratic_events.19
	title = russia_democratic_events.19.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_global_flag = RUS_socrus_happened }
		text = russia_democratic_events.19.d.socialist
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_socrus_happened } }
		text = russia_democratic_events.19.d.szrs
	}

	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_trial_2

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.19 option russia_democratic_events.19.a"
		name = russia_democratic_events.19.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_global_flag = RUS_socrus_happened
				check_variable = { RUS_right_anger < 3 }
				check_variable = { RUS_military_anger < 3 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_socrus_happened }
				check_variable = { RUS_left_anger < 3 }
				check_variable = { RUS_military_anger < 3 }
			}
		}
		army_experience = -40
		add_stability = 0.1
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = RUS_socrus_happened }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
			RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
			RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.19 option russia_democratic_events.19.b"
		name = russia_democratic_events.19.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_global_flag = RUS_socrus_happened
				check_variable = { RUS_right_anger > 2 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_socrus_happened }
				check_variable = { RUS_left_anger > 2 }
			}
		}
		army_experience = -20
		add_stability = 0.05
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = RUS_socrus_happened }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
			RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
			RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Trial Revelations
	id = russia_democratic_events.20
	title = russia_democratic_events.20.t
	desc = russia_democratic_events.20.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_trial_2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { RUS_is_demrus = yes }

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.20 option russia_democratic_events.20.a"
		name = russia_democratic_events.20.a #It belongs to the state, now
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_marlib_or_soclib_government = no
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_dolgorukov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_kartashyov_ai
				}
				RUS_vasily_maklakov = { is_country_leader = yes }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai
					RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 80
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.20 option russia_democratic_events.20.b"
		name = russia_democratic_events.20.b #Return it to those who have proven loyal
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_marlib_or_soclib_government = yes
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = 5 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		add_stability = 0.05
		if = {
			limit = { has_soclib_or_socdem_government = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
			RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
			RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = RUS_political_apathy }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_apathy_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_apathy_increase_tt
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.20 option russia_democratic_events.20.c"
		name = russia_democratic_events.20.c #Return all of it, no questions asked
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				check_variable = { RUS_right_anger > 7 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_dolgorukov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_kartashyov_ai
				}
				RUS_vasily_maklakov = { is_country_leader = yes }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai
					RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.1
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
	}
}

	id = russia_democratic_events.21

	desc = russia_democratic_events.21.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_farming

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_democratic_events.125 days = 180 } #Agronomic Crisis on Long Fuse
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.21 option russia_democratic_events.21.a"
		name = russia_democratic_events.21.a #Peasants
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_government = social_liberal
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_dolgorukov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_kartashyov_ai
				}
				RUS_vasily_maklakov = { is_country_leader = yes }
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = 5 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_political_power = 50
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.21 option russia_democratic_events.21.b"
		name = russia_democratic_events.21.b #Mechanisation
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_government = social_conservative
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				check_variable = { RUS_left_anger > 6 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai
					RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 100
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					state = 260
					state = 265
					state = 239
					state = 401
				}
			}
			add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = RUS_political_apathy }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_apathy_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_apathy_increase_tt
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Boldyrev wishes to return #
	id = russia_democratic_events.22
	title = russia_democratic_events.22.t
	desc = russia_democratic_events.22.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_boldyrev
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		RUS_sulimov = no
		NOT = { has_character = RUS_vasily_boldyrev }
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.22 option russia_democratic_events.22.a"
		name = russia_democratic_events.22.a #Boldyrev returns
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_government = social_conservative
				has_authoritarian_government = yes
			}
		}
		RSA = {
			RUS_vasily_boldyrev = {
				add_unit_leader_trait = RUS_republican_officer
				set_nationality = ROOT
			}
		}
		add_advisor_role = {
			character = RUS_vasily_boldyrev
			advisor = {
				slot = air_chief
				idea_token = RUS_vasily_boldyrev_air_chief
				desc = RUS_vasily_boldyrev_army_chief_desc
				traits = { KR_air_chief_ground_support_1 }
				cost = 75
			}
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = 0.02 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_flavour_events.105 days = 60 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.22 option russia_democratic_events.22.b"
		name = russia_democratic_events.22.b #Meh
	}
}

	id = russia_democratic_events.23

	desc = russia_democratic_events.23.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.23 option russia_democratic_events.23.a"
		name = russia_democratic_events.23.a #Give GetArmyChief free hands
		ai_chance = { base = 10 }
		add_political_power = -35
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { army_chief = 0 } }
				var:army_chief = { is_unit_leader = yes }
			}
			var:army_chief = { add_max_trait = 1 }
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.23 option russia_democratic_events.23.b"
		name = russia_democratic_events.23.b #Reminds him who leads
		ai_chance = { base = 2 }
		add_political_power = 25
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #The Old Guard Generals fired by decision RUS_sideline_monarchists
	id = russia_democratic_events.24
	title = russia_democratic_events.24.t
	desc = russia_democratic_events.24.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_wrangel
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		is_monarchy = no
	}

	immediate = {
		#Always retired
		if = {
			limit = { has_character = RUS_anton_turkul }
			RUS_anton_turkul = { add_to_array = { ROOT.RUS_characters_to_retire = THIS } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_character = RUS_yevgeny_miller }
			RUS_yevgeny_miller = { add_to_array = { ROOT.RUS_characters_to_retire = THIS } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_character = RUS_pyotr_glazenap }
			RUS_pyotr_glazenap = { add_to_array = { ROOT.RUS_characters_to_retire = THIS } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_character = RUS_mikhail_diterikhs }
			RUS_mikhail_diterikhs = { add_to_array = { ROOT.RUS_characters_to_retire = THIS } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_character = MON_roman_ungern_sternberg }
			MON_roman_ungern_sternberg = { add_to_array = { ROOT.RUS_characters_to_retire = THIS } }
		}
		# Sidelined, retired or neither
		if = {
			limit = { has_character = RUS_mikhail_drozdovsky }
			RUS_mikhail_drozdovsky = { add_to_array = { ROOT.RUS_characters_to_sideline_or_retire = THIS } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_character = RUS_pyotr_wrangel }
			RUS_pyotr_wrangel = { add_to_array = { ROOT.RUS_characters_to_sideline_or_retire = THIS } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_character = RUS_pavel_shatilov }
			RUS_pavel_shatilov = { add_to_array = { ROOT.RUS_characters_to_sideline_or_retire = THIS } }
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.24 option russia_democratic_events.24.a"
		name = russia_democratic_events.24.a #They've been professional thus far!
		trigger = { RUS_rikhter = no }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				check_variable = { RUS_left_anger > 6 }
			}
		}
		every_character = {
			display_individual_scopes = yes
			limit = { is_in_array = { ROOT.RUS_characters_to_retire = THIS } }
			retire = yes
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = 0.05 }
		add_political_power = 30
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.24 option russia_democratic_events.24.b"
		name = russia_democratic_events.24.b #Here's a nice office job in Siberia
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				check_variable = { RUS_right_anger > 6 }
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.02
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = -0.04 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		every_character = {
			display_individual_scopes = yes
			limit = { is_in_array = { ROOT.RUS_characters_to_retire = THIS } }
			retire = yes
		}
		every_army_leader = {
			display_individual_scopes = yes
			limit = { is_in_array = { ROOT.RUS_characters_to_sideline_or_retire = THIS } }
			add_unit_leader_trait = RUS_sidelined
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.24 option russia_democratic_events.24.c"
		name = russia_democratic_events.24.c #Pressure them to retire
		trigger = { NOT = { has_government = social_conservative } }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				check_variable = { RUS_right_anger > 6 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				check_variable = { RUS_military_anger > 6 }
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 50
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = -0.05 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = paternal_autocrat popularity = -0.05 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		every_character = {
			display_individual_scopes = yes
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_in_array = { ROOT.RUS_characters_to_sideline_or_retire = THIS }
					is_in_array = { ROOT.RUS_characters_to_retire = THIS }
				}
			}
			retire = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = RUS_bold_promises }
			add_days_mission_timeout = {
				mission = RUS_bold_promises
				days = 90
			}
		}
	}
	after = {
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_republican_purge_tt
		clear_array = RUS_characters_to_retire
		clear_array = RUS_characters_to_sideline_or_retire
	}
}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.25 option russia_democratic_events.25.a"
		name = russia_democratic_events.25.a #We'll use any means to come out on top
		ai_chance = { base = 10 }
		add_war_support = 0.04
		add_stability = -0.06

			limit = { has_active_mission = RUS_political_apathy }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_apathy_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_apathy_increase_tt
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.25 option russia_democratic_events.25.b"
		name = russia_democratic_events.25.b #No, we're better than this
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_dolgorukov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_kartashyov_ai
				}
				RUS_vasily_maklakov = { is_country_leader = yes }
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.03
	}
}

	id = russia_democratic_events.30

				add = 10

			}
		}
		add_political_power = 80
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes

		add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = 0.02 }
	}

		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.30 option russia_democratic_events.30.b"
		name = russia_democratic_events.30.b #We have a chance for a fairer capitalism
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 1
				has_country_flag = RUS_rdp_ai
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 1
				has_country_flag = RUS_sr_ai
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_political_power = 30
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = 0.04 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = 0.04 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.30 option russia_democratic_events.30.c"
		name = russia_democratic_events.30.c #Keep critical companies nationalised, privatise the rest.
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_government = social_democrat
				has_government = authoritarian_democrat
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { base = 50 }
		add_political_power = -40
		add_one_random_civilian_factory = yes
		add_one_random_civilian_factory = yes
		add_to_variable = { RUS_ic_cost_low = 5 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_ic_cost_med = 10 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_new_russian_capitalism_tt
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Remove Denikin
	id = russia_democratic_events.31
	title = russia_democratic_events.31.t
	desc = russia_democratic_events.31.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_denikin2

	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		RUS_anton_denikin = { is_army_chief = yes }
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.31 option russia_democratic_events.31.a"
		name = russia_democratic_events.31.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_unit_leader = {
					is_field_marshal = yes
					skill > 3
					NOT = { has_advisor_role = army_chief }
					NOT = { is_character = RUS_mikhail_drozdovsky }
					NOT = { is_character = RUS_pyotr_wrangel }
					NOT = { is_character = RUS_anton_denikin }
					NOT = { is_character = RUS_sergey_markov }
				}
			}
			random_unit_leader = {
				limit = {
					is_field_marshal = yes
					skill > 3
					NOT = { has_advisor_role = army_chief }
					NOT = { is_character = RUS_mikhail_drozdovsky }
					NOT = { is_character = RUS_pyotr_wrangel }
					NOT = { is_character = RUS_anton_denikin }
					NOT = { is_character = RUS_sergey_markov }
				}
				add_advisor_role = {
					activate = yes
					advisor = {
						slot = army_chief
						traits = { KR_army_chief_offensive_3 }
						cost = 200
						can_be_fired = no
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_character = RUS_sergey_markov }
			activate_advisor = RUS_sergey_markov_army_chief
		}
		retire_character = RUS_anton_denikin
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -2 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_democratic_events.37 days = 90 } ##Republicanisation of the Army Successful
			RUS_sergey_markov = { #Set Markov as political leader of the clique in any case
				if = {
					limit = { NOT = { has_ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype } }
					add_country_leader_role = {
						country_leader = {
							desc = RUS_sergey_markov_leader_desc
							ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Denikin retires
	id = russia_democratic_events.32
	title = russia_democratic_events.32.t
	desc = russia_democratic_events.32.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { has_character = RUS_anton_denikin }
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_denikin2

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.32 option russia_democratic_events.32.a"
		name = russia_democratic_events.32.a
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_anton_denikin = { is_army_chief = yes } }
			if = {
				limit = { RUS_sergey_markov = { NOT = { has_advisor_role = army_chief } } }
				RUS_sergey_markov = {
					add_advisor_role = {
						activate = yes
						advisor = {
							slot = army_chief
							idea_token = RUS_sergey_markov_army_chief
							traits = { KR_army_chief_manoeuvre_3 }
							cost = 200
							can_be_fired = no
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				activate_advisor = RUS_sergey_markov_army_chief
			}
		}
		retire_character = RUS_anton_denikin
	}
}

	id = russia_democratic_events.33

		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.33 option russia_democratic_events.33.b"

		ai_chance = {

					has_country_flag = RUS_kartashyov_ai

				RUS_vasily_maklakov = { is_country_leader = yes }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai
					RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.02
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = 2 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
	}
}

		name = russia_democratic_events.34.a #Keep complaining

			limit = {
				NOT = { is_core_of = RUS }
				OR = {
					is_core_of = TRK
					is_core_of = KAZ
					is_core_of = BUK
					is_core_of = KHI
					is_core_of = AFG
					is_core_of = PER
					is_core_of = AZR
					is_core_of = TUR
				}
			}
			add_compliance = -25
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.34 option russia_democratic_events.34.b"

			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.2
				check_variable = { RUS_right_anger > 6 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai
					RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -5 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }

	}

country_event = { #Boris Viktorovich Sends His Regards
	id = russia_democratic_events.40
	title = russia_democratic_events.40.t
	desc = russia_democratic_events.40.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_rikhter
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { RUS_rikhter = yes }

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.40 option russia_democratic_events.40.a"
		name = russia_democratic_events.40.a
		kill_country_leader = yes
		add_stability = -0.1
		end_coalition = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -4 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -2 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_sorokin_csc }
			promote_character = {
				character = RUS_pitirim_sorokin
				ideology = social_liberal_subtype
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = { id = russia_democratic_events.48 days = 180 } #Program of Integralism
			}
		}
		else = {
			promote_character = {
				character = RUS_ilya_fondaminsky
				ideology = social_liberal_subtype
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = { id = russia_democratic_events.49 days = 180 } #Towards True Narodism
			}
		}
		country_event = { id = russia_democratic_events.44 days = 7 } #[ROOT.GetLeader]'s Government
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
	}
}

	}

	}

		trigger = { RUS_sorokin = yes }
		text = russia_democratic_events.44.d.sorokin
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_duma

		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_elections_events.50 days = 30 } #President's agenda
		}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.44 option russia_democratic_events.44.a"
		name = russia_democratic_events.44.a
		trigger = { RUS_sorokin = yes }

		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_democrat }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = 0.05 }
	}

		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.44 option russia_democratic_events.44.b"

		trigger = { RUS_fondaminsky = yes }

		add_to_coalition = yes
		add_popularity = { ideology = market_liberal popularity = 0.05 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = 0.05 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.44 option russia_democratic_events.44.c"
		name = russia_democratic_events.44.c

country_event = { #The Moderate Revolution
	id = russia_democratic_events.46
	title = russia_democratic_events.46.t
	desc = russia_democratic_events.46.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_crowd1
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { has_government = social_liberal }
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.46 option russia_democratic_events.46.a"
		name = russia_democratic_events.46.a
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_republican_guard }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_republican_guard
				add_idea = RUS_republican_guard_2
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_narodovolets_idea }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_narodovolets_idea
				add_idea = RUS_narodovolets_idea_2
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_strict_anti_socialist_laws }
			remove_ideas = RUS_strict_anti_socialist_laws
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Revolt of the Left
	id = russia_democratic_events.51
	title = russia_democratic_events.51.t
	desc = russia_democratic_events.51.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_levitsky

	trigger = {
		has_government = social_democrat
		OR = {
			is_ai = no
			has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT }
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.51 option russia_democratic_events.51.a"
		name = russia_democratic_events.51.a
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = -0.1 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = 0.1 }
		set_country_flag = RUS_RDP_split
		effect_tooltip = {
			RUS_vladimir_levitsky = { remove_political_advisor_role = yes }
			RUS_gergard_zeller = { remove_political_advisor_role = yes }
		}
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_strike_season
			days = 120
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
	}
}

			limit = { has_idea = RUS_tomsky_versus_titov }
			remove_ideas = RUS_tomsky_versus_titov

		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_tomsky_versus_titov_2 }
			remove_ideas = RUS_tomsky_versus_titov_2
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_socdem_unions
	}

country_event = { #Maklakov Resigns
	id = russia_democratic_events.61
	title = russia_democratic_events.61.t
	desc = russia_democratic_events.61.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { RUS_maklakov = yes }
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			uncomplete_national_focus = {
				focus = RUS_free_fair_russia
				uncomplete_children = no
			}
			uncomplete_national_focus = {
				focus = RUS_progressive_literature_clubs
				uncomplete_children = yes
			}
			uncomplete_national_focus = {
				focus = RUS_democratic_education
				uncomplete_children = yes
			}
			remove_ideas = {
				RUS_literary_clubs
				RUS_democratic_foundation
				RUS_democratic_education_idea
				RUS_democratic_foundation_2
			}
			country_event = { id = russia_elections_events.50 days = 14 } #President's agenda
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.61 option russia_democratic_events.61.a"
		name = russia_democratic_events.61.a
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_dolgorukov_csc } }
		retire_character = RUS_vasily_maklakov
		promote_character = {
			character = RUS_anton_kartashyov
			ideology = market_liberal_subtype
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_pavel_gronsky_sic
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_conservative }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_ally_army
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:paternal_autocrat }
				add_to_coalition = yes
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_democratic_events.59 days = 300 } #The President of Holy Rus'
		}
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.61 option russia_democratic_events.61.a"
		name = russia_democratic_events.61.a
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_dolgorukov_csc }
		retire_character = RUS_vasily_maklakov
		promote_character = {
			character = RUS_pyotr_dolgorukov
			ideology = market_liberal_subtype
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_mikhail_kalugin_sic
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_liberal }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_ally_army
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:paternal_autocrat }
				add_to_coalition = yes
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_democratic_events.58 days = 300 } #Old Man of the Kadets
		}
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Solving Strikes
	id = russia_democratic_events.63

	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.63 option russia_democratic_events.63.a"
		name = russia_democratic_events.63.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				add = 5
				has_political_power < -50
			}
			modifier = {
				add = -5
				check_variable = { RUS_left_anger > 2 }
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 40
		add_popularity = { ideology = market_liberal popularity = 0.04 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes

		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.63 option russia_democratic_events.63.b"
		name = russia_democratic_events.63.b
		add_stability = 0.02
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_dolgorukov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_kartashyov_ai
				}
				RUS_vasily_maklakov = { is_country_leader = yes }
			}
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = market_liberal popularity = -0.06 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = RUS_political_apathy }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_apathy_decrease_tt
			add_to_variable = { RUS_apathy_var = -1 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.63 option russia_democratic_events.63.c"
		name = russia_democratic_events.63.c
		ai_chance = { base = 20 }
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_VSTPF
				has_completed_focus = RUS_new_russian_capitalism
			}
			is_in_coalition_with_social_democrat = yes
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = market_liberal popularity = -0.05 }
		add_political_power = -50
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_solving_strikes_tt
		set_country_flag = RUS_maklakov_labour_negotiations
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_solving_strikes_tt2
		show_ideas_tooltip = RUS_state_economic_committee_5
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Law on Russian Freedoms
	id = russia_democratic_events.64
	title = russia_democratic_events.64.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_maklakov = yes }
		text = russia_democratic_events.64.d.rep
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_dolgorukov = yes }
		text = russia_democratic_events.64.d.rep2
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			is_monarchy = yes
			RUS_nikolay_nekrasov = { is_second_in_command = yes }
		}
		text = russia_democratic_events.64.d.nekrasov
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			is_monarchy = yes
			OR = {
				RUS_pavel_gronsky = { is_second_in_command = yes }
				RUS_anton_kartashyov = { is_second_in_command = yes }
			}
		}
		text = russia_democratic_events.64.d.gronsky
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_maklakov
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			RUS_maklakov = yes
			RUS_dolgorukov = yes
			AND = {
				is_monarchy = yes
				has_government = market_liberal
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.64 option russia_democratic_events.64.a"
		name = russia_democratic_events.64.a
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				RUS_nikolay_nekrasov = { is_second_in_command = yes }
				RUS_pyotr_dolgorukov = { is_country_leader = yes }
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_law_on_freedoms_tt
		random_list = {
			10 = {
				modifier = { add = 10 check_variable = { RUS_apathy_var < 1 } }
				modifier = { add = 2 check_variable = { RUS_apathy_var < 3 } }
				modifier = { add = 2 check_variable = { RUS_apathy_var < 5 } }
				modifier = { add = 2 social_liberal > 0.15 }
				modifier = { add = 2 social_democrat > 0.15 }
				modifier = { add = 2 market_liberal > 0.15 }
				modifier = { add = 1 has_country_leader = { character = RUS_kirill_romanov } }
				modifier = { add = 3 has_country_leader = { character = RUS_vladimir_romanov } }
				modifier = { add = 2 RUS_vladimir_rikhter = { is_hired_as_advisor = yes } }
				modifier = { add = 2 RUS_aleksandr_titov = { is_hired_as_advisor = yes } }
				country_event = russia_democratic_events.67 #'Law on Russian Freedoms' Passes the Duma!
			}
			5 = {
				modifier = { add = RUS_apathy_var has_active_mission = RUS_political_apathy }
				modifier = { add = 5 check_variable = { RUS_apathy_var > 9 } }
				modifier = { add = RUS_right_anger has_idea = RUS_right_anger }
				modifier = { add = RUS_military_anger has_idea = RUS_military_anger_dem }
				modifier = { add = 5 is_in_coalition_with_social_conservative = yes }
				country_event = russia_democratic_events.68 #'Law on Russian Freedoms' Is Killed in the Duma!
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.64 option russia_democratic_events.64.b"
		name = russia_democratic_events.64.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				RUS_nikolay_nekrasov = { is_second_in_command = yes }
				RUS_pyotr_dolgorukov = { is_country_leader = yes }
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_law_on_freedoms_tt
		country_event = russia_democratic_events.69 #Watered Down 'Law on Russian Freedoms' Passes the Duma!
		if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = RUS_political_apathy }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_apathy_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_apathy_increase_tt
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.64 option russia_democratic_events.64.c"
		name = russia_democratic_events.64.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 50
				has_country_flag = RUS_maklakov_ai
			}
		}
		trigger = { RUS_maklakov = yes }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_law_on_freedoms_tt
		add_political_power = -80
		add_popularity = { ideology = market_liberal popularity = 0.04 }
		country_event = russia_democratic_events.67 #'Law on Russian Freedoms' Passes the Duma!
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.64 option russia_democratic_events.64.e"
		name = russia_democratic_events.64.e
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		trigger = { RUS_nikolay_nekrasov = { is_second_in_command = yes } }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		add_popularity = { ideology = market_liberal popularity = -0.05 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = RUS_political_apathy }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_apathy_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_apathy_increase_tt
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.64 option russia_democratic_events.64.f"
		name = russia_democratic_events.64.f
		trigger = {
			is_monarchy = yes
			OR = {
				RUS_pavel_gronsky = { is_second_in_command = yes }
				RUS_anton_kartashyov = { is_second_in_command = yes }
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = RUS_SVR_activity }
			add_days_mission_timeout = {
				mission = RUS_SVR_activity
				days = 60
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Collapse of the Coalition
	id = russia_democratic_events.65
	title = russia_democratic_events.65.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { is_in_coalition_with_social_liberal = yes }
		text = russia_democratic_events.65.d.psr
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { is_in_coalition_with_social_democrat = yes }
		text = russia_democratic_events.65.d.rdp
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { is_in_coalition_with_market_liberal = yes }
		text = russia_democratic_events.65.d.kadet
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { is_in_coalition_with_social_conservative = yes }
		text = russia_democratic_events.65.d.vpp
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy3
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		OR = {
			is_ai = no
			has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT }
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.65 option russia_democratic_events.65.a"
		name = russia_democratic_events.65.a
		ai_chance = { base = 2 }
		end_coalition = yes
		add_ideas = RUS_deadlocked_duma
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_deadlock_tt
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.65 option russia_democratic_events.65.b"
		name = russia_democratic_events.65.b #Offer deal to VPP
		ai_chance = { base = 20 }
		trigger = {
			is_part_of_government_social_conservative = no
		}
		add_political_power = -100
		end_coalition = yes
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_conservative }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = 0.1 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.65 option russia_democratic_events.65.c"
		name = russia_democratic_events.65.c #Offer deal to SRs
		trigger = {
			is_part_of_government_social_liberal = no
		}
		ai_chance = { base = 20 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = social_conservative }
			add_political_power = -150
		}
		else = {
			add_political_power = -100
		}
		end_coalition = yes
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_liberal }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = 0.1 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = social_conservative }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
			RUS_change_right_anger = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
			RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.65 option russia_democratic_events.65.e"
		name = russia_democratic_events.65.e #Offer deal to RDP
		trigger = {
			is_part_of_government_social_democrat = no
		}
		ai_chance = { base = 20 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = social_democrat }
			add_political_power = -150
		}
		else = {
			add_political_power = -100
		}
		end_coalition = yes
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_democrat }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = 0.1 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.65 option russia_democratic_events.65.f"
		name = russia_democratic_events.65.f #Offer deal to Kadets
		trigger = {
			is_part_of_government_market_liberal = no
		}
		ai_chance = { base = 20 }
		add_political_power = -100
		end_coalition = yes
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:market_liberal }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		add_popularity = { ideology = market_liberal popularity = 0.1 }
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_government = social_conservative } }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
			RUS_change_left_anger = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
			RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		}
	}
}

	}

		trigger = { is_monarchy = no }
		text = russia_democratic_events.70.t.dem
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { is_monarchy = yes }
		text = russia_democratic_events.70.d.mon
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { is_monarchy = no }
		text = russia_democratic_events.70.d.dem
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_solonevich_4
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			RUS_solonevich = yes
			RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
		}
	}

		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.70 option russia_democratic_events.70.a"
		name = russia_democratic_events.70.a

country_event = { #Ascension of the People's Monarchists
	id = russia_democratic_events.71
	title = russia_democratic_events.71.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { is_monarchy = yes }
		text = russia_democratic_events.71.d.mon
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { is_monarchy = no }
		text = russia_democratic_events.71.d.rep
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_solonevich_3
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { has_government = social_conservative }
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.71 option russia_democratic_events.71.a"
		name = russia_democratic_events.71.a
		set_country_flag = RUS_nmd_formed
		effect_tooltip = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = social_conservative
				long_name = RUS_paternal_autocrat2_party_long_tt
				name = RUS_paternal_autocrat2_party
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { is_monarchy = no }
			activate_advisor = RUS_boris_suvorin_sic
		}
		else = {
			add_stability = 0.05
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = social_conservative
				long_name = RUS_paternal_autocrat2_party_long
				name = RUS_paternal_autocrat2_party
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Relationship with SOR
	id = russia_democratic_events.72
	title = russia_democratic_events.72.t
	desc = russia_democratic_events.72.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_shulgin
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { has_government = social_conservative }

	option = {
		name = russia_democratic_events.72.a
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.72 option russia_democratic_events.72.a"
		ai_chance = { base = 50 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_pop_increase = party_popularity@authoritarian_democrat }
		hidden_effect = {
			add_popularity = { ideology = authoritarian_democrat popularity = -1 }
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = RUS_pop_increase }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_NMD } }
			effect_tooltip = {
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = authoritarian_democrat
					long_name = RUS_social_conservative_party_long_tt
					name = RUS_social_conservative_party
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = authoritarian_democrat
					long_name = RUS_social_conservative_party_long
					name = RUS_social_conservative_party
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.72 option russia_democratic_events.72.b"
		name = russia_democratic_events.72.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai
					RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.02
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #The Stabs-Captains Against Communism!
	id = russia_democratic_events.73
	title = russia_democratic_events.73.t
	desc = russia_democratic_events.73.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_solonevich
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { RUS_is_demrus = yes }
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_democratic_events.74 days = 50 random_days = 50 } #President's Paramilitary?
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.73 option russia_democratic_events.73.a"
		name = russia_democratic_events.73.a
		ai_chance = { base = 50 }
		trigger = {
			has_soclib_or_socdem_government = no
			RUS_maklakov = no
		}
		add_political_power = 30
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = -0.03 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = -0.03 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = RUS_SVR_activity }
			add_days_mission_timeout = {
				mission = RUS_SVR_activity
				days = 30
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.73 option russia_democratic_events.73.b"
		name = russia_democratic_events.73.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai
					RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.02
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.73 option russia_democratic_events.73.c"
		name = russia_democratic_events.73.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai
					RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -30
		add_stability = 0.03
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.73 option russia_democratic_events.73.e"
		name = russia_democratic_events.73.e
		ai_chance = { base = 50 }
		trigger = {
			has_conservative_government = no
			NOT = { has_government = paternal_autocrat }
		}
		add_political_power = -40
		add_stability = 0.06
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = -0.05 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		RUS_ivan_solonevich = { remove_political_advisor_role = yes }
	}
}

### Anger Events

country_event = { #Rightwing Exploiting Anger
	id = russia_democratic_events.100
	title = russia_democratic_events.100.t
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kremlin4
	desc = russia_democratic_events.100.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		has_idea = RUS_military_anger_dem
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.100 option russia_democratic_events.100.a"
		name = russia_democratic_events.100.a #We will work with the opposition to make this better
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				check_variable = { RUS_right_anger > 7 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				check_variable = { RUS_military_anger > 7 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai
					RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -75
		add_war_support = 0.05
		add_popularity = { ideology = paternal_autocrat popularity = 0.05 }
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { RUS_right_anger > RUS_military_anger } }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
			RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
			RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.100 option russia_democratic_events.100.b"
		name = russia_democratic_events.100.b #Try to appease these groups as best we can
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai
					RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -35
		add_popularity = { ideology = paternal_autocrat popularity = 0.075 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.100 option russia_democratic_events.100.c"
		name = russia_democratic_events.100.c #And make the opposition look better? Nonsense!
		ai_chance = { base = 50 }
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { RUS_right_anger < RUS_military_anger } }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
			RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
			RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Role of the Military
	id = russia_democratic_events.101
	title = russia_democratic_events.101.t
	desc = russia_democratic_events.101.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army4
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_idea = RUS_military_anger_dem
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.101 option russia_democratic_events.101.a"
		name = russia_democratic_events.101.a #We'll make them an integral part of the process
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_soclib_or_socdem_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_soccon_or_marlib_government = yes
			}
		}
		RUS_decrease_democracy = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = RUS_political_apathy }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_apathy_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_apathy_increase_tt
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = paternal_autocrat popularity = 0.05 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.101 option russia_democratic_events.101.b"
		name = russia_democratic_events.101.b #They can have an advisory role only
		ai_chance = { base = 50 }
		add_political_power = -50
		add_popularity = { ideology = paternal_autocrat popularity = 0.05 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.101 option russia_democratic_events.101.c"
		name = russia_democratic_events.101.c #The military is supposed to be apolitical
		ai_chance = { base = 25 }
		add_stability = 0.025
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = RUS_political_apathy }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_apathy_decrease_tt
			add_to_variable = { RUS_apathy_var = -1 }
		}
	}
}
