			limit = { NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_controlling_the_military } }
			complete_national_focus = RUS_controlling_the_military
		}
		activate_decision = RUS_army_extra_funding
	}
	after = {
		add_popularity = { ideology = paternal_autocrat popularity = 0.05 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Coup in the Kremlin
	id = russia_democratic_events.103
	title = russia_democratic_events.103.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_prewar_coup }
		text = russia_democratic_events.103.d.prewar
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_prewar_coup } }
		text = russia_democratic_events.103.d
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_moscow
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		has_idea = RUS_military_anger_dem
		has_democratic_government = yes
		is_monarchy = no
		RUS_golitsyn = no
		is_ai = no
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { RUS_anton_denikin = { is_army_chief = yes } }
				RUS_anton_denikin = {
					promote_character = { ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype }
				}
			}
			else = {
				activate_advisor = RUS_sergey_markov_army_chief
				RUS_sergey_markov = {
					if = {
						limit = { has_ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype }
						promote_character = { ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype }
					}
					else = {
						add_country_leader_role = {
							country_leader = {
								desc = RUS_sergey_markov_leader_desc
								ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
							}
							promote_leader = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -9 }
			RUS_change_military_anger = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -5 }
			RUS_change_right_anger = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -3 }
			RUS_change_left_anger = yes
			remove_ideas = {
				RUS_embers_of_democracy
				RUS_weak_democracy
				RUS_unstable_democracy
				RUS_strenghtening_democracy
				RUS_strong_democracy
				RUS_genuine_democracy
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_completed_focus = RUS_republicanisation_of_army }
				uncomplete_national_focus = { focus = RUS_republicanisation_of_army }
				remove_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_ideological_officer_curriculum target = ROOT }
				remove_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_promote_young_blood target = ROOT }
				remove_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_sideline_monarchists target = ROOT }
				remove_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_remove_denikin target = ROOT }
			}
			set_country_flag = RUS_mil_anger_coup
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.103 option russia_democratic_events.103.a"
		name = russia_democratic_events.103.a
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		add_ideas = RUS_rule_by_decree
		if = {
			limit = { syndicalist > 0.1 }
			add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = -0.2 }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			activate_advisor = RUS_vasily_shulgin_sic
			country_event = { id = russia_democratic_events.104 days = 7 } #Establishment of 'enforced democracy'
			RUS_daniil_sulimov = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_trait = RUS_sulimov_1_off }
					remove_trait = { trait = RUS_sulimov_1_off ideology = social_democrat_subtype }
					clr_character_flag = RUS_traits_assigned
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Establishment of 'enforced democracy'
	id = russia_democratic_events.104
	title = russia_democratic_events.104.t
	desc = russia_democratic_events.104.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_trial_1
	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_elections_events.50 days = 14 } #President's agenda
			RUS_clear_earlier_demrus_focuses = yes
			remove_ideas = {
				RUS_narodovolets_idea
				RUS_narodovolets_idea_2
				RUS_republican_guard
				RUS_republican_guard_2
				RUS_new_russian_capitalism_idea
				RUS_new_russian_capitalism_idea_2
				RUS_republican_constitutional_clubs_idea
				RUS_liberal_intelligentsia
				RUS_liberal_intelligentsia_2
				RUS_liberal_intelligentsia_3
				RUS_deadlocked_duma
				RUS_win_back_peasants_idea
				RUS_literary_clubs
				RUS_democratic_education_idea
				RUS_democratic_foundation
				RUS_democratic_foundation_2
				RUS_fighting_democracy_campaign
				RUS_russian_civil_society_1
				RUS_russian_civil_society_2
				RUS_russian_civil_society_3
				RUS_russian_civil_society_4
				RUS_democratic_artels
				RUS_vsodes
				RUS_vsodes_2
				RUS_civil_militia
				RUS_tomsky_versus_titov
				RUS_tomsky_versus_titov_2
				RUS_labour_peace
				RUS_party_versus_president
				RUS_party_versus_president_2
				RUS_party_versus_president_3
				RUS_party_versus_president_4
				RUS_party_versus_president_5
				RUS_establishment_opposition
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.104 option russia_democratic_events.104.a"
		name = russia_democratic_events.104.a
		RUS_aleksandr_golitsyn = {
			promote_character = { ideology = social_conservative_subtype }
		}
		swap_ideas = {
			remove_idea = RUS_rule_by_decree
			add_idea = RUS_guided_democracy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_republic_under_watch }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_republic_under_watch
				add_idea = RUS_republic_under_watch_2
			}
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_conservative
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_georgy_vernadsky_sic
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:authoritarian_democrat }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		complete_national_focus = RUS_soccons
		if = {
			limit = {
				threat > 0.75
				NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
			}
			load_oob = RUS_preemptive_war_focus
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Creation of the Young Guard
	id = russia_democratic_events.105
	title = russia_democratic_events.105.t
	desc = russia_democratic_events.105.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_coronation
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_circle_of_st_george_in_russia }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.105 option russia_democratic_events.105.a"
		name = russia_democratic_events.105.a #Ban them
		add_political_power = -30
		add_popularity = { ideology = national_populist popularity = 0.01 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.105 option russia_democratic_events.105.b"
		name = russia_democratic_events.105.b #They are insignificant
		add_war_support = 0.02
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_active_mission = RUS_demands_from_unions_monarchy
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai
					RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.02
		add_popularity = { ideology = national_populist popularity = 0.05 }
	}
	after = {
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_circle_of_st_george_in_russia } }
			effect_tooltip = {
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = national_populist
					long_name = RUS_national_populist2_party_long_tt
					name = RUS_national_populist2_party
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = national_populist
					long_name = RUS_national_populist2_party_long
					name = RUS_national_populist2_party
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Faith in Russia
	id = russia_democratic_events.106
	title = russia_democratic_events.106.t
	desc = russia_democratic_events.106.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_orthodox
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_idea = RUS_right_anger
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.106 option russia_democratic_events.106.a"
		name = russia_democratic_events.106.a #Fight fire with fire
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai
					RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = -0.05 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = RUS_bold_promises }
			add_days_mission_timeout = {
				mission = RUS_bold_promises
				days = 30
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.106 option russia_democratic_events.106.b"
		name = russia_democratic_events.106.b #They have the right to say it
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				check_variable = { RUS_right_anger > 6 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai
					RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = social_conservative }
			add_popularity = { ideology = authoritarian_democrat popularity = 0.05 }
		}
		else = {
			add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = 0.05 }
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.106 option russia_democratic_events.106.c"
		name = russia_democratic_events.106.c #The state must support and promote the church
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				check_variable = { RUS_left_anger > 6 }
			}
		}
		trigger = { NOT = { has_government = social_democrat } }
		add_stability = 0.04
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = social_conservative }
			add_popularity = { ideology = authoritarian_democrat popularity = 0.05 }
		}
		else = {
			add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = 0.05 }
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { is_core_of = RUS }
				is_central_asia = yes
			}
			add_compliance = -10
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #The Patriots March
	id = russia_democratic_events.108
	title = russia_democratic_events.108.t
	desc = russia_democratic_events.108.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army2
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_idea = RUS_right_anger
		has_elected_government = yes
		is_ai = no
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.108 option russia_democratic_events.108.a"
		name = russia_democratic_events.108.a #Keep the order
		ai_chance = { base = 10 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_completed_focus = RUS_expand_okhrana }
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_nationalist_marches
				days = 25
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_okhrana_expanded_tt
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { RUS_titov = no }
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_nationalist_marches
				days = 50
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_nationalist_marches
				days = 70
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.108 option russia_democratic_events.108.b"
		name = russia_democratic_events.108.b #Dismiss left-wing ministers
		trigger = {
			RUS_titov = no
			RUS_sulimov = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_government = social_democrat
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_dolgorukov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_kartashyov_ai
				}
				RUS_vasily_maklakov = { is_country_leader = yes }
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			RUS_aleksandr_titov = { remove_political_advisor_role = yes }
			RUS_sergey_melgunov = { remove_political_advisor_role = yes }
			RUS_nikolay_oganovsky = { remove_political_advisor_role = yes }
			RUS_vladimir_levitsky = { remove_political_advisor_role = yes }
			RUS_vladimir_karelin = { remove_political_advisor_role = yes }
			RUS_aleksandr_finn_yenotayevsky = { remove_political_advisor_role = yes }
			RUS_gergard_zeller = { remove_political_advisor_role = yes }
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -2 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		set_country_flag = RUS_purged_social_democrats
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = -0.05 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = RUS_political_apathy }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_apathy_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_apathy_increase_tt
		}
		if = {
			limit = { is_in_coalition_with_social_democrat = yes }
			country_event = russia_democratic_events.65 #Collapse of the Coalition
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.108 option russia_democratic_events.108.c"
		name = russia_democratic_events.108.c #Pass stricter anti-socialist laws
		trigger = {
			RUS_titov = no
			RUS_sulimov = no
		}
		ai_chance = { base = 50 }
		RUS_decrease_democracy = yes
		add_ideas = RUS_strict_anti_socialist_laws
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -2 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -2 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = RUS_political_apathy }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_apathy_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_apathy_increase_tt
		}
		if = {
			limit = { is_in_coalition_with_social_democrat = yes }
			country_event = russia_democratic_events.65 #Collapse of the Coalition
		}
	}
}

		has_country_flag = RUS_confidence_votes_law
		NOT = {
			has_idea = RUS_guided_democracy
			has_idea = RUS_rule_by_decree
		}

country_event = { #Socialists Demand Unbanning
	id = russia_democratic_events.110
	title = russia_democratic_events.110.t
	desc = russia_democratic_events.110.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_protest
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		has_idea = RUS_left_anger
		NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_repeal_communist_ban_law }
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.110 option russia_democratic_events.110.a"
		name = russia_democratic_events.110.a #All right, we'll let them back for now
		trigger = { has_authoritarian_government = no }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				OR = {
					has_soclib_or_socdem_government = yes
					RUS_maklakov = yes
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				check_variable = { RUS_right_anger > 7 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai
					RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -75
		add_stability = 0.05
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -2 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = 0.05 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = 0.05 }
		set_country_flag = RUS_repeal_communist_ban_law
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.110 option russia_democratic_events.110.b"
		name = russia_democratic_events.110.b #We will not budge on this
		trigger = { RUS_sulimov = no }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_government = social_conservative
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				check_variable = { RUS_left_anger > 7 }
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.04
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = 0.025 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = 0.025 }
	}
}

				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai
			}
		}

		}
	}

	id = russia_democratic_events.115
	title = russia_democratic_events.115.t
	desc = russia_democratic_events.115.d

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = RUS_confidence_votes_law
		has_idea = RUS_left_anger
		RUS_sulimov = no
		is_ai = no
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.115 option russia_democratic_events.115.a"
		name = russia_democratic_events.115.a #Give in and appoint a more left-wing government
		trigger = { is_ai = no }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_aftermath option = DEFAULT } }
			}
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = social_democrat
			elections_allowed = yes
			election_frequency = 60
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_vladimir_levitsky_sic
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = 0.06 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_deadlock_tt
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -3 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { is_monarchy = yes }
				country_event = { id = russia_monarchist_events.70 days = 1 } #Coup in the Kremlin (Monarchy)
			}
			else = {
				country_event = { id = russia_democratic_events.103 days = 1 } #Coup in the Kremlin
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.115 option russia_democratic_events.115.b"
		name = russia_democratic_events.115.b #Not on my watch
		add_stability = -0.12
		add_political_power = -100
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -9 }

		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -5 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -2 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -2 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Shatilov Report
	id = russia_democratic_events.122
	title = russia_democratic_events.122.t
	desc = russia_democratic_events.122.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_shatilov
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		original_tag = RUS
		date > 1939.5.1
		threat > 0.7
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
		NOT = {
			has_war_with = GER
			second_weltkrieg_has_begun = yes
			has_completed_focus = RUS_preemptive_war
			has_completed_focus = RUS_triumphant_russian_nation
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.122 option russia_democratic_events.122.a"
		name = russia_democratic_events.122.a
		add_war_support = 0.04
		add_named_threat = {
			threat = 2
			name = russia_democratic_events.122.t
		}
		GER = {
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = ROOT
				modifier = KR_outraged
			}
			add_intel = {
				target = ROOT
				civilian_intel = 1
				army_intel = 1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.122 option russia_democratic_events.122.b"
		name = russia_democratic_events.122.b
		add_stability = 0.01
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
	}
	after = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_democratic_events.123 days = 30 } #Emergency Meeting of the Cabinet
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Emergency Meeting of the Cabinet
	id = russia_democratic_events.123
	title = russia_democratic_events.123.t
	desc = russia_democratic_events.123.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_conference2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.123 option russia_democratic_events.123.a"
		name = russia_democratic_events.123.a
		ai_chance = { base = 100 }
		trigger = { has_soclib_or_socdem_government = yes }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_preemptive_war_tt
		activate_mission = RUS_oncoming_war
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.123 option russia_democratic_events.123.b"
		name = russia_democratic_events.123.b
		ai_chance = { base = 100 }
		trigger = { has_soclib_or_socdem_government = no }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_preemptive_war_tt
		activate_mission = RUS_oncoming_war
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.123 option russia_democratic_events.123.c"
		name = russia_democratic_events.123.c
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		trigger = { NOT = { has_government = social_conservative } }
		custom_effect_tooltip = russia_democratic_events.123.c.tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_preemptive_war_tt
		add_war_support = -0.05
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { is_monarchy = yes }
				country_event = { id = russia_monarchist_events.70 days = 4 } #Coup in the Kremlin (Monarchy)
			}
			else = {
				country_event = { id = russia_democratic_events.103 days = 4 } #Coup in the Kremlin
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Agronomic Crisis on Long Fuse
	id = russia_democratic_events.125
	title = russia_democratic_events.125.t
	desc = russia_democratic_events.125.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_famine
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		NOT = { country_exists = KAZ }
		TRK = {
			exists = yes
			NOT = { has_war_with = RUS }
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.125 option russia_democratic_events.125.a"
		name = russia_democratic_events.125.a
		ai_chance = { base = 10 }
		add_political_power = -60
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = 3 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.125 option russia_democratic_events.125.b"
		name = russia_democratic_events.125.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai
					RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -30
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_ca_alash_unreliability1_tt
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_central_asia_unrest_temp = 1 }
		RUS_add_CA_unrest = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.125 option russia_democratic_events.125.c"
		name = russia_democratic_events.125.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai
					RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.04
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_ca_alash_unreliability2_tt
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_central_asia_unrest_temp = 1 }
		RUS_add_CA_unrest = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.125 option russia_democratic_events.125.e"
		name = russia_democratic_events.125.e
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				check_variable = { RUS_right_anger > 8 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai
					RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
	}
}

### Demrus post-war events

country_event = { #Russian puppet regimes in Europe get elections
	id = russia_democratic_events.151
	hidden = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		is_ally_with = FROM
	}
	immediate = {
		country_event = { id = russia_democratic_events.151 days = 1460 }
	}

	option = { #PatAut
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.151 option 1"
		trigger = {
			FROM = { has_completed_focus = RUS_return_to_tradition }
			NOT = { tag = POL }
			NOT = { has_cosmetic_tag = ITA_federation }
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			popularity = 0.25
		}
	}

	option = { #AuthDem
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.151 option 2"
		trigger = {
			NOT = { tag = POL }
			OR = {
				has_cosmetic_tag = ITA_federation
				FROM = { has_completed_focus = RUS_first_party_of_russia }
				FROM = { has_completed_focus = RUS_european_policeman }
				FROM = { has_completed_focus = RUS_return_to_tradition }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				FROM = { has_government = authoritarian_democrat }
			}
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = authoritarian_democrat
			election_frequency = 48
			elections_allowed = yes
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = authoritarian_democrat
			popularity = 0.25
		}
	}

	option = { #SocCon
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.151 option 3"
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_cosmetic_tag = ITA_federation }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				FROM = {
					has_government = social_conservative
					has_country_flag = RUS_controlled_european_democracy
				}
			}
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = social_conservative
			election_frequency = 48
			elections_allowed = yes
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_conservative
			popularity = 0.2
		}
		random_list = {
			33 = {
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = paternal_autocrat
					popularity = 0.1
				}
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = authoritarian_democrat
					popularity = 0.1
				}
			}
			33 = {
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = market_liberal
					popularity = 0.1
				}
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = social_liberal
					popularity = 0.1
				}
			}
			33 = {
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = social_liberal
					popularity = 0.1
				}
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = social_democrat
					popularity = 0.1
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #MarLib
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.151 option 4"
		trigger = {
			NOT = { FROM = { has_completed_focus = RUS_return_to_tradition } }
			NOT = { tag = POL }
			NOT = { has_cosmetic_tag = ITA_federation }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				FROM = {
					has_government = market_liberal
					has_country_flag = RUS_controlled_european_democracy
				}
			}
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = market_liberal
			election_frequency = 48
			elections_allowed = yes
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = market_liberal
			popularity = 0.2
		}
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = social_conservative
					popularity = 0.1
				}
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = social_liberal
					popularity = 0.1
				}
			}
			50 = {
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = social_liberal
					popularity = 0.1
				}
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = social_democrat
					popularity = 0.1
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #SocLib
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.151 option 5"
		trigger = {
			NOT = { FROM = { has_completed_focus = RUS_return_to_tradition } }
			NOT = { has_cosmetic_tag = ITA_federation }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				FROM = {
					has_government = social_liberal
					has_country_flag = RUS_controlled_european_democracy
				}
			}
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = social_liberal
			election_frequency = 48
			elections_allowed = yes
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_liberal
			popularity = 0.2
		}
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = social_conservative
					popularity = 0.1
				}
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = market_liberal
					popularity = 0.1
				}
			}
			50 = {
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = market_liberal
					popularity = 0.1
				}
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = social_democrat
					popularity = 0.1
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #SocDem
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.151 option 6"
		trigger = {
			NOT = { FROM = { has_completed_focus = RUS_return_to_tradition } }
			NOT = { has_cosmetic_tag = ITA_federation }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				FROM = {
					has_government = social_democrat
					has_country_flag = RUS_controlled_european_democracy
				}
			}
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = social_democrat
			election_frequency = 48
			elections_allowed = yes
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = 0.2
		}
		random_list = {
			33 = {
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = radical_socialist
					popularity = 0.1
				}
			}
			33 = {
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = social_conservative
					popularity = 0.1
				}
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = market_liberal
					popularity = 0.1
				}
			}
			33 = {
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = market_liberal
					popularity = 0.1
				}
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = social_liberal
					popularity = 0.1
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

			}
		}
	}

country_event = { #retvrn
	id = russia_democratic_events.164
	title = russia_democratic_events.164.t
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_intro
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_solonevich = yes }
		text = russia_democratic_events.164.d.solonevich_republic
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes } }
		text = russia_democratic_events.164.d.peoples_monarchy
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_completed_focus = RUS_authdems }
		text = russia_democratic_events.164.d.SOR
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.164 option russia_democratic_events.164.a"
		name = russia_democratic_events.164.a
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_solonevich = yes }
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_NMD } }
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = authoritarian_democrat
					long_name = RUS_social_conservative_party_long
					name = RUS_social_conservative_party
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = authoritarian_democrat
					long_name = RUS_paternal_autocrat2_party_long
					name = RUS_paternal_autocrat2_party
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_pop_increase = party_popularity@social_conservative }
			divide_temp_variable = { RUS_pop_increase = 2 }
			add_popularity = { ideology = authoritarian_democrat popularity = RUS_pop_increase }
			hidden_effect = {
				multiply_temp_variable = { RUS_pop_increase = -1 }
				add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = RUS_pop_increase }
			}
			set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_conservative }
			add_to_coalition = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Dvinsk Referendum
	id = russia_democratic_events.166
	title = russia_democratic_events.166.t
	desc = russia_democratic_events.166.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy3
	trigger = {
		LAT = { is_subject_of = RUS }
		RUS = {
			OR = {
				has_liberal_government = yes
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
			owns_state = 880 #Latgale
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.166 option russia_democratic_events.166.a"
		name = russia_democratic_events.166.a
		add_political_power = 75
		add_stability = 0.02
		880 = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_state_flag = dvinsk_state }
				clr_state_flag = dvinsk_state
				remove_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_dvinsk_modifier }
			}
			transfer_state_to = LAT
			remove_core_of = ROOT
		}
		LAT = {
			add_opinion_modifier = { target = ROOT modifier = KR_returned_land }
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.166 option russia_democratic_events.166.b"
		name = russia_democratic_events.166.b
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		add_war_support = 0.04
		LAT = {
			add_opinion_modifier = { target = ROOT modifier = KR_displeased }
		}
	}
}

		name = russia_democratic_events.170.b
		add_political_power = -30
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = -0.03 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = 0.03 }
		effect_tooltip = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = syndicalist
				name = RUS_social_democrat3_party
				long_name = RUS_social_democrat3_party_long_tt
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_VSRP_formed
		hidden_effect = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = syndicalist
				name = RUS_social_democrat3_party
				long_name = RUS_social_democrat3_party_long
			}
			country_event = { id = russia_democratic_events.176 days = 265 random_days = 100 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.170 option russia_democratic_events.170.c"
		name = russia_democratic_events.170.c
		add_war_support = -0.03
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = -0.06 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = 0.06 }
		effect_tooltip = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = syndicalist
				name = RUS_social_democrat3_party
				long_name = RUS_social_democrat3_party_long_tt
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_VSRP_formed
		hidden_effect = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = syndicalist
				name = RUS_social_democrat3_party
				long_name = RUS_social_democrat3_party_long
			}
			country_event = { id = russia_democratic_events.176 days = 265 random_days = 100 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Spread of the Revolutionary Cells
	id = russia_democratic_events.171
	title = russia_democratic_events.171.t
	desc = russia_democratic_events.171.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_protest
	trigger = {
		country_exists = INT
		country_exists = FRA
		has_soclib_or_socdem_government = no
		has_socialist_government = no
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.171 option russia_democratic_events.171.a"
		name = russia_democratic_events.171.a
		trigger = { RUS_savinkov = yes }
		add_political_power = -50
		add_stability = 0.04
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = -0.06 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = totalist popularity = -0.06 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.171 option russia_democratic_events.171.b"
		name = russia_democratic_events.171.b
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_idea = RUS_embers_of_democracy } }
			RUS_decrease_democracy = yes
		}
		add_political_power = -100
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = -0.06 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = totalist popularity = -0.04 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.171 option russia_democratic_events.171.c"
		name = russia_democratic_events.171.c
		trigger = {
			RUS_savinkov = no
		}
		add_stability = -0.03
		add_popularity = { ideology = totalist popularity = 0.04 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Strikes Against the War!
	id = russia_democratic_events.172
	title = russia_democratic_events.172.t
	desc = russia_democratic_events.172.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { has_war_with = INT }
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_strike

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.172 option russia_democratic_events.172.a"
		name = russia_democratic_events.172.a
		add_war_support = -0.1
		if = {
			limit = { has_soclib_or_socdem_government = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -6 }
		}
		else = { set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -4 } }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		RUS_decrease_democracy = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.172 option russia_democratic_events.172.b"
		name = russia_democratic_events.172.b
		add_war_support = -0.1
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_strike_season
			days = 120
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.172 option russia_democratic_events.172.c"
		name = russia_democratic_events.172.c
		add_political_power = -100
		add_war_support = -0.05
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = 3 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Demands from the Socialists
	id = russia_democratic_events.173
	title = russia_democratic_events.173.t
	desc = russia_democratic_events.173.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_shliapnikov
	trigger = {
		is_part_of_government_social_democrat = yes
		has_country_flag = RUS_VSRP_formed
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.173 option russia_democratic_events.173.a"
		name = russia_democratic_events.173.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_war_with = INT
				has_government = market_liberal
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -100
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -10 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:syndicalist }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = 0.05 }
		add_stability = -0.05
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.173 option russia_democratic_events.173.b"
		name = russia_democratic_events.173.b
		add_political_power = -50
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = 0.05 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = -0.05 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = -0.05 }
		add_stability = 0.05
	}
}

	desc = russia_democratic_events.175.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_maklakov
	trigger = {
		has_country_leader = { character = RUS_vasily_maklakov }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_democratic_events.175 option russia_democratic_events.175.a"
		name = russia_democratic_events.175.a
		add_country_leader_role = {
			character = RUS_nikolay_nekrasov
			country_leader = {
				desc = RUS_nikolay_nekrasov_sic_desc
				ideology = market_liberal_subtype
			}
			promote_leader = yes
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_mikhail_kalugin_sic
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_elections_events.50 days = 3 }  #President's agenda
		}
	}
}

### Monarchist Russia Events ###

unit_leader_event = { #Wrangel becomes imperial regent
	id = russia_monarchist_events.1
	title = russia_monarchist_events.1.t
	desc = russia_monarchist_events.1.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_monarchist_events.1 option russia_monarchist_events.1.a" #Normal Monarchy
		name = russia_monarchist_events.1.a
		trigger = { NOT = { has_war_with = GER } }
		set_cosmetic_tag = RUS_empire
		RUS_pyotr_wrangel = { set_character_as_regent = yes }
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_monarchist_events.2 days = 20 } #Crown Kirill/Vladimir
			country_event = { id = russia_democratic_events.120 days = 150 random_days = 50 } #Wrangel reveals the war plan
			country_event = { id = russia_monarchist_events.6 days = 100 } #Union for the Revival of the Republic
			country_event = { id = russia_monarchist_events.29 days = 600 random_days = 600 } #Orthodoxy, Constitution, People
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Crowning the Tsar
	id = russia_monarchist_events.2
	title = russia_monarchist_events.2.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { date < 1938.8.2 }
		text = russia_monarchist_events.2.d.kirill
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { date > 1938.8.1 }
		text = russia_monarchist_events.2.d.vladimir
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_coronation

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_monarchist_events.2 option russia_monarchist_events.2.a"
		name = russia_monarchist_events.2.a
		add_stability = 0.05
		RUS_create_monarchy = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			random_other_country = {
				limit = { is_ai = yes }
				news_event = russia_news_events.6
			}
			country_event = { id = russia_monarchist_events.28 days = 365 } #The Day of Restoration
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Death of Kirill
	id = russia_monarchist_events.5
	title = russia_monarchist_events.5.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { is_monarchy = yes }
		text = russia_monarchist_events.5.d.mon
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_socialist_government = yes }
		text = russia_monarchist_events.5.d.soc
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			is_monarchy = no
			has_socialist_government = no
		}
		text = russia_monarchist_events.5.d.dem
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kirill2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { is_monarchy = yes }
				RUS_create_vladimir = yes
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_monarchist_events.5 option russia_monarchist_events.5.a"
		name = russia_monarchist_events.5.a
		trigger = { is_monarchy = yes }
		effect_tooltip = { promote_character = RUS_vladimir_romanov }
		hidden_effect = { RUS_add_vladimir_traits = yes }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_monarchist_events.5 option russia_monarchist_events.5.b"
		name = russia_monarchist_events.5.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_socialist_government = yes
				has_government = national_populist
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_monarchist_events.5 option russia_monarchist_events.5.c"
		name = russia_monarchist_events.5.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai
					RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			is_monarchy = no
			has_socialist_government = no
			NOT = { has_government = national_populist }
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_monarchist_events.5 option russia_monarchist_events.5.e"
		name = russia_monarchist_events.5.e
		ai_chance = { base = 1 }
		trigger = {
			is_monarchy = no
			has_socialist_government = no
			has_conservative_government = yes
		}
		add_political_power = -30
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = 0.02 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
	}
	after = {
		RUS_kirill_romanov = { kill_character = yes }
	}
}

country_event = { #Union for the Revival of the Republic
	id = russia_monarchist_events.6
	title = russia_monarchist_events.6.t
	desc = russia_monarchist_events.6.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_protest
	trigger = { is_monarchy = yes }
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_monarchist_events.6 option russia_monarchist_events.6.a"
		name = russia_monarchist_events.6.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					RUS_pavel_gronsky = { is_second_in_command = yes }
					has_government = social_conservative
				}
			}
			add_war_support = -0.1
			add_stability = -0.1
		}
		else = {
			add_war_support = -0.05
			add_stability = -0.05
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_SVR_var = 0 }
		activate_mission = RUS_SVR_activity
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_monarchist_events.10 days = 70 } #Winning the Hearts and Souls
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #VTSPS Mobilizes
	id = russia_monarchist_events.7
	title = russia_monarchist_events.7.t
	desc = russia_monarchist_events.7.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_levitsky
	trigger = { is_monarchy = yes }
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_monarchist_events.7 option russia_monarchist_events.7.a"
		name = russia_monarchist_events.7.a
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		add_manpower = -5000
		add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
			type = infantry_equipment
			amount = -1000
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		add_days_mission_timeout = {
			mission = RUS_SVR_activity
			days = 40
		}
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_strike_season
			days = 30
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = 0.025 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_monarchist_events.7 option russia_monarchist_events.7.b"
		name = russia_monarchist_events.7.b
		ai_chance = { base = 100 }
		trigger = {
			has_marlib_or_soclib_government = yes
			NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_press_controls }
			NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_entrench_kadets }
		}
		add_political_power = -40
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = 0.05 }
		country_event = { id = russia_monarchist_events.9 days = 5 } #Negotiations with the Labour Unions
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_monarchist_events.7 option russia_monarchist_events.7.c"
		name = russia_monarchist_events.7.c
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_strike_season
			days = 30
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = 0.05 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = 0.05 }
	}
}

	id = russia_monarchist_events.8
	title = russia_monarchist_events.8.t
	desc = russia_monarchist_events.8.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_riot2
	trigger = { is_monarchy = yes }
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_monarchist_events.8 option russia_monarchist_events.8.a"
		ai_chance = { base = 20 }
		name = russia_monarchist_events.8.a
		add_manpower = -5000
		add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
			type = infantry_equipment
			amount = -1000
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		add_days_mission_timeout = {
			mission = RUS_SVR_activity
			days = 40
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_government = social_liberal } }
			add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = 0.025 }
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = 0.025 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_monarchist_events.8 option russia_monarchist_events.8.b"
		name = russia_monarchist_events.8.b
		ai_chance = { base = 5 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
					has_government = social_liberal
				}
			}
			add_political_power = -30
		}
		else = {
			add_political_power = -50
		}
		add_stability = 0.02
		add_days_mission_timeout = {
			mission = RUS_SVR_activity
			days = 40
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = 0.025 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_monarchist_events.8 option russia_monarchist_events.8.c"
		name = russia_monarchist_events.8.c
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		add_stability = -0.05
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_government = social_liberal } }
			add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = 0.05 }
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = 0.05 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Winning the Hearts and Souls
	id = russia_monarchist_events.10
	title = russia_monarchist_events.10.t
	desc = russia_monarchist_events.10.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy3
	trigger = {
		is_monarchy = yes
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_monarchist_events.10 option russia_monarchist_events.10.a"
		name = russia_monarchist_events.10.a
		activate_mission = RUS_promised_jobs
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				add = -5
				has_political_power > 50
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_sr_ai
				has_country_flag = RUS_empire_ai
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_monarchist_events.10 option russia_monarchist_events.10.b"
		name = russia_monarchist_events.10.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				add = 5
				has_political_power > 50
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 5
				check_variable = { RUS_left_anger > 3 }
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		add_days_mission_timeout = {
			mission = RUS_SVR_activity
			days = 90
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_monarchist_events.10 option russia_monarchist_events.10.c"
		name = russia_monarchist_events.10.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				add = 5
				has_political_power > 50
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 5
				check_variable = { RUS_left_anger > 3 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 5
				has_stability < 0.15
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_sr_ai
			}
		}
		activate_mission = RUS_promised_jobs
		add_political_power = -50
		add_days_mission_timeout = {
			mission = RUS_SVR_activity
			days = 90
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
	}
}

				factor = 0

		}
		add_stability = -0.05

		add_popularity = { ideology = totalist popularity = -0.03 }

		add_political_power = -30

		add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = -0.04 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = -0.04 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = totalist popularity = -0.04 }
	}

		add_political_power = -100
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -4 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		add_days_mission_timeout = {
			mission = RUS_SVR_activity
			days = 120
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_monarchist_events.12 option russia_monarchist_events.12.b"
		name = russia_monarchist_events.12.b
		add_political_power = -40
		country_event = russia_monarchist_events.14 #Imperial Decree on Protection of the People and the State
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
	}
	after = {
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -5 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
	}
}

	id = russia_monarchist_events.13
	title = russia_monarchist_events.13.t
	desc = russia_monarchist_events.13.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_gun
	trigger = { is_monarchy = yes }
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_monarchist_events.13 option russia_monarchist_events.13.a"
		name = russia_monarchist_events.13.a
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -2 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		RUS_decrease_democracy = yes
		remove_mission = RUS_SVR_activity
		add_popularity = { ideology = paternal_autocrat popularity = 0.04 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = -0.04 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = -0.03 }
		set_country_flag = RUS_destroyed_SVR
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_monarchist_events.17 days = 70 } #Expansion of Anti-Communist Laws
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Imperial Decree on Protection of the People and the State
	id = russia_monarchist_events.14
	title = russia_monarchist_events.14.t
	desc = russia_monarchist_events.14.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_duma
	trigger = { is_monarchy = yes }
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_monarchist_events.14 option russia_monarchist_events.14.a"
		name = russia_monarchist_events.14.a
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = social_liberal }
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_protection_decree_soclib
				days = 730
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_government = market_liberal }
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_protection_decree_marlib
				days = 730
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_protection_decree
				days = 730
			}
		}
		RUS_decrease_democracy = yes
		add_days_mission_timeout = {
			mission = RUS_SVR_activity
			days = 90
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_state_protection_decree
	}
}
country_event = { #Imperial Cabinet Falls
	id = russia_monarchist_events.15
	title = russia_monarchist_events.15.t
	desc = russia_monarchist_events.15.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_conference1

	trigger = {
		is_ai = no
		is_monarchy = yes
		country_exists = GER
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			end_coalition = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_monarchist_events.15 option russia_monarchist_events.15.a"
		name = russia_monarchist_events.15.a
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_government = social_conservative
				has_government = social_liberal
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			complete_national_focus = RUS_marlibs
			if = {
				limit = { has_government = social_conservative }
				uncomplete_national_focus = { focus = RUS_soccons }
				uncomplete_national_focus = {
					focus = RUS_empower_MVD
					uncomplete_children = yes
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { has_government = social_liberal }
				RUS_remove_sr_monarchist_govt = yes
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.1
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -5 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		end_coalition = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = market_liberal
			elections_allowed = yes
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_pavel_gronsky_sic
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_conservative }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -3 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -3 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_monarchist_events.15 option russia_monarchist_events.15.c"
		name = russia_monarchist_events.15.c
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_government = social_conservative
				has_government = social_liberal
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.1
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -5 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		end_coalition = yes
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = social_conservative
			elections_allowed = yes
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_aleksandr_golitsyn_sic
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:authoritarian_democrat }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -3 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -3 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			complete_national_focus = RUS_soccons
			uncomplete_national_focus = { focus = RUS_marlibs }
			uncomplete_national_focus = {
				focus = RUS_future_direction_of_liberalism
				uncomplete_children = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Socialist-Revolutionary Brothers' War
	id = russia_monarchist_events.16
	title = russia_monarchist_events.16.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_fondaminsky_victory }
		text = russia_monarchist_events.16.d.fondaminsky
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_fondaminsky_victory } }
		text = russia_monarchist_events.16.d.rikhter
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_fondaminsky
	trigger = {
		is_monarchy = yes
		has_government = social_liberal
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_monarchist_events.16 option russia_monarchist_events.16.a"
		name = russia_monarchist_events.16.a
		add_stability = -0.05
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_fondaminsky_victory }
			retire_character = RUS_vladimir_rikhter
			add_political_power = 50
		}
		else = {
			add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = -0.05 }
			country_event = { id = russia_monarchist_events.15 days = 3 } #Imperial Cabinet Falls
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #The Garde Equipage
	id = russia_monarchist_events.20
	title = russia_monarchist_events.20.t
	desc = russia_monarchist_events.20.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kirill2
	trigger = {
		is_monarchy = yes
		RUS_wrangel = no
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_monarchist_events.20 option russia_monarchist_events.20.a"
		name = russia_monarchist_events.20.a #Yes, Garde Equipage will be restored
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				check_variable = { RUS_left_anger > 3 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_political_power < -20
			}
		}
		custom_override_tooltip = {
			tooltip = {
				localization_key = tooltip_create_division_template
				NAME = "Imperatorskaya Gvardiya"
				LINE_1 = { localization_key = line_battalion_tt NAME = cavalry ICON = GFX_unit_cavalry_icon_small COUNT = 12 }
				SUPPORT_1 = { localization_key = support_battalion_tt NAME = mot_recon ICON = GFX_unit_mot_recon_icon_small }
				SUPPORT_2 = { localization_key = support_battalion_tt NAME = artillery ICON = GFX_unit_artillery_icon_small }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_template = "Imperatorskaya Gvardiya" }
				delete_unit_template_and_units = { division_template = "Imperatorskaya Gvardiya" disband = yes } #no cheating
			}
			division_template = {
				name = "Imperatorskaya Gvardiya"
				division_names_group = RUS_CAV_02
				regiments = {
					cavalry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
					cavalry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
					cavalry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
					cavalry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
					cavalry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
					cavalry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
					cavalry = { x = 2 y = 0 }
					cavalry = { x = 2 y = 1 }
					cavalry = { x = 2 y = 2 }
					cavalry = { x = 3 y = 0 }
					cavalry = { x = 3 y = 1 }
					cavalry = { x = 3 y = 2 }
				}
				support = {
					mot_recon = { x = 0 y = 0 }
					artillery = { x = 0 y = 1 }
				}
			}
		}

		random_owned_controlled_state = {
			prioritize = { 219 } #Moscow
			limit = { valid_state_for_spawning_friendly_unit = yes }
			custom_override_tooltip = {
				tooltip = {
					localization_key = tooltip_spawn_unit
					TYPE = "Imperatorskaya Gvardiya"
				}
				create_unit = {
					division = "division_template = \"Imperatorskaya Gvardiya\" start_experience_factor = 1"
					owner = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		add_war_support = 0.01
		add_manpower = -9500
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_monarchist_events.20 option russia_monarchist_events.20.b"
		name = russia_monarchist_events.20.b #Grant him a smaller token guard
		ai_chance = { base = 10 }
		add_political_power = -20
		add_manpower = -800
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_monarchist_events.20 option russia_monarchist_events.20.c"
		name = russia_monarchist_events.20.c #What is this, the 19th century?
		ai_chance = {
			base = 15
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				check_variable = { RUS_right_anger > 5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				check_variable = { RUS_right_anger < 3 }
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -4 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #The Doctrine of the Tsar-Redeemer
	id = russia_monarchist_events.24
	title = russia_monarchist_events.24.t
	desc = russia_monarchist_events.24.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kirill
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			RUS_is_demrus = yes
			tag = FER
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_monarchist_events.24 option russia_monarchist_events.24.a"
		name = russia_monarchist_events.24.a #Support the canonisation
		ai_chance = { base = 50 }
		if = {
			limit = { is_monarchy = no }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
			RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_government = social_conservative
					has_authoritarian_government = yes
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = 5 }
			change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		}
		else = {
			add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = 0.05 }
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		set_country_flag = RUS_imperial_family_martyrs
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_monarchist_events.24 option russia_monarchist_events.24.b"
		name = russia_monarchist_events.24.b #Why would one man matter?
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai
					RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = { tag = RUS }
		if = {
			limit = { is_monarchy = no }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
			RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		}
		else = { add_political_power = -35 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
	}
}
country_event = { #Chairman of the High Imperial Council
	id = russia_monarchist_events.25
	title = russia_monarchist_events.25.t
	desc = russia_monarchist_events.25.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_duma
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_monarchist_events.25 option russia_monarchist_events.25.a"
		name = russia_monarchist_events.25.a
		RUS_dmitry_romanov = {
			add_trait = {
				slot = political_advisor
				trait = RUS_high_imperial_council_member
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.02
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_monarchist_events.25 option russia_monarchist_events.25.b"
		name = russia_monarchist_events.25.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 50
				RUS_aleksandr_golitsyn = { is_second_in_command = yes }
			}
		}
		RUS_aleksandr_golitsyn = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_advisor_role = second_in_command }
				add_trait = {
					slot = second_in_command
					trait = RUS_high_imperial_council_member
				}
			}
			else = {
				add_trait = {
					slot = political_advisor
					trait = RUS_high_imperial_council_member
				}
			}
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = 0.03 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_monarchist_events.25 option russia_monarchist_events.25.c"
		name = russia_monarchist_events.25.c
		RUS_georgy_vernadsky = {
			add_trait = {
				slot = second_in_command
				trait = RUS_high_imperial_council_member
			}
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = 0.03 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_monarchist_events.25 option russia_monarchist_events.25.e"
		name = russia_monarchist_events.25.e
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_invite_SOR
				RUS_wrangel_path = yes
			}
		}
		RUS_ivan_ilyin = {
			add_trait = {
				slot = political_advisor
				trait = RUS_high_imperial_council_member
			}
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = authoritarian_democrat popularity = 0.03 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_monarchist_events.25 option russia_monarchist_events.25.f"
		name = russia_monarchist_events.25.f
		trigger = {
			RUS_ivan_solonevich = {
				is_second_in_command = no
				is_country_leader = yes
			}
		}
		RUS_ivan_solonevich = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_advisor_role = second_in_command }
				add_trait = {
					slot = second_in_command
					trait = RUS_high_imperial_council_member
				}
			}
			else = {
				add_trait = {
					slot = political_advisor
					trait = RUS_high_imperial_council_member
				}
			}
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = 0.03 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_monarchist_events.25 option russia_monarchist_events.25.g"
		name = russia_monarchist_events.25.g
		trigger = { is_in_coalition_with_market_liberal = yes }
		RUS_anton_kartashyov = {
			add_trait = {
				slot = political_advisor
				trait = RUS_high_imperial_council_member
			}
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = market_liberal popularity = 0.03 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Enshrining Family Values in the Law
	id = russia_monarchist_events.27
	title = russia_monarchist_events.27.t
	desc = russia_monarchist_events.27.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kremlin_1
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_government = national_populist
			is_monarchy = yes
			has_soccon_or_marlib_government = yes
			has_authoritarian_government = yes
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_monarchist_events.27 option russia_monarchist_events.27.a"
		name = russia_monarchist_events.27.a
		ai_chance = { base = 50 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_marlib_or_soclib_government = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -3 }
			change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = 3 }
			change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_demrus = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
			RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_monarchist_events.27 option russia_monarchist_events.27.b"
		name = russia_monarchist_events.27.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai
					RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_government = national_populist
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -20
	}
}

country_event = { #Coup in the Kremlin (Monarchy)
	id = russia_monarchist_events.70
	title = russia_monarchist_events.70.t
	desc = russia_monarchist_events.70.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army2
	trigger = { is_monarchy = yes }
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -9 }
			RUS_change_military_anger = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -5 }
			RUS_change_right_anger = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -3 }
			RUS_change_left_anger = yes
			remove_ideas = {
				RUS_embers_of_democracy
				RUS_weak_democracy
				RUS_unstable_democracy
				RUS_strenghtening_democracy
				RUS_strong_democracy
				RUS_genuine_democracy
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_completed_focus = RUS_NMD }
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = paternal_autocrat
					long_name = RUS_paternal_autocrat_party_long
					name = RUS_paternal_autocrat_party
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_mil_anger_coup
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_monarchist_events.70 option russia_monarchist_events.70.a"
		name = russia_monarchist_events.70.a
		add_stability = -0.1
		add_ideas = RUS_rule_by_decree
		add_advisor_role = {
			character = RUS_pyotr_wrangel
			activate = yes
			advisor = {
				slot = second_in_command
				idea_token = RUS_pyotr_wrangel_sic
				desc = RUS_pyotr_wrangel_leader_desc
				traits = { KR_old_general_sic }
			}
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		if = {
			limit = { threat > 0.75 }
			load_oob = RUS_preemptive_war_focus
		}
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = 5 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Restoration of Civilian Government
	id = russia_monarchist_events.71
	title = russia_monarchist_events.71.t
	desc = russia_monarchist_events.71.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_duma
	trigger = { is_monarchy = yes }
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_ideas = {
				RUS_embers_of_democracy
				RUS_weak_democracy
				RUS_unstable_democracy
				RUS_strenghtening_democracy
				RUS_strong_democracy
				RUS_genuine_democracy
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_monarchist_events.71 option russia_monarchist_events.71.a"
		name = russia_monarchist_events.71.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_vps }
			}
		}
		swap_ideas = {
			remove_idea = RUS_rule_by_decree
			add_idea = RUS_guided_democracy
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_conservative
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_aleksandr_golitsyn_sic
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = 10 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_monarchist_events.71 option russia_monarchist_events.71.b"
		name = russia_monarchist_events.71.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_vps
			}
		}
		swap_ideas = {
			remove_idea = RUS_rule_by_decree
			add_idea = RUS_guided_democracy
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = authoritarian_democrat
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_vasily_shulgin_sic
	}
}

unit_leader_event = { #Wrangel's regency
	id = russia_monarchist_events.80
	title = russia_monarchist_events.80.t
	desc = russia_monarchist_events.80.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_wrangel2
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_monarchist_events.80 option russia_monarchist_events.80.a"
		name = russia_monarchist_events.80.a
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = allow_sound_events_flag }
				scoped_play_song = "god_save_the_tsar"
			}
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = paternal_autocrat
				long_name = RUS_paternal_autocrat3_party_long
				name = RUS_paternal_autocrat3_party
			}
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = authoritarian_democrat
				long_name = RUS_authoritarian_democrat_party_long
				name = RUS_authoritarian_democrat_party
			}
			country_event = { id = russia_monarchist_events.79 days = 10 } #Imperial Govt
			clr_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_ai
			set_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_path
			RUS_create_monarchy = yes
			mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		}
		complete_national_focus = RUS_black_baron
		activate_advisor = RUS_vasily_shulgin_sic
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:authoritarian_democrat }
		add_to_coalition = yes
	}
}

					ideology = social_conservative_subtype

country_event = { #Coronation of Wrangel
	id = russia_monarchist_events.92
	title = russia_monarchist_events.92.t
	desc = russia_monarchist_events.92.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_coronation
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_monarchist_events.92 option russia_monarchist_events.92.a"
		name = russia_monarchist_events.92.a
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { RUS_mikhail_drozdovsky = { has_advisor_role = army_chief } } }
			add_advisor_role = {
				character = RUS_mikhail_drozdovsky
				advisor = {
					slot = army_chief
					idea_token = RUS_mikhail_drozdovsky_army_chief
					desc = RUS_mikhail_drozdovsky_commander_desc
					traits = { KR_army_chief_morale_3 }
					cost = 100
					can_be_fired = no
				}
				activate = yes
			}
		}
		else = {
			activate_advisor = RUS_mikhail_drozdovsky_army_chief
		}
		RUS_increase_imperial_popularity = yes
		RUS_pyotr_wrangel = {
			set_portraits = {
				civilian = { large = GFX_portrait_RUS_pyotr_wrangel_civilian_large }
			}
			set_character_name = RUS_pyotr_wrangel_regnal
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_trait = RUS_imperial_regent }
					remove_trait = {
						trait = RUS_imperial_regent
						ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_trait = RUS_ruler_of_state }
					remove_trait = {
						trait = RUS_ruler_of_state
						ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
					}
				}
				add_trait = {
					ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
					trait = RUS_emperor_of_all_russias_wrangel
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { news_event = russia_news_events.7 }
	}
}

country_event = { #End of state of emergency and calls for elections
	id = russia_monarchist_events.94

	desc = russia_monarchist_events.94.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_election

	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_monarchist_events.94 option russia_monarchist_events.94.a"
		name = russia_monarchist_events.94.a
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_popularity = { ideology = paternal_autocrat popularity = -0.1 }
		complete_national_focus = RUS_democracy_restored
		add_ideas = RUS_weak_democracy
		hidden_effect = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = paternal_autocrat
				long_name = RUS_paternal_autocrat_party_long
				name = RUS_paternal_autocrat_party
			}
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = national_populist
				long_name = RUS_national_populist2_party_long
				name = RUS_national_populist2_party
			}
			promote_character = { character = RUS_anastasy_vonsyatsky ideology = national_populist_subtype }
			country_event = { id = russia_monarchist_events.89 days = 7 } #Constitution of the Restored Monarchy
			country_event = { id = russia_monarchist_events.90 days = 21 } #Fate of Wrangel Regency
			country_event = { id = russia_monarchist_events.95 days = 60 } #The Opposition Bloc
			country_event = { id = russia_monarchist_events.96 days = 75 } #Socialist-Revolutionaries Split
			country_event = { id = russia_monarchist_events.97 days = 90 } #Shulgin's Scheme
			country_event = { id = russia_monarchist_events.99 days = 120 } #Elections
			meta_effect = {
				text = {
					set_politics = {
						ruling_party = authoritarian_democrat
						last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
						election_frequency = 4
						elections_allowed = yes
					}
				}
				CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
			}
		}
	}
}

			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_monarchist_events.97 option russia_monarchist_events.97.b"
		name = russia_monarchist_events.97.b #Yes, our achievements won't be squandered

			has_country_leader = { character = RUS_pyotr_wrangel }
			OR = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_oaths_of_allegiance
				has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_vps
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_vpp
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_monarchist_events.98 days = 7 } #Alliance of the Right
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Alliance of the Right
	id = russia_monarchist_events.98
	title = russia_monarchist_events.98.t
	desc = russia_monarchist_events.98.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_shulgin
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_monarchist_events.98 option russia_monarchist_events.98.a"
		name = russia_monarchist_events.98.a
		set_country_flag = RUS_VPS_formed

			set_party_name = {
				ideology = authoritarian_democrat
				long_name = RUS_authoritarian_democrat3_party_long_tt
				name = RUS_authoritarian_democrat3_party
			}
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = social_conservative
				long_name = RUS_authoritarian_democrat3_party_long_tt
				name = RUS_authoritarian_democrat3_party
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_pop_increase = party_popularity@paternal_autocrat }
		hidden_effect = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = authoritarian_democrat
				long_name = RUS_authoritarian_democrat3_party_long
				name = RUS_authoritarian_democrat3_party
			}
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = social_conservative
				long_name = RUS_authoritarian_democrat3_party_long
				name = RUS_authoritarian_democrat3_party
			}
			add_popularity = { ideology = paternal_autocrat popularity = -1 }
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = authoritarian_democrat popularity = RUS_pop_increase }
	}
}

country_event = { #Post-War elections for Wrangel
	id = russia_monarchist_events.99
	title = russia_monarchist_events.99.t
	desc = russia_monarchist_events.99.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_election
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_clear_earlier_demrus_focuses = yes
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_monarchist_events.99 option russia_monarchist_events.99.a"
		name = russia_monarchist_events.99.a
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_VPS_formed } }
		set_country_flag = RUS_had_first_election
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_vps
					has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_kadets
				}
			}
		}
		complete_national_focus = RUS_soccons
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = 0.1 }
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_conservative
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:authoritarian_democrat }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		activate_advisor = RUS_aleksandr_golitsyn_sic
		RUS_increase_democracy = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_monarchist_events.99 option russia_monarchist_events.99.b"
		name = russia_monarchist_events.99.b
		set_country_flag = RUS_had_first_election
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_pledge_of_democracy
				has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_kadets
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_vps
					has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_vpp
				}
			}
		}
		complete_national_focus = RUS_marlibs
		add_popularity = { ideology = market_liberal popularity = 0.15 }
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = market_liberal
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_anton_kartashyov_sic
		RUS_increase_democracy = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_monarchist_events.99 option russia_monarchist_events.99.c"
		name = russia_monarchist_events.99.c
		set_country_flag = RUS_had_first_election
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_VPS_formed
				has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_vps
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_vpp
					has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_kadets
				}
			}
		}
		complete_national_focus = RUS_authdems
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = authoritarian_democrat
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_vasily_shulgin_sic
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_conservative }
		add_to_coalition = yes
	}
}

### SocRus Events ###

country_event = { #Law on Workers' Representation (through DemRus)
	id = russia_socialist_events.1
	title = russia_socialist_events.1.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_levitsky

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.1 option russia_socialist_events.1.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.1.a
		add_stability = 0.2
		add_political_power = 150
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = syndicalist
			elections_allowed = yes
		}
		promote_character = {
			character = RUS_vladimir_levitsky
			ideology = syndicalist_subtype
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_daniil_sulimov_sic
		add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = 0.15 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = 0.1 }
		complete_national_focus = RUS_revolution_from_above
		RUS_initialise_socrus = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Reunification of the Socialist-Revolutionaries
	id = russia_socialist_events.3
	title = russia_socialist_events.3.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.3.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_leftsrs

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.3 option russia_socialist_events.3.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.3.a
		effect_tooltip = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = radical_socialist
				long_name = RUS_SR_unified_party2_long_tt
				name = RUS_SR_unified_party2
			}
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = social_liberal
				long_name = RUS_SR_unified_party2_long_tt
				name = RUS_SR_unified_party2
			}
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = 0.05 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = -0.05 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = national_populist popularity = -0.05 }
		hidden_effect = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = radical_socialist
				long_name = RUS_SR_unified_party2_long
				name = RUS_SR_unified_party2
			}
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = social_liberal
				long_name = RUS_SR_unified_party2_long
				name = RUS_SR_unified_party2
			}
		}
	}
}
