country_event = { #Bolsheviks in the Officer Corps
	id = russia_socialist_events.32
	title = russia_socialist_events.32.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.32.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_frunze
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.32 option russia_socialist_events.32.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.32.a #Keep them away from important posts
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
			RUS_RKP_relation = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_SDS_relation = yes
		}
		add_stability = 0.05
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.32 option russia_socialist_events.32.b"
		name = russia_socialist_events.32.b #Promote some
		RUS_fix_army_soc = yes
		add_political_power = -40
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.32 option russia_socialist_events.32.c"
		name = russia_socialist_events.32.c #They have proved capable
		RUS_fix_army_soc = yes
		add_popularity = { ideology = totalist popularity = 0.1 }
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST = yes }
			RUS_decrease_VST_centre_unity = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_RKP_relation = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
			RUS_PSR_relation = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #The Krasnaya Gorka Case
	id = russia_socialist_events.33
	title = russia_socialist_events.33.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.33.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_stalin
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { has_character = RUS_iosif_stalin }

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.33 option russia_socialist_events.33.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.33.a #It would be a shame if something happened to him
		add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = 0.04 }
		add_political_power = -20
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST = yes }
			add_command_power = -15
			add_political_power = -30
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_PSR_relation = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
			RUS_RKP_relation = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = -2 }
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = -3 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_remove_stalin
		hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.34 days = 40 } }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.33 option russia_socialist_events.33.b"
		name = russia_socialist_events.33.b #Off to Siberia with him
		add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = 0.02 }
		add_political_power = -15
		retire_character = RUS_iosif_stalin
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_PSR_relation = yes
			RUS_SDS_relation = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
			RUS_RKP_relation = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = -1 }
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 1 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.33 option russia_socialist_events.33.c"
		name = russia_socialist_events.33.c #He is right, though
		add_political_power = -10
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -3 }
			RUS_PSR_relation = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_RKP_relation = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = 3 }
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 3 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
		}
	}
}

	title = russia_socialist_events.34.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.34.d

			RUS_RKP_relation = yes
		}

country_event = { #The Great Bolshevik Trial #fired by focus
	id = russia_socialist_events.35
	title = russia_socialist_events.35.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.35.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_trial_2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_invite_sverdlov }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.35 option russia_socialist_events.35.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.35.a
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_maximalist = no }
			add_popularity = { ideology = totalist popularity = -0.05 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_character = RUS_yakov_sverdlov }
			retire_character = RUS_yakov_sverdlov
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_character = RUS_mikhail_frunze
				RUS_mikhail_frunze = { is_army_chief = no }
			}
			retire_character = RUS_mikhail_frunze
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_character = RUS_grigory_zinovyev
				OR = {
					RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
					RUS_is_maximalist = yes
				}
			}
			retire_character = RUS_grigory_zinovyev
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_character = RUS_iosif_stalin
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_remove_stalin }
			}
			retire_character = RUS_iosif_stalin
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_purged_bolsheviks
	}
}

country_event = { #The Green Partisans
	id = russia_socialist_events.37
	title = russia_socialist_events.37.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.37.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_protest
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.37 option russia_socialist_events.37.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.37.a
		add_political_power = -25
		if = {
			limit = { is_ai = no }
			add_ideas = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_3
		}
		else = {
			add_ideas = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_1
		}
		country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.38 days = 25 }
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_PSR_relation = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = -1 }
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 1 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 2 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.37 option russia_socialist_events.37.b"
		name = russia_socialist_events.37.b
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		add_command_power = -50
		if = {
			limit = { is_ai = no }
			add_ideas = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_2
		}
		else = {
			add_ideas = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_1
		}
		country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.44 days = 25 }
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_RKP_relation = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 3 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Murder of Comrade Jurenko
	id = russia_socialist_events.39
	title = russia_socialist_events.39.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.39.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_gronsky2
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.39 option russia_socialist_events.39.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.39.a #Accept Gronsky's proposal
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					RUS_VST = yes
					RUS_is_maximalist = yes
				}
			}
			add_political_power = -20
			add_command_power = -50
		}
		else = {
			add_political_power = 30
		}
		country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.44 days = 14 }
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 5 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = 4 }
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = -2 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.39 option russia_socialist_events.39.b"
		name = russia_socialist_events.39.b #This was an unavoidable tragedy
		trigger = { RUS_VST_left = no }
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.40 days = 7 }
		}
		RUS_increase_VST_left_radicalism = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 2 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 4 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Revolt in the Duma
	id = russia_socialist_events.40
	title = russia_socialist_events.40.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.40.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_zinovyev
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_socialist_government = yes
		RUS_VST_left = no
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.40 option russia_socialist_events.40.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.40.a #We have no choice but agree
		country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.44 days = 14 }
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST = yes }
			RUS_decrease_VST_centre_unity = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 5 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = 2 }
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = -1 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.40 option russia_socialist_events.40.b"
		name = russia_socialist_events.40.b #Let him shout
		add_stability = -0.05
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -10 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
			RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 3 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = -2 }
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 3 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.41 days = 7 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #The General Strike
	id = russia_socialist_events.41
	title = russia_socialist_events.41.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.41.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_strike
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.41 option russia_socialist_events.41.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.41.a #Implement their anti-peasant policy
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_soc_strike
			days = 14
		}
		add_command_power = -50
		RUS_decrease_VST_left_radicalism = yes
		country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.44 days = 14 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.41 option russia_socialist_events.41.b"
		name = russia_socialist_events.41.b #Just wait it out
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_soc_strike
			days = 70
		}
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -10 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
			RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = -2 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 3 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.41 option russia_socialist_events.41.c"
		name = russia_socialist_events.41.c #They must listen to reason
		trigger = { RUS_VST_centre = yes }
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_soc_strike
			days = 7
		}
		add_political_power = -100
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 2 }
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
		RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.42 days = 7 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.41 option russia_socialist_events.41.e"
		name = russia_socialist_events.41.e #Call an emergency meeting of the cabinet
		trigger = { has_government = radical_socialist }
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_soc_strike
			days = 7
		}
		country_event = russia_socialist_events.43
	}
}

country_event = { #Emergency Meeting
	id = russia_socialist_events.43
	title = russia_socialist_events.43.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.43.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_conference1
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { has_government = radical_socialist }

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.43 option russia_socialist_events.43.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.43.a #Call Levitsky to the next meeting
		ai_chance = { base = 10 }
		add_political_power = -50
		add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = -0.1 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = 0.05 }
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 1 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = -1 }
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = -1 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.43 option russia_socialist_events.43.b"
		name = russia_socialist_events.43.b #Prepare to remove Zinovyev
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_2
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_3
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_4
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_5
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_6
				}
			}
		}
		retire_character = RUS_grigory_zinovyev
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			add_popularity = { ideology = totalist popularity = 0.1 }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = -5 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
			add_popularity = { ideology = totalist popularity = 0.05 }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = 1 }
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 2 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
		}
		RUS_increase_antisoc_resistance = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Fighting in the Countryside
	id = russia_socialist_events.44
	title = russia_socialist_events.44.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.44.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_riot1
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.44 option russia_socialist_events.44.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.44.a
		RUS_increase_antisoc_resistance = yes
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_PLSR = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -10 }
		}
		else = { set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -5 } }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.45 days = 45 random_days = 15 } #Vozhd i Svoboda!
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Vozhd i Svoboda!

		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Villagers Flock to Matroshka
	id = russia_socialist_events.46
	title = russia_socialist_events.46.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.46.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_Spiridonova
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.46 option russia_socialist_events.46.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.46.a #SRs must stand by the peasants
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = radical_socialist }
			add_political_power = -45
			if = {
				limit = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
				set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 3 }
				RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
				set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 3 }
				RUS_add_faith = yes
			}
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
			RUS_PSR_relation = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.47 days = 7 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.46 option russia_socialist_events.46.b"
		name = russia_socialist_events.46.b #Building socialism is a greater goal
		trigger = { has_government = radical_socialist }
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = -3 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = -5 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.48 days = 45 }
		}
	}
}

			}
		}

country_event = { #Re-Education Labour Administration
	id = russia_socialist_events.51
	title = russia_socialist_events.51.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.51.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_industry
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.51 option russia_socialist_events.51.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.51.a #Bare minimum
		trigger = { NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_reject_state_terror } }
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -3 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		add_ideas = RUS_reeducation_camps
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 3 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = 4 }
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 2 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.51 option russia_socialist_events.51.b"
		name = russia_socialist_events.51.b #The ends justify the means
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_abramovich_ai
			}
		}
		trigger = { RUS_VST_right = no }
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -6 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		add_ideas = RUS_reeducation_camps_2
		RUS_decrease_antisoc_resistance = yes
		RUS_increase_VST_left_radicalism = yes
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
			RUS_SDS_relation = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 5 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = 5 }
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			add_political_power = 40
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.51 option russia_socialist_events.51.c"
		name = russia_socialist_events.51.c #No! Just arrest fewer people!
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_kamenev_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_zinovyev_ai
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_2
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_3
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_4
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_5
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_6
				}
			}
		}
		RUS_increase_antisoc_resistance = yes
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
			RUS_SDS_relation = yes
			RUS_PSR_relation = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = -3 }
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 5 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
	}
}

		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = -1 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = -3 }
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = -3 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.52 option russia_socialist_events.52.b"
		name = russia_socialist_events.52.b #It is their job to do our dirty work
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -2 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 4 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = 4 }
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			add_stability = 0.05
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = -3 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		else = {
			add_political_power = 40
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Abolition of Cavalry?
	id = russia_socialist_events.55
	title = russia_socialist_events.55.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.55.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_cossacks_1
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_character = RUS_mikhail_tukhachevsky
		any_country_division = {
			division_has_majority_template = cavalry
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.55 option russia_socialist_events.55.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.55.a
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.55 option russia_socialist_events.55.b"
		name = russia_socialist_events.55.b
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		every_country_division = {
			limit = { division_has_majority_template = cavalry }
			destroy_unit = yes
		}
		custom_override_tooltip = {
			tooltip = {
				localization_key = tooltip_create_division_template
				NAME = "Motopekhotnaya Diviziya"
				LINE_1 = { localization_key = line_battalion_tt NAME = motorized ICON = GFX_unit_motorized_icon_small COUNT = 8 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_template = "Motopekhotnaya Diviziya" }
				delete_unit_template_and_units = { division_template = "Motopekhotnaya Diviziya" disband = yes } #no cheating
			}
			division_template = {
				name = "Motopekhotnaya Diviziya" # Motorised Division
				division_names_group = RUS_MOT_01
				regiments = {
					motorized = { x = 0 y = 0 }
					motorized = { x = 0 y = 1 }
					motorized = { x = 0 y = 2 }
					motorized = { x = 0 y = 3 }
					motorized = { x = 1 y = 0 }
					motorized = { x = 1 y = 1 }
					motorized = { x = 1 y = 2 }
					motorized = { x = 1 y = 3 }
				}
			}
		}
		capital_scope = {
			custom_override_tooltip = {
				tooltip = {
					localization_key = tooltip_spawn_units
					COUNT = 2
					TYPE = "Motopekhotnaya Diviziya"
				}
				create_unit = {
					division = "division_template = \"Motopekhotnaya Diviziya\" start_experience_factor = 0.5"
					owner = ROOT
					count = 2
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #The People's Navy
	id = russia_socialist_events.56
	title = russia_socialist_events.56.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.56.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_navy
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.56 option russia_socialist_events.56.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.56.a
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_character = RUS_nikolay_kuznetsov } }
			show_unit_leaders_tooltip = RUS_nikolay_kuznetsov
			hidden_effect = {
				RUS_nikolay_kuznetsov = { set_nationality = ROOT }
			}
		}
		else = {
			RUS_nikolay_kuznetsov = { add_max_trait = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				amount_taken_ideas = {
					amount < 1
					slots = { navy_chief }
				}
			}
			activate_advisor = RUS_nikolay_kuznetsov_navy_chief
		}
		else = {
			navy_experience = 15
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Drafting the Operation Kutuzov
	id = russia_socialist_events.57
	title = russia_socialist_events.57.t
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				RUS_mikhail_frunze = { is_army_chief = yes }
				has_completed_focus = RUS_legacy_of_workers_army
				has_country_leader = { character = RUS_grigory_zinovyev }
			}
		}
		text = russia_socialist_events.57.d.tukha
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				RUS_mikhail_frunze = { is_army_chief = yes }
				has_completed_focus = RUS_legacy_of_workers_army
				has_country_leader = { character = RUS_grigory_zinovyev }
			}
		}
		text = russia_socialist_events.57.d.frunze
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army3
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.57 option russia_socialist_events.57.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.57.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				RUS_mikhail_frunze = { is_army_chief = yes }
				has_completed_focus = RUS_legacy_of_workers_army
				has_country_leader = { character = RUS_grigory_zinovyev }
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_speed_bonus
		set_country_flag = RUS_BLR_bonus
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_upon_taking_war_focus_tt
		effect_tooltip = {
			add_ideas = RUS_BLR_shock_plan
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.57 option russia_socialist_events.57.b"
		name = russia_socialist_events.57.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				RUS_mikhail_frunze = { is_army_chief = yes }
				has_completed_focus = RUS_legacy_of_workers_army
				has_country_leader = { character = RUS_grigory_zinovyev }
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_speed_bonus
		set_country_flag = RUS_UKR_bonus
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_upon_taking_war_focus_tt
		effect_tooltip = {
			add_ideas = RUS_UKR_shock_plan
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.57 option russia_socialist_events.57.c"
		name = russia_socialist_events.57.c
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				RUS_mikhail_frunze = { is_army_chief = yes }
				has_completed_focus = RUS_legacy_of_workers_army
				has_country_leader = { character = RUS_grigory_zinovyev }
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_long_war
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_upon_taking_war_focus_tt
		effect_tooltip = {
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_long_war
				days = 1095
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Radicalisation of the Militsya
	id = russia_socialist_events.59
	title = russia_socialist_events.59.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.59.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army3
	trigger = { RUS_has_antisoc_resistance = yes }

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.59 option russia_socialist_events.59.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.59.a
		RUS_decrease_VST_left_radicalism = yes
		add_political_power = -30
		add_stability = 0.05
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.59 option russia_socialist_events.59.b"
		name = russia_socialist_events.59.b
		RUS_increase_VST_left_radicalism = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					RUS_VST = yes
					RUS_is_maximalist = yes
				}
			}
			add_stability = -0.025
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = totalist popularity = 0.05 }
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 1 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = -4 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
			add_political_power = 50
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = { RUS_VST_right = no }
				set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
				RUS_RKP_relation = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Towards Planned Economy
	id = russia_socialist_events.62
	title = russia_socialist_events.62.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.62.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_economic_policy

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.62 option russia_socialist_events.62.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.62.a
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST_centre = no }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_VST_centre_relation = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST_left = no }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST_right = no }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
			RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
		RUS_SDS_relation = yes
	}
}

	id = russia_socialist_events.63
	title = russia_socialist_events.63.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.63.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

		name = russia_socialist_events.63.a

			limit = { RUS_VST_right = no }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_SDS_relation = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST_left = no }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
			RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST_right = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
			RUS_VST_centre_relation = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Zeller Quits the Workers' Coalition
	id = russia_socialist_events.65
	title = russia_socialist_events.65.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.65.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_zeller
	trigger = {
		if = {
			limit = { is_ai = no }
			RUS_VST_left = yes
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.65 option russia_socialist_events.65.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.65.a
		add_stability = -0.05
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_democrat }
		remove_from_coalition = yes
		if = {
			limit = { is_in_coalition_with_social_liberal = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_liberal }
			remove_from_coalition = yes
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_SDS_left_coalition
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.65 option russia_socialist_events.65.b"
		name = russia_socialist_events.65.b
		add_political_power = -50
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = -0.05 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 2 }
		RUS_SDS_relation = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Fate of the Workers' Coalition?
	id = russia_socialist_events.69
	title = russia_socialist_events.69.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.69.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_leftsrs
	trigger = { is_ai = no }

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.69 option russia_socialist_events.69.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.69.a
		ai_chance = { base = 5 }
		add_political_power = -100
		add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = 0.1 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 4 }
		RUS_PSR_relation = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.69 option russia_socialist_events.69.b"
		name = russia_socialist_events.69.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				has_government = totalist
				NOT = { country_exists = GER }
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:radical_socialist }
		remove_from_coalition = yes
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST_left = no }
			add_stability = -0.3
			add_war_support = -0.3
		}
		else = {
			add_stability = -0.15
			add_war_support = -0.1
		}
		RUS_increase_antisoc_resistance = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #High Anti-Soc resistance event
	id = russia_socialist_events.75
	title = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				RUS_is_maximalist = yes
				RUS_VST_left = yes
			}
		}
		text = russia_socialist_events.75.t.evil
	}
	title = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				RUS_is_maximalist = yes
				RUS_VST_left = yes
			}
		}
		text = russia_socialist_events.75.t.idealist
	}
	desc = russia_socialist_events.75.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_protest
	trigger = {
		has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_6
		has_socialist_government = yes
		is_ai = yes
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.75 option russia_socialist_events.75.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.75.a
		add_manpower = -37800
		swap_ideas = {
			remove_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_6
			add_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_4
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = -5 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
			add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = -0.08 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST = yes RUS_VST_left = no }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -2 }
			RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -2 }
			RUS_PSR_relation = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -2 }
			RUS_SDS_relation = yes
			add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = -0.05 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.75 option russia_socialist_events.75.b"
		name = russia_socialist_events.75.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				RUS_is_maximalist = yes
				RUS_VST_left = yes
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		RUS_decrease_antisoc_resistance = yes
	}
}

		name = russia_socialist_events.80.a

			if = {
				limit = { has_country_leader_with_trait = RUS_protector_of_revolution }
				remove_country_leader_trait = RUS_protector_of_revolution
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_leader_with_trait = RUS_protector_of_revolution_2 }
				remove_country_leader_trait = RUS_protector_of_revolution_2
			}
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = syndicalist
			elections_allowed = yes
			last_election = "1935.12.17"
			election_frequency = 36
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_aleksandr_shlyapnikov = { set_nationality = ROOT }
			country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.81 days = 30 }
		}
	}
}

	id = russia_socialist_events.81

			}
		}

			base = 20

			}
		}

		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes

				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
			}
		}

			character = RUS_sergey_syrtsov
			activate = yes

				idea_token = RUS_sergey_syrtsov_sic

	id = russia_socialist_events.82

	desc = russia_socialist_events.82.d

	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_dan

		RUS_VST_left = no
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.82 option russia_socialist_events.82.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.82.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_VST_centre = yes
				RUS_fyodor_dan = { is_second_in_command = yes }
			}
			add_advisor_role = {
				character = RUS_rafail_abramovich
				activate = yes
				advisor = {
					slot = second_in_command
					idea_token = RUS_rafail_abramovich_sic
					desc = RUS_rafail_abramovich_leader_desc
					traits = { KR_dream_of_democracy KR_vst_right_abramovich }
					can_be_fired = no
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_dan_retire_tt
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST_right = yes }
			add_advisor_role = {
				character = RUS_vladimir_shatov
				activate = yes
				advisor = {
					slot = second_in_command
					idea_token = RUS_vladimir_shatov_sic
					desc = RUS_vladimir_shatov_advisor_desc
					traits = { KR_socialist_industrializer_sic KR_vst_centre_shatov }
					can_be_fired = no
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_VST_centre_relation = yes
		}
		retire_character = RUS_fyodor_dan
	}
}

country_event = { #Direction of the Revolutionary Struggle
	id = russia_socialist_events.103
	title = russia_socialist_events.103.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.103.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_BLR_sojm_meeting
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Spiridonovist side
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.103 option russia_socialist_events.103.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.103.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 667
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_ustinov_ai
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_maria_spiridonova = { unit_leader_event = russia_socialist_events.161 }
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_spiridonist_side
		custom_effect_tooltip = russia_socialist_events.103.a.tt
		set_variable = { RUS_faith = 0 }
		add_ideas = RUS_parliamentarian_faith_0
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.164 days = 80 } #Rise of the Maximalists
			country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.162 days = 100 } #Siberian Direction
			country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.165 days = 450 } #Tambov Project
			country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.166 days = 600 } #The Romantic Esers
			country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.173 days = 900 } #PSR Conference
		}
	}

	option = { #Maximalist side
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.103 option russia_socialist_events.103.b"
		name = russia_socialist_events.103.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 333
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_zdobnov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_kamkov_ai
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_aleksey_ustinov = { unit_leader_event = russia_socialist_events.141 }
			remove_trait = {
				character = RUS_andrey_kolegayev
				slot = political_advisor
				trait = KR_maximalist_kolegayev
			}
			remove_trait = {
				character = RUS_andrey_kolegayev
				slot = political_advisor
				trait = KR_peasant_populist_3
			}
			add_trait = {
				character = RUS_andrey_kolegayev
				slot = political_advisor
				trait = KR_peasant_populist
			}
			add_trait = {
				character = RUS_andrey_kolegayev
				slot = political_advisor
				trait = KR_maximalist_kolegayev
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_maximalist_side
		custom_effect_tooltip = russia_socialist_events.103.b.tt
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = THIS decision = RUS_pro_coalition_rhetoric }
		set_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion = 0 }
		add_ideas = RUS_maximalist_influence_0
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.106 days = 30 } #Declaration of Organic Socialism
			country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.133 days = 150 random_days = 100 } #Doctrine of Integral Socialism
			country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.127 days = 250 random_days = 10 } #Zdobnov assassination event chain
		}
	}
}

		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.104 option russia_socialist_events.104.c"
		name = russia_socialist_events.104.c
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.03
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = totalist
			popularity = -0.02
		}
		add_stability = -0.04
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		custom_effect_tooltip = available_political_advisor
		show_ideas_tooltip = RUS_sergey_kirov_advisor
		set_country_flag = RUS_hired_kirov
	}
	after = {
		hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.105 days = 2 } }
	}
}

country_event = { #Hidden event for incrementing Maximalist Influence every 60 days
	id = russia_socialist_events.107
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_promote_maximalist_news_outlets_flag
			has_country_flag = RUS_sway_peoples_militia_flag
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.107 option 1"
		country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.107 days = 59 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_promote_maximalist_news_outlets_flag }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 1 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
			RUS_change_maximalist_influence_spirit = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_sway_peoples_militia_flag }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 1 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
			RUS_change_maximalist_influence_spirit = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Democratic Bloc event chain: VST
	id = russia_socialist_events.108
	title = russia_socialist_events.108.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.108.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.108 option russia_socialist_events.108.a"
		trigger = {
			NOT = { RUS_nikolay_zdobnov = { is_hired_as_advisor = yes } }
		}
		name = russia_socialist_events.108.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = russia_socialist_events.108.a.tt
		set_country_flag = RUS_vst_right_agree
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.108 option russia_socialist_events.108.b"
		name = russia_socialist_events.108.b
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { RUS_nikolay_zdobnov = { is_hired_as_advisor = yes } }
			}
			random_list = {
				60 = {
					custom_effect_tooltip = russia_socialist_events.108.b.tt
					set_country_flag = RUS_levitsky_agree
					hidden_effect = { country_event = russia_socialist_events.113 }
				}
				40 = {
					set_country_flag = RUS_levitsky_disagree
					hidden_effect = { country_event = russia_socialist_events.113 }
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = russia_socialist_events.108.b.tt
			set_country_flag = RUS_levitsky_agree
			hidden_effect = { country_event = russia_socialist_events.113 }
		}
	}
	after = {
		hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.109 days = 1 } }
	}
}

	id = russia_socialist_events.109
	title = russia_socialist_events.109.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.109.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1

		set_country_flag = RUS_sds_agree
		custom_effect_tooltip = russia_socialist_events.109.a.tt

		add_to_coalition = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		custom_effect_tooltip = available_political_advisor
		show_ideas_tooltip = RUS_gergard_zeller_advisor
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_reforming_the_weapons_of_state } }
			custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
			custom_effect_tooltip = russia_socialist_events.109.a2.tt
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.109 option russia_socialist_events.109.b"

		add_popularity = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = 0.05
		}
	}

	}
}

			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
		}

		}
	}

	id = russia_socialist_events.129
	title = russia_socialist_events.129.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.129.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

		name = russia_socialist_events.129.a
		activate_mission = RUS_appointment_of_interior_ministry
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = THIS decision = RUS_fearmonger_in_congress }
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = THIS decision = RUS_pressure_kamkov }
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = THIS decision = RUS_reach_out_to_blyumkin }
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = THIS decision = RUS_convince_the_vst }
	}
}

country_event = { #Appointment of the Interior Minister
	id = russia_socialist_events.130
	title = russia_socialist_events.130.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.130.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_targeted_decision = { target = THIS decision = RUS_fearmonger_in_congress }
			remove_targeted_decision = { target = THIS decision = RUS_pressure_kamkov }
			remove_targeted_decision = { target = THIS decision = RUS_reach_out_to_blyumkin }
			remove_targeted_decision = { target = THIS decision = RUS_convince_the_vst }
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kolegayev

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.130 option russia_socialist_events.130.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.130.a
		country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.134 days = 14 random_days = 7 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_free_political_advisor_slot = yes
				NOT = { RUS_andrey_kolegayev = { is_hired_as_advisor = yes } }
			}
			activate_advisor = RUS_andrey_kolegayev_advisor
		}
		else = {
			add_political_power = 150
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_interior_var < 10 }
			}
			effect_tooltip = {
				add_stability = -0.02
				add_war_support = -0.02
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_interior_var > 9 }
				check_variable = { RUS_interior_var < 20 }
			}
			add_stability = 0.05
			add_war_support = 0.05
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_interior_var > 19 }
				check_variable = { RUS_interior_var < 30 }
			}
			add_stability = 0.05
			add_war_support = 0.05
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = totalist
				popularity = 0.05
			}
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 5 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_interior_var > 29 }
				check_variable = { RUS_interior_var < 40 }
			}
			add_stability = 0.05
			add_war_support = 0.05
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = totalist
				popularity = 0.05
			}
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 10 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = -5 }
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_interior_var > 39 }
				check_variable = { RUS_interior_var < 50 }
			}
			add_stability = 0.1
			add_war_support = 0.05
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = totalist
				popularity = 0.1
			}
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 10 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = -5 }
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_interior_var > 49 }
			}
			add_stability = 0.1
			add_war_support = 0.05
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = totalist
				popularity = 0.1
			}
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 10 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = -5 }
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_completed_focus = RUS_universal_labour_service
				}
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = RUS_dignity_of_labour
					add_idea = RUS_dignity_of_labour_2
				}
			}
			else = {
				set_country_flag = RUS_universal_labour_service_buff
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Blyukher Report Part 2
	id = russia_socialist_events.132
	title = russia_socialist_events.132.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
		text = russia_socialist_events.132.d.maximalist
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
		text = russia_socialist_events.132.d.spiridonist
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_VST = yes }
		text = russia_socialist_events.132.d.VST
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy2

	option = { #Levandovsky, Maximalists
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.132 option russia_socialist_events.132.a"
		trigger = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
		name = russia_socialist_events.132.a
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = totalist
			popularity = 0.07
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_mikhail_levandovsky_army_chief
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 5 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = 7 }
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
		}
	}
	option = { #Frunze, Maximalists
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.132 option russia_socialist_events.132.b"
		name = russia_socialist_events.132.b
		trigger = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = totalist
			popularity = 0.03
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_mikhail_frunze_army_chief
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 3 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = 5 }
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
		}
	}
	option = { #Tukhachevsky
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.132 option russia_socialist_events.132.c"
		name = russia_socialist_events.132.c
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_sablin_only }
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_mikhail_tukhachevsky_army_chief
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = -5 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		else = {
			add_war_support = 0.04
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
			RUS_PSR_relation = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_RKP_relation = yes
		}
	}
	option = { #Levandonsky, Spiridonovists + VST
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.132 option russia_socialist_events.132.a2"
		name = russia_socialist_events.132.a2
		trigger = {
			RUS_is_maximalist = no
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_sablin_only }
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_mikhail_levandovsky_army_chief
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_PLSR = yes }
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = totalist
				popularity = 0.08
			}
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = -5 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		else = {
			add_popularity = { ideology = totalist popularity = 0.025 }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_PSR_relation = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
			RUS_SDS_relation = yes
		}
	}
	option = { #Sablin
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.132 option russia_socialist_events.132.b2"
		name = russia_socialist_events.132.b2
		trigger = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 5 }
		RUS_add_faith = yes
	}
	option = { #Yegorov
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.132 option russia_socialist_events.132.e"
		name = russia_socialist_events.132.e
		trigger = { RUS_VST = yes }
		activate_advisor = RUS_aleksandr_yegorov_army_chief
		add_stability = 0.02
	}
	option = { #Frunze
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.132 option russia_socialist_events.132.f"
		name = russia_socialist_events.132.f
		trigger = {
			RUS_VST = yes
			has_character = RUS_mikhail_frunze
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_mikhail_frunze_army_chief
		add_popularity = { ideology = totalist popularity = 0.025 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 2 }
		RUS_RKP_relation = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
		RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -2 }
		RUS_PSR_relation = yes
	}
	option = { #Vasilevsky
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.132 option russia_socialist_events.132.g"
		name = russia_socialist_events.132.g
		trigger = {
			RUS_VST_right = yes
			has_character = RUS_aleksandr_vasilevsky
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_aleksandr_vasilevsky_army_chief
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = 0.025 }
		add_political_power = -40
	}
}

country_event = { #Maximalist-Kamkov suspicion event 1
	id = russia_socialist_events.136
	title = russia_socialist_events.136.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.136.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.136 option russia_socialist_events.136.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.136.a
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion > 10 } }
			add_stability = -0.03
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion > 19 }
				check_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion < 30 }
			}
			add_stability = -0.05
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = totalist
				popularity = -0.02
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion > 29 }
				check_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion < 40 }
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = totalist
				popularity = -0.1
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion > 39 }
				check_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion < 50 }
			}
			add_stability = -0.1
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = totalist
				popularity = -0.1
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Maximalist-Kamkov suspicion event 5
	id = russia_socialist_events.140
	title = russia_socialist_events.140.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.140.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		is_ai = no
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.140 option russia_socialist_events.140.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.140.a
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = totalist
			popularity = -0.15
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = totalist
				long_name = RUS_totalist2_party_long_tt
				name = RUS_totalist2_party
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_maximalist_failstate
		clr_country_flag = RUS_maximalist_side
		hidden_effect = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = totalist
				long_name = RUS_totalist2_party_long
				name = RUS_totalist2_party
			}
			remove_ideas = {
				RUS_maximalist_influence_0
				RUS_maximalist_influence_1
				RUS_maximalist_influence_2
				RUS_maximalist_influence_3
				RUS_maximalist_influence_4
				RUS_maximalist_influence_5
				RUS_maximalist_influence_6
				RUS_maximalist_influence_7
				RUS_maximalist_influence_8
				RUS_maximalist_influence_9
				RUS_maximalist_influence_10
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_aleksey_ustinov = { is_second_in_command = yes } }
			activate_advisor = RUS_boris_kamkov_sic
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = RUS_appointment_of_interior_ministry }
			hidden_effect = {
				remove_targeted_decision = { target = THIS decision = RUS_fearmonger_in_congress }
				remove_targeted_decision = { target = THIS decision = RUS_pressure_kamkov }
				remove_targeted_decision = { target = THIS decision = RUS_reach_out_to_blyumkin }
				remove_targeted_decision = { target = THIS decision = RUS_convince_the_vst }
				remove_mission = RUS_appointment_of_interior_ministry
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #The Question of the Cossacks
	id = russia_socialist_events.150
	title = russia_socialist_events.150.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.150.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		original_tag = RUS
		has_socialist_government = yes
		is_subject = no
		date > 1938.10.1
		has_completed_focus = RUS_russian_congress
	}
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.152 days = 90 random_days = 20 } #Pavlov's Rebellion
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_cossacks_2
	option = { #We cannot trust the cossack
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.150 option russia_socialist_events.150.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.150.a
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
			RUS_VST_centre_relation = yes
			RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		}
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = 4 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_flavour_events.154 days = 720 }
		}
	}
	option = { #They can change, like all of russia
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.150 option russia_socialist_events.150.b"
		name = russia_socialist_events.150.b
		trigger = {
			RUS_VST_left = no
			RUS_is_maximalist = no
		}
		add_political_power = -40
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -4 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		add_stability = 0.05
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 2 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.151 days = 180 } #1st People's Cossack Cavalry Corps
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Don Cossacks Declare Independence
	id = russia_socialist_events.152
	title = russia_socialist_events.152.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.152.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_socialist_government = yes
		NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
		controls_state = 218 #Rostov
	}
	immediate = {
		set_country_flag = RUS_pavlov_rebellion_flag
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_cossacks_2

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.152 option russia_socialist_events.152.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.152.a
		ai_chance = { base = 10 }
		set_variable = { RUS_pavlov_unrest = 1 }
		add_command_power = -100
		army_experience = -15
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_pavlov_instruction
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_pavlov_rebellion
			days = 365
		}
		RUS_increase_antisoc_resistance = yes
		RUS_don_resistance = yes
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = -3 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.152 option russia_socialist_events.152.b"
		name = russia_socialist_events.152.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_2
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_3
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_4
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_5
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_6
				}
			}
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_pavlov_unrest = 2 }
		add_command_power = -50
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_pavlov_power
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_pavlov_instruction
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_pavlov_rebellion
			days = 365
		}
		RUS_increase_antisoc_resistance = yes
		RUS_don_resistance = yes
	}
	after = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.153 days = 14 }
			country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.195 days = 30 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #The Rebellion Spreads to Kuban
	id = russia_socialist_events.153
	title = russia_socialist_events.153.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.153.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_socialist_government = yes
		NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
		controls_state = 234 #Ekaterinodar
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_cavalry

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.153 option russia_socialist_events.153.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.153.a
		add_to_variable = { RUS_pavlov_unrest = 2 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_pavlov_power
		add_manpower = -13500
		RUS_kuban_resistance = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.157 days = 30 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.153 option russia_socialist_events.153.b"
		name = russia_socialist_events.153.b
		add_to_variable = { RUS_pavlov_unrest = 1 }
		add_manpower = -43200
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -4 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = -4 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		RUS_decrease_antisoc_resistance = yes
		RUS_kuban_resistance = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.157 days = 30 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.153 option russia_socialist_events.153.c"
		name = russia_socialist_events.153.c
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_future_for_the_rural_regions
				has_completed_focus = RUS_healthcare_reform
				has_completed_focus = RUS_countryside_concession
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_available_because_ruralism_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_pavlov_power_decrease
		add_to_variable = { RUS_pavlov_unrest = -1 }
		add_political_power = -50
		RUS_kuban_resistance = yes
		country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.155 days = 30 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Pavlov's Rebellion Crushed
	id = russia_socialist_events.154
	title = russia_socialist_events.154.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.154.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_socialist_government = yes
		NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_cossacks_3

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.154 option russia_socialist_events.154.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.154.a
		add_popularity = { ideology = totalist popularity = 0.05 }
		add_manpower = -65700
		remove_ideas = RUS_pavlov_rebellion
		RUS_decrease_antisoc_resistance = yes
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = -3 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		### Possible add other path-specific variables
		clr_country_flag = RUS_pavlov_rebellion_flag
		set_variable = { RUS_pavlov_unrest = 1 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Pavlov's Rebellion Dies Down
	id = russia_socialist_events.155
	title = russia_socialist_events.155.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.155.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_socialist_government = yes
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_cossacks_3

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.155 option russia_socialist_events.155.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.155.a
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = 3 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		remove_ideas = RUS_pavlov_rebellion
		RUS_decrease_antisoc_resistance = yes
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = -4 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_pavlov_rebellion_flag
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_pavlov_rebels } }
			add_resistance = -40
		}
		hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.158 days = 30 } }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.155 option russia_socialist_events.155.b"
		name = russia_socialist_events.155.b
		add_stability = 0.03
		remove_ideas = RUS_pavlov_rebellion
		RUS_decrease_antisoc_resistance = yes
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 3 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_in_coalition_with_social_democrat = yes
					RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
				}
			}
			add_political_power = 50
		}
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -5 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		clr_country_flag = RUS_pavlov_rebellion_flag
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_pavlov_rebels } }
			add_resistance = -20
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #The Caspian Hosts
	id = russia_socialist_events.157
	title = russia_socialist_events.157.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.157.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_socialist_government = yes
		NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
		controls_state = 236 #Astrakhan
		has_idea = RUS_pavlov_rebellion
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_cossacks_3

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.157 option russia_socialist_events.157.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.157.a
		add_to_variable = { RUS_pavlov_unrest = 2 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_pavlov_power
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 1 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		RUS_caspian_resistance = yes
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { RUS_pavlov_unrest < 4 } }
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.155 days = 30 } }
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.158 days = 30 } }
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.157 option russia_socialist_events.157.b"
		name = russia_socialist_events.157.b
		add_to_variable = { RUS_pavlov_unrest = 1 }
		army_experience = -20
		add_war_support = 0.05
		RUS_caspian_resistance = yes
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { RUS_pavlov_unrest < 4 } }
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.154 days = 30 } }
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.158 days = 30 } }
		}
	}
}

			limit = { check_variable = { RUS_pavlov_unrest < 4 } }

		}
	}

country_event = { #The Pavlovites join Free Russian Army
	id = russia_socialist_events.159
	title = russia_socialist_events.159.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { tag = RUS }
		text = russia_socialist_events.159.d.rus
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { NOT = { tag = RUS } }
		text = russia_socialist_events.159.d.rsa
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RSA = { exists = yes }
		has_war = yes
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_boldyrev
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.159 option russia_socialist_events.159.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.159.a
		trigger = { tag = RUS }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_pavlovite_effect = RUS_pavlov_unrest }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_pavlov_instruction_outcome
		divide_temp_variable = { RUS_pavlovite_effect = -50 }
		add_stability = RUS_pavlovite_effect
		multiply_temp_variable = { RUS_pavlovite_effect = 101165 }
		add_manpower = RUS_pavlovite_effect
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.159 option russia_socialist_events.159.b"
		name = russia_socialist_events.159.b
		trigger = { tag = RSA }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_pavlov_instruction_outcome_RSA
		set_temp_variable = { RSA_pavlovite_effect = RUS.RUS_pavlov_unrest }
		custom_override_tooltip = {
			tooltip = {
				localization_key = tooltip_create_division_template
				NAME = "Svobodny Kazachya diviziya"
				LINE_1 = { localization_key = line_battalion_tt NAME = cavalry ICON = GFX_unit_cavalry_icon_small COUNT = 6 }
				SUPPORT_1 = { localization_key = support_battalion_tt NAME = recon ICON = GFX_unit_recon_icon_small }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_template = "Svobodny Kazachya diviziya" }
				delete_unit_template_and_units = { division_template = "Svobodny Kazachya diviziya" disband = yes } #no cheating
			}
			division_template = {
				name = "Svobodny Kazachya diviziya"
				division_names_group = RUS_CAV_02
				regiments = {
					cavalry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
					cavalry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
					cavalry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
					cavalry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
					cavalry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
					cavalry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
				}
				support = {
					recon = { x = 0 y = 0 }
				}
			}
		}
		random_owned_controlled_state = {
			prioritize = { 64 } #Berlin
			limit = { valid_state_for_spawning_friendly_unit = yes }
			custom_override_tooltip = {
				tooltip = {
					localization_key = tooltip_spawn_units
					COUNT = "[?RSA_pavlovite_effect]"
					TYPE = "Svobodny Kazachya diviziya"
				}
				create_unit = {
					division = "division_template = \"Svobodny Kazachya diviziya\" start_experience_factor = 0.2"
					owner = ROOT
					count = RSA_pavlovite_effect
				}
			}
		}
		multiply_temp_variable = { RSA_pavlovite_effect = 10 }
		add_political_power = RSA_pavlovite_effect
		multiply_temp_variable = { RSA_pavlovite_effect = 1137 }
		add_manpower = RSA_pavlovite_effect
		hidden_effect = { RUS = { country_event = russia_socialist_events.159 } }
	}
}

country_event = { #The Tambov Experiment
	id = russia_socialist_events.165
	title = russia_socialist_events.165.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.165.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_mechanized_farms

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.165 option russia_socialist_events.165.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.165.a
		activate_mission = RUS_complete_the_tambov_experiment
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = THIS decision = RUS_devolution_of_authority }
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = THIS decision = RUS_incentivise_creation_of_rural_enterprises }
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = THIS decision = RUS_modernisation_of_agricultural_communes }
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = THIS decision = RUS_mordva_autonomies }
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = THIS decision = RUS_peoples_militia_reform }
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		custom_effect_tooltip = russia_socialist_events.165.a.tt
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_ai = no
			}
			add_to_variable = { RUS_tambov_experiment_cost_var = 60 }
		}
		else = {
			add_to_variable = { RUS_tambov_experiment_cost_var = 40 }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.184 days = 80 random_days = 60 }
			country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.197 days = 155 }
		}
	}
}

					has_country_flag = RUS_siberian_direction_complete

			has_country_flag = RUS_completed_incentivise_creation_of_rural_enterprises
			has_country_flag = RUS_completed_modernisation_of_agricultural_communes

			has_country_flag = RUS_completed_peoples_militia_reform
			RUS_isaak_steinberg = { has_trait = KR_head_of_the_romanticists }
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_kamkov_victory
		custom_effect_tooltip = russia_socialist_events.167.b.tt
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.185 days = 20 random_days = 20 }
		}
	}

country_event = { #Towards the Future
	id = russia_socialist_events.168
	title = russia_socialist_events.168.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_zdobnov_victory }
		text = russia_socialist_events.168.d
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_kamkov_victory }
		text = russia_socialist_events.168.d2
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kremlin2

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.168 option russia_socialist_events.168.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.168.a
		retire_character = RUS_maria_spiridonova
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_zdobnov_victory
			}
			promote_character = {
				character = RUS_nikolay_zdobnov
				ideology = radical_socialist_subtype
			}
		}
		else = {
			promote_character = {
				character = RUS_boris_kamkov
				ideology = radical_socialist_subtype
			}
			activate_advisor = RUS_isaak_steinberg_sic
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #New Parties

	title = russia_socialist_events.170.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.170.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kadets

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.170 option russia_socialist_events.170.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.170.a
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = social_conservative
			long_name = RUS_social_conservative3_party_long
			name = RUS_social_conservative3_party
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = market_liberal
			long_name = RUS_market_liberal3_party_long
			name = RUS_market_liberal3_party
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Hidden event for incrementing Faith every 75 days
	id = russia_socialist_events.172
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	trigger = {
		check_variable = { RUS_faith < 100 }
		OR = {
			has_idea = RUS_democratic_bloc_3
			has_idea = RUS_democratic_bloc_4
			has_idea = RUS_democratic_bloc_5
			has_idea = RUS_democratic_bloc_6
			has_idea = RUS_democratic_bloc_9
			has_idea = RUS_democratic_bloc_10
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.172 option 1"
		country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.172 days = 75 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 1 }
		RUS_add_faith = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #PSR Conference hidden event to fire unit leader event
	id = russia_socialist_events.173
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.173 option 1"
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_siberian_direction_complete
						has_country_flag = RUS_completed_incentivise_creation_of_rural_enterprises
						has_country_flag = RUS_completed_modernisation_of_agricultural_communes
						has_country_flag = RUS_completed_mordva_autonomies
						has_country_flag = RUS_completed_peoples_militia_reform
						RUS_isaak_steinberg = { has_trait = KR_head_of_the_romanticists }
					}
				}
			}
			RUS_nikolay_zdobnov = {
				unit_leader_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.167 days = 1 } #PSR Conference
			}
		}
		else = {
			RUS_boris_kamkov = {
				unit_leader_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.167 days = 1 } #PSR Conference
			}
		}
	}
}

		}
		text = russia_socialist_events.179.d2
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
		text = russia_socialist_events.179.d3

	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_oleksandr_shumskyi

		UKR = {
			is_subject_of = RUS
			NOT = { has_country_leader = { character = UKR_vlas_chubar } }
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.179 option russia_socialist_events.179.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.179.a
		clr_country_flag = UKR_had_auth_govt
		clr_country_flag = UKR_had_dem_govt
	}
}

		}

		}
	}

country_event = { #Renaming of Cities
	id = russia_socialist_events.190
	title = russia_socialist_events.190.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.190.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_Latinization

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.190 option russia_socialist_events.190.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.190.a
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST = yes }
			217 = {
				set_global_flag = tsaritsyn_renamed_vst
				effect_tooltip = {
					set_state_name = VICTORY_POINTS_3529_MININGRAD
					set_province_name = { id = 3529 name = VICTORY_POINTS_3529_MININGRAD }
				}
				rename_state_effect = yes
			}
		}
		else = {
			217 = {
				set_global_flag = tsaritsyn_renamed
				effect_tooltip = {
					set_state_name = VICTORY_POINTS_3529_VOLGOGRAD
					set_province_name = { id = 3529 name = VICTORY_POINTS_3529_VOLGOGRAD }
				}
				rename_state_effect = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
			653 = {
				set_global_flag = ekaterinburg_renamed_maximalist
				effect_tooltip = {
					set_state_name = VICTORY_POINTS_1821_ZDOBNOVSK
					set_province_name = { id = 1821 name = VICTORY_POINTS_1821_ZDOBNOVSK }
				}
				rename_state_effect = yes
			}
		}
		else = {
			653 = {
				set_global_flag = ekaterinburg_renamed
				effect_tooltip = {
					set_state_name = VICTORY_POINTS_1821_CHERNOVSK
					set_province_name = { id = 1821 name = VICTORY_POINTS_1821_CHERNOVSK }
				}
				rename_state_effect = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST = yes }
			250 = {
				set_global_flag = simbirsk_renamed_vst
				effect_tooltip = {
					set_state_name = VICTORY_POINTS_392_ULYANOVSK
					set_province_name = { id = 392 name = VICTORY_POINTS_392_ULYANOVSK }
				}
			}
			rename_state_effect = yes
		}
		570 = {
			set_global_flag = novonikolayevsk_renamed
			effect_tooltip = {
				set_state_name = VICTORY_POINTS_7274_NOVOSIBIRSK
				set_province_name = { id = 7274 name = VICTORY_POINTS_7274_NOVOSIBIRSK }
			}
			rename_state_effect = yes
		}
		233 = {
			set_global_flag = vladikavkaz_renamed
			effect_tooltip = {
				set_state_name = VICTORY_POINTS_9628_DZAUDZHIKAU
				set_province_name = { id = 9628 name = VICTORY_POINTS_9628_DZAUDZHIKAU }
			}
			rename_state_effect = yes
		}
		961 = {
			set_global_flag = grozny_renamed
			custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
			effect_tooltip = {
				set_province_name = { id = 3672 name = VICTORY_POINTS_3672_SOLZHAGALA }
			}
			rename_state_effect = yes
		}
		232 = {
			set_global_flag = petrovsk_renamed
			custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
			effect_tooltip = {
				set_province_name = { id = 3668 name = VICTORY_POINTS_3668_ANZHIKALA }
			}
			rename_state_effect = yes
		}
		397 = {
			set_global_flag = ustsysolsk_renamed
			effect_tooltip = {
				set_state_name = VICTORY_POINTS_6121_SYKYTYVDIN
				set_province_name = { id = 6121 name = VICTORY_POINTS_6121_SYKYTYVDIN }
			}
			rename_state_effect = yes
		}
	}

country_event = { #Tambov Experiment Complete
	id = russia_socialist_events.193
	title = russia_socialist_events.193.t
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { RUS_tambov_var < 2 }
		}
		text = russia_socialist_events.193.d
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { RUS_tambov_var > 1 }
			check_variable = { RUS_tambov_var < 4 }
		}
		text = russia_socialist_events.193.d2
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { RUS_tambov_var = 4 }
		}
		text = russia_socialist_events.193.d3
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_land_reform

	option = { #bad
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.193 option russia_socialist_events.193.a"
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { RUS_tambov_var < 2 }
		}
		name = russia_socialist_events.193.a
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.1
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = -0.1
		}
	}
	option = { #mid
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.193 option russia_socialist_events.193.b"
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { RUS_tambov_var > 1 }
			check_variable = { RUS_tambov_var < 4 }
		}
		name = russia_socialist_events.193.b
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = -0.05
		}
	}
	option = { #good
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.193 option russia_socialist_events.193.c"
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { RUS_tambov_var = 4 }
		}
		name = russia_socialist_events.193.c
	}
}

country_event = { #PSR-Spiridonists AI - don't do Tambov Decisions by this point
	id = russia_socialist_events.197
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	trigger = {
		is_ai = yes
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.197 option 1"
		set_country_flag = RUS_no_tambov_decisions_ai
	}
}
