country_event = { #Elections to Constituent Assembly
	id = russia_socialist_events.300
	title = russia_socialist_events.300.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_government = radical_socialist }
		text = russia_socialist_events.300.d.radsoc
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_government = syndicalist }
		text = russia_socialist_events.300.d.syndie
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_soviet_congress
	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.301 days = 3 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.300 option russia_socialist_events.300.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.300.a
		if = {
			limit = { has_completed_focus = RUS_red_flag_over_kremlin }
			add_stability = 0.05
			add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = 0.08 }
			add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = 0.06 }
		}
		else = {
			add_stability = 0.15
			add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = 0.08 }
			add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = 0.06 }
			add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = 0.02 }
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = totalist popularity = 0.04 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Matter of the Parliament
	id = russia_socialist_events.301
	title = russia_socialist_events.301.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.301.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_soviet_congress
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			set_cosmetic_tag = RUS_soc
			country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.302 days = 3 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.301 option russia_socialist_events.301.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.301.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_zdobnov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_kamkov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_ustinov_ai
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_const_left_option_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = 0.02 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = totalist popularity = 0.01 }
		set_country_flag = RUS_const_left_option
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.301 option russia_socialist_events.301.b"
		name = russia_socialist_events.301.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_completed_focus = RUS_revolution_from_above
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_zdobnov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_kamkov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_ustinov_ai
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_const_centre_option_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = 0.02 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = 0.01 }
		set_country_flag = RUS_const_centre_option
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.301 option russia_socialist_events.301.c"
		name = russia_socialist_events.301.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 40
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_abramovich_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_levitsky_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_sulimov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_kamenev_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_zinovyev_ai
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_const_right_option_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = 0.02 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = 0.01 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = 0.01 }
		set_country_flag = RUS_const_right_option
	}
}

					has_country_flag = RUS_levitsky_ai

country_event = { #HoS Election
	id = russia_socialist_events.303
	title = russia_socialist_events.303.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.303.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_soviet_congress
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #SRs
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.303 option russia_socialist_events.303.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.303.a
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					has_completed_focus = RUS_red_flag_over_kremlin
					has_country_flag = RUS_const_centre_option
				}
				has_country_flag = RUS_const_right_option
			}
			NOT = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_revolution_from_above
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_abramovich_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_levitsky_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_sulimov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_kamenev_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_zinovyev_ai
				}
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = 0.06
		}
		complete_national_focus = RUS_radsocs
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = radical_socialist
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 48
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = totalist
				long_name = RUS_totalist3_party_long
				name = RUS_totalist3_party
			}
			RUS_aleksey_ustinov = { promote_character = { ideology = totalist_subtype } }
			set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:syndicalist }
			add_to_coalition = yes
		}
	}

	option = { #VST
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.303 option russia_socialist_events.303.b"
		name = russia_socialist_events.303.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_revolution_from_above
				has_country_flag = RUS_const_left_option
				has_country_flag = RUS_const_centre_option
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_zdobnov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_kamkov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_ustinov_ai
				}
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.06
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_government = syndicalist } }
			meta_effect = {
				text = {
					set_politics = {
						ruling_party = syndicalist
						last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
						election_frequency = 48
						elections_allowed = yes
					}
				}
				CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
			}
		}
		unlock_decision_category_tooltip = RUS_socrus_coalition_mechanic_decisions
		set_variable = { var = vst_centre_unity value = 6 }
		set_variable = { var = sr_var value = 3 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_const_centre_option }
			add_to_variable = { var = sr_var value = 1 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_const_right_option }
			add_to_variable = { var = sr_var value = 2 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_const_parliamentarian }
			add_to_variable = { var = sr_var value = 1 }
		}
		set_variable = { var = sds_var value = 2 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_const_right_option }
			add_to_variable = { var = sds_var value = 1 }
		}
		set_variable = { var = rkp_var value = 2 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_const_left_option }
			add_to_variable = { var = rkp_var value = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_const_executive }
			add_to_variable = { var = rkp_var value = 1 }
		}
		set_variable = { var = vst_left_var value = 2 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_const_left_option }
			add_to_variable = { var = vst_left_var value = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_const_executive }
			add_to_variable = { var = vst_left_var value = 1 }
		}
		set_variable = { var = vst_centre_var value = 5 }
		set_variable = { var = vst_right_var value = 3 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_const_right_option }
			add_to_variable = { var = vst_right_var value = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_const_parliamentarian }
			add_to_variable = { var = vst_right_var value = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_completed_focus = RUS_revolution_from_above }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_sulimov_buff_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_VST_improve_all_relation_tt
			add_to_variable = { var = vst_right_var value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { var = vst_left_var value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { var = vst_centre_unity value = 1 }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:radical_socialist }
			add_to_coalition = yes
			set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:totalist }
			add_to_coalition = yes
			country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.304 days = 2 }
			country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.11 days = 180 random_days = 180 } #One Class, Two Parties
		}
	}
	after = {
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { is_ai = yes }
				add_political_power = 150
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Choice of Syndie Sub-Path
	id = russia_socialist_events.304
	title = russia_socialist_events.304.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.304.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_levitsky
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.320 days = 100 random_days = 100 } #Uglanov's Resignation
			country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.305 days = 300 } #VST Congress
		}
	}

	option = { #Mensheviks
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.304 option russia_socialist_events.304.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.304.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_sulimov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_levitsky_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_kamenev_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_zinovyev_ai
				}
			}
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_fyodor_dan_sic
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 2 }
		RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
		RUS_SDS_relation = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
		RUS_RKP_relation = yes
		add_ideas = RUS_vst_party_unity_idea
		RUS_VST_party_check = yes
	}

	option = { #Centre
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.304 option russia_socialist_events.304.b"
		name = russia_socialist_events.304.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_abramovich_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_kamenev_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_zinovyev_ai
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_daniil_sulimov = { is_second_in_command = no }
			}
			activate_advisor = RUS_daniil_sulimov_sic
			custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		}
		RUS_increase_VST_centre_unity = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
		RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
		RUS_SDS_relation = yes
		RUS_RKP_relation = yes
		add_ideas = RUS_vst_party_unity_idea
		RUS_VST_party_check = yes
	}

	option = { #Left
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.304 option russia_socialist_events.304.c"
		name = russia_socialist_events.304.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_abramovich_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_sulimov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_levitsky_ai
				}
			}
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_lev_kamenev_sic
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 2 }
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
		RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
		RUS_RKP_relation = yes
		RUS_SDS_relation = yes
		add_ideas = RUS_vst_party_unity_idea
		RUS_VST_party_check = yes
	}
}

country_event = { # Annual Congress of VST
	id = russia_socialist_events.305
	title = russia_socialist_events.305.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_war_with = GER }
		text = russia_socialist_events.305.d.war
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_idea = RUS_vst_party_unity_idea #normal
				AND = { #what if somehow you don't fulfil any of the descs listed here? if so, use 305.d.stable - attempt at fixing issue #9347
					NOT = {
						has_war_with = GER
						has_idea = RUS_vst_party_unity_idea
						AND = {
							has_idea = RUS_vst_party_factionalism_idea
							check_variable = { vst_centre_unity > 3 }
						}
						has_idea = RUS_vst_party_streamlined_idea
						AND = {
							has_country_leader = { character = RUS_vladimir_levitsky }
							has_idea = RUS_vst_party_factionalism_idea
							OR = {
								RUS_lev_kamenev = { is_second_in_command = yes }
								RUS_daniil_sulimov = { is_second_in_command = yes }
							}
							check_variable = { vst_centre_unity < 4 }
							NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_VST_left_revolt }
						}
						AND = {
							has_country_leader = { character = RUS_vladimir_levitsky }
							has_idea = RUS_vst_party_factionalism_idea
							RUS_fyodor_dan = { is_second_in_command = yes }
							check_variable = { vst_centre_unity < 4 }
							NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_VST_right_revolt }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		text = russia_socialist_events.305.d.stable
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_idea = RUS_vst_party_factionalism_idea
			check_variable = { vst_centre_unity > 3 }
		}
		text = russia_socialist_events.305.d.factionalism
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_idea = RUS_vst_party_streamlined_idea }
		text = russia_socialist_events.305.d.streamlined
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_leader = { character = RUS_vladimir_levitsky }
			has_idea = RUS_vst_party_factionalism_idea
			OR = {
				RUS_lev_kamenev = { is_second_in_command = yes }
				RUS_daniil_sulimov = { is_second_in_command = yes }
			}
			check_variable = { vst_centre_unity < 4 }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_VST_left_revolt }
		}
		text = russia_socialist_events.305.d.kamenev
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_leader = { character = RUS_vladimir_levitsky }
			has_idea = RUS_vst_party_factionalism_idea
			RUS_fyodor_dan = { is_second_in_command = yes }
			check_variable = { vst_centre_unity < 4 }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_VST_right_revolt }
		}
		text = russia_socialist_events.305.d.abramovich
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_soviet_congress
	immediate = {
		RUS_VST_party_check = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.305 days = 365 }
		}
	}

	option = { #United front
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.305 option russia_socialist_events.305.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.305.a
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_war_with = GER
				has_idea = RUS_vst_party_streamlined_idea
				has_idea = RUS_vst_party_unity_idea
				is_ai = yes
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_levitsky_ai
					has_country_leader = { character = RUS_daniil_sulimov }
					has_country_leader = { character = RUS_rafail_abramovich }
					has_country_leader = { character = RUS_lev_kamenev }
					has_country_leader = { character = RUS_grigory_zinovyev }
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_leader = { character = RUS_vladimir_levitsky } }
			RUS_increase_VST_centre_unity = yes
			add_political_power = 80
			add_stability = 0.04
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST_centre = yes }
			RUS_increase_VST_centre_unity = yes
			add_political_power = 40
			add_stability = 0.04
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					RUS_VST_right = yes
					RUS_VST_left = yes
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_VST_centre_relation = yes
			add_political_power = 40
			add_stability = 0.04
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_war_with = GER }
			add_war_support = 0.05
		}
	}

	option = { #It descends into factionalist debate
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.305 option russia_socialist_events.305.b"
		name = russia_socialist_events.305.b
		trigger = {
			has_idea = RUS_vst_party_factionalism_idea
			if = {
				limit = { RUS_VST_centre = yes }
				check_variable = { vst_centre_unity > 3 }
			}
			else = {
				check_variable = { vst_centre_var < 4 }
			}
			NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_leader = { character = RUS_vladimir_levitsky }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_levitsky_ai }
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -5 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
		RUS_VST_centre_relation = yes
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
	}

	option = { #Try to maintain peace!
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.305 option russia_socialist_events.305.c"
		name = russia_socialist_events.305.c
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
			has_idea = RUS_vst_party_factionalism_idea
			if = {
				limit = { RUS_VST_centre = yes }
				check_variable = { vst_centre_unity > 3 }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_leader = { character = RUS_vladimir_levitsky }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_levitsky_ai }
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -75
	}

	option = { #Levitsky gets the boot, Abramovich takes over
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.305 option russia_socialist_events.305.e"
		name = russia_socialist_events.305.e
		trigger = {
			if = {
				limit = { is_ai = no }
				has_country_leader = { character = RUS_vladimir_levitsky }
				has_idea = RUS_vst_party_factionalism_idea
				RUS_fyodor_dan = { is_second_in_command = yes }
				check_variable = { vst_centre_unity < 4 }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_VST_right_revolt }
			}
			else = {
				has_country_leader = { character = RUS_vladimir_levitsky }
				has_country_flag = RUS_abramovich_ai
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_abramovich_ai }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				has_country_flag = RUS_abramovich_ai
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_VST_conference_abramovich
		country_event = russia_socialist_events.338
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -5 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
		RUS_VST_centre_relation = yes
	}

	option = { #Levitsky gets the boot, Kamenev takes over
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.305 option russia_socialist_events.305.f"
		name = russia_socialist_events.305.f
		trigger = {
			if = {
				limit = { is_ai = no }
				has_country_leader = { character = RUS_vladimir_levitsky }
				has_idea = RUS_vst_party_factionalism_idea
				OR = {
					RUS_lev_kamenev = { is_second_in_command = yes }
					RUS_daniil_sulimov = { is_second_in_command = yes }
				}
				check_variable = { vst_centre_unity < 4 }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_VST_left_revolt }
			}
			else = {
				has_country_leader = { character = RUS_vladimir_levitsky }
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_kamenev_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_zinovyev_ai
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_zinovyev_ai }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_kamenev_ai }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_kamenev_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_zinovyev_ai
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_VST_conference_kamenev
		country_event = russia_socialist_events.338
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -5 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
		RUS_VST_centre_relation = yes
	}

	option = { #Make plans for Sulimov takeover
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.305 option russia_socialist_events.305.g"
		name = russia_socialist_events.305.g
		trigger = {
			has_country_leader = { character = RUS_vladimir_levitsky }
			if = {
				limit = { is_ai = no }
				has_country_flag = RUS_const_executive
				has_idea = RUS_vst_party_factionalism_idea
				OR = {
					has_completed_focus = RUS_revolution_from_above
					check_variable = { vst_centre_unity < 4 }
				}
			}
			else = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_sulimov_ai
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_sulimov_ai }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				has_country_flag = RUS_sulimov_ai
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_VST_sulimov_coup_tt
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = russia_socialist_events.355 #Experiment in Blanquism
		}
	}
}

		RUS_SDS_relation = yes
	}

country_event = { # The Progressive Fellow-Travellers
	id = russia_socialist_events.310
	title = russia_socialist_events.310.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.310.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_election

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.310 option russia_socialist_events.310.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.310.a
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_liberal }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = 0.04 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = 0.04 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
		RUS_VST_centre_relation = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.310 option russia_socialist_events.310.b"
		name = russia_socialist_events.310.b
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = 0.02 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = 0.02 }
	}
	after = {
		effect_tooltip = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = market_liberal
				name = RUS_social_democrat2_party
				long_name = RUS_social_democrat2_party_long_tt
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = market_liberal
				name = RUS_social_democrat2_party
				long_name = RUS_social_democrat2_party_long
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # Speculation with the Prices
	id = russia_socialist_events.314
	title = russia_socialist_events.314.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.314.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_protest
	trigger = { has_socialist_government = yes }

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.314 option russia_socialist_events.314.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.314.a
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_political_power = -50
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = 4 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 2 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_PSR_relation = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.314 option russia_socialist_events.314.b"
		name = russia_socialist_events.314.b
		trigger = { RUS_is_spiridonist = no }
		add_stability = 0.025
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = -0.03 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = -0.03 }
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_PLSR = yes }
			add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = -0.06 }
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
			RUS_PSR_relation = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
			RUS_RKP_relation = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.314 option russia_socialist_events.314.c"
		name = russia_socialist_events.314.c
		RUS_decrease_antisoc_resistance = yes
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = 0.06 }
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_PLSR = yes }
			add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = -0.05 }
		}
		else = {
			RUS_decrease_VST_centre_unity = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
			RUS_SDS_relation = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
			RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
			RUS_VST_centre_relation = yes
			RUS_RKP_relation = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Uglanov's resignation
	id = russia_socialist_events.322
	title = russia_socialist_events.322.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_VST_left = yes }
		text = russia_socialist_events.322.d.left
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_VST_left = no }
		text = russia_socialist_events.322.d.noleft
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { RUS_VST = yes }
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_uglanov

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.322 option russia_socialist_events.322.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.322.a
		trigger = { RUS_VST_left = no }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
		RUS_VST_centre_relation = yes
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.323 days = 5 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.322 option russia_socialist_events.322.b"
		name = russia_socialist_events.322.b
		trigger = { RUS_VST_left = yes }

		RUS_increase_VST_left_radicalism = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
		RUS_RKP_relation = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.322 option russia_socialist_events.322.c"
		name = russia_socialist_events.322.c
		trigger = { RUS_VST_left = yes }
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = 0.04 }
		add_political_power = 20
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
		RUS_VST_centre_relation = yes
	}
}

country_event = { # Breakthrough
	id = russia_socialist_events.323
	title = russia_socialist_events.323.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.323.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { RUS_VST = yes }
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_zinovyev

	option = { # Side with Zinovyev
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.323 option russia_socialist_events.323.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.323.a
		trigger = { RUS_VST_right = no }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
		RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.324 days = 10 }
		}
	}

	option = { # Side with Right
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.323 option russia_socialist_events.323.b"
		name = russia_socialist_events.323.b
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
		RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.325 days = 10 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # Zinovyev wins
	id = russia_socialist_events.324
	title = russia_socialist_events.324.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.324.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { RUS_VST = yes }
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_zinovyev

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.324 option russia_socialist_events.324.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.324.a
		set_country_flag = RUS_centre_collapsing_to_left
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_relations_with_vst_die_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		RUS_decrease_VST_centre_unity = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
		RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		RUS_VST_centre_relation = yes
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.324 option russia_socialist_events.324.b"
		name = russia_socialist_events.324.b
		add_political_power = -60
	}

	after = {
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = -0.05 }
	}
}

country_event = { # Shlyapnikov gets the job
	id = russia_socialist_events.325
	title = russia_socialist_events.325.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.325.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_shliapnikov

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.325 option russia_socialist_events.325.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.325.a
		RUS_increase_VST_centre_unity = yes
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST_centre = yes }
			add_political_power = 50
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 2 }
			RUS_VST_centre_relation = yes
		}
	}
}

unit_leader_event = { # Zinovyev boots Kamenev due to Radicalism
	id = russia_socialist_events.329
	title = russia_socialist_events.329.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.329.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kamenev
	trigger = {
		if = {
			limit = { is_ai = yes }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_kamenev_ai }
		}
	}

	option = { #Kamenev -> Zinovyev
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.329 option russia_socialist_events.329.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.329.a
		add_stability = -0.1
		RUS_grigory_zinovyev = {
			promote_character = syndicalist_subtype
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		activate_advisor = RUS_lev_kamenev_sic
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		RUS_streamline_VST = yes
		RUS_convert_radicalism_to_totalist_popularity = yes
	}
}

country_event = { # Ministry - Finance
	id = russia_socialist_events.330
	title = russia_socialist_events.330.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.330.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_VST_Centre_fell_flag }
		check_variable = { vst_right_var > 0 }
		check_variable = { vst_left_var > 0 }
	}
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.335 days = 3 }
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_conference1

	option = { #Strumlin
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.330 option russia_socialist_events.330.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.330.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_abramovich_ai
			}
		}
		RUS_increase_VST_centre_unity = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
		RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = 0.01 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		custom_effect_tooltip = {
			localization_key = tooltip_disable_focus
			FOCUS = RUS_new_russian_socialism
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_strumilin_ministry
	}

	option = { #Kamkov (SR)
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.330 option russia_socialist_events.330.b"
		name = russia_socialist_events.330.b
		RUS_decrease_VST_centre_unity = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
		RUS_PSR_relation = yes
		add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = 0.01 }
	}

	option = { #Finn-Yenotayevsky (Right)
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.330 option russia_socialist_events.330.c"
		name = russia_socialist_events.330.c
		RUS_decrease_VST_centre_unity = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
		RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		custom_effect_tooltip = {
			localization_key = tooltip_disable_focus
			FOCUS = RUS_4_year_plan
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_yenotayevsky_ministry
	}

	option = { #Kamenev (Left)
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.330 option russia_socialist_events.330.e"
		name = russia_socialist_events.330.e
		trigger = {
			RUS_lev_kamenev = { is_second_in_command = no }
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
		RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
	}
}

country_event = { # VST Centre Falling
	id = russia_socialist_events.336
	title = russia_socialist_events.336.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.336.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_country_leader = { character = RUS_vladimir_levitsky }
		OR = {
			check_variable = { vst_centre_unity < 1 }
			has_country_flag = RUS_VST_collapse
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		RUS_clear_zinovyev_minigame = yes
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_levitsky

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.336 option russia_socialist_events.336.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.336.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_VST_power_struggle_tt
		add_stability = -0.1
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = russia_socialist_events.338
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.336 option russia_socialist_events.336.b"
		name = russia_socialist_events.336.b
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_const_executive }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_VST_sulimov_coup_tt
		add_stability = -0.1
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.355 days = 1 } #Experiment in Blanquism
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # Change in Leadership
	id = russia_socialist_events.338
	title = russia_socialist_events.338.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.338.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_levitsky

	option = { #Right
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.338 option russia_socialist_events.338.a"
		trigger = {
			if = {
				limit = { is_ai = no }
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_VST_conference_abramovich
					RUS_fyodor_dan = { is_second_in_command = yes }
					check_variable = { vst_right_var > vst_left_var }
				}
			}
			else = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_abramovich_ai
			}
		}
		name = russia_socialist_events.338.a
		promote_character = {
			character = RUS_rafail_abramovich
			ideology = syndicalist_subtype
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_fyodor_dan_sic
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -5 }
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		RUS_RKP_relation = yes
		set_country_flag = RUS_VST_left_revolt
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.405 days = 200 random_days = 200 }
		}
	}

	option = { #Left
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.338 option russia_socialist_events.338.b"
		trigger = {
			if = {
				limit = { is_ai = no }
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_centre_collapsing_to_left
					has_country_flag = RUS_VST_conference_kamenev
					RUS_grigory_zinovyev = { is_second_in_command = yes }
					check_variable = { vst_right_var < vst_left_var }
				}
			}
			else = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_kamenev_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_zinovyev_ai
				}
			}
		}
		name = russia_socialist_events.338.b
		promote_character = {
			character = RUS_lev_kamenev
			ideology = syndicalist_subtype
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_grigory_zinovyev_sic
		set_country_flag = RUS_VST_right_revolt
		country_event = russia_socialist_events.328 # Dvoika formed
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -5 }
		RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		RUS_SDS_relation = yes
		clr_country_flag = socrus340_fired
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.307 days = 60 } #Centralisation of Power
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #The Zinovyev Manifesto
	id = russia_socialist_events.350
	title = russia_socialist_events.350.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.350.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_country_leader = { character = RUS_vladimir_levitsky }
		has_character = RUS_grigory_zinovyev
		NOT = {
			has_war_with = GER
			has_completed_focus = RUS_eternal_flame
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_zinovyev

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.350 option russia_socialist_events.350.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.350.a
		activate_mission = RUS_left_ultimatum
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -4 }
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_expel_zinovietes target = ROOT }
		activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_expel_sds target = ROOT }
		activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_ideological_restriction target = ROOT }
		activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_appoint_bolsheviks target = ROOT }
		activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_bolshevik_operation target = ROOT }
		if = {
			limit = { is_in_coalition_with_radical_socialist = yes }
			activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_backing_from_esers target = ROOT }
		}
		### Add rest of decisions

		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.358 days = 7 } #War over the Central Committee
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Sulimov's Strike
	id = russia_socialist_events.351
	title = russia_socialist_events.351.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.351.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { has_country_leader = { character = RUS_vladimir_levitsky } }
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_sulimov

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.351 option russia_socialist_events.351.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.351.a
		if = {
			limit = { is_in_coalition_with_totalist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:totalist }
			remove_from_coalition = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_completed_focus = RUS_invite_sverdlov }
			uncomplete_national_focus = {
				focus = RUS_invite_sverdlov
				uncomplete_children = yes
			}
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = totalist popularity = -0.1 }
		retire_character = RUS_yakov_sverdlov # Remember to unretire him for potential puppet?
		retire_character = RUS_mikhail_frunze
		if = {
			limit = { has_character = RUS_iosif_stalin }
			retire_character = RUS_iosif_stalin
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Rebellion of the Left
	id = russia_socialist_events.352
	title = russia_socialist_events.352.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_VST_collapse }
		text = russia_socialist_events.352.d.rebellion
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_expelled_left }
		text = russia_socialist_events.352.d.expulsion
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { check_variable = { vst_left_var < 1 } }
		text = russia_socialist_events.352.d.coalition
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		if = {
			limit = { is_ai = no }
			has_government = syndicalist
		}
		else = {
			RUS_VST_right = yes
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kamenev

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.352 option russia_socialist_events.352.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.352.a
		set_country_flag = RUS_VST_left_revolt
		clr_country_flag = RUS_VST_collapse
		RUS_grigory_zinovyev = {
			remove_political_advisor_role = yes
		}
		RUS_ivan_gronsky = {
			remove_political_advisor_role = yes
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = totalist popularity = 0.05 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -6 }
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_completed_focus = RUS_communists }
			uncomplete_national_focus = { focus = RUS_communists }
			hidden_effect = {
				uncomplete_national_focus = {
					focus = RUS_encourage_collectivisation
				}
				uncomplete_national_focus = {
					focus = RUS_invite_sverdlov
					uncomplete_children = yes
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_VST_right_revolt }
			country_event = russia_socialist_events.336 #VST Centre Falling
		}
	}
}

	id = russia_socialist_events.359
	title = russia_socialist_events.359.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.359.d

	trigger = {
		has_active_mission = RUS_left_ultimatum
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.359 option russia_socialist_events.359.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.359.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_sulimov_ai
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_SULIMOV_SYNDIE }
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 40
		add_days_mission_timeout = {
			mission = RUS_left_ultimatum
			days = 15
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.359 option russia_socialist_events.359.b"
		name = russia_socialist_events.359.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_levitsky_ai
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_LEVITSKY_SYNDIE }
				}
			}
		}
		country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.360 days = 5 } #To Protect the Revolution
	}
}

country_event = { #To Protect the Revolution
	id = russia_socialist_events.360
	title = russia_socialist_events.360.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.360.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_sulimov

	trigger = {
		has_country_leader = { character = RUS_vladimir_levitsky }
		has_socialist_government = yes
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.360 option russia_socialist_events.360.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.360.a
		promote_character = { character = RUS_daniil_sulimov ideology = syndicalist_subtype }
		set_country_flag = RUS_levitsky_resigned
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = syndicalist
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		RUS_streamline_VST = yes
		activate_advisor = RUS_sergey_kirov_sic
		activate_advisor = RUS_mikhail_tukhachevsky_army_chief
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = -0.05 }
		set_country_flag = RUS_VST_right_revolt
		set_country_flag = RUS_VST_left_revolt
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_leader_description = {
				ideology = syndicalist
				desc = RUS_daniil_sulimov_socrus_leader_desc
			}
			set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:radical_socialist }
			add_to_coalition = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_active_mission = RUS_left_ultimatum }
				remove_mission = RUS_left_ultimatum
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_active_mission = RUS_right_ultimatum }
				remove_mission = RUS_right_ultimatum
			}
		}
	}
}

	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_VST_right = yes }
		text = russia_socialist_events.362.d.right
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes

		if = {
			limit = { is_ai = no }
			has_socialist_government = yes

		}

			remove_political_advisor_role = yes

			remove_second_in_command_role = yes
		}

			limit = { has_completed_focus = RUS_internationalists }

				focus = RUS_internationalists
				uncomplete_children = yes
			}
		}
	}
	option = {

		add_political_power = -50
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 2 }
		RUS_VST_centre_relation = yes

			limit = { RUS_VST_right = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
			RUS_SDS_relation = yes
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }

		}

		RUS_VST_Centre_relation = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
		RUS_RKP_relation = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.366 days = 7 }
		}
	}
}

	title = russia_socialist_events.380.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.380.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

		RUS_VST_Centre_relation = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
		RUS_PSR_relation = yes
		RUS_grigory_zinovyev = {
			promote_character = syndicalist_subtype
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		activate_advisor = RUS_lev_kamenev_sic
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		RUS_streamline_VST = yes
		RUS_convert_radicalism_to_totalist_popularity = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Reversed October
	id = russia_socialist_events.381
	title = russia_socialist_events.381.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.381.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_sverdlov

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.381 option russia_socialist_events.381.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.381.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_leader = { character = RUS_lev_kamenev }
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_reversed_october_event_kamenev_tt
			set_temp_variable = { current_vst_left_radicalism = vst_left_radicalism }
			multiply_temp_variable = { current_vst_left_radicalism = 0.01 }
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = totalist
				popularity = current_vst_left_radicalism
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
			RUS_increase_VST_left_radicalism = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_leader = { character = RUS_grigory_zinovyev }
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = totalist
				popularity = 0.05
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		effect_tooltip = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = totalist
				name = RUS_totalist5_party
				long_name = RUS_totalist5_party_long_tt
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		set_country_flag = RUS_rkp_absorbed_by_vst
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_reversed_october_event_bolshevik_purge_tt
		hidden_effect = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = totalist
				name = RUS_totalist5_party
				long_name = RUS_totalist5_party_long
			}
			RUS_yakov_sverdlov = {
				retire = yes
			}
			RUS_mikhail_frunze = {
				remove_trait = {
					slot = political_advisor
					trait = KR_bolshevik_frunze
				}
				add_trait = {
					slot = political_advisor
					trait = KR_vst_left_frunze
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		add_country_leader_role = {
			character = RUS_grigory_zinovyev
			country_leader = {
				desc = RUS_grigory_zinovyev_leader_desc
				ideology = totalist_subtype
				traits = { RUS_grishka_third_sic }
			}
			promote_leader = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Bringing Modernity to Russia
	id = russia_socialist_events.384
	title = russia_socialist_events.384.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.384.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_government = syndicalist
			has_government = totalist
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_zinovyev

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.384 option russia_socialist_events.384.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.384.a
		add_political_power = 100
		activate_mission = RUS_soc_industrialisation_plan
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		RUS_increase_VST_centre_unity = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			INT = { country_event = russia_socialist_events.385 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.384 option russia_socialist_events.384.b"
		name = russia_socialist_events.384.b
		RUS_decrease_VST_centre_unity = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Bringing Modernity to Russia for #FRA
	id = russia_socialist_events.385
	title = russia_socialist_events.385.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.385.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { has_socialist_government = yes }

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.385 option russia_socialist_events.385.a"

country_event = { #Against the Anti-Social Intelligentsia
	id = russia_socialist_events.386
	title = russia_socialist_events.386.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.386.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = { has_socialist_government = yes }
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_soviet_congress

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.386 option russia_socialist_events.386.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.386.a
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_purged_universities
			days = 365
		}
		add_stability = 0.1
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = radical_socialist
				popularity = 0.04
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_maximalist = yes
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = totalist
				popularity = 0.04
			}
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = 4 }
			change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
		RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		RUS_SDS_relation = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = radical_socialist }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 2 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = -2 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.386 option russia_socialist_events.386.b"
		name = russia_socialist_events.386.b
		add_political_power = -50
		add_stability = 0.05
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
		RUS_SDS_relation = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = radical_socialist }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 1 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = -1 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.386 option russia_socialist_events.386.c"
		name = russia_socialist_events.386.c
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		RUS_RKP_relation = yes
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 2 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Maximalist Takeover of the Socialist-Revolutionaries
	id = russia_socialist_events.387
	title = russia_socialist_events.387.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.387.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = { has_socialist_government = yes }
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kolegayev

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.387 option russia_socialist_events.387.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.387.a
		retire_character = RUS_maria_spiridonova
		add_popularity = { ideology = totalist popularity = 0.05 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = -0.05 }
		effect_tooltip = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = radical_socialist
				name = RUS_totalist3_party
				long_name = RUS_totalist3_party_long_tt
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 2 }
		RUS_PSR_relation = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = radical_socialist
				name = RUS_totalist3_party
				long_name = RUS_totalist3_party_long
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #The New Normal
	id = russia_socialist_events.388
	title = russia_socialist_events.388.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_country_leader = { character = RUS_lev_kamenev } }
		text = russia_socialist_events.388.d.kamenev
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_country_leader = { character = RUS_grigory_zinovyev } }
		text = russia_socialist_events.388.d.zinovyev
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { RUS_VST_left = yes }
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kremlin2

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.388 option russia_socialist_events.388.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.388.a

	}

country_event = { #Integral Socialism and the Accession of the Maximalists
	id = russia_socialist_events.389
	title = russia_socialist_events.389.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.389.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { has_country_leader = { character = RUS_grigory_zinovyev } }
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_ustinov

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.389 option russia_socialist_events.389.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.389.a
		add_political_power = 50
		effect_tooltip = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = radical_socialist
				name = RUS_totalist6_party
				long_name = RUS_totalist6_party_long_tt
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { is_in_coalition_with_radical_socialist = no }
			set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:radical_socialist }
			add_to_coalition = yes
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 5 }
		RUS_PSR_relation = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = radical_socialist
				name = RUS_totalist6_party
				long_name = RUS_totalist6_party_long
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Devolution of State
	id = russia_socialist_events.399
	title = russia_socialist_events.399.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.399.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_maksimov
	trigger = {
		RUS_grigory_maksimov = { is_second_in_command = yes }
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.399 option russia_socialist_events.399.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.399.a
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = 0.05 }
		add_country_leader_role = {
			character = RUS_grigory_maksimov
			country_leader = {
				desc = RUS_grigory_maksimov_sic_desc
				ideology = syndicalist_subtype
				traits = { KR_syndicalist_visionary_sic }
			}
			promote_leader = yes
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_isaak_steinberg_sic
		set_cosmetic_tag = RUS_confederation
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_confederation_tt
		RUS_streamline_VST = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_completed_focus = RUS_expansion_of_union }
			every_other_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_in_europe = yes
						tag = SRI
						tag = SWF
						tag = WLS
						tag = SCO
					}
				}
				add_to_array = { array = ROOT.RUS_SSTR_tags value = THIS }
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Association for Research of Western Totalism
	id = russia_socialist_events.403
	title = russia_socialist_events.403.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.403.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_gronsky2

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.404 days = 265 random_days = 100 }
		}
	}

	option = { #Allow them
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.403 option russia_socialist_events.403.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.403.a
		trigger = {
			RUS_fyodor_dan = { is_second_in_command = no }
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
		RUS_VST_Right_relation = yes
		RUS_VST_Centre_relation = yes
		RUS_increase_VST_left_radicalism = yes
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = totalist
			popularity = 0.05
		}
	}

	option = { #Ban them
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.403 option russia_socialist_events.403.b"
		name = russia_socialist_events.403.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				RUS_lev_kamenev = { is_second_in_command = no }
				RUS_grigory_zinovyev = { is_second_in_command = no }
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
		RUS_VST_Left_relation = yes
		RUS_RKP_relation = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
		RUS_VST_Centre_relation = yes
		RUS_VST_Right_relation = yes
	}
}

		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.460 option russia_socialist_events.460.i"
		trigger = { var:9.owner = { is_ally_with = ROOT } }
		name = russia_socialist_events.460.i
		set_faction_name = faction_prague_accords
	}
}

country_event = { #Collapse of Government
	id = russia_socialist_events.430
	title = russia_socialist_events.430.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.430.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.430 option russia_socialist_events.430.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.430.a
		RUS_aleksandr_vasilevsky = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype }
				promote_character = { ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype }
			}
			else = {
				add_country_leader_role = {
					country_leader = {
						desc = RUS_aleksandr_vasilevsky_leader_desc
						ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
					}
					promote_leader = yes
				}
			}
			add_unit_leader_trait = politically_connected
			add_max_trait = 1
			add_planning = 1
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = -0.3 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = -0.3 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = totalist popularity = -0.3 }
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_in_faction_with = INT
					any_allied_country = {
						is_major = yes
						has_capitulated = no
						num_of_owned_factories > 50
					}
				}
				leave_faction = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { is_faction_leader = yes }
				dismantle_faction = yes
			}
			if = { #Triggered by RSA tree
				limit = {
					var:219.controller = {
						OR = {
							tag = RSA
							is_in_faction_with = RSA
						}
					}
				}
				country_event = { id = russia_boldyrev_events.20 days = 1 } #Negotiations with Boldyrev
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #The Eastern Front of the Internationale
	id = russia_socialist_events.114
	title = russia_socialist_events.114.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.114.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_Young_Pioneers

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.114 option russia_socialist_events.114.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.114.a #Yes, let's join forces
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_government = totalist
				FROM = { any_owned_state = { is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = yes } }
			}
		}
		leave_faction = yes
		set_global_flag = TEMPORARY_DISABLED_FACTION_POPUP
		var:FROM.faction_leader = { add_to_faction = ROOT }
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.114 option russia_socialist_events.114.claims"
		name = russia_socialist_events.114.claims #Yes, but for all of our claims
		trigger = {
			FROM = { any_owned_state = { is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = yes } }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 1
				has_government = totalist
			}
		}
		FROM = { country_event = russia_socialist_events.1150 }
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.114 option russia_socialist_events.114.b"
		name = russia_socialist_events.114.b #We'd rather stay with France
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
	}
}

		trigger = {
			NOT = { is_guaranteed_by = FROM }
		}
	}

		FROM = { is_in_faction = yes }

			}
		}

			limit = { FROM = { is_faction_leader = yes } }
			FROM = { add_to_faction = ROOT }
		}
		else = {
			var:FROM.faction_leader = { country_event = russia_socialist_events.116 }
		}

			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 1
				has_government = totalist
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			FROM = { any_owned_state = { is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = yes } }
		}

country_event = { # FROM Seeks Membership in the Internationale
	id = russia_socialist_events.1153
	title = russia_socialist_events.116.t

	desc = {
		text = russia_socialist_events.116.d.guaranteed
		trigger = {
			FROM = { is_guaranteed_by = RUS }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = russia_socialist_events.116.d.invited
		trigger = {
			FROM = { NOT = { is_guaranteed_by = RUS } }
		}
	}

	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_Young_Pioneers

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.1153 option russia_socialist_events.116.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.116.a #Welcome, comrades
		add_to_faction = FROM
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS = {
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = { is_claim_or_core_of_FROM = yes }
					transfer_state_to = FROM
				}
			}
			FROM = {
				every_owned_state = {
					if = {
						limit = { is_claimed_by = RUS }
						remove_claim_by = RUS
					}
					if = {
						limit = { is_core_of = RUS }
						remove_core_of = RUS
					}
				}
				country_event = russia_socialist_events.1180
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.1153 option russia_socialist_events.116.b"
		name = russia_socialist_events.116.b #No, we don't need them
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		FROM = { country_event = russia_socialist_events.118 }
	}
}

		}

country_event = { #The Union of Socialist Labour Republics
	id = russia_socialist_events.411
	title = russia_socialist_events.411.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.411.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy4
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = { has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_oskab_modifier } }
				remove_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_oskab_modifier }
				clr_state_flag = oskab_state
			}
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = { has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_CA_modifier } }
				remove_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_CA_modifier }
				clr_state_flag = alash_state
			}
			every_core_state = {
				limit = {
					is_owned_by = ROOT
					has_resistance = yes
				}
				force_enable_resistance = { occupier = RUS clear = yes }
			}
			589 = { #Semireche
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = CA_turkestan_victorious }
					remove_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.411 option russia_socialist_events.411.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.411.a
		ai_chance = { base = 5 }
		add_stability = 0.1
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { BUK = { has_cosmetic_tag = TRK_RUS } } } #Puppeted united CA after Central Asia war
			set_autonomy = {
				target = KAZ
				autonomy_state = union_republic
				end_wars = no
			}
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = KAZ
					NOT = {
						state = 581 #Uralsk
						state = 583 #Petropavlovsk
						state = 588 #Pavlodar
					}
				}
				transfer_state_to = KAZ
				remove_core_of = RUS
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				KAZ = {
					drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
					set_country_flag = CA_able_to_repair #Unlocks postwar unification tree
					remove_ideas = {
						KAZ_ethnic_tensions_0
						KAZ_alash_militias_0
					}
					add_ideas = {
						central_asia_economic_destruction_start
						central_asia_disorganized_military_0
					}
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			787 = { remove_core_of = MNR } #Terek
		}
		release_puppet = MNR
		set_autonomy = {
			target = MNR
			autonomy_state = union_republic
			end_wars = no
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_nationalise_oil_completed } }
				MNR = {
					give_resource_rights = { state = 232 receiver = GER } #Dagestan
					give_resource_rights = { state = 961 receiver = GER } #Chechenya
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.411 option russia_socialist_events.411.b"
		name = russia_socialist_events.411.b
		ai_chance = { base = 10 }
		#### Fire World News Event
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { BUK = { has_cosmetic_tag = TRK_RUS } } } #Puppeted united CA after Central Asia war
			set_autonomy = {
				target = KAZ
				autonomy_state = union_republic
				end_wars = no
			}
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = KAZ
					NOT = {
						state = 581 #Uralsk
						state = 583 #Petropavlovsk
						state = 588 #Pavlodar
					}
				}
				transfer_state_to = KAZ
				remove_core_of = RUS
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				KAZ = {
					drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
					set_country_flag = CA_able_to_repair #Unlocks postwar unification tree
					remove_ideas = {
						KAZ_ethnic_tensions_0
						KAZ_alash_militias_0
					}
					add_ideas = {
						central_asia_economic_destruction_start
						central_asia_disorganized_military_0
					}
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { every_subject_country = { drop_cosmetic_tag = yes } }
	}
	after = {
		if = {
			limit = { BUK = { exists = no } }
			release_puppet = BUK
			set_autonomy = {
				target = BUK
				autonomy_state = union_republic
				end_wars = no
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { BUK = { is_subject_of = RUS } }
			BUK = { get_current_government_type = yes }
			set_autonomy = {
				target = BUK
				autonomy_state = union_republic
				end_wars = no
			}
			BUK = { restore_previous_government_type = yes }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { KHI = { exists = no } }
			release_puppet = KHI
			set_autonomy = {
				target = KHI
				autonomy_state = union_republic
				end_wars = no
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { KHI = { is_subject_of = RUS } }
			set_autonomy = {
				target = KHI
				autonomy_state = union_republic
				end_wars = no
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { TRK = { exists = no } }
			release_puppet = TRK
			set_autonomy = {
				target = TRK
				autonomy_state = union_republic
				end_wars = no
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { TRK = { is_subject_of = RUS } }
			set_autonomy = {
				target = TRK
				autonomy_state = union_republic
				end_wars = no
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = russia_socialist_events.413

	desc = russia_socialist_events.413.d

	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_oleksandr_shumskyi

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.413 option russia_socialist_events.413.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.413.a
		set_country_flag = UKR_borotbyst_help_large
		add_political_power = -100
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_cooperate_with_borotbyst_tt
		effect_tooltip = {
			UKR = {
				add_timed_idea = {
					idea = RUS_UKR_borotbyst_sabotage_large
					days = 500
				}
			}
			add_intel = {
				target = UKR
				civilian_intel = 50
				army_intel = 50
				navy_intel = 50
				airforce_intel = 50
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.413 option russia_socialist_events.413.b"
		name = russia_socialist_events.413.b
		set_country_flag = UKR_borotbyst_help_medium
		add_political_power = -50
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_cooperate_with_borotbyst_tt
		effect_tooltip = {
			UKR = {
				add_timed_idea = {
					idea = RUS_UKR_borotbyst_sabotage_medium
					days = 500
				}
			}
			add_intel = {
				target = UKR
				civilian_intel = 50
				army_intel = 50
				navy_intel = 50
				airforce_intel = 50
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.413 option russia_socialist_events.413.c"
		name = russia_socialist_events.413.c
		set_country_flag = UKR_borotbyst_help_small
		add_political_power = -25
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_cooperate_with_borotbyst_tt
		UKR = {
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_UKR_borotbyst_sabotage_medium
				days = 500
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #UKR receives Borotbyst sabotage
	id = russia_socialist_events.414
	title = russia_socialist_events.414.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.414.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_oleksandr_shumskyi
	trigger = { has_socialist_government = no }

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.414 option russia_socialist_events.414.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.414.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = { has_country_flag = UKR_borotbyst_help_large }
			}
			RUS = {
				add_intel = {
					target = UKR
					civilian_intel = 50
					army_intel = 50
					navy_intel = 50
					airforce_intel = 50
				}
			}
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_UKR_borotbyst_sabotage_large
				days = 500
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = { has_country_flag = UKR_borotbyst_help_medium }
			}
			RUS = {
				add_intel = {
					target = UKR
					civilian_intel = 50
					army_intel = 50
					navy_intel = 50
					airforce_intel = 50
				}
			}
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_UKR_borotbyst_sabotage_medium
				days = 500
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = { has_country_flag = UKR_borotbyst_help_small }
			}
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_UKR_borotbyst_sabotage_medium
				days = 500
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #POL socialist uprising guaranteed
	id = russia_socialist_events.415
	title = russia_socialist_events.415.t
	desc = russia_socialist_events.415.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			is_in_faction_with = GER
			is_in_faction_with = AUS
		}
		UKR = {
			OR = {
				has_capitulated = yes
				is_in_faction_with = RUS
			}
		}
		BLR = {
			OR = {
				has_capitulated = yes
				is_in_faction_with = RUS
			}
		}
		BAT = { has_capitulated = yes }
		has_war_with = RUS
	}

	option = { #Based
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.415 option russia_socialist_events.415.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.415.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_active_mission = POL_syndicalist_threat }
			}
			activate_mission = POL_syndicalist_threat
		}
		set_country_flag = POL_socialist_uprising_guaranteed
		set_temp_variable = { POL_influence_change = 100 }
		POL_add_syndicalist_influence = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		custom_effect_tooltip = russia_socialist_events.415.a.tt
	}
}

		}
		text = russia_socialist_events.420.d.psrdem
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			tag = RUS
			RUS_is_maximalist = yes
		}
		text = russia_socialist_events.420.d.psrmax
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			tag = RUS
			has_country_leader = { character = RUS_grigory_zinovyev }
		}
		text = russia_socialist_events.420.d.vstcom
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			tag = RUS
			has_government = syndicalist
		}
		text = russia_socialist_events.420.d.vstdem
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { NOT = { tag = RUS } }
		text = russia_socialist_events.420.d.other
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes

		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_socialist_events.420 option russia_socialist_events.420.a"
		name = russia_socialist_events.420.a
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_political_power = 50
	}
	option = {

		name = russia_socialist_events.420.b
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = 5 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		add_one_random_civilian_factory = yes
	}

### Boldyrev's Free Russia Events ###

country_event = { #An Opportunity for Germany
	id = russia_boldyrev_events.2
	title = russia_boldyrev_events.2.t
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_boldyrev
	desc = russia_boldyrev_events.2.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS = {
			OR = {
				has_government = national_populist
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_boldyrev_events.2 option russia_boldyrev_events.2.a"
		name = russia_boldyrev_events.2.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_enables_boldyrev_tt
		set_global_flag = RSA_enabled
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS = { country_event = russia_boldyrev_events.3 } #Boldyrev in Berlin
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_boldyrev_events.2 option russia_boldyrev_events.2.b"
		name = russia_boldyrev_events.2.b
		trigger = { is_ai = no }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_disables_boldyrev_tt
		add_manpower = 12500
	}
}

	id = russia_boldyrev_events.3
	title = russia_boldyrev_events.3.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_savinkov = yes }
		text = russia_boldyrev_events.3.d.szrs
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_socialist_government = yes }
		text = russia_boldyrev_events.3.d.soc
	}

	fire_only_once = yes

			has_socialist_government = yes
		}
		has_global_flag = RSA_enabled

	id = russia_boldyrev_events.4

	desc = russia_boldyrev_events.4.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_boldyrev
	is_triggered_only = yes

		name = russia_boldyrev_events.4.a

		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_boldyrev_events.5 days = 30 random_days = 30 }

country_event = { #Boldyrev's Trial
	id = russia_boldyrev_events.5
	title = russia_boldyrev_events.5.t
	desc = russia_boldyrev_events.5.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_trial_2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			MNR = { MNR_sultan_klych_girey = { set_nationality = MNR } } #In case he was moved to RSA by russia_free_army_events.10
			RSA = {
				every_character = {
					limit = {
						is_unit_leader = yes
					}
					set_character_flag = RUS_RSA_general
					set_nationality = RUS
					demote_leader = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_boldyrev_events.5 option russia_boldyrev_events.5.a"
		name = russia_boldyrev_events.5.a #No Mercy for traitors! Execute them all!
		RUS_vasily_boldyrev = { kill_character = yes }
		every_character = {
			limit = {
				has_character_flag = RUS_RSA_general
				NOT = { is_character = RUS_vasily_boldyrev }
			}
			kill_character = yes
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST_left = no }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = -1 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = 4 }
			change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_boldyrev_events.5 option russia_boldyrev_events.5.b"
		name = russia_boldyrev_events.5.b
		retire_character = RUS_vasily_boldyrev
		custom_effect_tooltip = available_general
		show_unit_leaders_tooltip = RUS_vladimir_potapenko
		show_unit_leaders_tooltip = RUS_leonid_kotelnikov
		show_unit_leaders_tooltip = RUS_dmitry_lelyushenko
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		add_political_power = -40
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_savinkov = yes }
			add_power_balance_value = {
				id = RUS_power_balance
				value = -0.05
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST_right = no }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_character = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						is_character = RUS_vladimir_potapenko
						is_character = RUS_leonid_kotelnikov
						is_character = RUS_dmitry_lelyushenko
					}
					has_character_flag = RUS_RSA_general
				}
				retire = yes
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_boldyrev_events.5 option russia_boldyrev_events.5.c"
		name = russia_boldyrev_events.5.c
		retire_character = RUS_vasily_boldyrev
		every_character = {
			limit = {
				has_character_flag = RUS_RSA_general
				NOT = { is_character = RUS_vasily_boldyrev }
			}
			retire = yes
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		add_political_power = -20
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_savinkov = yes }
			add_power_balance_value = {
				id = RUS_power_balance
				value = -0.05
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST_right = no }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Boldyrev activated by Germany
	id = russia_boldyrev_events.10
	title = russia_boldyrev_events.10.t
	desc = russia_boldyrev_events.10.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_boldyrev
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_socialist_government = yes
			has_government = national_populist
		}
		has_global_flag = RSA_enabled
	}
	immediate = {
		RSA = {
			hidden_effect = {
				RUS = { transfer_technology = yes }
				RSA_setup_boldyrev = yes
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					is_ai = no
					has_war_with = RUS
					OR = {
						tag = GER
						tag = GEO
						tag = AZR
						tag = FIN
						has_autonomy_state = oststaat
						has_autonomy_state = oststaat_autonomous
						AND = {
							tag = UKR
							is_in_faction_with = AUS
						}
					}
				}
				country_event = russia_boldyrev_events.11
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_boldyrev_events.10 option russia_boldyrev_events.10.a"
		name = russia_boldyrev_events.10.a #Boldyrev is a traitor to Russia!
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_boldyrev_events.10 option russia_boldyrev_events.10.b"
		name = russia_boldyrev_events.10.b #Boldyrev is a goddamn hero
		trigger = { is_ai = no }
		RSA = {
			change_tag_from = ROOT
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Negotiate with Boldyrev?
	id = russia_boldyrev_events.20
	title = russia_boldyrev_events.20.t
	desc = russia_boldyrev_events.20.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_boldyrev
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		is_subject = no
		NOT = { controls_state = 219 } #Moscow
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_boldyrev_events.20 option russia_boldyrev_events.20.a"
		name = russia_boldyrev_events.20.a #Put end to this war...
		ai_chance = { base = 10 }
		RSA = { country_event = russia_boldyrev_events.21 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_boldyrev_events.20 option russia_boldyrev_events.20.b"
		name = russia_boldyrev_events.20.b #Never!
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		#continue the war
		RSA = { country_event = russia_boldyrev_events.22 }
	}
}

country_event = { #For Boldyrev: Unification proposed
	id = russia_boldyrev_events.21
	title = russia_boldyrev_events.21.t
	desc = russia_boldyrev_events.21.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_boldyrev_events.21 option russia_boldyrev_events.21.a"
		name = russia_boldyrev_events.21.a
		GER = {
			if = {
				limit = { RUS = { has_government = national_populist } }
				RUS = { country_event = russia_events.918 } #Death of Savinkov
			}
			else = {
				country_event = russia_foreign_policy_events.1300
			}
		}
	}
}

unit_leader_event = { #Restoration of 1922 Constitution
	id = russia_boldyrev_events.40
	title = russia_boldyrev_events.40.t
	desc = russia_boldyrev_events.40.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_boldyrev_events.40 option russia_boldyrev_events.40.a"
		name = russia_boldyrev_events.40.a
		set_stability = 0
		hidden_effect = { add_research_slot_until_five = yes }
		complete_national_focus = RUS_democracy_restored
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_confidence_votes_law
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_electoral_threshold_law
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_defensive_democracy_law
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_judicial_review_law
		set_country_flag = RUS_confidence_votes_law
		set_country_flag = RUS_electoral_threshold_law
		set_country_flag = RUS_judicial_review_law
		set_country_flag = RUS_defensive_democracy_law
		country_event = { id = russia_boldyrev_events.41 days = 5 }
	}
}
