country_event = { #Transfer of the territory
	id = russia_foreign_policy_events.92
	title = russia_foreign_policy_events.92.t
	desc = russia_foreign_policy_events.92.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.92 option russia_foreign_policy_events.92.a"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.92.a #Another victory for Russian diplomacy!
		remove_decision = RUS_Demand_Armenia
		clr_country_flag = RUS_demanding_armenia
		TUR = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = { is_core_of = ROOT }
				transfer_state_to = ROOT
			}
			if = {
				limit = { owns_state = 230 }
				230 = { transfer_state_to = ROOT }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { owns_state = 585 }
				if = {
					limit = { is_in_faction_with = GEO }
					585 = { transfer_state_to = GEO }
				}
				else = {
					585 = { transfer_state_to = ROOT }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { owns_state = 1000 }
				if = {
					limit = { is_in_faction_with = ARM }
					1000 = { transfer_state_to = ARM }
				}
				else = {
					1000 = { transfer_state_to = ROOT }
				}
			}
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = ROOT
				relation = non_aggression_pact
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { FROM = { NOT = { original_tag = TUR } } }
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = FROM
				relation = non_aggression_pact
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_power_change = 5 }
		RUS_change_projection = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Ultimatum for Galicia AUS owns it
	id = russia_foreign_policy_events.95
	title = russia_foreign_policy_events.95.t
	desc = russia_foreign_policy_events.95.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kremlin_1

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.95 option russia_foreign_policy_events.95.a"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.95.a #Accept
		ai_chance = { base = 15 }
		add_political_power = -100
		if = {
			limit = { has_subject = GAL }
			if = {
				limit = {
					GAL = { owns_state = 73 }
				}
				transfer_state = 73
			}
			set_autonomy = {
				target = GAL
				autonomy_state = autonomy_free
			}
			remove_from_faction = GAL
			GAL = {
				drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
				country_event = { id = russia_foreign_policy_events.98 random_hours = 24 days = 1 }
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = { is_galicia = yes }
				transfer_state_to = FROM
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = { id = russia_foreign_policy_events.96 days = 2 random_days = 2 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.95 option russia_foreign_policy_events.95.b"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.95.b #refuse
		ai_chance = { base = 75 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = {
			localization_key = may_lead_to_war_with
			COUNTRY = "[RUS.GetNameDef]"
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = { id = russia_foreign_policy_events.97 days = 2 random_days = 2 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #ROM-RUS peace deal
	id = russia_foreign_policy_events.101
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army_1

	title = {
		text = russia_foreign_policy_events.101.t.victory
		trigger = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
	}
	desc = {
		text = russia_foreign_policy_events.101.d.victory
		trigger = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
	}

	title = {
		text = russia_foreign_policy_events.101.t.defeat
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = russia_foreign_policy_events.101.d.defeat
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		tag = ROM
		has_war_with = var:global.russia
		owns_state = 78 #Bessarabia
		is_valid_peace_target = yes
		var:global.russia = { is_valid_peace_target = yes }
		OR = {
			#Romania loses
			surrender_progress > 0.15
			var:global.russia = {
				controls_state = 78 #Bessarabia
				controls_state = 79 #Moldavia
			}
			#Romania wins
			var:global.russia = { surrender_progress > 0.15 }
			controls_state = 202 #Kiev
			controls_state = 226 #Ekaterinoslav
			AND = {
				controls_state = 192 #Odessa
				controls_state = 198 #Vinnitsa
				OR = {
					controls_state = 197 #Kherson
					controls_state = 199 #Proskurov
					controls_state = 203 #Cherkasy
				}
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_ROM_offered_peace }
	}

	immediate = {
		set_global_flag = { flag = RUS_ROM_offered_peace days = 90 value = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					surrender_progress > 0.25
					RUS = {
						controls_state = 78 #Bessarabia
						controls_state = 79 #Moldavia
					}
				}
			}
			set_global_flag = { flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM days = 60 value = 1 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.101 option russia_foreign_policy_events.101.a"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.101.a #We have no choice; send word to Moscow.
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
		}
		var:global.russia = {
			country_event = { id = russia_foreign_policy_events.102 days = 1 random_hours = 24 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.101 option russia_foreign_policy_events.101.b"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.101.b #We can still win this!
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
			is_ai = no
		}
		add_stability = -0.1
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.101 option russia_foreign_policy_events.101.c"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.101.c #We prevail!
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM
		}
		var:global.russia = {
			country_event = { id = russia_foreign_policy_events.102 days = 1 random_hours = 24 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.101 option russia_foreign_policy_events.101.d"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.101.d #No, they must be taught a lesson.
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM
			is_ai = no
		}
		add_stability = -0.1
	}
}

	title = {
		text = russia_foreign_policy_events.102.t.victory
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = russia_foreign_policy_events.102.d.victory
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
		}
	}

		text = russia_foreign_policy_events.102.t.defeat
		trigger = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
	}

		text = russia_foreign_policy_events.102.d.defeat
		trigger = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }

		has_global_flag = RUS_war_for_bessarabia

		FROM = { country_event = russia_foreign_policy_events.103 }

		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.102 option russia_foreign_policy_events.102.b"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.102.b #Refuse; they must be taught a lesson!
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
			is_ai = no

		add_political_power = -50
		FROM = { country_event = russia_foreign_policy_events.104 }
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.102 option russia_foreign_policy_events.102.c"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.102.c #Reach out to the Romanians; this humiliation must end.
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM
		}
		FROM = { country_event = russia_foreign_policy_events.103 }
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.102 option russia_foreign_policy_events.102.d"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.102.d #To hell with them! We will reach Kishinev at all costs!

			has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM
			is_ai = no
		}
		add_stability = -0.15
		FROM = { country_event = russia_foreign_policy_events.104 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Treaty of Chisinau
	id = russia_foreign_policy_events.103
	title = russia_foreign_policy_events.103.t

	desc = {
		text = russia_foreign_policy_events.103.d.victory
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = russia_foreign_policy_events.103.d.defeat
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.103 option russia_foreign_policy_events.103.a"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.103.a #United just to be torn asunder again...
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_core_of = FROM
					is_claimed_by = FROM
					state = 78 #Bessarabia
					AND = {
						state = 80 #Cernauti
						FROM = { RUS_is_expansionist = yes }
					}
				}
			}
			transfer_state_to = FROM
		}
		FROM = {
			white_peace_with_ROOT = yes
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = ROOT
				relation = non_aggression_pact
			}
			set_truce = { target = ROOT days = 730 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.103 option russia_foreign_policy_events.103.b"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.103.b
		trigger = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
		FROM = {
			remove_state_claim = 78 #Bessarabia
			white_peace_with_ROOT = yes
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = ROOT
				relation = non_aggression_pact
			}
			set_truce = { target = ROOT days = 730 }
		}
	}
}

				factor = 6
				tag = ENG
			}

		add_ideas = RUS_INT_deal
		RUS = { country_event = russia_foreign_policy_events.106 }

			}
		}
		RUS = { country_event = russia_foreign_policy_events.107 }

country_event = { #FROM accepts trade deal (for RUS)
	id = russia_foreign_policy_events.106
	title = russia_foreign_policy_events.106.t
	desc = russia_foreign_policy_events.106.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Splendid
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.106 option russia_foreign_policy_events.106.a"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.106.a
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_INT_deal_2 }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_INT_deal_2
				add_idea = RUS_INT_deal_3
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_ideas = RUS_INT_deal_2
			custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_power_change = 5 }
		RUS_change_projection = yes
		FROM = {
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				modifier = KR_approves_of_govt
				target = FROM
			}
		}
	}
}

						navy_intel = 40

					}

					navy_intel = 40
					airforce_intel = 40
				}

				limit = { tag = BAT }

					RUS = {

							target = BAT

							army_intel = 50
							navy_intel = 50
							airforce_intel = 50
						}
					}
				}
			}

						LIT_change_LAF_threat = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Russians Propose Trade Deal
	id = russia_foreign_policy_events.113
	title = russia_foreign_policy_events.113.t
	desc = russia_foreign_policy_events.113.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = { #Accept
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.113 option russia_foreign_policy_events.113.a"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.113.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_american_tag = yes
					is_chinese_tag = yes
					tag = JAP
				}
			}
			add_political_power = 40
			if = {
				limit = { has_dlc_aat = yes }
				add_cic = 300
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_political_power = 20
			if = {
				limit = { has_dlc_aat = yes }
				add_cic = 150
			}
		}
		add_one_random_civilian_factory = yes
		FROM = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_completed_focus = RUS_pacific_trade }
				country_event = russia_foreign_policy_events.116
			}
			else = {
				country_event = russia_foreign_policy_events.114
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #Refuse
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.113 option russia_foreign_policy_events.113.b"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.113.b
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		FROM = { country_event = russia_foreign_policy_events.115 }
	}
}

country_event = { #They have accepted.
	id = russia_foreign_policy_events.114
	title = russia_foreign_policy_events.114.t
	desc = russia_foreign_policy_events.114.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.114 option russia_foreign_policy_events.114.america"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.114.america
		trigger = { FROM = { is_american_tag = yes } }
		custom_effect_tooltip = {
			localization_key = tooltip_modify_dynmod
			DYNMOD = RUS_state_export
		}
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_export_pp = 0.02 tooltip = political_power_gain_tooltip }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_export_cg = -0.05 tooltip = consumer_goods_factor_tooltip }
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		add_tech_bonus = {
			name = RUS_new_refineries
			bonus = 0.33
			uses = 1
			category = synth_resources
		}
		add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
			type = motorized_equipment
			amount = 500
			producer = USA
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.114 option russia_foreign_policy_events.114.britain"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.114.britain
		trigger = {
			FROM = {
				OR = {
					original_tag = IMP
					tag = GBP
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = {
			localization_key = tooltip_modify_dynmod
			DYNMOD = RUS_state_export
		}
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_export_pp = 0.02 tooltip = political_power_gain_tooltip }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_export_cg = -0.03 tooltip = consumer_goods_factor_tooltip }
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
			type = convoy
			amount = 100
			producer = CAN
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.114 option russia_foreign_policy_events.114.britain_colonies"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.114.britain_colonies
		trigger = {
			FROM = {
				OR = {
					is_indian_tag = yes
					tag = SAF
					tag = AST
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = {
			localization_key = tooltip_modify_dynmod
			DYNMOD = RUS_state_export
		}
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_export_pp = 0.02 tooltip = political_power_gain_tooltip }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_export_cg = -0.02 tooltip = consumer_goods_factor_tooltip }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.114 option russia_foreign_policy_events.114.china"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.114.china
		trigger = { FROM = { is_chinese_tag = yes } }
		custom_effect_tooltip = {
			localization_key = tooltip_modify_dynmod
			DYNMOD = RUS_state_export
		}
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_export_pp = 0.04 tooltip = political_power_gain_tooltip }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_export_cg = -0.05 tooltip = consumer_goods_factor_tooltip }
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		if = {
			limit = { FROM = { tag = CHN } }
			408 = { add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1 }
			409 = { add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1 }
			657 = { add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.114 option russia_foreign_policy_events.114.danube_mediterranean"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.114.danube_mediterranean
		trigger = {
			FROM = {
				OR = {
					is_danubian_tag = yes
					is_italian_tag = yes
					tag = NFA
					tag = FRP
					tag = TUR
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = {
			localization_key = tooltip_modify_dynmod
			DYNMOD = RUS_state_export
		}
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_export_pp = 0.02 tooltip = political_power_gain_tooltip }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_state_export_cg = -0.03 tooltip = consumer_goods_factor_tooltip }
	}
}

country_event = { #Russia approaches Entente (RUSKAPA)
	id = russia_foreign_policy_events.117
	title = russia_foreign_policy_events.117.t
	desc = russia_foreign_policy_events.117.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.117 option russia_foreign_policy_events.117.a"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.117.a
		add_political_power = -25
		add_offsite_building = { type = arms_factory level = 1 }
		add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
			type = infantry_equipment
			amount = 1000
			producer = RUS
		}
		add_fuel = 2600
		effect_tooltip = {
			RUS = {
				add_ideas = RUS_ruskapa
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = ENT
					modifier = RUS_ruskapa_deal
				}
				set_temp_variable = { RUS_influence_change = -1 }
				RUS_change_german_economic_influence = yes
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS = {
				country_event = { id = russia_foreign_policy_events.118 days = 5 }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.117 option russia_foreign_policy_events.117.b"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.117.b
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS = {
				country_event = { id = russia_foreign_policy_events.119 days = 5 }
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Decision for approach to China
	id = russia_foreign_policy_events.125
	title = russia_foreign_policy_events.125.t
	desc = russia_foreign_policy_events.125.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_FNG_railway_map
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Wargoals against all China tags
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.125 option russia_foreign_policy_events.125.a"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.125.a
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					var:650.owner = { is_ally_with = JAP } #Chonqing
					NOT = { country_exists = CUF }
				}
				var:608.owner = { #Beijing
					has_socialist_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				RUS_savinkov = yes
				var:608.owner = { #Beijing
					has_socialist_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
		add_named_threat = {
			threat = 5
			name = russia_foreign_policy_events.125.a
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_chinese_tag = yes
				ROOT = { can_declare_war_on = PREV }
			}
			ROOT = {
				create_wargoal = {
					type = topple_government
					target = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #Trade deal
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.125 option russia_foreign_policy_events.125.b"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.125.b
		add_political_power = 50
		set_country_flag = RUS_sino_russian_relations_peaceful
		effect_tooltip = {
			activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_trade_deal_china target = CHN }
		}
		LEC_remove_from_legation_council = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Trade with Russia
	id = russia_foreign_policy_events.126
	title = russia_foreign_policy_events.126.t
	desc = russia_foreign_policy_events.126.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_FNG_railway_map
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {

		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.126.a
		add_stability = 0.05
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_china_trade_deal }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_china_trade_deal
				add_idea = RUS_china_trade_deal_2
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_ideas = RUS_china_trade_deal
		}
		add_opinion_modifier = { modifier = KR_trade_agreement target = FROM }
		diplomatic_relation = {
			country = FROM relation = non_aggression_pact active = yes
		}
		FROM = {
			add_stability = 0.05
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = RUS_china_trade_deal }
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = RUS_china_trade_deal
					add_idea = RUS_china_trade_deal_2
				}
			}
			else = {
				add_ideas = RUS_china_trade_deal
			}
			add_opinion_modifier = { modifier = KR_trade_agreement target = ROOT }
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.126 option russia_foreign_policy_events.126.b"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.126.b
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
	}

			owns_state = 608 #Beijing

			owns_state = 716 #Liaoning
			owns_state = 592 #Guangzhou
			owns_state = 650 #Chongqing

			NOT = { has_war_with = JAP }
			NOT = { has_war_with = RUS }

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = national_populist

			CHN = { has_socialist_government = no }

		FER = { exists = no }

country_event = { #Russia Approachs... And Presents...
	id = russia_foreign_policy_events.128
	title = russia_foreign_policy_events.128.t
	desc = russia_foreign_policy_events.128.desc
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kremlin4

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS = { country_event = { id = russia_foreign_policy_events.129 days = 30 } } #Outcome of the Vladivostok Conference
		}
	}

	option = { #Sure
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.128 option russia_foreign_policy_events.128.a"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.128.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_idea = RUS_chinese_military_mission_idea
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_idea = RUS_china_trade_deal
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_opinion = { target = RUS value > 100 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				has_democratic_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					ETS = { is_ally_with = RUS }
					617 = { is_owned_by = RUS } #Dihua
				}
			}
		}
		set_global_flag = RUS_CHN_postwar_agreement
	}
	option = { #Gib Mongol claims
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.128 option russia_foreign_policy_events.128.b"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.128.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					ETS = { is_ally_with = RUS }
					617 = { is_owned_by = RUS } #Dihua
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_authoritarian_government = yes
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				MON = { is_ally_with = RUS }
				330 = { is_owned_by = RUS } #Mongolia
			}
		}
		set_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_mongolia
	}
	option = { #Gib East Turkestan
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.128 option russia_foreign_policy_events.128.c"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.128.c
		ai_chance = { base = 50 }
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				ETS = { is_ally_with = RUS }
				617 = { is_owned_by = RUS } #Dihua
			}
		}
		set_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_xinjiang
	}
	option = { #Gib Mongol claims and all of East Turkestan
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.128 option russia_foreign_policy_events.128.e"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.128.e
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_authoritarian_government = yes
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				MON = { is_ally_with = RUS }
				330 = { is_owned_by = RUS } #Mongolia
			}
			OR = {
				ETS = { is_ally_with = RUS }
				617 = { is_owned_by = RUS } #Dihua
			}
		}
		set_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_mongolia
		set_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_xinjiang
	}
	option = { #How about no?
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.128 option russia_foreign_policy_events.128.f"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.128.f
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		set_global_flag = RUS_CHN_no_agreement
	}
}

country_event = { #Outcome of the Vladivostok Conference
	id = russia_foreign_policy_events.129
	title = russia_foreign_policy_events.129.t
	desc = {
		text = russia_foreign_policy_events.129.desc1
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_CHN_postwar_agreement
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = russia_foreign_policy_events.129.desc2
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_mongolia
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_xinjiang }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = russia_foreign_policy_events.129.desc3
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_xinjiang
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_mongolia }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = russia_foreign_policy_events.129.desc4
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_mongolia
			has_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_xinjiang
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = russia_foreign_policy_events.129.desc5
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_CHN_no_agreement
		}
	}

	trigger = {
		is_faction_leader = yes
		FROM = {
			exists = yes
			is_subject = no
			at_war_with_or_justifying_wargoal_against_ROOT = no
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Cool
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.129 option russia_foreign_policy_events.129.a"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.129.a
		trigger = { has_global_flag = RUS_CHN_postwar_agreement }
		diplomatic_relation = {
			country = FROM
			relation = non_aggression_pact
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_chinese_military_mission_idea }
			remove_ideas = RUS_chinese_military_mission_idea
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_china_trade_deal }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_china_trade_deal
				add_idea = RUS_china_trade_deal_2
			}
			FROM = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_idea = RUS_china_trade_deal }
					swap_ideas = {
						remove_idea = RUS_china_trade_deal
						add_idea = RUS_china_trade_deal_2
					}
				}
				else = {
					add_ideas = RUS_china_trade_deal_2
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_ideas = RUS_china_trade_deal
			FROM = { add_ideas = RUS_china_trade_deal }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				country_exists = MON
				MON = {
					is_in_faction = no
					is_subject = no
				}
			}
			FROM = { give_guarantee = MON }
			give_guarantee = MON
		}
		clr_global_flag = RUS_CHN_postwar_agreement
	}
	option = { #Sure
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.129 option russia_foreign_policy_events.129.b"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.129.b
		ai_chance = { base = 50 }
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_mongolia
				has_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_xinjiang
			}
		}
		diplomatic_relation = {
			country = FROM
			relation = non_aggression_pact
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_chinese_military_mission_idea }
			remove_ideas = RUS_chinese_military_mission_idea
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_china_trade_deal }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_china_trade_deal
				add_idea = RUS_china_trade_deal_2
			}
			FROM = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_idea = RUS_china_trade_deal }
					swap_ideas = {
						remove_idea = RUS_china_trade_deal
						add_idea = RUS_china_trade_deal_2
					}
				}
				else = {
					add_ideas = RUS_china_trade_deal_2
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_ideas = RUS_china_trade_deal
			FROM = { add_ideas = RUS_china_trade_deal }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_xinjiang
				ETS = { is_ally_with = ROOT }
			}
			ETS = { remove_puppet_and_leave_faction = yes }
			FROM = { puppet = ETS }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_xinjiang
				NOT = { country_exists = ETS }
				617 = { is_owned_by = ROOT } #Dihua
			}
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = { is_xinjiang = yes }
				transfer_state_to = FROM
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_mongolia
				MON = { is_ally_with = ROOT }
			}
			MON = { remove_puppet_and_leave_faction = yes }
			FROM = { puppet = MON }
			MON = {
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = { region = 222 } #Inner Mongolia - Inner Mongolia = Chinese areas, Outer Mongolia = "Modern Mongolia"
					transfer_state_to = FROM
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_mongolia
				NOT = { country_exists = MON }
				330 = { is_owned_by = ROOT } #Mongolia
			}
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = { is_mongolia = yes }
				transfer_state_to = FROM
			}
		}
		clr_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_mongolia
		clr_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_xinjiang
	}
	option = { #Nope
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.129 option russia_foreign_policy_events.129.c"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.129.c
		ai_chance = { base = 50 }
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_mongolia
				has_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_xinjiang
			}
		}
		clr_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_mongolia
		clr_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_xinjiang
	}
	option = { #China tells us to go away
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.129 option russia_foreign_policy_events.129.d"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.129.d
		trigger = { has_global_flag = RUS_CHN_no_agreement }
		clr_global_flag = RUS_CHN_no_agreement
	}
}

country_event = { #Time for a Truce? #CHN offers peace
	id = russia_foreign_policy_events.130
	title = russia_foreign_policy_events.130.t
	desc = russia_foreign_policy_events.130.d
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		is_chinese_tag = yes #to limit checks a bit
		tag = CHN
		var:566.owner = { #Irkutsk
			has_war_with = ROOT
			tag = var:global.russia
			is_valid_peace_target = yes
		}
		is_valid_peace_target = yes
		var:566.owner = { surrender_progress > 0.15 }
		count_triggers = {
			amount = 2
			408 = { #Vladivostok
				owner = { is_ally_with = 566.owner }
				controller = { is_ally_with = ROOT }
			}
			566 = { #Irkutsk
				owner = { is_ally_with = 566.owner }
				controller = { is_ally_with = ROOT }
			}
			407 = { #Tashkent
				owner = { is_ally_with = 566.owner }
				controller = { is_ally_with = ROOT }
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 14
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.130 option russia_foreign_policy_events.130.a"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.130.a
		var:566.owner = { country_event = russia_foreign_policy_events.132 }
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.130 option russia_foreign_policy_events.130.b"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.130.b
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		add_war_support = -0.2
	}
}

country_event = { #Time for a Truce? #RUS receives peace
	id = russia_foreign_policy_events.132
	title = russia_foreign_policy_events.132.t
	desc = russia_foreign_policy_events.132.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.132 option russia_foreign_policy_events.132.a"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.132.a
		if = {
			limit = { FROM = { original_tag = JAP } }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_lose_to_japan_tt
			FROM = { country_event = russia_foreign_policy_events.133 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { FROM = { original_tag = MON } }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_lose_to_mongolia_tt
			FROM = { country_event = russia_foreign_policy_events.1350 }
		}
		else = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_lose_to_china_tt
			FROM = { country_event = russia_foreign_policy_events.135 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.132 option russia_foreign_policy_events.132.b"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.132.b
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		add_war_support = -0.2
		FROM = { country_event = russia_foreign_policy_events.134 }
	}
}
country_event = { #End of the Second Russo-Japanese War (can only fire if FER does not exist)
	id = russia_foreign_policy_events.133
	title = russia_foreign_policy_events.133.t
	desc = russia_foreign_policy_events.133.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.133 option russia_foreign_policy_events.133.a"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.133.a
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { owns_state = 577 } } #North Sakhalin
			transfer_state = 577
		}
		set_temp_variable = { target = ROOT }
		if = {
			limit = { #Larger FER if Japan controls China
				var:608.owner = { is_ally_with = ROOT } #Beijing
				var:884.owner = { is_ally_with = ROOT } #Hulunbuir
			}
			every_state = {
				limit = {
					owner = { is_ally_with = FROM }
					OR = {
						is_core_of = ROOT
						is_claimed_by = ROOT
						is_mongolia = yes
						AND = {
							CHN = { is_subject_of = JAP }
							is_claimed_by = CHN
						}
						region = 148 #Primorye
						region = 260 #Amur
						region = 259 #Transbaikal
						region = 149 #Russian Far East
						state = 644 #Northeastern Siberia
					}
				}
				transfer_state_during_war = yes
			}
		}
		else = {
			every_state = {
				limit = {
					owner = { is_ally_with = FROM }
					OR = {
						is_core_of = ROOT
						is_claimed_by = ROOT
						region = 148 #Primorye
						region = 260 #Amur
					}
				}
				transfer_state_during_war = yes
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			FROM = {
				white_peace_with_ROOT = yes
				set_truce = { target = FROM days = 1095 }
			}
			every_enemy_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_ally_with = FROM
						has_guaranteed = FROM
						is_guaranteed_by = FROM
					}
					NOT = { tag = FROM }
				}
				white_peace_with_ROOT = yes
				set_truce = { target = FROM days = 1095 }
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			add_state_claim = 577
			FROM = { white_peace_with_ROOT = yes }
			every_enemy_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_ally_with = FROM
						has_guaranteed = FROM
						is_guaranteed_by = FROM
					}
					is_valid_peace_target_against_PREV = yes
				}
				white_peace_with_ROOT = yes
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_ally_with = FROM
						has_guaranteed = FROM
						is_guaranteed_by = FROM
					}
				}
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = PREV
					relation = non_aggression_pact
				}
				set_truce = { target = FROM days = 1095 }
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Second Treaty of Aigun #for CHN
	id = russia_foreign_policy_events.135
	title = russia_foreign_policy_events.135.t
	desc = russia_foreign_policy_events.135.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.135 option russia_foreign_policy_events.135.a"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.135.a
		set_temp_variable = { target = ROOT }
		every_state = {
			limit = {
				owner = { is_ally_with = FROM }
				OR = {
					is_core_of = ROOT
					is_claimed_by = ROOT #Only transfer Outer Manchuria if China has claims on it
					is_core_china = yes
					is_mongolia = yes
					is_xinjiang = yes
					is_tibet = yes
					state = 329 #Tuva
					state = 1042 #Badakshan
				}
			}
			transfer_state_during_war = yes
			if = {
				limit = { state = 329 } #Tua
				add_claim_of_ROOT = yes
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			FROM = {
				white_peace_with_ROOT = yes
				set_truce = { target = FROM days = 1095 }
			}
			every_enemy_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_ally_with = FROM
						has_guaranteed = FROM
						is_guaranteed_by = FROM
					}
					NOT = { tag = FROM }
				}
				white_peace_with_ROOT = yes
				set_truce = { target = FROM days = 1095 }
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			FROM = { white_peace_with_ROOT = yes }
			every_enemy_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_ally_with = FROM
						has_guaranteed = FROM
						is_guaranteed_by = FROM
					}
					is_valid_peace_target_against_PREV = yes
				}
				white_peace_with_ROOT = yes
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_ally_with = FROM
						has_guaranteed = FROM
						is_guaranteed_by = FROM
					}
				}
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = PREV
					relation = non_aggression_pact
				}
				set_truce = { target = FROM days = 1095 }
			}
		}
	}
}

### Post-WK2 Foreign Policy ###

country_event = { #Russia Demands Our Subjugation
	id = russia_foreign_policy_events.150
	title = russia_foreign_policy_events.150.t
	desc = russia_foreign_policy_events.150.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_border

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.150 option russia_foreign_policy_events.150.a"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.150.a #Yes
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				add = 70
				is_in_faction = no
				FROM = {
					surrender_progress < 0.01
					NOT = { any_enemy_country = { is_actual_major = yes } }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_claim_or_core_of_FROM = yes
						any_of = {
							array = FROM.faction_members
							OR = {
								is_claimed_by = var:v
								is_core_of = var:v
							}
						}
						any_of = {
							array = FROM.subjects
							OR = {
								is_claimed_by = var:v
								is_core_of = var:v
							}
						}
					}
				}
				FROM = { transfer_state = PREV }
			}
			FROM = { puppet = ROOT }
		}
		FROM = { country_event = { id = russia_foreign_policy_events.151 days = 2 } }
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.150 option russia_foreign_policy_events.150.b"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.150.b #No
		ai_chance = {
			base = 80
			modifier = {
				add = -70
				is_in_faction = no
				FROM = {
					surrender_progress < 0.01
					NOT = { any_enemy_country = { is_actual_major = yes } }
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = {
			localization_key = may_lead_to_war_with
			COUNTRY = "[RUS.GetNameDef]"
		}
		FROM = { country_event = { id = russia_foreign_policy_events.152 days = 2 } }
	}
}

country_event = { #FROM Accepts
	id = russia_foreign_policy_events.151
	title = russia_foreign_policy_events.151.t
	desc = russia_foreign_policy_events.151.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_border

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.151 option russia_foreign_policy_events.151.a"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.151.a
		remove_targeted_decision = { target = FROM decision = RUS_subjugate_eastern_europe }
		FROM = {
			get_current_government_type = yes
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = yes
						any_of = {
							array = ROOT.faction_members
							OR = {
								is_claimed_by = var:v
								is_core_of = var:v
							}
						}
						any_of = {
							array = ROOT.subjects
							OR = {
								is_claimed_by = var:v
								is_core_of = var:v
							}
						}
					}
				}
				ROOT = { transfer_state = PREV }
			}
		}
		set_autonomy = {
			target = FROM
			autonomy_state = autonomous_puppet
			end_wars = no
		}
		hidden_effect = { FROM = { restore_previous_government_type = yes } }
	}
}

country_event = { #FROM Refuses
	id = russia_foreign_policy_events.152
	title = russia_foreign_policy_events.152.t
	desc = russia_foreign_policy_events.152.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.152 option russia_foreign_policy_events.152.a"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.152.a #War
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.152 option russia_foreign_policy_events.152.b"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.152.b #Back down
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		remove_targeted_decision = { target = FROM decision = RUS_subjugate_eastern_europe }
		FROM = {
			set_country_flag = RUS_cannot_subjugate
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Russia Requests Lifting of the Restrictions
	id = russia_foreign_policy_events.153
	title = russia_foreign_policy_events.153.t
	desc = russia_foreign_policy_events.153.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army3

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.153 option russia_foreign_policy_events.153.a"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.153.a #I suppose we cannot hold them forever
		ai_chance = {
			base = 70
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_authoritarian_government = yes
			}
		}
		FROM = { country_event = russia_foreign_policy_events.154 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.153 option russia_foreign_policy_events.153.b"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.153.b #Absolutely not!
		ai_chance = {
			base = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_democratic_government = yes
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -40
		FROM = { country_event = russia_foreign_policy_events.155 }
	}
}

	desc = russia_foreign_policy_events.154.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army3

country_event = { #Germany Refuses to Lift the Army Restrictions
	id = russia_foreign_policy_events.155
	title = russia_foreign_policy_events.155.t
	desc = russia_foreign_policy_events.155.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army3
	trigger = { country_exists = GER }
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.155 option russia_foreign_policy_events.155.a"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.155.a
		add_stability = -0.05
		add_political_power = -50
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Anti Internationale Pact Event
	id = russia_foreign_policy_events.202
	title = russia_foreign_policy_events.202.t
	desc = russia_foreign_policy_events.202.d

	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_october

	option = { #We shall join the crusade against the reds
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.202 option russia_foreign_policy_events.202.a"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.202.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_opinion = { target = FROM value > 20 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 6
				is_ally_with = ENT
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				has_authoritarian_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_soccon_or_marlib_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_soclib_or_socdem_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					tag = SCA
					tag = SWI
					AND = {
						tag = IRE
						OR = {
							has_guarantor = yes
							IRE_has_american_guarantor = yes
						}
						NOT = { is_guaranteed_by = RUS }
						NOT = { has_country_flag = IRE_got_guarantee_WCA }
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = IRE
				has_game_rule = { rule = IRE_forpol option = IRE_FORPOL_NEUT }
				has_war = no
			}
		}
		add_ideas = RUS_anti_internationale_pact
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { is_guaranteed_by = RUS } }
			RUS = { give_guarantee = ROOT }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			FRA = { country_event = russia_foreign_policy_events.203 }
			RUS = { country_event = russia_foreign_policy_events.203 }
		}
	}
	option = { #None of our business
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.202 option russia_foreign_policy_events.202.b"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.202.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				has_opinion = { target = INT value > 20 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				is_subject_of = FROM
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				is_ally_with = FROM
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_soclib_or_socdem_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				RUS = { has_authoritarian_government = yes }
				has_democratic_government = yes
				NOT = {
					is_ally_with = ENT
					is_ally_with = RUS
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			FROM = { country_event = { id = russia_foreign_policy_events.75 hours = 8 } }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Response and warning for RUS and FRA
	id = russia_foreign_policy_events.203
	title = russia_foreign_policy_events.203.t
	desc = russia_foreign_policy_events.203.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		trigger = { tag = RUS }
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.203 option russia_foreign_policy_events.203.a"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.203.a
	}
	option = {
		trigger = { tag = FRA }
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.203 option russia_foreign_policy_events.203.b"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.203.b
	}
	after = {
		effect_tooltip = {
			FROM = { add_ideas = RUS_anti_internationale_pact }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Tilsit Conference Start
	id = russia_foreign_policy_events.204
	title = russia_foreign_policy_events.204.t
	desc = russia_foreign_policy_events.204.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.204 option russia_foreign_policy_events.204.a"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.204.a #Sure thing
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_conference option = RUS_CONFERENCE_FAILURE }
			}
		}
		RUS = { country_event = { id = russia_foreign_policy_events.206 days = 1 } }
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.204 option russia_foreign_policy_events.204.b"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.204.b #Waste of time
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_conference option = RUS_CONFERENCE_FAILURE }
			}
		}
		RUS = { country_event = { id = russia_foreign_policy_events.205 days = 1 } }
	}
}

country_event = { #Tilsit Conference Demands
	id = russia_foreign_policy_events.207
	title = russia_foreign_policy_events.207.t
	desc = russia_foreign_policy_events.207.desc

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Demand mutual guarantees to remaining neutral countries in Europe (clause a)
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.207 option russia_foreign_policy_events.207.a"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.207.a
		trigger = {
			RUS = { NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_clause_a_agreed } }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				has_authoritarian_government = no
				NOT = { has_government = totalist }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_conference option = RUS_CONFERENCE_SUCCESS }
				RUS = { NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_clause_b_agreed } }
				tag = RUS
				ENT = { is_faction_leader = yes }
				OR = {
					has_global_flag = USA_civil_war_over_flag
					AND = {
						NOT = { WCA = { is_ally_with = INT } }
						NOT = { USA = { is_ally_with = ENT } }
						NOT = { ACC = { is_ally_with = ENT } }
						NOT = { NEE = { is_ally_with = ENT } }
						NOT = { APG = { is_ally_with = ENT } }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { tag = RUS }
			if = {
				limit = {
					ENG = { is_ai = no }
					INT = {
						tag = FRA
						is_ai = yes
					}
				}
				ENG = { country_event = { id = russia_foreign_policy_events.208 days = 1 } }
			}
			else = {
				INT = { country_event = { id = russia_foreign_policy_events.208 days = 1 } }
			}
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_power_change = -5 }
			RUS_change_projection = yes
		}
		else = {
			RUS = { country_event = { id = russia_foreign_policy_events.208 days = 1 } }
		}
	}
	option = { #Demand White Peace with Entente (clause b)
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.207 option russia_foreign_policy_events.207.b"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.207.b
		trigger = {
			RUS = { NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_clause_b_agreed } }
			tag = RUS
			ENT = { is_faction_leader = yes }
			OR = {
				has_global_flag = USA_civil_war_over_flag
				AND = {
					NOT = { WCA = { is_ally_with = INT } }
					NOT = { USA = { is_ally_with = ENT } }
					NOT = { ACC = { is_ally_with = ENT } }
					NOT = { NEE = { is_ally_with = ENT } }
					NOT = { APG = { is_ally_with = ENT } }
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 3
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				OR = {
					is_monarchy = yes
					RUS_savinkov = yes
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { tag = RUS }
			custom_effect_tooltip = russia_foreign_policy_events.207.b.tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
			if = {
				limit = {
					ENG = { is_ai = no }
					INT = {
						tag = FRA
						is_ai = yes
					}
				}
				ENG = { country_event = { id = russia_foreign_policy_events.211 days = 1 } }
			}
			else = {
				INT = { country_event = { id = russia_foreign_policy_events.211 days = 1 } }
			}
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_power_change = -5 }
			RUS_change_projection = yes
		}
		else = {
			RUS = { country_event = { id = russia_foreign_policy_events.211 days = 1 } }
		}
	}
	option = { #Demand Mutual Army Limits (clause c)
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.207 option russia_foreign_policy_events.207.c"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.207.c
		trigger = {
			RUS = { NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_clause_c_agreed } }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				has_soclib_or_socdem_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				OR = {
					has_government = syndicalist
					has_government = radical_socialist
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_conference option = RUS_CONFERENCE_SUCCESS }
				RUS = { NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_clause_b_agreed } }
				tag = RUS
				ENT = { is_faction_leader = yes }
				OR = {
					has_global_flag = USA_civil_war_over_flag
					AND = {
						NOT = { WCA = { is_ally_with = INT } }
						NOT = { USA = { is_ally_with = ENT } }
						NOT = { ACC = { is_ally_with = ENT } }
						NOT = { NEE = { is_ally_with = ENT } }
						NOT = { APG = { is_ally_with = ENT } }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		show_ideas_tooltip = RUS_army_limits
		if = {
			limit = { tag = RUS }
			if = {
				limit = {
					ENG = { is_ai = no }
					INT = {
						tag = FRA
						is_ai = yes
					}
				}
				ENG = { country_event = { id = russia_foreign_policy_events.212 days = 1 } }
			}
			else = {
				INT = { country_event = { id = russia_foreign_policy_events.212 days = 1 } }
			}
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_power_change = -5 }
			RUS_change_projection = yes
		}
		else = {
			RUS = { country_event = { id = russia_foreign_policy_events.212 days = 1 } }
		}
	}
	option = { #Demand Embargo of Entente (clause d)
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.207 option russia_foreign_policy_events.207.d"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.207.d
		trigger = {
			RUS = { NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_clause_d_agreed } }
			is_ally_with = INT
			ENT = { is_faction_leader = yes }
		}
		ai_chance = { base = 10 }
		RUS = { country_event = { id = russia_foreign_policy_events.213 days = 1 } }
	}
	option = { #That's all for now
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.207 option russia_foreign_policy_events.207.e"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.207.e
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				RUS = { NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_clause_b_agreed } }
				has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_conference option = RUS_CONFERENCE_SUCCESS }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_clause_a_agreed }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_clause_b_agreed }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_clause_c_agreed }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_clause_d_agreed }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { tag = RUS }
			if = {
				limit = {
					ENG = { is_ai = no }
					INT = {
						tag = FRA
						is_ai = yes
					}
				}
				ENG = { country_event = { id = russia_foreign_policy_events.207 days = 1 } }
			}
			else = {
				INT = { country_event = { id = russia_foreign_policy_events.207 days = 1 } }
			}
		}
		else = {
			country_event = { id = russia_foreign_policy_events.214 days = 1 }
			RUS = { country_event = { id = russia_foreign_policy_events.214 days = 1 } }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Other party demands mutual guarantees to remaining neutral countries in Europe (clause a)
	id = russia_foreign_policy_events.208
	title = russia_foreign_policy_events.208.t
	desc = russia_foreign_policy_events.208.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Sure
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.208 option russia_foreign_policy_events.208.a"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.208.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 45
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_conference option = RUS_CONFERENCE_FAILURE }
			}
		}
		RUS = { set_country_flag = RUS_clause_a_agreed }
		RUS = { set_country_flag = RUS_clause_a_agreed_response }
		hidden_effect = {
			FROM = { country_event = { id = russia_foreign_policy_events.209 days = 1 } }
		}
	}
	option = { #Nope we're out
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.208 option russia_foreign_policy_events.208.b"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.208.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_conference option = RUS_CONFERENCE_SUCCESS }
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_foreign_policy_events.210 days = 1 }
			FROM = { country_event = { id = russia_foreign_policy_events.210 days = 1 } }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # Russian/3I notification of agreement for clauses
	id = russia_foreign_policy_events.209
	title = {
		text = russia_foreign_policy_events.209.t1
		trigger = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_clause_a_agreed_response } }
	}
	title = {
		text = russia_foreign_policy_events.209.t2
		trigger = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_clause_b_agreed_response } }
	}
	title = {
		text = russia_foreign_policy_events.209.t3
		trigger = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_clause_c_agreed_response } }
	}
	title = {
		text = russia_foreign_policy_events.209.t4
		trigger = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_clause_d_agreed_response } }
	}
	desc = {
		text = russia_foreign_policy_events.209.d1
		trigger = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_clause_a_agreed_response } }
	}
	desc = {
		text = russia_foreign_policy_events.209.d2
		trigger = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_clause_b_agreed_response } }
	}
	desc = {
		text = russia_foreign_policy_events.209.d3
		trigger = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_clause_c_agreed_response } }
	}
	desc = {
		text = russia_foreign_policy_events.209.d4
		trigger = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_clause_d_agreed_response } }
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Wonderful
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.209 option russia_foreign_policy_events.209.a"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.209.a
		RUS = { clr_country_flag = RUS_clause_a_agreed_response }
		RUS = { clr_country_flag = RUS_clause_b_agreed_response }
		RUS = { clr_country_flag = RUS_clause_c_agreed_response }
		RUS = { clr_country_flag = RUS_clause_d_agreed_response }
		country_event = { id = russia_foreign_policy_events.207 days = 1 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Negotiations collapse
	id = russia_foreign_policy_events.210
	title = russia_foreign_policy_events.210.t
	desc = russia_foreign_policy_events.210.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Oh welp
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.210 option russia_foreign_policy_events.210.a"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.210.a
		if = {
			limit = { tag = RUS }
			set_global_flag = tilsit_peace_collapsed
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Other party demands white peace with Entente (clause b)
	id = russia_foreign_policy_events.211
	title = russia_foreign_policy_events.211.t
	desc = russia_foreign_policy_events.211.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Sure
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.211 option russia_foreign_policy_events.211.a"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.211.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_conference option = RUS_CONFERENCE_FAILURE }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				WCA = { is_ally_with = INT }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_conference option = RUS_CONFERENCE_SUCCESS } }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 5
				strength_ratio = { tag = RUS ratio < 0.3 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 5
				var:361.owner = { is_ally_with = IMP }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 5
				INT = {
					any_neighbor_country = { is_in_faction_with = RUS }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 5
				GRU = { is_in_faction_with = RUS }
				any_state_of = {
					target = { 8 51 55 741 781 } #Luxembourg, Eastern Rhineland, Hesse, Verviers, Western Rhineland
					owner = { is_ally_with = RUS }
				}
			}
		}
		RUS = { set_country_flag = RUS_clause_b_agreed }
		RUS = { set_country_flag = RUS_clause_b_agreed_response }
		hidden_effect = {
			FROM = { country_event = { id = russia_foreign_policy_events.209 days = 1 } }
		}
	}
	option = { #Nope we're out
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.211 option russia_foreign_policy_events.211.b"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.211.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				add = -5
				var:361.owner = { is_ally_with = IMP }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_conference option = RUS_CONFERENCE_SUCCESS }
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			FROM = { country_event = { id = russia_foreign_policy_events.210 days = 1 } }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Other party demands mutual army limits (clause c)
	id = russia_foreign_policy_events.212
	title = russia_foreign_policy_events.212.t
	desc = russia_foreign_policy_events.212.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Sure
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.212 option russia_foreign_policy_events.212.a"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.212.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_dictatorship_government = yes
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_conference option = RUS_CONFERENCE_SUCCESS } }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				OR = {
					has_soclib_or_socdem_government = yes
					RUS_maklakov = yes
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				has_socialist_government = yes
				ENG = { has_government = radical_socialist }
			}
		}
		RUS = { set_country_flag = RUS_clause_c_agreed }
		RUS = { set_country_flag = RUS_clause_c_agreed_response }
		hidden_effect = {
			FROM = { country_event = { id = russia_foreign_policy_events.209 days = 1 } }
		}
		show_ideas_tooltip = RUS_army_limits
	}
	option = { #Nope we're out
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.212 option russia_foreign_policy_events.212.b"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.212.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_conference option = RUS_CONFERENCE_SUCCESS }
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			FROM = { country_event = { id = russia_foreign_policy_events.210 days = 1 } }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Other party demands embargo and cutting of relations with Entente (clause d)
	id = russia_foreign_policy_events.213
	title = russia_foreign_policy_events.213.t
	desc = russia_foreign_policy_events.213.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Sure
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.213 option russia_foreign_policy_events.213.a"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.213.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				OR = {
					has_soclib_or_socdem_government = yes
					RUS_maklakov = yes
				}
			}
		}
		RUS = { set_country_flag = RUS_clause_d_agreed }
		RUS = { set_country_flag = RUS_clause_d_agreed_response }
		hidden_effect = {
			FROM = { country_event = { id = russia_foreign_policy_events.209 days = 1 } }
		}
	}
	option = { #Nope we're out
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.213 option russia_foreign_policy_events.213.b"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.213.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				is_monarchy = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				RUS_savinkov = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_conference option = RUS_CONFERENCE_SUCCESS }
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			FROM = { country_event = { id = russia_foreign_policy_events.210 days = 1 } }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Tilsit Succeeds
	id = russia_foreign_policy_events.214
	title = russia_foreign_policy_events.214.t
	desc = russia_foreign_policy_events.214.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.214 option russia_foreign_policy_events.214.a"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.214.a
		if = {
			limit = { tag = RUS }
			every_other_country = {
				limit = { is_ally_with = INT }
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = PREV
					relation = non_aggression_pact
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_power_change = 10 }
			RUS_change_projection = yes
			hidden_effect = { news_event = { id = russia_news_events.26 days = 1 } }
		}
		if = { #Executes clause a
			limit = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_clause_a_agreed } }
			if = {
				limit = { tag = RUS }
				every_other_country = {
					limit = {
						is_in_europe = yes
						NOT = { has_war_with = INT }
						NOT = { has_war_with = RUS }
						NOT = { is_ally_with = RUS }
						NOT = { is_ally_with = INT }
						NOT = { is_ally_with = ENT }
						NOT = { is_guaranteed_by = RUS }
					}
					add_to_array = { RUS.RUS_guarantee_countries = THIS }
					for_each_loop = {
						array = RUS.RUS_guarantee_countries
						value = v
						RUS = { give_guarantee = v }
					}
				}
				RUS = { set_country_flag = clause_a_done_3I }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						tag = ENG
						tag = FRA
					}
				}
				every_other_country = {
					limit = {
						is_in_europe = yes
						NOT = { has_war_with = INT }
						NOT = { has_war_with = RUS }
						NOT = { is_ally_with = RUS }
						NOT = { is_ally_with = INT }
						NOT = { is_ally_with = ENT }
						NOT = { is_guaranteed_by = ENG }
					}
					add_to_array = { ENG.ENG_guarantee_countries = THIS }
					for_each_loop = {
						array = ENG.ENG_guarantee_countries
						value = v
						ENG = { give_guarantee = v }
					}
				}
				every_other_country = {
					limit = {
						is_in_europe = yes
						NOT = { has_war_with = INT }
						NOT = { has_war_with = RUS }
						NOT = { is_ally_with = RUS }
						NOT = { is_ally_with = INT }
						NOT = { is_ally_with = ENT }
						NOT = { is_guaranteed_by = FRA }
					}
					add_to_array = { FRA.FRA_guarantee_countries = THIS }
					for_each_loop = {
						array = FRA.FRA_guarantee_countries
						value = v
						FRA = { give_guarantee = v }
					}
				}
				RUS = { set_country_flag = RUS_clause_a_done }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_clause_a_done }
					RUS = { has_country_flag = clause_a_done_3I }
				}
				RUS = { clr_country_flag = RUS_clause_a_agreed }
				RUS = { clr_country_flag = RUS_clause_a_done }
				RUS = { clr_country_flag = clause_a_done_3I }
			}
		}
		if = { #Executes clause b
			limit = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_clause_b_agreed } }
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					is_ally_with = ENT
					has_war_with = INT
					OR = {
						AND = {
							has_capitulated = yes
							any_owned_state = {
								OR = {
									controller = { is_ally_with = INT }
									any_neighbor_state = { controller = { is_ally_with = INT } }
								}
								impassable = no
							}
						}
						AND = {
							has_civil_war = yes
							any_enemy_country = {
								civilwar_target = PREV
								is_ally_with = INT
							}
						}
						AND = {
							any_home_area_neighbor_country = {
								is_ally_with = INT
								has_war_with = PREV
								same_continent_as_PREV = yes
								has_capitulated = no
							}
						}
						AND = {
							any_home_area_neighbor_country = {
								is_ally_with = INT
								has_war_with = PREV
								has_capitulated = no
							}
							meta_trigger = {
								text = {
									[ORIGINAL_CAPITAL] = { controller = { is_ally_with = INT } }
								}
								ORIGINAL_CAPITAL = "[THIS.OriginalCapital.GetId]"
							}
						}
					}
				}
				leave_faction = yes
				peace_out_non_neighbours_after_leaving_faction = yes
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					is_ally_with = INT
					has_war_with = ENT
					OR = {
						AND = {
							has_capitulated = yes
							any_owned_state = {
								OR = {
									controller = { is_ally_with = ENT }
									any_neighbor_state = { controller = { is_ally_with = ENT } }
								}
								impassable = no
							}
						}
						AND = {
							has_civil_war = yes
							any_enemy_country = {
								civilwar_target = PREV
								is_ally_with = ENT
							}
						}
						AND = {
							any_home_area_neighbor_country = {
								is_ally_with = ENT
								has_war_with = PREV
								same_continent_as_PREV = yes
								has_capitulated = no
							}
						}
						AND = {
							any_home_area_neighbor_country = {
								is_ally_with = INT
								has_war_with = PREV
								has_capitulated = no
							}
							meta_trigger = {
								text = {
									[ORIGINAL_CAPITAL] = { controller = { is_ally_with = ENT } }
								}
								ORIGINAL_CAPITAL = "[THIS.OriginalCapital.GetId]"
							}
						}
					}
				}
				leave_faction = yes
				peace_out_non_neighbours_after_leaving_faction = yes
			}
			INT = {
				ENT = { white_peace_with_PREV = yes }
				for_each_scope_loop = {
					array = faction_members
					for_each_scope_loop = {
						array = ENT.faction_members
						diplomatic_relation = {
							country = PREV
							relation = non_aggression_pact
						}
						set_truce = { target = PREV days = 365 }
					}
				}
			}
			RUS = { clr_country_flag = RUS_clause_b_agreed }
			set_global_flag = tilsit_peace_success
		}
		if = { #Executes clause c
			limit = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_clause_c_agreed } }
			if = {
				limit = { tag = RUS }
				RUS = { add_ideas = RUS_army_limits }
				RUS = { set_country_flag = RUS_clause_c_done }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_ally_with = INT }
				ENG = { add_ideas = RUS_army_limits }
				FRA = { add_ideas = RUS_army_limits }
				RUS = { set_country_flag = clause_c_done_3I }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_clause_c_done }
					RUS = { has_country_flag = clause_c_done_3I }
				}
				RUS = { clr_country_flag = RUS_clause_c_agreed }
				RUS = { clr_country_flag = RUS_clause_c_done }
				RUS = { clr_country_flag = clause_c_done_3I }
			}
		}
		if = { #Executes clause d
			limit = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_clause_d_agreed } }
			if = {
				limit = { tag = RUS }
				effect_tooltip = {
					every_other_country = {
						limit = { is_ally_with = ENT }
						embargo_PREV = yes
					}
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					for_each_scope_loop = {
						array = ENT.faction_members
						for_each_scope_loop = {
							array = RUS.faction_members
							embargo_PREV = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
			RUS = { clr_country_flag = RUS_clause_d_agreed }
		}
	}
}

		leave_faction = yes
		FROM = {
			country_event = russia_foreign_policy_events.251
		}

			country_event = russia_foreign_policy_events.253
		}
	}
	option = { #Yes
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.250 option russia_foreign_policy_events.250.b"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.250.b

			country_event = russia_foreign_policy_events.252
		}
	}

			target = FROM

		}

			target = RUS
			modifier = KR_disapproves_of_govt
		}
		send_embargo = FROM
		send_embargo = RUS
	}

		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.253.b
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		create_wargoal = {
			type = annex_everything
			target = FROM
		}
	}
}

### TREATY OF MOSCOW ###
country_event = { #For GER - hidden event to fire peace
	id = russia_foreign_policy_events.1299
	hidden = yes

	trigger = {
		original_tag = GER
		has_war_with = RUS
		RUS = {
			surrender_progress > 0.5
			OR = {
				is_faction_leader = yes
				is_in_faction_with = INT
			}
		}
		surrender_progress < 0.3
		is_faction_leader = yes
		OR = {
			RUS = { surrender_progress > 0.95 }
			NOT = {
				219 = { is_controlled_by = RUS } #Moscow
				195 = { is_controlled_by = RUS } #Petrograd
				217 = { is_controlled_by = RUS } #Tsaritsyn
			}
		}
	}

	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.1299 option 1"
		if = {
			limit = { RUS = { has_government = national_populist } }
			RUS = { country_event = russia_events.918 } #Death of Savinkov
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = { has_socialist_government = yes }
			}
			RUS = { country_event = russia_socialist_events.430 }
		}
		else = {
			country_event = russia_foreign_policy_events.1300
			RUS = {
				remove_ideas = RUS_surrender_limit_idea
				add_ideas = has_scripted_peace
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #For GER - ask for peace with RUS
	id = russia_foreign_policy_events.1300
	title = russia_foreign_policy_events.1300.t
	desc = russia_foreign_policy_events.1300.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_conference1

	trigger = {
		has_war_with = RUS
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #yea
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.1300 option russia_foreign_policy_events.1300.a"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.1300.a
		RUS = { country_event = { id = russia_foreign_policy_events.1301 days = 2 } }
	}

	option = { #no
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.1300 option russia_foreign_policy_events.1300.b"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.1300.b
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		add_war_support = -0.1
		RUS = {
			add_ideas = RUS_patriotic_war_3
			hidden_effect = { remove_ideas = has_scripted_peace }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #RUS gets event
	id = russia_foreign_policy_events.1301
	title = russia_foreign_policy_events.1301.t
	desc = russia_foreign_policy_events.1301.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Yes
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.1301 option russia_foreign_policy_events.1301.a"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.1301.a
		event_option_tooltip = russia_foreign_policy_events.1302.a
		GER = { country_event = russia_foreign_policy_events.1302 }
	}

	option = { #No
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.1301 option russia_foreign_policy_events.1301.b"
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.1301.b
		add_stability = -0.2
		add_war_support = -0.2
		hidden_effect = { remove_ideas = has_scripted_peace }
	}
}

country_event = { #GER gets event
	id = russia_foreign_policy_events.1302
	title = russia_foreign_policy_events.1302.t
	desc = russia_foreign_policy_events.1302.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Yes
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.1302 option russia_foreign_policy_events.1302.a"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.1302.a
		RUS = {
			hidden_effect = { remove_ideas = has_scripted_peace }
			every_other_country = {
				limit = {
					is_in_faction_with = PREV
					is_central_asian_tag = no
					has_capitulated = no
				}
				if = {
					limit = { is_subject_of = PREV }
					remove_puppet_and_leave_faction = yes
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = { is_subject = no }
					leave_faction = yes
				}
				peace_out_non_neighbours_after_leaving_faction = yes
				hidden_effect = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								tag = MON
								tag = MNR
							}
							is_subject = no
							has_socialist_government = yes
						}
						set_politics = {
							ruling_party = authoritarian_democrat
							elections_allowed = no
						}
						set_political_party = { ideology = totalist popularity = 0 }
						set_political_party = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = 0 }
						set_political_party = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = 0 }
					}
				}
			}
			RUS_dismantle_economic_treaty = yes
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_in_tech_sharing_group = russian_research }
				remove_from_tech_sharing_group = russian_research
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { RUS_set_up_peace_conference_with_germany = yes }
		start_peace_conference = {
			tag = RUS
			score_factor = 1
			winner_scope = ALL
			loser_scope = FACTION
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #For player-led German allies: peace or no?
	id = russia_foreign_policy_events.1303
	title = russia_foreign_policy_events.1303.t
	desc = russia_foreign_policy_events.1303.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Yes
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.1303 option russia_foreign_policy_events.1303.a"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.1303.a
		set_country_flag = GER_accepts_peace
		RUS_fire_next_moscow_treaty_event = yes
	}

	option = { #No
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.1303 option russia_foreign_policy_events.1303.b"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.1303.b
		ai_chance = { base = 0 } #just in case
		every_other_country = {
			limit = {
				is_ai = no
				is_ally_with = GER
			}
			country_event = russia_foreign_policy_events.1304
		}
		RUS = { country_event = russia_foreign_policy_events.1304 }
		hidden_effect = {
			every_possible_country = { clr_country_flag = GER_accepts_peace }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Notification for other players that peace fell through
	id = russia_foreign_policy_events.1304
	title = russia_foreign_policy_events.1304.t

	desc = {
		text = russia_foreign_policy_events.1304.d.reichspakt
		trigger = { NOT = { original_tag = RUS } }
	}
	desc = {
		text = russia_foreign_policy_events.1304.d.russia
		trigger = { original_tag = RUS }
	}

	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Yes
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.1304 option russia_foreign_policy_events.1304.a"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.1304.a

}

country_event = { #Invite the KMT to the Moscow Accord
	id = russia_foreign_policy_events.1309
	title = russia_foreign_policy_events.1309.t
	desc = russia_foreign_policy_events.1309.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #Yes
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.1309 option russia_foreign_policy_events.1309.a"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.1309.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				NOT = {  #KMT will accept if RUS doesn't enroach on the frontiers
					MON = { is_subject_of = RUS }
					RUS = { owns_state = 330 }
					RUS = { owns_state = 716 }
					RUS = { owns_state = 885 }
				}
			}
		}

		FROM = {
			add_to_faction = ROOT
			country_event = { id = russia_foreign_policy_events.1310 days = 2 } #The Chinese accept
		}
	}
	option = { #No
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.1309 option russia_foreign_policy_events.1309.b"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.1309.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				OR = {
					MON = { is_subject_of = RUS }
					RUS = { owns_state = 330 }
				}
				OR = {
					RUS = { owns_state = 716 }
					RUS = { owns_state = 885 }
				}
			}
		}

		FROM = {
			country_event = { id = russia_foreign_policy_events.1311 days = 2 } #The Chinese say no
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Korean Volunteers in Manchuria
	id = russia_foreign_policy_events.1312
	title = russia_foreign_policy_events.1312.t
	desc = russia_foreign_policy_events.1312.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_korean_army_flavor

	trigger = {
		has_socialist_government = yes
		has_war_with = JAP
		KOR = { any_core_state = { is_controlled_by = ROOT } }
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.1312 option russia_foreign_policy_events.1312.a"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.1312.a
		add_manpower = 1500
		custom_override_tooltip = {
			tooltip = {
				localization_key = tooltip_create_division_template
				NAME = "Koreyskaya Dobrovolchesskaya Brigada" #Northeast Anti-Japanese Allied Forces Teaching Brigade"
				LINE_1 = { localization_key = line_battalion_tt NAME = irregular_infantry ICON = GFX_unit_irregular_infantry_icon_small COUNT = 9 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_template = "Koreyskaya Dobrovolchesskaya Brigada" }
				delete_unit_template_and_units = { division_template = "Koreyskaya Dobrovolchesskaya Brigada" disband = yes } #no cheating
			}
			division_template = {
				name = "Koreyskaya Dobrovolchesskaya Brigada" #Northeast Anti-Japanese Allied Forces Teaching Brigade"
				division_names_group = RUS_MVD_01
				regiments = {
					irregular_infantry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
					irregular_infantry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
					irregular_infantry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
					irregular_infantry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
					irregular_infantry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
					irregular_infantry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
					irregular_infantry = { x = 2 y = 0 }
					irregular_infantry = { x = 2 y = 1 }
					irregular_infantry = { x = 2 y = 2 }
				}
			}
		}
		random_controlled_state = { #Gwanbuk
			limit = { is_core_of = KOR }
			custom_override_tooltip = {
				tooltip = {
					localization_key = tooltip_spawn_unit
					TYPE = "Koreyskaya Dobrovolchesskaya Brigada"
				}
				create_unit = {
					division = "name = \"88ya Otdelnaya Strelkovaja Brigada\" division_template = \"Koreyskaya Dobrovolchesskaya Brigada\" start_experience_factor = 0.2"
					owner = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Citizen Romanovs
	id = russia_flavour_events.16
	title = russia_flavour_events.16.t
	desc = russia_flavour_events.16.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kirill
	trigger = { has_government = national_populist }
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.16 option russia_flavour_events.16.a"
		name = russia_flavour_events.16.a #Exile them
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_socialist_ai
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_republic_ai
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_empire_ai
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 25
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_pyotr_wrangel = { is_army_chief = yes } }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
			RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
			RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.16 option russia_flavour_events.16.b"
		name = russia_flavour_events.16.b #They are of no consequence
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -5 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #The Stabs-Captain Movement
	id = russia_flavour_events.17
	title = russia_flavour_events.17.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_government = national_populist }
		text = russia_flavour_events.17.d.szrs
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_socialist_government = yes }
		text = russia_flavour_events.17.d.soc
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { is_monarchy = yes }
		text = russia_flavour_events.17.d.mon
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			is_monarchy = no
			RUS_is_demrus = yes
		}
		text = russia_flavour_events.17.d.dem
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_solonevich

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.17 option russia_flavour_events.17.a"

		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_government = social_conservative
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -30
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.17 option russia_flavour_events.17.b"
		name = russia_flavour_events.17.b #Seems harmless enough

		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				RUS_solonevich = yes
				RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
			}
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = 0.05 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.17 option russia_flavour_events.17.c"
		name = russia_flavour_events.17.c #GetLeader's finest sons!
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				RUS_solonevich = yes
				RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = 4 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #The Circle of Eurasianist-Ideocrats

	desc = russia_flavour_events.19.d

	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { has_government = national_populist }

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.19 option russia_flavour_events.19.a"
		name = russia_flavour_events.19.a #Ensure they get their words heard
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_old_svobodnik_ai
						power_balance_value = { id = RUS_power_balance value > 0.15 }
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_solidarist_ai
						power_balance_value = { id = RUS_power_balance value > -0.30 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -10
		add_power_balance_value = {
			id = RUS_power_balance
			value = 0.05
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.19 option russia_flavour_events.19.b"
		name = russia_flavour_events.19.b #Do not let them get any ideas
		ai_chance = { base = 100 }
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -0.01 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
	}
}

	id = russia_flavour_events.20
