	desc = russia_flavour_events.20.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_trubetskoy
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		RUS_soccon_advisor = yes
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.20 option russia_flavour_events.20.a"
		name = russia_flavour_events.20.a #Support their initiative
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai
					RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -25
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = 0.02 }
		set_country_flag = RUS_supported_eurasianism
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		custom_effect_tooltip = available_political_advisor
		show_ideas_tooltip = RUS_nikolay_trubetskoy_advisor
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.20 option russia_flavour_events.20.b"
		name = russia_flavour_events.20.b #Seems odd
	}
}

country_event = { #Kurchatov Petition
	id = russia_flavour_events.23
	title = russia_flavour_events.23.t
	desc = russia_flavour_events.23.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_soviet_soldiers_tank

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.23 option russia_flavour_events.23.a"
		name = russia_flavour_events.23.a #Russia shall wield this superweapon
		trigger = { NOT = { has_government = national_populist } }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.23 option russia_flavour_events.23.b"
		name = russia_flavour_events.23.b #Radical solution to the question of terror
		trigger = { has_government = national_populist }
	}
	after = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				controls_province = 11394 #Sarov
				253 = { #Vladimir
					is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
					can_construct_building = nuclear_facility
				}
			}
			253 = { #Vladimir
				add_building_construction = {
					type = nuclear_facility
					level = 1
					province = 11394 #Sarov
					instant_build = yes
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			random_owned_controlled_state = {
				prioritize = { 248 252 253 }
				limit = {
					is_core_of = ROOT
					can_construct_building = nuclear_facility
				}
				construct_building_in_random_province = { nuclear_facility = 1 }
			}
		}
	}
}

	desc = russia_flavour_events.25.d

		name = russia_flavour_events.25.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 40
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai
					RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
				}
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -5 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		add_political_power = 50
	}

		name = russia_flavour_events.25.b
		trigger = { has_socialist_government = no }
		ai_chance = { base = 10 }
		add_stability = -0.035
		add_one_random_civilian_factory = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.25 option russia_flavour_events.25.c"
		name = russia_flavour_events.25.c
		ai_chance = { base = 20 }
		add_political_power = -30
		add_stability = 0.05
	}
	option = {

country_event = { #Churchill Iron Curtain speech
	id = russia_flavour_events.26
	title = russia_flavour_events.26.t
	desc = russia_flavour_events.26.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_conference2

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		FRA = { is_faction_leader = yes }
		ENT = { is_faction_leader = yes }
		is_subject = no
		has_socialist_government = no
		NOT = {
			has_war_with = INT
			has_war_with = ENT
			is_ally_with = INT
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.26 option russia_flavour_events.26.a"
		name = russia_flavour_events.26.a
		add_stability = 0.05
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_idea = RUS_cold_war
					has_idea = RUS_cold_war_2
				}
			}
			add_ideas = RUS_cold_war
		}
		else = {
			add_war_support = 0.05
		}
		ENT = {
			country_event = russia_flavour_events.27
		}
		INT = {
			country_event = russia_flavour_events.27
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #History of the Protocols of the Elders of Zion
	id = russia_flavour_events.28
	title = russia_flavour_events.28.t
	desc = russia_flavour_events.28.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_protocols

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.28 option russia_flavour_events.28.a"
		name = russia_flavour_events.28.a #The government must act
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_government = national_populist
				has_completed_focus = RUS_authdems
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -25
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_left_anger }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
			RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_authoritarian_government = yes
					has_government = social_conservative
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = 3 }
			change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.28 option russia_flavour_events.28.b"
		name = russia_flavour_events.28.b #Blame freedom of press and conscience
		add_stability = -0.02
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = national_populist }
			add_popularity = { ideology = national_populist popularity = 0.02 }
		}
		else = {
			add_popularity = { ideology = authoritarian_democrat popularity = 0.03 }
		}
	}
}

		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.30 option russia_flavour_events.30.a"
		name = russia_flavour_events.30.a #Block it
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 50
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
				has_political_power > 80
			}
		}
		trigger = { has_authoritarian_government = no }

			limit = { has_idea = RUS_military_anger_dem }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
			RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		}
		else = {
			add_political_power = -40
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.30 option russia_flavour_events.30.b"
		name = russia_flavour_events.30.b #Harsh, but necessary

			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 50
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai
					RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.02
		if = {
			limit = { has_soclib_or_socdem_government = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -4 }
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -2 }
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #The Fate of the Veterans' Organisations
	id = russia_flavour_events.34
	title = russia_flavour_events.34.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_government = national_populist }
		text = russia_flavour_events.34.d.szrs
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_is_demrus = yes }
		text = russia_flavour_events.34.d.dem
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_socialist_government = yes }
		text = russia_flavour_events.34.d.soc
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_partisans1

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.34 option russia_flavour_events.34.a"
		name = russia_flavour_events.34.a
		trigger = { has_government = national_populist }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_old_svobodnik_ai
						power_balance_value = { id = RUS_power_balance value > 0.10 }
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_solidarist_ai
						power_balance_value = { id = RUS_power_balance value > -0.35 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -40
		add_popularity = { ideology = national_populist popularity = 0.05 }
		add_power_balance_value = {
			id = RUS_power_balance
			value = 0.1
			tooltip_side = RUS_ideocrat
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.34 option russia_flavour_events.34.b"
		name = russia_flavour_events.34.b
		trigger = { has_government = national_populist }
		ai_chance = { base = 100 }
		add_stability = 0.02
		add_popularity = { ideology = national_populist popularity = 0.02 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.34 option russia_flavour_events.34.c"
		name = russia_flavour_events.34.c
		trigger = { RUS_is_demrus = yes }
		ai_chance = { base = 100 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		add_stability = 0.01
		add_popularity = { ideology = national_populist popularity = -0.04 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = paternal_autocrat popularity = -0.02 }
		country_event = { id = russia_flavour_events.35 days = 3 } #The Volunteer March
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.34 option russia_flavour_events.34.e"
		name = russia_flavour_events.34.e
		trigger = { RUS_is_demrus = yes }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_active_mission = RUS_demands_from_unions_monarchy
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai
					RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.02
		add_popularity = { ideology = national_populist popularity = 0.02 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.34 option russia_flavour_events.34.f"
		name = russia_flavour_events.34.f
		trigger = { has_socialist_government = yes }
		ai_chance = { base = 100 }
		add_political_power = -15
		add_popularity = { ideology = national_populist popularity = -0.03 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = paternal_autocrat popularity = -0.03 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = authoritarian_democrat popularity = -0.02 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = -0.02 }
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = -3 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = syndicalist }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
			RUS_SDS_relation = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_flavour_events.35 days = 3 } #The Volunteer March
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.34 option russia_flavour_events.34.g"
		name = russia_flavour_events.34.g
		trigger = { has_socialist_government = yes }
		ai_chance = { base = 100 }
		RUS_increase_antisoc_resistance = yes
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 1 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = syndicalist }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_SDS_relation = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
			RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = authoritarian_democrat popularity = 0.05 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = paternal_autocrat popularity = 0.05 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = national_populist popularity = 0.05 }
		set_country_flag = RUS_allowed_veterans_unions
	}
}

country_event = { #Doubts over the Alekseyev Conspiracy
	id = russia_flavour_events.38
	title = russia_flavour_events.38.t
	desc = russia_flavour_events.38.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_soviet_congress

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.38 option russia_flavour_events.38.a"
		name = russia_flavour_events.38.a
		add_political_power = -20
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = radical_socialist }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 2 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = -2 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = syndicalist }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
			RUS_SDS_relation = yes
			RUS_PSR_relation = yes
			RUS_RKP_relation = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST_centre = no }
			RUS_VST_centre_relation = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST_left = no }
			RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST_right = no }
			RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.38 option russia_flavour_events.38.b"
		name = russia_flavour_events.38.b
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -10 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
	}
}
country_event = { #Wave of White Sabotage
	id = russia_flavour_events.39
	title = russia_flavour_events.39.t
	desc = russia_flavour_events.39.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_partisans1

	trigger = {
		has_socialist_government = yes
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.39 option russia_flavour_events.39.a"
		name = russia_flavour_events.39.a
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_white_sabotage = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_allowed_veterans_unions }
			add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_white_sabotage = 2 }
			clr_country_flag = RUS_allowed_veterans_unions
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_5 }
			add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_white_sabotage = 5 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_4 }
			add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_white_sabotage = 4 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_3 }
			add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_white_sabotage = 3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_2 }
			add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_white_sabotage = 2 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_1 }
			add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_white_sabotage = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_lack_of_officers }
			add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_white_sabotage = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_lack_of_officers_2 }
			add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_white_sabotage = 2 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_lack_of_officers_3 }
			add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_white_sabotage = 3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_reeducation_camps }
			add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_white_sabotage = -1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_stability < 0.5 }
			add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_white_sabotage = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_stability < 0 }
			add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_white_sabotage = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_completed_focus = RUS_state_surveillance
					has_completed_focus = RUS_triumph_of_the_idea
				}
			}
			add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_white_sabotage = -1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_yakov_blyumkin = { is_hired_as_advisor = yes } }
			add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_white_sabotage = -2 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST = yes }
			add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_white_sabotage = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { is_in_coalition_with_totalist = yes }
			add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_white_sabotage = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_reeducation_camps_2 }
			add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_white_sabotage = -2 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_variable = RUS_faith }
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { RUS_faith < 50 } }
				add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_white_sabotage = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { RUS_faith < 25 } }
				add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_white_sabotage = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { RUS_faith > 50 } }
				add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_white_sabotage = -1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { RUS_faith > 75 } }
				add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_white_sabotage = -1 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { RUS_white_sabotage > 8 } }
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_white_sabotage_5
				days = 365
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { RUS_white_sabotage > 4 } }
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_white_sabotage_4
				days = 365
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { RUS_white_sabotage > 4 } }
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_white_sabotage_3
				days = 365
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { RUS_white_sabotage > 2 } }
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_white_sabotage_2
				days = 365
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_white_sabotage_1
				days = 365
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #The Green International Divided
	id = russia_flavour_events.40
	title = russia_flavour_events.40.t
	desc = russia_flavour_events.40.d
	trigger = {
		RUS_savinkov = yes
		SER = { is_faction_leader = yes } #TEMP TRIGGER
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_conference3
	mean_time_to_happen = { months = 2 }
	fire_only_once = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.40 option russia_flavour_events.40.a"
		name = russia_flavour_events.40.a
		random_list = { #Add variety based on national situations; democratic countries prefer the first option
			10 = {
				news_event = russia_news_events.20 #The Green International Falls to Radicalism
			}
			10 = {
				news_event = russia_news_events.21 #Creation of the Peasant International
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = russia_flavour_events.46
	title = russia_flavour_events.46.t
	desc = russia_flavour_events.46.d

	trigger = {
		RUS_savinkov = yes
		NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_abolished_cossack_hosts }
		has_character = RUS_pyotr_krasnov
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.46 option russia_flavour_events.46.a"
		name = russia_flavour_events.46.a
		trigger = { RUS_pavel_agyeyev = { is_hired_as_advisor = no } }
		add_ideas = RUS_cossack_resistance
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_remove_krasnov_tt
		retire_character = RUS_pyotr_krasnov
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.46 option russia_flavour_events.46.b"
		name = russia_flavour_events.46.b
		add_political_power = -50
		add_popularity = { ideology = authoritarian_democrat popularity = 0.05 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = national_populist popularity = -0.05 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.46 option russia_flavour_events.46.c"
		name = russia_flavour_events.46.c
		trigger = { RUS_pavel_agyeyev = { is_hired_as_advisor = yes } }
		add_trait = {
			character = RUS_pavel_agyeyev
			slot = political_advisor
			trait = RUS_cossack_ataman
		}
		add_political_power = 50
		add_popularity = { ideology = authoritarian_democrat popularity = -0.05 }
		retire_character = RUS_pyotr_krasnov
	}
}

			limit = { has_active_mission = RUS_political_apathy }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_apathy_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_apathy_increase_tt
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.47 option russia_flavour_events.47.b"
		name = russia_flavour_events.47.b

		retire_character = RUS_pyotr_krasnov

		add_popularity = { ideology = authoritarian_democrat popularity = -0.04 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = RUS_bold_promises }
			add_days_mission_timeout = {
				mission = RUS_bold_promises
				days = 45
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = RUS_titov_SR_demands }
			add_days_mission_timeout = {
				mission = RUS_titov_SR_demands
				days = 45
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = RUS_political_apathy }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_apathy_decrease_tt
			add_to_variable = { RUS_apathy_var = -1 }
		}
	}
}

		add_to_coalition = yes

			ruling_party = social_conservative
			elections_allowed = yes

		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_elections_events.50 days = 3 }  #President's agenda
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = national_populist
				long_name = RUS_national_populist2_party_long
				name = RUS_national_populist2_party
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #The Myth of October
	id = russia_flavour_events.55
	title = russia_flavour_events.55.t
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				RUS_savinkov = yes
				has_authoritarian_government = yes
			}
		}
		text = russia_flavour_events.55.d.szrs
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_socialist_government = yes }
		text = russia_flavour_events.55.d.soc
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_elected_government = yes }
		text = russia_flavour_events.55.d.lib
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_october

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.55 option russia_flavour_events.55.a"
		name = russia_flavour_events.55.a
		trigger = { has_elected_government = no }
		add_war_support = 0.01
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.55 option russia_flavour_events.55.b"
		name = russia_flavour_events.55.b
		trigger = { has_elected_government = yes }
		add_stability = 0.01
	}
}

		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.65 option russia_flavour_events.65.a"
		name = russia_flavour_events.65.a

			random_list = {
				5 = { set_country_flag = RUS_bad_luck }
				5 = { }
			}
			country_event = { id = russia_flavour_events.66 days = 100 random_days = 10 }
		}
	}

	id = russia_flavour_events.66
	title = russia_flavour_events.66.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_bad_luck }
		text = russia_flavour_events.66.d.sad
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_bad_luck } }
		text = russia_flavour_events.66.d.good
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { has_character = RUS_aleksandr_kolchak }
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_lintrose

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.66 option russia_flavour_events.66.a"
		name = russia_flavour_events.66.a
		clr_country_flag = RUS_bad_luck
		RUS_aleksandr_kolchak = {
			add_unit_leader_trait = aviation_enthusiast
		}
		add_ace = {
			name = "Valerian"
			surname = "Chkalov"
			callsign = "Kolchakovets"
			type = support_unique
		}
		air_experience = 15
	}
}

country_event = { #The Sannikov Flyover
	id = russia_flavour_events.77
	title = russia_flavour_events.77.t
	desc = russia_flavour_events.77.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { has_character = RUS_aleksandr_kolchak }
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kolchak

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.77 option russia_flavour_events.77.a"
		name = russia_flavour_events.77.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_tech = improved_small_airframe
					has_tech = improved_medium_airframe
					has_tech = improved_large_airframe
					has_tech = fighter2
					has_tech = CAS2
					has_tech = heavy_fighter2
					has_tech = naval_bomber2
					has_tech = tactical_bomber2
					has_tech = scout_plane2
					has_completed_focus = RUS_the_flying_tank
					has_completed_focus = RUS_polikarpov_fighters
					has_completed_focus = RUS_enter_hundred
					has_completed_focus = RUS_over_the_northern_skies
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = russia_flavour_events.78 days = 25 } }
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = russia_flavour_events.75 days = 300 } }
			set_country_flag = RUS_kolchak_died_plane_crash
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.77 option russia_flavour_events.77.b"
		name = russia_flavour_events.77.b
		hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = russia_flavour_events.75 days = 300 } }
		set_country_flag = RUS_kolchak_died_trying
	}
	after = {
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_polar_tt
	}
}

country_event = { #Russian Military Exercises in Kursk
	id = russia_flavour_events.84
	title = russia_flavour_events.84.t
	desc = russia_flavour_events.84.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army2
	trigger = {
		has_socialist_government = no
	}

	option = { #Moderate
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.84 option russia_flavour_events.84.a"
		name = russia_flavour_events.84.a
		ai_chance = { base = 33 }
		add_political_power = -30
		add_command_power = -50
		set_country_flag = RUS_moderate_exercise
	}
	option = { #Large
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.84 option russia_flavour_events.84.b"
		name = russia_flavour_events.84.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 33
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
				check_variable = { RUS_popular_anger > 2 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
				check_variable = { RUS_popular_anger < 2 }
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		add_command_power = -70
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
		set_country_flag = RUS_large_exercise
	}
	option = { #Small
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.84 option russia_flavour_events.84.c"
		name = russia_flavour_events.84.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 33
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
				check_variable = { RUS_military_anger > 1 }
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		set_country_flag = RUS_small_exercise
	}
	after = {
		country_event = { id = russia_flavour_events.85 days = 1 }
	}
}

			}

country_event = { #Invitation to Russia
	id = russia_flavour_events.86
	title = russia_flavour_events.86.t
	desc = russia_flavour_events.86.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army2

	option = { #Send observers
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.86 option russia_flavour_events.86.a"
		name = russia_flavour_events.86.a
		ai_chance = { base = 30 }
		add_political_power = -20
		add_doctrine_cost_reduction = {
			name = RUS_kursk_excerise
			cost_reduction = 0.5
			uses = 1
			category = land_doctrine
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS = { country_event = { id = russia_flavour_events.88 days = 2 } }
		}
	}
	option = { #Meh
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.86 option russia_flavour_events.86.b"
		name = russia_flavour_events.86.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = IMP
				OR = {
					has_completed_focus = RUS_approach_entente
					has_completed_focus = RUS_the_american_ice_march
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = INT
				OR = {
					has_completed_focus = RUS_franco_russian_treaty
					has_socialist_government = yes
					RUS_sulimov = yes
					RUS_titov = yes
				}
			}
		}
		RUS = {
			country_event = { id = russia_flavour_events.87 days = 1 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Military Exercises
	id = russia_flavour_events.88
	title = {
		text = russia_flavour_events.88.t1
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_small_exercise }
	}
	title = {
		text = russia_flavour_events.88.t2
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_moderate_exercise }
	}
	title = {
		text = russia_flavour_events.88.t3
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_large_exercise }
	}
	desc = {
		text = russia_flavour_events.88.d1
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_small_exercise }
	}
	desc = {
		text = russia_flavour_events.88.d2
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_moderate_exercise }
	}
	desc = {
		text = russia_flavour_events.88.d3
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_large_exercise }
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army2

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.88 option russia_flavour_events.88.a"
		name = russia_flavour_events.88.a
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_small_exercise }
			army_experience = 20
			add_tech_bonus = {
				name = RUS_kursk_exercises
				bonus = 0.25
				uses = 2
				category = armor
			}
			add_doctrine_cost_reduction = {
				name = RUS_kursk_exercises
				cost_reduction = 0.5
				uses = 1
				category = land_doctrine
			}
			add_named_threat = {
				threat = 3
				name = RUS_kursk_exercises
			}
			clr_country_flag = RUS_small_exercise
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_moderate_exercise }
			army_experience = 40
			add_tech_bonus = {
				name = RUS_kursk_exercises
				bonus = 0.5
				uses = 2
				category = armor
			}
			add_doctrine_cost_reduction = {
				name = RUS_kursk_exercises
				cost_reduction = 0.75
				uses = 1
				category = land_doctrine
			}
			add_named_threat = {
				threat = 4
				name = RUS_kursk_exercises
			}
			clr_country_flag = RUS_moderate_exercise
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_large_exercise }
			army_experience = 60
			add_tech_bonus = {
				name = RUS_kursk_exercises
				bonus = 0.5
				uses = 2
				category = armor
			}
			add_doctrine_cost_reduction = {
				name = RUS_kursk_exercises
				cost_reduction = 0.95
				uses = 1
				category = land_doctrine
			}
			add_named_threat = {
				threat = 5
				name = RUS_kursk_exercises
			}
			clr_country_flag = RUS_large_exercise
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_power_change = 5 }
		RUS_change_projection = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Solonevich Attacked!
	id = russia_flavour_events.90
	title = russia_flavour_events.90.t
	desc = russia_flavour_events.90.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_solonevich
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			RUS_solonevich = yes
			RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.90 option russia_flavour_events.90.a"
		name = russia_flavour_events.90.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai
					RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_start
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = russia_flavour_events.92 #Solonevich Fights
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = allow_sound_events_flag }
				scoped_play_song = "kazachya_pesnya"
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = russia_flavour_events.90.a.tt
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.90 option russia_flavour_events.90.b"
		name = russia_flavour_events.90.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_dmitry_ai
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = russia_flavour_events.91 #Solonevich Leaves
		}
	}
}

			RUS_solonevich = yes

		}

		name = russia_flavour_events.91.a
		add_stability = -0.01
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_punished }

					character = RUS_ivan_solonevich

				}
			}
		}
	}

country_event = { #Solonevich Fig
	id = russia_flavour_events.92
	title = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_start }
		text = russia_flavour_events.92.t.fight
	}
	title = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_knockout }
		text = russia_flavour_events.92.t.knockout
	}
	title = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_successful_atk }
		text = russia_flavour_events.92.t.successful_atk
	}
	title = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_counter_atk }
		text = russia_flavour_events.92.t.counter_atk
	}
	title = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_fail }
		text = russia_flavour_events.92.t.fail
	}
	title = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_parry }
		text = russia_flavour_events.92.t.parry
	}
	title = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_heal }
		text = russia_flavour_events.92.t.heal
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_start }
		text = russia_flavour_events.92.d.fight
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_knockout }
		text = russia_flavour_events.92.d.knockout
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_successful_atk }
		text = russia_flavour_events.92.d.successful_atk
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_counter_atk }
		text = russia_flavour_events.92.d.counter_atk
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_fail }
		text = russia_flavour_events.92.d.fail
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_parry }
		text = russia_flavour_events.92.d.parry
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_heal }
		text = russia_flavour_events.92.d.heal
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_solonevich
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			RUS_solonevich = yes
			RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_start }
			set_variable = { RUS_solonevich_hp = 6 }
			set_variable = { RUS_assailant_hp = 8 }
			clr_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_start
		}
	}

	option = { #Aggressive Stance
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.92 option russia_flavour_events.92.a"
		name = russia_flavour_events.92.a
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { RUS_solonevich_hp > 0 }
			check_variable = { RUS_assailant_hp > 0 }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_dmitry_ai }
		}
		RUS_solonevich_fight_bold = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = russia_flavour_events.92
			country_event = russia_flavour_events.93
		}
	}
	option = { #Careful Stance
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.92 option russia_flavour_events.92.b"
		name = russia_flavour_events.92.b
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { RUS_solonevich_hp > 0 }
			check_variable = { RUS_assailant_hp > 0 }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_dmitry_ai }
		}
		RUS_solonevich_fight_careful = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = russia_flavour_events.92
			country_event = russia_flavour_events.93
		}
	}
	option = { #Leave the fight
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.92 option russia_flavour_events.92.c"
		name = russia_flavour_events.92.c
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { RUS_solonevich_hp = 1 }
			check_variable = { RUS_assailant_hp > 0 }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_dmitry_ai }
		}
		random_list = {
			10 = {
				set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -2 }
				change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
				country_event = russia_flavour_events.91
			}
			5 = { country_event = russia_flavour_events.96 }
		}
	}
	option = { #Victory!
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.92 option russia_flavour_events.92.e"
		name = russia_flavour_events.92.e
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { RUS_solonevich_hp > -1 }
			check_variable = { RUS_assailant_hp = 0 }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_dmitry_ai }
		}
		hidden_effect = { country_event = russia_flavour_events.94 }
	}
	option = { #Death!
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.92 option russia_flavour_events.92.f"
		name = russia_flavour_events.92.f
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					check_variable = { RUS_solonevich_hp = 0 }
					check_variable = { RUS_assailant_hp > 0 }
				}
				has_country_flag = RUS_dmitry_ai
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { country_event = russia_flavour_events.96 }
	}
}

		}

				set_portraits = {
					character = RUS_ivan_solonevich

country_event = { #Solonevich Interview
	id = russia_flavour_events.95
	title = russia_flavour_events.95.t
	desc = russia_flavour_events.95.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			RUS_solonevich = yes
			RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_solonevich_2

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.95 option russia_flavour_events.95.a"
		name = russia_flavour_events.95.a
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_solonevich = yes }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_solonevich_reelection_tt
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_military_anger_dem
				check_variable = { RUS_military_anger > 0 }
			}
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
			RUS_change_military_anger = yes
			add_war_support = 0.03
		}
		else = {
			add_war_support = 0.06
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.95 option russia_flavour_events.95.b"
		name = russia_flavour_events.95.b
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_solonevich = yes }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_solonevich_reelection_tt
		}
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = 5 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.95 option russia_flavour_events.95.c"
		name = russia_flavour_events.95.c
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_solonevich = yes }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_solonevich_reelection_tt
		}
		add_political_power = 40
	}
}
country_event = { #Solonevich Dies!
	id = russia_flavour_events.96
	title = russia_flavour_events.96.t
	desc = russia_flavour_events.96.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_solonevich_2
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			RUS_solonevich = yes
			RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.96 option russia_flavour_events.96.a"
		name = russia_flavour_events.96.a
		#Oh no!
		add_stability = -0.1
		RUS_ivan_solonevich = { kill_character = yes }
		if = {
			limit = { is_monarchy = no }
			promote_character = {
				character = RUS_dmitry_romanov
				ideology = social_conservative_subtype
			}
		}
		else = {
			activate_advisor = RUS_aleksandr_golitsyn_sic
		}
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		set_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_dead
		hidden_effect = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = social_conservative
				name = RUS_social_conservative_party
				long_name = RUS_social_conservative_party_long
			}
			country_event = { id = russia_flavour_events.98 days = 14 } #The Funeral
			country_event = { id = russia_elections_events.50 days = 14 } #President's agenda
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_punished }
				clr_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_punished
				set_portraits = {
					character = RUS_ivan_solonevich
					civilian = { large = GFX_portrait_RUS_ivan_solonevich_civilian_large }
				}
			}
			remove_ideas = {
				RUS_party_versus_president
				RUS_party_versus_president_2
				RUS_party_versus_president_3
				RUS_party_versus_president_4
				RUS_party_versus_president_5
			}
		}
		clear_variable = RUS_solonevich_hp
		clear_variable = RUS_assailant_hp
	}
}

	id = russia_flavour_events.128
	title = russia_flavour_events.128.t
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_georgian_monarchy
				GEO = {
					has_country_leader = { character = GEO_giorgi_bagration_mukhraneli }
					is_ally_with = RUS
				}
			}
		}
		text = russia_flavour_events.128.d.alternate
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_georgian_monarchy
				GEO = {
					has_country_leader = { character = GEO_giorgi_bagration_mukhraneli }
					is_ally_with = RUS
				}
			}
		}
		text = russia_flavour_events.128.d
	}
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		is_monarchy = yes
		has_country_flag = RUS_leonida_marriage
	}
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia_flavour_events.127 days = 250 random_days = 200 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.128 option russia_flavour_events.128.a"
		name = russia_flavour_events.128.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_georgian_monarchy
				GEO = {
					has_country_leader = { character = GEO_giorgi_bagration_mukhraneli }
					is_ally_with = RUS
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.02
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.128 option russia_flavour_events.128.b"
		name = russia_flavour_events.128.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_georgian_monarchy
				GEO = {
					has_country_leader = { character = GEO_giorgi_bagration_mukhraneli }
					is_ally_with = RUS
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.01
	}
}

country_event = { #Victory in the Second Weltkrieg
	id = russia_flavour_events.134
	title = {
		trigger = { RUS_savinkov = yes }
		text = russia_flavour_events.134.t
	}
	title = {
		trigger = {
			RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
			is_monarchy = yes
		}
		text = russia_flavour_events.134.t2
	}
	title = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_soccon_or_marlib_government = yes
				has_soclib_or_socdem_government = yes
			}
		}
		text = russia_flavour_events.134.t3
	}
	title = {
		trigger = { RUS_wrangel_path = yes }
		text = russia_flavour_events.134.t4
	}
	title = {
		trigger = { has_socialist_government = yes }
		text = russia_flavour_events.134.t5
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_savinkov = yes }
		text = russia_flavour_events.134.d
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
			is_monarchy = yes
		}
		text = russia_flavour_events.134.d2
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_soclib_or_socdem_government = yes
		}
		text = russia_flavour_events.134.d3
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_soccon_or_marlib_government = yes
		}
		text = russia_flavour_events.134.d4
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_wrangel_path = yes }
		text = russia_flavour_events.134.d5
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_socialist_government = yes }
		text = russia_flavour_events.134.d6
	}
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_parade

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = { remove_ideas = RUS_surrender_limit_idea }
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.134 option russia_flavour_events.134.a"
		name = russia_flavour_events.134.a
		trigger = { RUS_savinkov = yes }
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = allow_sound_events_flag }
				scoped_play_song = "slavsya"
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = national_populist
			popularity = 0.01
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.134 option russia_flavour_events.134.b"
		name = russia_flavour_events.134.b
		trigger = {
			RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
			is_monarchy = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = allow_sound_events_flag }
				scoped_play_song = "slavsya"
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.134 option russia_flavour_events.134.c"
		name = russia_flavour_events.134.c
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_elected_government = yes
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_socialist_government = no }
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = allow_sound_events_flag }
					scoped_play_song = "slavsya"
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = allow_sound_events_flag }
					scoped_play_song = "workers_marseillaise"
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = radical_socialist
				NOT = {
					RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
					RUS_is_maximalist = yes
				}
			}
			country_event = { id = russia_socialist_events.203 days = 5 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.134 option russia_flavour_events.134.e"
		name = russia_flavour_events.134.e
		trigger = { RUS_wrangel_path = yes }
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = allow_sound_events_flag }
				scoped_play_song = "slavsya"
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #European Democracy Question
	id = russia_flavour_events.143
	title = russia_flavour_events.143.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { INT = { exists = yes } }
		text = russia_flavour_events.143.d
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { INT = { exists = no } }
		text = russia_flavour_events.143.d2
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_election

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.143 option russia_flavour_events.143.a"
		name = russia_flavour_events.143.a
		trigger = { INT = { exists = yes } }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_european_democracy_1_tt
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { POL = { is_subject_of = RUS } }
				country_event = { id = russia_flavour_events.119 days = 50 random_days = 30 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { POL = { has_government = national_populist } }
				country_event = { id = russia_flavour_events.121 days = 50 random_days = 30 }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.143 option russia_flavour_events.143.b"
		name = russia_flavour_events.143.b
		set_country_flag = RUS_controlled_european_democracy
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_european_democracy_2_tt
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { POL = { is_subject_of = RUS } }
				country_event = { id = russia_flavour_events.119 days = 230 random_days = 30 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { POL = { has_government = national_populist } }
				country_event = { id = russia_flavour_events.121 days = 200 random_days = 30 }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.143 option russia_flavour_events.143.c"
		name = russia_flavour_events.143.c
		trigger = { INT = { exists = no } }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_european_democracy_1_tt
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { POL = { is_subject_of = RUS } }
				country_event = { id = russia_flavour_events.119 days = 50 random_days = 30 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { POL = { has_government = national_populist } }
				country_event = { id = russia_flavour_events.121 days = 50 random_days = 30 }
			}
		}
	}
	after = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					is_subject_of = RUS
					is_ai = yes
					is_in_europe = yes
					NOT = { tag = GRU }
				}
				country_event = russia_democratic_events.151
			}
			RUS_postwar_distribute_dem_popularities = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Empire of the Middle-Earth
	id = russia_flavour_events.145
	title = russia_flavour_events.145.t
	desc = russia_flavour_events.145.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_FNG_railway_map

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.145 option russia_flavour_events.145.a"
		name = russia_flavour_events.145.a
		add_war_support = 0.01
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.145 option russia_flavour_events.145.b"
		name = russia_flavour_events.145.b
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		every_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_manchuria = yes
					is_mongolia = yes
					is_xinjiang = yes
					is_central_asia = yes
					region = 134 #Transcaucasia
					state = 745 #Dalian
				}
				NOT = {
					is_claimed_by = ROOT
					is_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
			add_claim_by = ROOT
			if = {
				limit = {
					THIS = {
						is_claimed_by = ROOT
						NOT = { is_owned_by = ROOT }
						controller = {
							OR = {
								is_subject_of = RUS
								has_country_leader = { character = MON_roman_ungern_sternberg }
							}
							is_ai = yes
						}
					}
				}
				transfer_state_to = ROOT
			}
			else = {
				custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_annex_puppet_tt
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Flight of the Karelians

		hidden_effect = {
			146 = { add_manpower = 40000 } #Karelia
			195 = { add_manpower = -40000 } #Petrograd
			RUS = { 146 = { enable_state_integration_50_compliance = yes } } #Karelia
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.155 option russia_flavour_events.155.a"
		name = russia_flavour_events.155.a

		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		add_war_support = 0.05

		add_stability = -0.05
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -5 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
	}
	after = {
		146 = { add_manpower = -380000 } #Karelia
		840 = { add_manpower = 150000 } #Nyland
		111 = { add_manpower = 90000 } #Tavastia
		863 = { add_manpower = 100000 } #Finland Proper
		149 = { add_manpower = 60000 } #East Bothnia
	}
}

country_event = { #Daughters of the Motherland
	id = russia_flavour_events.161
	title = russia_flavour_events.161.t
	desc = russia_flavour_events.161.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_SRI_female_red_guards
	trigger = { has_war = yes }

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.161 option russia_flavour_events.161.a"
		name = russia_flavour_events.161.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_socialist_government = yes }
			add_stability = -0.02
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
			RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_demrus = yes
				OR = {
					has_soccon_or_marlib_government = yes
					has_authoritarian_government = yes
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -3 }
			change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		}
		custom_override_tooltip = {
			tooltip = {
				localization_key = tooltip_create_division_template
				NAME = "Zhenskaya Dobrovolnaya Pekhotnaya Divizya"
				LINE_1 = { localization_key = line_battalion_tt NAME = infantry ICON = GFX_unit_infantry_icon_small COUNT = 9 }
				LINE_2 = { localization_key = line_battalion_tt NAME = artillery_brigade ICON = GFX_unit_artillery_brigade_icon_small COUNT = 3 }
				SUPPORT_1 = { localization_key = support_battalion_tt NAME = artillery ICON = GFX_unit_artillery_icon_small }
				SUPPORT_2 = { localization_key = support_battalion_tt NAME = engineer ICON = GFX_unit_engineer_icon_small }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_template = "Zhenskaya Dobrovolnaya Pekhotnaya Divizya" }
				delete_unit_template_and_units = { division_template = "Zhenskaya Dobrovolnaya Pekhotnaya Divizya" disband = yes } #no cheating
			}
			division_template = {
				name = "Zhenskaya Dobrovolnaya Pekhotnaya Divizya"
				division_names_group = RUS_INF_01
				regiments = {
					infantry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
					infantry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
					infantry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
					infantry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
					infantry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
					infantry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
					infantry = { x = 2 y = 0 }
					infantry = { x = 2 y = 1 }
					infantry = { x = 2 y = 2 }
					artillery_brigade = { x = 3 y = 0 }
					artillery_brigade = { x = 3 y = 1 }
					artillery_brigade = { x = 3 y = 2 }
				}
				support = {
					artillery = { x = 0 y = 0 }
					engineer = { x = 0 y = 1 }
				}
			}
		}
		random_owned_controlled_state = {
			prioritize = { 219 }
			limit = { valid_state_for_spawning_friendly_unit = yes }
			custom_override_tooltip = {
				tooltip = {
					localization_key = tooltip_spawn_unit
					TYPE = "Zhenskaya Dobrovolnaya Pekhotnaya Divizya"
				}
				create_unit = {
					division = "name = \"Zhenskaya Dobrovolnaya Pekhotnaya Divizya\" division_template = \"Zhenskaya Dobrovolnaya Pekhotnaya Divizya\" start_experience_factor = 0.2"
					owner = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		set_rule = { can_generate_female_aces = yes }
		if = {
			limit = { has_socialist_government = yes }
			set_rule = { can_generate_female_unit_leaders = yes }
			add_ideas = RUS_night_witches_idea
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.161 option russia_flavour_events.161.b"
		name = russia_flavour_events.161.b
		ai_chance = { base = 40 }
		add_political_power = -20
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_demrus = yes
				amount_taken_ideas = {
					amount < 3
					slots = { political_advisor }
				}
				RUS_maria_zakharchenko = { is_hired_as_advisor = no }
			}
			activate_advisor = RUS_maria_zakharchenko_advisor
		}
		add_manpower = 86500
		set_rule = { can_generate_female_aces = yes }
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_with_small_blood } }
			enable_tech_improved_field_hospitals = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.161 option russia_flavour_events.161.c"
		name = russia_flavour_events.161.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 40
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.25
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
		}
		add_war_support = -0.01
		if = {
			limit = { has_socialist_government = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -5 }
			change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #The Heart of the Army
	id = russia_flavour_events.170
	title = russia_flavour_events.170.t
	desc = russia_flavour_events.170.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_white_army
	trigger = { has_socialist_government = no }

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.170 option russia_flavour_events.170.a"
		name = russia_flavour_events.170.a
		add_war_support = 0.02
		add_popularity = { ideology = paternal_autocrat popularity = 0.04 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.170 option russia_flavour_events.170.b"
		name = russia_flavour_events.170.b
		trigger = { has_soclib_or_socdem_government = yes }
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		add_political_power = 30
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_demrus = yes
				is_monarchy = no
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_counts_as_mil_republicanisation
			add_to_variable = { RUS_republicanisation = 1 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Germans Beg for Peace
	id = russia_flavour_events.172
	title = russia_flavour_events.172.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_savinkov = no }
		text = russia_flavour_events.172.d
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_savinkov = yes }
		text = russia_flavour_events.172.d2
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_conference3

	trigger = {
		has_socialist_government = no
		GER = {
			has_war_with = ROOT
			has_war_with = INT
			surrender_progress > 0.2
			any_owned_state = {
				is_core_of = PREV
				is_controlled_by = ROOT
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.172 option russia_flavour_events.172.a"
		name = russia_flavour_events.172.a
		trigger = { NOT = { has_government = national_populist } }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_flavour_events.172 option russia_flavour_events.172.b"
		name = russia_flavour_events.172.b
		trigger = { has_government = national_populist }
	}
}

### MIO Effects and Modifiers ###
country_event = { #Event for giving funds to LAZ from NAZ (doesn't want to give it when coded in RUS_organization)
	id = russia_events.1001

	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.1001 option 1"
		mio:RUS_laz_organisation = {
			add_mio_funds = 1000
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Event for constructing random buildings from OSOAVIA
	id = russia_events.1002

	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.1002 option 1"
		RUS_Gamayun_Factories = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Event for giving random funds to MIOs from Obukhov MIO
	id = russia_events.1008

	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.1008 option 1"
		trigger = {
			mio:RUS_obukhov_organisation = {
				has_mio_policy_active = RUS_mio_policy_private_assistance_obukhov
			}
		}
		RUS_private_assistance = yes
		country_event = { id = russia_events.1008 days = 30 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Event for giving random funds to MIOs from Gamayun MIO
	id = russia_events.1010

	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.1010 option 1"
		trigger = {
			mio:RUS_gamayun_organisation = {
				has_mio_policy_active = RUS_mio_policy_private_assistance_osoavia
			}
		}
		RUS_private_assistance = yes
		country_event = { id = russia_events.1010 days = 30 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Event for giving random funds to MIOs from BZ MIO
	id = russia_events.1011

	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.1011 option 1"
		trigger = {
			mio:RUS_bz_organisation = {
				has_mio_policy_active = RUS_mio_policy_private_assistance_bz
			}
		}
		RUS_private_assistance = yes
		country_event = { id = russia_events.1011 days = 30 }
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = russia_events.1012

	trigger = {
		mio:RUS_toz_organisation = {
			has_mio_policy_active = RUS_mio_policy_dedicated_experimental_research_centres
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.1012 option 1"
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_has_TOZ_attack_medal = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_TOZ_attack_medal = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_has_TOZ_defense_medal = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_TOZ_defense_medal = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_has_TOZ_org_medal = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_TOZ_org_medal = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_has_TOZ_breakthrough_medal = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_TOZ_breakthrough_medal = 1 }
		}
		random_country_division = {
			limit = { unit_organization > 0.02 }
			add_history_entry = {
				key = RUS_TOZ_Medal_Award
				subject = "RUS_TOZ_Medal_Award"
				allow = yes
			}
			meta_effect = {
				text = { add_unit_medal_to_latest_entry = { unit_medals = RUS_TOZ_Medal_[MEDAL] } }
				MEDAL = "[?RUS_TOZ_attack_medal|0][?RUS_TOZ_defense_medal|0][?RUS_TOZ_org_medal|0][?RUS_TOZ_breakthrough_medal|0]"
			}
			set_unit_organization = 0.01
		}
		country_event = { id = russia_events.1012 days = 50 }
	}
}
### News Events

# Viktor Chernov Assassinated!
news_event = {
	id = russia_news_events.1
	immediate = { log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_news_events.1" }
	title = russia_news_events.1.t
	desc = russia_news_events.1.d
	picture = GFX_news_event_RUS_assassination_of_alexander_kerensky

	major = yes
	fire_for_sender = no
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = { wants_world_news = yes } #Global news event

	option = {
		name = russia_news_events.1.a
	}
}

# The Russian State
news_event = {
	id = russia_news_events.2
	immediate = { log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_news_events.2" }
	title = russia_news_events.2.t
	desc = russia_news_events.2.d
	picture = GFX_news_event_RUS_savinkov

	major = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_for_sender = no

	trigger = { wants_world_news = yes } #Global news event

	option = {
		name = russia_news_events.2.a
		trigger = { is_ally_with = GER }
	}
	option = {
		name = russia_news_events.2.b
		trigger = { is_ally_with = RUS }
	}
	option = {
		name = russia_news_events.2.c
		trigger = {
			has_socialist_government = yes
			NOT = {
				is_ally_with = GER
				is_ally_with = RUS
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia_news_events.2.e
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				is_ally_with = GER
				is_ally_with = RUS
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

# Savinkov Overthrown by Angry Military
news_event = {
	id = russia_news_events.3
	immediate = { log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_news_events.3" }
	title = russia_news_events.3.t
	picture = "[RUS_army_coup_event_picture]"

	desc = {
		text = russia_news_events.3.d.wrangel
		trigger = { RUS = { RUS_pyotr_wrangel = { is_army_chief = yes } } }
	}
	desc = {
		text = russia_news_events.3.d.denikin
		trigger = { NOT = { RUS = { RUS_pyotr_wrangel = { is_army_chief = yes } } } }
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_for_sender = no
	major = yes

	trigger = { wants_world_news = yes } #Global news event

	option = {
		name = russia_news_events.3.a
		trigger = { is_ally_with = RUS }
	}
	option = {
		name = russia_news_events.3.b
		trigger = { is_ally_with = GER }
	}
	option = {
		name = russia_news_events.3.c
		trigger = {
			NOT = { is_ally_with = RUS }
			OR = {
				is_ally_with = INT
				is_ally_with = JAP
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia_news_events.3.e
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				is_ally_with = RUS
				is_ally_with = GER
				is_ally_with = INT
				is_ally_with = JAP
			}
		}
	}
}

# Russia restored to democracy
news_event = {
	id = russia_news_events.5
	immediate = { log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_news_events.5" }
	title = russia_news_events.5.t
	picture = GFX_news_event_RUS_moscow
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			RUS = { is_monarchy = no }
		}
		text = russia_news_events.5.d
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			RUS = { is_monarchy = yes }
		}
		text = russia_news_events.5.d2
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_for_sender = no
	major = yes

	trigger = { wants_world_news = yes } #Global news event

	option = {
		name = russia_news_events.5.a
		trigger = {
			is_ally_with = RUS
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia_news_events.5.b
		trigger = {
			has_war_with = RUS
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia_news_events.5.c
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				is_ally_with = RUS
				has_war_with = RUS
			}
		}
	}
}

# Wrangel becomes wartime regent and DICTATOR
news_event = {
	id = russia_news_events.7
	immediate = { log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_news_events.7" }
	title = russia_news_events.7.t
	desc = russia_news_events.7.d
	picture = GFX_news_event_RUS_tsar_wrangel

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_for_sender = no
	major = yes

	trigger = { wants_world_news = yes } #Global news event

	option = {
		name = russia_news_events.7.a
		trigger = { is_ally_with = RUS }
	}
	option = {
		name = russia_news_events.7.b
		trigger = { has_war_with = RUS }
	}
	option = {
		name = russia_news_events.7.c
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				is_ally_with = RUS
				has_war_with = RUS
			}
		}
	}
}

# Formation of the Moscow Accord
news_event = {
	id = russia_news_events.10
	immediate = { log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_news_events.10" }
	title = russia_news_events.10.t
	desc = russia_news_events.10.d
	picture = GFX_news_event_RUS_treaty_1
	major = yes
	fire_for_sender = no
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = { wants_world_news = yes } #Global news event

	option = {
		name = russia_news_events.10.a
		trigger = { is_in_faction_with = GER }
		effect_tooltip = { RUS_moscow_accord_threat = yes }
	}

	option = {
		name = russia_news_events.10.b
		trigger = { is_in_faction_with = INT }
		effect_tooltip = { RUS_moscow_accord_threat = yes }
	}

	option = {
		name = russia_news_events.10.c
		trigger = { is_in_faction_with = ENT }
		effect_tooltip = { RUS_moscow_accord_threat = yes }
	}

	option = {
		name = russia_news_events.10.f
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				is_in_faction_with = GER
				is_in_faction_with = INT
				is_in_faction_with = ENT
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = { RUS_moscow_accord_threat = yes }
	}
}

	id = russia_news_events.20
	immediate = { log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_news_events.20" }
	title = russia_news_events.20.t
	desc = russia_news_events.20.d
	picture = GFX_news_event_RUS_treaty_2

	trigger = { wants_world_news = yes } #Global news event

	is_triggered_only = yes
	major = yes

	show_major = {
		has_socialist_government = no
	}

	option = {
		name = russia_news_events.20.a
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				tag = RUS
				tag = SER
				is_in_faction_with = SER
				is_in_faction_with = RUS
				tag = LAT
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia_news_events.20.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				tag = RUS
				tag = SER
				is_in_faction_with = SER
				is_in_faction_with = RUS
				tag = LAT
			}
		}
	}
}

		has_socialist_government = no
	}

		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				tag = RUS
				tag = SER
				is_in_faction_with = SER
				is_in_faction_with = RUS
				tag = LAT
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia_news_events.21.b
		trigger = { tag = RUS }
	}
	option = {
		name = russia_news_events.21.c
		trigger = {
			NOT = { tag = RUS }
			OR = {
				tag = SER
				is_in_faction_with = SER
				is_in_faction_with = RUS
				tag = LAT
			}
		}
	}

### Debug events ###

country_event = {
	id = russia_events.5000
	title = russia_events.test.t
	desc = russia_events.test.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		deactivate_advisor = RUS_vladimir_nabokov_natpop_advisor
		deactivate_advisor = RUS_vladimir_nabokov_dem_advisor
		clr_country_flag = RUS_lost_wk2
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.5000 option RUS_test_republic"
		name = RUS_test_republic
		RUS_anton_denikin = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype }
				promote_character = { ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype }
			}
			else = {
				add_country_leader_role = {
					country_leader = {
						desc = RUS_anton_denikin_leader_desc
						ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
					}
					promote_leader = yes
				}
			}
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		RUS_remove_savinkov = yes
		RUS_setup_demrus = yes
		add_ideas = RUS_republic_under_watch
		set_variable = { RUS_target_army_size = num_divisions }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_target_army_size = 5 }
		set_variable = { RUS_military_demands_var = 120 }
		activate_mission = RUS_military_demands
		country_event = russia_events.5003
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.5000 option RUS_test_monarchy"
		name = RUS_test_monarchy
		country_event = russia_events.5007
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.5000 option RUS_test_socrus-sr"
		name = RUS_test_socrus-sr
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = radical_socialist
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		RUS_initialise_socrus = yes
		RUS_maria_spiridonova = {
			promote_character = { ideology = radical_socialist_subtype }
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_boris_kamkov_sic
		complete_national_focus = RUS_red_flag_over_kremlin
		complete_national_focus = RUS_russian_congress
		country_event = russia_socialist_events.411
		activate_advisor = RUS_yury_sablin_army_chief
		RUS_purge_white_generals = yes
		RUS = {
			RUS_mikhail_tukhachevsky = {
				set_nationality = PREV.PREV
				set_portraits = {
					army = {
						large = GFX_portrait_RUS_mikhail_tukhachevsky_army_large
						small = GFX_portrait_RUS_mikhail_tukhachevsky_army_small
					}
				}
			}
			RUS_vasily_blyukher = { set_nationality = PREV.PREV }
			RUS_boris_shaposhnikov = { set_nationality = PREV.PREV }
			RUS_kirill_meretskov = { set_nationality = PREV.PREV }
			RUS_semyon_timoshenko = { set_nationality = PREV.PREV }
			RUS_mikhail_frunze = { set_nationality = PREV.PREV }
			RUS_iosif_stalin = { set_nationality = PREV.PREV }
			RUS_aleksandr_yegorov = { set_nationality = PREV.PREV }
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_exiles_have_returned
		add_ideas = RUS_white_army_red_baron
		add_ideas = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_3
		add_ideas = RUS_workers_control
		set_cosmetic_tag = RUS_soc
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.5000 option RUS_test_socrus-vst"
		name = RUS_test_socrus-vst
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = syndicalist
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		RUS_initialise_socrus = yes
		activate_advisor = RUS_daniil_sulimov_sic
		complete_national_focus = RUS_revolution_from_above
		complete_national_focus = RUS_russian_congress
		complete_national_focus = RUS_syndicalists
		country_event = russia_events.5006
		country_event = russia_socialist_events.411
		activate_advisor = RUS_yury_sablin_army_chief
		RUS_purge_white_generals = yes
		RUS = {
			RUS_mikhail_tukhachevsky = {
				set_nationality = PREV.PREV
				set_portraits = {
					army = {
						large = GFX_portrait_RUS_mikhail_tukhachevsky_army_large
						small = GFX_portrait_RUS_mikhail_tukhachevsky_army_small
					}
				}
			}
			RUS_vasily_blyukher = { set_nationality = PREV.PREV }
			RUS_boris_shaposhnikov = { set_nationality = PREV.PREV }
			RUS_kirill_meretskov = { set_nationality = PREV.PREV }
			RUS_semyon_timoshenko = { set_nationality = PREV.PREV }
			RUS_mikhail_frunze = { set_nationality = PREV.PREV }
			RUS_iosif_stalin = { set_nationality = PREV.PREV }
			RUS_aleksandr_yegorov = { set_nationality = PREV.PREV }
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_exiles_have_returned
		add_ideas = RUS_white_army_red_baron
		add_ideas = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_3
		add_ideas = RUS_workers_control
		set_cosmetic_tag = RUS_soc
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.5000 option RUS_test_far_eastern_army"
		name = RUS_test_far_eastern_army
		set_country_flag = RUS_underfunded_vladivostok
		set_country_flag = RUS_ussuri_unrest
		FER = {
			FER_setup_far_eastern_army = yes
			change_tag_from = ROOT
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.5000 option RUS_test_boldyrev-army"
		name = RUS_test_boldyrev-army
		set_global_flag = RSA_enabled
		country_event = russia_boldyrev_events.10
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.5000 option RUS_test_boldyrev-postwar"
		name = RUS_test_boldyrev-postwar
		set_global_flag = RSA_enabled
		RSA = {
			RUS = { transfer_technology = yes }
			RSA_setup_boldyrev = yes
		}
		GER = { country_event = russia_foreign_policy_events.1302 }
	}
}

		}

			promote_character = { ideology = social_conservative_subtype }
		}
		country_event = russia_elections_events.36
		country_event = russia_elections_events.50
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = russia_events.5006
	title = russia_events.test.t
	desc = russia_events.test.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.5006 option RUS_test_levitsky"
		name = RUS_test_levitsky
		activate_advisor = RUS_daniil_sulimov_sic
		complete_national_focus = RUS_internationalists
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		set_variable = { var = sds_var value = 7 }
		set_variable = { var = rkp_var value = 4 }
		set_variable = { var = sr_var value = 5 }
		set_variable = { var = vst_left_var value = 4 }
		set_variable = { var = vst_right_var value = 7 }
		set_variable = { var = vst_centre_unity value = 6 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.5006 option RUS_test_abramovich"
		name = RUS_test_abramovich
		activate_advisor = RUS_fyodor_dan_sic
		complete_national_focus = RUS_mensheviks
		RUS_rafail_abramovich = { promote_character = syndicalist_subtype }
		set_variable = { var = sds_var value = 5 }
		set_variable = { var = rkp_var value = 0 }
		set_variable = { var = sr_var value = 7 }
		set_variable = { var = vst_left_var value = 5 }
		set_variable = { var = vst_centre_var value = 5 }
		set_variable = { var = vst_centre_unity value = 6 }
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.5006 option RUS_test_kamenev"
		name = RUS_test_kamenev
		activate_advisor = RUS_grigory_zinovyev_sic
		complete_national_focus = RUS_communists
		RUS_lev_kamenev = { promote_character = syndicalist_subtype }
		country_event = russia_socialist_events.328
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		set_variable = { var = sds_var value = 0 }
		set_variable = { var = rkp_var value = 7 }
		set_variable = { var = sr_var value = 3 }
		set_variable = { var = vst_centre_var value = 7 }
		set_variable = { var = vst_right_var value = 3 }
		set_variable = { var = vst_centre_unity value = 6 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.5006 option RUS_test_sulimov"
		name = RUS_test_sulimov
		activate_advisor = RUS_daniil_sulimov_sic
		complete_national_focus = RUS_internationalists
		RUS_daniil_sulimov = { promote_character = syndicalist_subtype }
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		set_variable = { var = sds_var value = 7 }
		set_variable = { var = rkp_var value = 4 }
		set_variable = { var = sr_var value = 5 }
		set_variable = { var = vst_left_var value = 4 }
		set_variable = { var = vst_right_var value = 7 }
		set_variable = { var = vst_centre_unity value = 6 }
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = russia_events.5007
	title = russia_events.test.t
	desc = russia_events.test.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.5007 option RUS_test_soclib"
		name = RUS_test_soclib
		clr_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_path
		RUS_remove_savinkov = yes
		RUS_create_monarchy = yes
		RUS_setup_demrus = yes
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = social_liberal
			elections_allowed = yes
		}
		RUS_ilya_fondaminsky = { unit_leader_event = russia_elections_events.38 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.5007 option RUS_test_marlib"
		name = RUS_test_marlib
		clr_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_path
		RUS_remove_savinkov = yes
		RUS_create_monarchy = yes
		RUS_setup_demrus = yes
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = market_liberal
			elections_allowed = yes
		}
		country_event = russia_elections_events.39
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.5007 option RUS_test_soccon"
		name = RUS_test_soccon
		clr_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_path
		RUS_remove_savinkov = yes
		RUS_create_monarchy = yes
		RUS_setup_demrus = yes
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = social_conservative
			elections_allowed = yes
		}
		country_event = russia_elections_events.40
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_events.5007 option RUS_test_wrangel"
		name = RUS_test_wrangel
		RUS_pyotr_wrangel = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype }
				promote_character = { ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype }
			}
			else = {
				add_country_leader_role = {
					country_leader = {
						desc = RUS_pyotr_wrangel_leader_desc
						ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
					}
					promote_leader = yes
				}
			}
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		RUS_remove_savinkov = yes
		set_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_path
		RUS_create_monarchy = yes
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		complete_national_focus = RUS_black_baron
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			long_name = RUS_authoritarian_democrat_party_long
			name = RUS_authoritarian_democrat_party
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_vasily_shulgin_sic
	}
}

country_event = { # Balkan War for potential Power Projection
	id = russia_foreign_policy_events.256
	title = russia_foreign_policy_events.256.t
	desc = russia_foreign_policy_events.256.d

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = RUS_belgrade_support_volunteers
		has_global_flag = balkan_war_ended
		SER = { owns_state = 767 } #Nish
		has_socialist_government = no
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.256 option russia_foreign_policy_events.256.a"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.256.a
		clr_country_flag = RUS_belgrade_support_volunteers
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_power_change = 10 }
		RUS_change_projection = yes
		army_experience = 10
	}
}

			name = russia_foreign_policy_events.257.t
			bonus = 0.25
			uses = 1
			category = logistics_tech
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # China reunifying for Power Projection
	id = russia_foreign_policy_events.262
	title = russia_foreign_policy_events.262.t
	desc = russia_foreign_policy_events.262.d

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = RUS_China_support_volunteers
		any_country = {
			has_idea = RUS_chinese_military_mission_idea
			OR = {
				has_idea = QIE_united_china_idea
				has_idea = unite_china_justification_idea
			}
		}
		has_socialist_government = no
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.262 option russia_foreign_policy_events.262.a"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.262.a
		clr_country_flag = RUS_China_support_volunteers
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_power_change = 20 }
		RUS_change_projection = yes
		add_political_power = 40
	}
}

country_event = { # Iranian aid
	id = russia_foreign_policy_events.263
	title = russia_foreign_policy_events.263.t
	desc = russia_foreign_policy_events.263.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.263 option russia_foreign_policy_events.263.a"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.263.a
		ai_chance = { base = 1 }
		RUS = { set_country_flag = RUS_iranian_aid_sent }
		if = {
			limit = { OTT_ottomans_defeated = no }
			add_ideas = RUS_PER_aid
		}
		RUS = {
			add_relation_modifier = {
				target = PER
				modifier = volunteer_limit_plus_two
			}
		}
		clr_country_flag = PER_align_with_GER
		PER_forpol_setup = yes #Choose between neutrality or MA alignment
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia_foreign_policy_events.263 option russia_foreign_policy_events.263.b"
		name = russia_foreign_policy_events.263.b
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
	}
}
